2PGuidance001.UsEnglish:
If you have two [icon WiiRemote], two people can play!
Press [icon Abtn] and aim [icon WiiRemote] at the screen. When
you see [icon YellowCursor], you're ready to play!
2PGuidance001.EuEnglish:
If you have two [icon WiiRemote], two people can play!
Press [icon Abtn] and aim [icon WiiRemote] at the screen. When
you see [icon YellowCursor], you're ready to play!
2PGuidance001.EuDutch:
If you have two [icon WiiRemote], two people can play!
Press [icon Abtn] and aim [icon WiiRemote] at the screen. When
you see [icon YellowCursor], you're ready to play!
2PGuidance001.UsFrench:
Si vous avez deux [icon WiiRemote], deux joueurs 
peuvent coopérer! Appuyez sur [icon Abtn] et 
pointez [icon WiiRemote] sur l'écran. Quand vous voyez 
le [icon YellowCursor], tout est prêt!
2PGuidance001.EuFrench:
Deux joueurs peuvent coopérer si vous
disposez de deux télécommandes Wii.
Appuyez sur [icon Abtn] sur la seconde
télécommande Wii. Quand le curseur [icon YellowCursor]
apparaît, tout est prêt!
2PGuidance001.UsSpanish:
Pueden jugar dos personas
con dos [icon WiiRemote]. Oprime [icon Abtn] y
apunta con [icon WiiRemote]  a la
pantalla. Cuando veas [icon YellowCursor],
estarás listo para jugar.
2PGuidance001.EuSpanish:
Dos personas pueden jugar con dos mandos
de Wii. Apunta a la pantalla y pulsa [icon Abtn] en
el mando. En cuanto salga el [icon YellowCursor]cursor
estelar, todo estará listo para jugar.
2PGuidance001.EuGerman:
Hast du zwei [icon WiiRemote], können zwei 
Spieler spielen. Richte die [icon WiiRemote]
auf den Bildschirm und drücke [icon Abtn].
Erscheint der [icon YellowCursor], kann es
losgehen!
2PGuidance001.EuItalian:
Con due [icon WiiRemote] è possibile
giocare in coppia. Punta [icon WiiRemote]
verso lo schermo e premi
[icon Abtn]. Quando appare [icon YellowCursor],
potrai iniziare.
2PGuidance001.JpJapanese:
Wiiリモコンが２つあれば　[ruby base]二人[ruby top]ふたり[ruby end]で[ruby base]遊[ruby top]あそ[ruby end]ぶことができます！
Wiiリモコンの[icon Abtn]ボタンを[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]し、[ruby base]画面[ruby top]がめん[ruby end]に[ruby base]向[ruby top]む[ruby end]けてください
[icon YellowCursor]ポインターが[ruby base]出[ruby top]で[ruby end]てきたら　[ruby base]準備[ruby top]じゅんび[ruby end]OKです
2PGuidance001.KrKorean:
Wii 리모컨 2개로 협력 플레이!
Wii 리모컨 [icon Abtn]를 눌러
[icon YellowCursor]포인터가 나오면 됩니다

2PGuidance002.UsEnglish:
Collect [icon StarBit] with [icon YellowCursor]! Aim [icon YellowCursor] and press [icon Bbtn]
to shoot [icon StarBit]. What happens if you hit an
enemy with [icon StarBit]?
2PGuidance002.EuEnglish:
Collect [icon StarBit] with [icon YellowCursor]! Aim [icon YellowCursor] and press [icon Bbtn]
to shoot [icon StarBit]. What happens if you hit an
enemy with [icon StarBit]?
2PGuidance002.EuDutch:
Collect [icon StarBit] with [icon YellowCursor]! Aim [icon YellowCursor] and press [icon Bbtn]
to shoot [icon StarBit]. What happens if you hit an
enemy with [icon StarBit]?
2PGuidance002.UsFrench:
Ramassez des [icon StarBit] avec le [icon YellowCursor]! Visez avec 
le [icon YellowCursor] et appuyez sur [icon Bbtn] pour tirer un [icon StarBit].
Essayez de frapper un ennemi avec un [icon StarBit]!
2PGuidance002.EuFrench:
Récoltez des fragments d'étoiles [icon StarBit] avec
le curseur [icon YellowCursor]! Visez avec [icon YellowCursor] et appuyez
sur [icon Bbtn] pour tirer des [icon StarBit] sur les ennemis!
2PGuidance002.UsSpanish:
¡Reúne [icon StarBit] con [icon YellowCursor]!
Apunta con [icon YellowCursor] y
oprime [icon Bbtn] para lanzar [icon StarBit].
Si lanzas [icon StarBit] a un enemigo....
2PGuidance002.EuSpanish:
¡Reúne [icon StarBit]trozos de estrella con el
[icon YellowCursor]cursor estelar! Apunta con [icon YellowCursor]
y pulsa [icon Bbtn] para lanzar [icon StarBit].
¿Qué pasará si le das a un enemigo
con [icon StarBit]? ¡Ya lo verás!
2PGuidance002.EuGerman:
Sammle mit dem [icon YellowCursor] 
Sternenzeiger [icon StarBit] Sternenteile! 
Wenn du mit dem [icon YellowCursor] zielst
und [icon Bbtn] drückst, kannst du
[icon StarBit] abfeuern...
2PGuidance002.EuItalian:
Prendi le Astroschegge [icon StarBit]
con il Cursore Stella [icon YellowCursor]!
Mira ai nemici con [icon YellowCursor] e
spara [icon StarBit] premendo [icon Bbtn].
2PGuidance002.JpJapanese:
[icon YellowCursor]ポインターで[icon StarBit]スターピースを[ruby base]集[ruby top]あつ[ruby end]めましょう！
[icon YellowCursor]でねらって[icon Bbtn]ボタンを[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]せば　[icon StarBit]を[ruby base]撃[ruby top]う[ruby end]てます
[icon StarBit]を[ruby base]敵[ruby top]てき[ruby end]に[ruby base]当[ruby top]あ[ruby end]てると…？
2PGuidance002.KrKorean:
[icon YellowCursor]포인터로 [icon StarBit]스타구슬을 모으고
[icon Bbtn]를 눌러 [icon StarBit]스타구슬을 쏘세요
[icon StarBit]을 쏴서 적에게 맞히면…?

2PGuidance003.UsEnglish:
Point at enemies and press [icon Abtn] to stop them
and shove them out of the way. If you
shake bushes, [icon StarBit] or [icon Coin] might pop out.
2PGuidance003.EuEnglish:
Point at enemies and press [icon Abtn] to stop them
and shove them out of the way. If you
shake bushes, [icon StarBit] or [icon Coin] might pop out.
2PGuidance003.EuDutch:
Point at enemies and press [icon Abtn] to stop them
and shove them out of the way. If you
shake bushes, [icon StarBit] or [icon Coin] might pop out.
2PGuidance003.UsFrench:
Visez un ennemi et appuyez sur [icon Abtn] pour 
l'immobiliser ou le bousculer. Fouillez les 
herbes et vous dénicherez peut-être des 
[icon StarBit] ou des [icon Coin].
2PGuidance003.EuFrench:
Visez un ennemi et appuyez sur [icon Abtn] pour
l'immobiliser ou le bousculer.
Et en fouillant les herbes, vous dénicherez
peut-être des fragments d'étoiles [icon StarBit] ou
des pièces [icon Coin]!
2PGuidance003.UsSpanish:
Apunta al enemigo y haz que se
detenga con [icon Abtn]. Si haces
que se muevan los arbustos, a veces
aparecerán [icon StarBit] o [icon Coin].
2PGuidance003.EuSpanish:
Apunta al enemigo y detén su marcha
con [icon Abtn]. Si pasas el cursor por la
hierba, a veces aparecen [icon StarBit]trozos
de estrella o [icon Coin]monedas.
2PGuidance003.EuGerman:
Zeige auf einen Gegner und
drücke [icon Abtn], um ihn aus
dem Weg zu schnippen.
Im Gebüsch finden sich
[icon StarBit] oder [icon Coin]...
2PGuidance003.EuItalian:
Punta verso i nemici e tieni
premuto [icon Abtn]: potrai fermarli
o ribaltarli. Nell'erba si
trovano Astroschegge [icon StarBit] o
Monete [icon Coin].
2PGuidance003.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]敵[ruby top]てき[ruby end]をポイントして[icon Abtn]で[ruby base]止[ruby top]と[ruby end]めたり、はじいたりできます
[ruby base]草[ruby top]くさ[ruby end]むらなどをこすると　[icon StarBit]スターピースや
[icon Coin]コインが[ruby base]出[ruby top]で[ruby end]てくることもあります
2PGuidance003.KrKorean:
적을 포인트해서 [icon Abtn]를 누르면
정지시키거나 튕겨낼 수 있습니다
풀에서는 [icon StarBit]이나 [icon Coin]도 나옵니다

2PGuidance004.UsEnglish:
Point at Mario with [icon YellowCursor] and press [icon Abtn]
to make him jump. Point [icon YellowCursor] when he's
airborne and press [icon Abtn] to make him spin.
2PGuidance004.EuEnglish:
Point at Mario with [icon YellowCursor] and press [icon Abtn]
to make him jump. Point [icon YellowCursor] when he's
airborne and press [icon Abtn] to make him Spin.
2PGuidance004.EuDutch:
Point at Mario with [icon YellowCursor] and press [icon Abtn]
to make him jump. Point [icon YellowCursor] when he's
airborne and press [icon Abtn] to make him Spin.
2PGuidance004.UsFrench:
Pointez Mario avec le [icon YellowCursor] quand il est au 
sol et appuyez sur [icon Abtn] pour le faire 
sauter. Pointez le [icon YellowCursor] lorsqu'il est dans 
l'air et appuyez sur [icon Abtn] pour le faire 
tourbillonner.
2PGuidance004.EuFrench:
Pointez Mario avec [icon YellowCursor] quand il est au sol
et appuyez sur [icon Abtn] pour le faire sauter.
Pointez Mario avec [icon YellowCursor] quand il est en l'air
et appuyez sur [icon Abtn] pour le faire tournoyer.
2PGuidance004.UsSpanish:
Apunta a Mario en el suelo
con [icon YellowCursor] y salta con [icon Abtn].
Apunta a Mario en el aire
con [icon YellowCursor] y gira con [icon Abtn].
2PGuidance004.EuSpanish:
Apunta a Mario con [icon YellowCursor] cuando está
en el suelo y hazle saltar con [icon Abtn].
Apunta a Mario con [icon YellowCursor] cuando está
en el aire y hazle girar con [icon Abtn].
2PGuidance004.EuGerman:
Zeige mit dem [icon YellowCursor] auf Mario am
Boden und springe mit [icon Abtn].
Zeige mit dem [icon YellowCursor] auf Mario in
der Luft und mache eine
Drehattacke mit [icon Abtn].
2PGuidance004.EuItalian:
Mentre è a terra, punta [icon YellowCursor]
verso Mario e fallo saltare
con [icon Abtn]. Quando è in aria,
punta [icon YellowCursor] verso di lui e
premi [icon Abtn] per farlo ruotare.
2PGuidance004.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]地上[ruby top]ちじょう[ruby end]のマリオを[icon YellowCursor]でポイントして[icon Abtn]で　ジャンプします
[ruby base]空中[ruby top]くうちゅう[ruby end]のマリオを[icon YellowCursor]でポイントして[icon Abtn]で　スピンします
2PGuidance004.KrKorean:
땅에서는 [icon YellowCursor]로 포인트 [icon Abtn]로 점프
공중에서는 [icon YellowCursor]로 포인트 [icon Abtn]로 스핀

2PGuidance005.UsEnglish:
Point at Mario with [icon YellowCursor], and if both players
press [icon Abtn] at the same time, he'll perform
an extra-high Super Jump!
2PGuidance005.EuEnglish:
Point at Mario with [icon YellowCursor], and if both players
press [icon Abtn] at the same time, he'll perform
an extra-high Super Jump!
2PGuidance005.EuDutch:
Point at Mario with [icon YellowCursor], and if both players
press [icon Abtn] at the same time, he'll perform
an extra-high Super Jump!
2PGuidance005.UsFrench:
Pointez Mario avec le [icon YellowCursor] et appuyez 
simultanément sur [icon Abtn] sur les deux [icon WiiRemote] 
pour effectuer un saut combiné plus haut 
que le saut normal!
2PGuidance005.EuFrench:
Pointez Mario avec [icon YellowCursor] et appuyez
simultanément sur [icon Abtn] sur les deux
télécommandes Wii pour effectuer un
saut combiné plus haut que le saut normal!
2PGuidance005.UsSpanish:
Apunta a Mario con [icon YellowCursor],
y al oprimir [icon Abtn] los dos jugadores
a la vez, conseguirán un salto
combinado más alto de lo normal.
2PGuidance005.EuSpanish:
Apunta a Mario con [icon YellowCursor]. Cuando
los dos jugadores pulsen [icon Abtn] a la vez,
conseguirán un salto combinado
más alto de lo normal.
2PGuidance005.EuGerman:
Wenn ihr mit dem [icon YellowCursor] auf Mario
zeigt und beide gleichzeitig
[icon Abtn] drückt, macht ihr einen
Kombinationssprung, der
höher ist als gewöhnlich.
2PGuidance005.EuItalian:
Punta [icon YellowCursor] verso Mario e
premi [icon Abtn] insieme all'altro
giocatore per fare un super
salto. Il salto sarà più
alto del solito!
2PGuidance005.JpJapanese:
[icon YellowCursor]でマリオをポイントして[ruby base]二人[ruby top]ふたり[ruby end][ruby base]同時[ruby top]どうじ[ruby end]に[icon Abtn]を[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]せば
[ruby base]通常[ruby top]つうじょう[ruby end]より[ruby base]高[ruby top]たか[ruby end]い　スーパージャンプ！
2PGuidance005.KrKorean:
[icon YellowCursor]로 마리오를 포인트해서
둘이 함께 [icon Abtn]를 누르면
평소보다 높이 높이 슈퍼 점프!

2PGuidanceIcon.JpJapanese: アシストプレイについて

2PGuidanceTitle001.UsEnglish: Play Co-Star Mode with Two People!
2PGuidanceTitle001.EuEnglish: Play Co-Star Mode with Two People!
2PGuidanceTitle001.EuDutch: Play Co-Star Mode with Two People!
2PGuidanceTitle001.UsFrench:
Jouer en Mode Coopératif
avec Deux Personnes!
2PGuidanceTitle001.JpJapanese: [ruby base]二人[ruby top]ふたり[ruby end]で[ruby base]遊[ruby top]あそ[ruby end]ぶには？（アシストプレイ）

2PGuidanceTitle002.UsFrench:
Coopérez pour ramasser 
les Éclats d'Étoile!
2PGuidanceTitle002.JpJapanese: [ruby base]二人[ruby top]ふたり[ruby end]でスターピースを[ruby base]集[ruby top]あつ[ruby end]めて[ruby base]撃[ruby top]う[ruby end]て！

2PGuidanceTitle003.UsEnglish: Point and Press [icon Abtn] to Help!
2PGuidanceTitle003.EuEnglish: Point and Press [icon Abtn] to Help!
2PGuidanceTitle003.EuDutch: Point and Press [icon Abtn] to Help!
2PGuidanceTitle003.UsFrench:
Pointez et appuyez sur
[icon Abtn] pour aider.
2PGuidanceTitle003.JpJapanese: ポイントして[icon Abtn]ボタンでアシスト

2PGuidanceTitle005.JpJapanese: [ruby base]協力[ruby top]きょうりょく[ruby end]ジャンプ

page. Want to post it to
the Wii Message Board?
AllStarList_ConfirmCapture.EuDutch:
[setwindowtype 3]A photo was taken of this 
page. Want to post it to
the Wii Message Board?

été prise. Voulez-vous

AstroDome_Butler001.UsEnglish:
These are the [setfontcol red]galaxies [setfontcol default]that can be
observed from this [setfontcol red]dome[setfontcol default].[newpage]
The [setfontcol red]numbers [setfontcol default]represent their distance
from the [setfontcol blue]observatory[setfontcol default]. The bigger the
number, the greater the distance.[newpage]
The more [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Stars[setfontcol default] you find,
the farther you will be able to travel.
AstroDome_Butler001.EuEnglish:
These are the [setfontcol red]galaxies [setfontcol default]that can be
observed from this [setfontcol red]dome[setfontcol default].[newpage]
The [setfontcol red]numbers [setfontcol default]represent their distance
from the [setfontcol blue]observatory[setfontcol default]. The bigger the
number, the greater the distance.[newpage]
The more [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Stars[setfontcol default] you find,
the farther you will be able to travel.
AstroDome_Butler001.EuDutch:
These are the [setfontcol red]galaxies [setfontcol default]that can be
observed from this [setfontcol red]dome[setfontcol default].[newpage]
The [setfontcol red]numbers [setfontcol default]represent their distance
from the [setfontcol blue]observatory[setfontcol default]. The bigger the
number, the greater the distance.[newpage]
The more [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Stars[setfontcol default] you find,
the farther you will be able to travel.
AstroDome_Butler001.UsFrench:
Ce sont les [setfontcol red]galaxies[setfontcol default] que l'on peut
observer depuis ce [setfontcol red]dôme[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Les nombres qui y sont inscrits
indiquent leur distance par rapport à
l'[setfontcol blue]observatoire[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Les nombres représentent aussi la
[setfontcol red]puissance[setfontcol default] nécessaire pour atteindre
ces galaxies.[newpage]
Plus tu rassembleras de [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Super
Étoiles[setfontcol default], plus loin tu pourras voyager.
AstroDome_Butler001.EuFrench:
Les astres qui apparaissent ici
représentent les [setfontcol red]galaxies[setfontcol default] que l'on
peut observer depuis ce [setfontcol red]dôme[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Les [setfontcol red]nombres[setfontcol default] qui y sont inscrits
indiquent leur distance par rapport
à l'[setfontcol blue]observatoire[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
... autrement dit, la [setfontcol red]puissance[setfontcol default]
nécessaire pour les atteindre.[newpage]
Plus tu rassembleras de [setfontcol red]super
étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar], plus tu pourras voyager
[setfontcol blue]loin[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler001.UsSpanish:
Estas son las [setfontcol red]galaxias[setfontcol default] que se pueden
ver desde esta [setfontcol red]bóveda[setfontcol default]. [newpage]
Los [setfontcol red]números [setfontcol default]indican la distancia
hasta ellas desde [setfontcol blue]aquí[setfontcol default] y la [setfontcol red]energía
[setfontcol default]necesaria para alcanzarlas.[newpage]
Salva [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Superestrellas [setfontcol default]para reunir
energía y poder volar [setfontcol blue]más lejos[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler001.EuSpanish:
Las estrellas que puedes ver desde
esta [setfontcol red]Bóveda Celeste [setfontcol default]son [setfontcol red]galaxias[setfontcol default]. [newpage]
Los [setfontcol red]números [setfontcol default]indican la distancia
hasta ellas desde [setfontcol blue]aquí[setfontcol default]. [pause] [newpage]
Representan la [setfontcol red]energía [setfontcol default]necesaria
para alcanzarlas. [newpage]
Salva [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]Superestrellas [setfontcol default]para reunir
energía y poder volar [setfontcol red]más lejos[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler001.EuGerman:
Die Sterne hier repräsentieren die 
vom [setfontcol red]Observatorium [setfontcol default]aus sichtbaren
[setfontcol red]Galaxien[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Die [setfontcol red]Nummer [setfontcol default]auf dem Stern steht für
die Distanz der Galaxie zur
[setfontcol blue]Sternwarte[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
So viel [setfontcol red]Kraft [setfontcol default]brauchst du, um dorthin 
zu gelangen.[newpage]
Befreie [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power-Sterne[setfontcol default], um zu 
[setfontcol blue]weit, weit entfernten Galaxien[setfontcol default] zu
reisen.
AstroDome_Butler001.EuItalian:
Queste sono le [setfontcol red]galassie [setfontcol default]che si vedono
dal [setfontcol red]planetario[setfontcol default].[newpage]
I [setfontcol red]numeri[setfontcol default] scritti sopra di esse indicano
la loro distanza dall'[setfontcol blue]osservatorio[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
E l'[setfontcol red]energia[setfontcol default] necessaria a raggiungerle.[newpage]
Più [setfontcol red]Superstelle[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] ottieni, [setfontcol blue]più lontano[setfontcol default]
sarai in grado di viaggiare.
AstroDome_Butler001.JpJapanese:
ここに[ruby base]現[ruby top]あらわ[ruby end]れた[ruby base]星々[ruby top]ほしぼし[ruby end]、これが　この[setfontcol red]ドーム[setfontcol default]から[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]える
[setfontcol red]ギャラクシー[setfontcol default]というわけでございます[newpage]
[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]に[ruby base]書[ruby top]か[ruby end]かれた[setfontcol red][ruby base]数字[ruby top]すうじ[ruby end][setfontcol default]は　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]天文台[ruby top]てんもんだい[ruby end][setfontcol default]からの[ruby base]距離[ruby top]きょり[ruby end]…[pause]
その[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]にたどり[ruby base]着[ruby top]つ[ruby end]くのに[ruby base]必要[ruby top]ひつよう[ruby end]な　[setfontcol red][ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end][setfontcol default]を[ruby base]表[ruby top]あらわ[ruby end]します[newpage]
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]救[ruby top]すく[ruby end]い　[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]を[ruby base]結集[ruby top]けっしゅう[ruby end]することで、
[setfontcol blue]より[ruby base]遠[ruby top]とお[ruby end]い[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end][setfontcol default]へ　[ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]くことができるのです
AstroDome_Butler001.KrKorean:
이곳에서 보이는 별은 이 [setfontcol red]돔[setfontcol default]에서 보이는
[setfontcol red]갤럭시[setfontcol default]입니다[newpage]
별에 적혀 있는 [setfontcol red]숫자[setfontcol default]는 [setfontcol blue]천문대[setfontcol default]와의 거리…[pause]
그 별에 가기 위해 필요한 [setfontcol red]힘[setfontcol default]을 나타냅니다[newpage]
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 되찾아 힘을 모으면

AstroDome_Butler002.UsEnglish:
Yes, it's undeniable! We're detecting
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star [setfontcol default]energy patterns in the
nearest galaxy.[newpage]
But I must warn you that the evil
energy readings are off the charts![pause]
Please be careful...

Yes, it's undeniable! We're detecting

AstroDome_Butler002.UsFrench:
Oui, c'est indéniable![newpage]
L'énergie caractéristique des [icon PowerStar]
[setfontcol red]Super Étoiles [setfontcol default]a été détectée dans la
galaxie la plus proche.[newpage]
Je dois t'avertir qu'elle est entourée
d'une aura maléfique.[pause] Fais bien
attention...
AstroDome_Butler002.EuFrench:
L'énergie caractéristique des [setfontcol red]super

[setfontcol blue]galaxie[setfontcol default], la plus proche de nous.[newpage]
Hmmm... mais elle semble également
être entourée d'une aura maléfique.[pause]
Fais bien attention...

Parece que se ha descubierto una

Siento una fuerza tenebrosa
muy intensa.[pause] Ten mucho cuidado.

Parece que se ha avistado una
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]Superestrella [setfontcol default]en una de las

Siento una fuerza tenebrosa
muy intensa. [pause]
Ten mucho cuidado.

[setfontcol blue]Galaxie[setfontcol default] haben wir Energiewellen eines

Hmm... Er scheint vom Bösen erfüllt 
zu sein. Pass gut auf dich auf!
AstroDome_Butler002.EuItalian:
Abbiamo osservato l'energia delle [setfontcol red]Su-
perstelle[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] nella [setfontcol blue]galassia[setfontcol default] più vicina.[newpage]
Hmmm...[pause] Questi pianeti hanno
una forma davvero strana...
AstroDome_Butler002.JpJapanese:
もっとも[ruby base]近[ruby top]ちか[ruby end]い　この[setfontcol blue]ギャラクシー[setfontcol default]で
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]が　[ruby base]観測[ruby top]かんそく[ruby end]されたようですな[newpage]
うーむ…　どうやら[ruby base]悪[ruby top]あく[ruby end]の[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]で　[ruby base]満[ruby top]み[ruby end]ちているようです[pause]
どうか　お[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]をつけて…
AstroDome_Butler002.KrKorean:
가장 가까이에 있는 이 [setfontcol blue]갤럭시[setfontcol default]에서
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]가 관측되었습니다[newpage]
흐음… 왠지 강한 악의 기운이 느껴집니다[pause]
부디 조심하세요…

AstroDome_Butler003.UsEnglish:
Well done, brave explorer![pause] You've

our range of vision, perhaps to
eventually include the[setfontcol red] [setfontcol blue]enemy base[setfontcol default]...

Étoiles[setfontcol default], plus notre champ de vision

ennemis[setfontcol default]...

Ho, bravo![pause] Grâce à toi, nous avons

Plus tu rassembleras de [setfontcol red]super
étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar], plus notre champ de vision

¡Bien hecho, valiente explorador!
¡Has descubierto una nueva [setfontcol red]galaxia[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Nuestro radio de visión crecerá a

[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Superestrellas[setfontcol default].[newpage]

こうやって　[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]集[ruby top]あつ[ruby end]めていけば

AstroDome_Butler003.KrKorean:

이렇게 [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 모으다 보면

[icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol default]...

Superstelle [icon PowerStar][setfontcol default]...

[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]スターの[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end][setfontcol default]を

AstroDome_Butler007.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol blue]Enemy base[setfontcol default] spotted! We're detecting
massive [setfontcol red]energy [setfontcol default]spikes! What ARE
they doing there?

[setfontcol blue]Enemy base[setfontcol default] spotted! We're detecting
massive [setfontcol red]energy [setfontcol default]spikes! What ARE
they doing there?

[setfontcol blue]Enemy base[setfontcol default] spotted! We're detecting
massive [setfontcol red]energy [setfontcol default]spikes! What ARE

[setfontcol blue]Positions ennemies[setfontcol default] repérées! Et cette
fois, nous y avons observé une
[setfontcol red]énergie[setfontcol default] incommensurable...[newpage]
Je me demande ce qu'ils trafiquent...
AstroDome_Butler007.UsSpanish:
¡[setfontcol blue]Base enemiga[setfontcol default] a la vista!
¡También hemos detectado una
enorme oscilación de [setfontcol red]energía[setfontcol default]![newpage]
¿Qué estarán haciendo?...

¡[setfontcol blue]Base enemiga[setfontcol default] a la vista!

[setfontcol red]energía [setfontcol default]gigantesca! [newpage]
¿Qué estarán haciendo?...
AstroDome_Butler007.EuGerman:
[setfontcol blue]Feindliche Basis [setfontcol default]entdeckt! [newpage]
Und wir messen unerhört große 
[setfontcol red]Energiemengen[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Was treiben die da bloß?!?
AstroDome_Butler007.EuItalian:
La [setfontcol blue]base nemica[setfontcol default] è stata identificata!
Abbiamo anche rilevato un'enorme
[setfontcol red]massa[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]energetica[setfontcol default]...[newpage]

AstroDome_Butler007.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]敵陣[ruby top]てきじん[ruby end][setfontcol default]　[ruby base]発見[ruby top]はっけん[ruby end]です！　しかも　[ruby base]今度[ruby top]こんど[ruby end]は、
とてつもない[setfontcol red]エネルギー[setfontcol default]が　[ruby base]観測[ruby top]かんそく[ruby end]されております[newpage]
いったい　[ruby base]何[ruby top]なに[ruby end]をしているのやら…
AstroDome_Butler007.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue]적진[setfontcol default]을 발견했습니다! 게다가 이곳에서는
엄청난 [setfontcol red]에너지[setfontcol default]가 관측되고 있습니다[newpage]

AstroDome_Butler009.UsEnglish:
Aim for a [icon PullStar] [setfontcol red]Pull Star[setfontcol default] with [icon BlueCursor],
then press [icon Abtn] to fly to it!

Aim for a [icon PullStar] [setfontcol red]Pull Star[setfontcol default] with [icon BlueCursor],
then press [icon Abtn] to fly to it!

Aim for a [icon PullStar] [setfontcol red]Pull Star[setfontcol default] with [icon BlueCursor],
then press [icon Abtn] to fly to it!
AstroDome_Butler009.UsFrench:
Vise une [icon PullStar][setfontcol red] Étoile Crampon[setfontcol default] avec le
[icon BlueCursor] et appuie sur [icon Abtn] pour y voler!
AstroDome_Butler009.EuFrench:
Vise l'[setfontcol red]étoile crampon[setfontcol default] [icon PullStar] avec [icon BlueCursor] et
appuie sur [icon Abtn] pour le départ!
AstroDome_Butler009.UsSpanish:
Apunta con [icon BlueCursor] a la [icon PullStar] [setfontcol red]Estrella Imán[setfontcol default]
y oprime [setfontcol red][icon Abtn] [setfontcol default]para comenzar el viaje.
AstroDome_Butler009.EuSpanish:
Apunta con [icon BlueCursor] a la [icon PullStar][setfontcol red]Estrella imán[setfontcol default],

AstroDome_Butler009.EuGerman:

AstroDome_Butler009.JpJapanese:
[icon PullStar][setfontcol red]スターキャプチャー[setfontcol default]を　[icon BlueCursor]で　ねらい、
[icon Abtn]を[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]して　[ruby base]出発[ruby top]しゅっぱつ[ruby end]です！
AstroDome_Butler009.KrKorean:
[icon PullStar][setfontcol red]스타중계소[setfontcol default]를 [icon BlueCursor]로 조준하고

AstroDome_Butler010.UsEnglish:
Please aim at me with [icon BlueCursor], then
press [icon Bbtn] to feed me [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default]!
AstroDome_Butler010.EuEnglish:
Please aim at me with [icon BlueCursor], then
press [icon Bbtn] to feed me [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default]!
AstroDome_Butler010.EuDutch:
Please aim at me with [icon BlueCursor], then
press [icon Bbtn] to feed me [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default]!
AstroDome_Butler010.UsFrench:
Vise-moi avec le [icon BlueCursor] et appuie sur [icon Bbtn]
pour me donner des [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Éclats
d'Étoile[setfontcol default], tu veux bien?
AstroDome_Butler010.EuFrench:
Vise-moi avec [icon BlueCursor] et appuie sur [icon Bbtn]
pour me nourrir de [setfontcol red]fragments
d'étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit], tu veux bien?
AstroDome_Butler010.UsSpanish:
¡Apúntame con [icon BlueCursor] y oprime [icon Bbtn]
para darme [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Trozos de Estrellas[setfontcol default]!
AstroDome_Butler010.EuSpanish:
¡Por fa! Apúntame con [icon BlueCursor] y pulsa [icon Bbtn]
para darme [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]trozos de estrella[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler010.EuGerman:

AstroDome_Butler010.EuItalian:

AstroDome_Butler010.JpJapanese:
[icon BlueCursor]で　ワタシを　ねらって、[icon Bbtn]で
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]スターピース[setfontcol default]を　いただけませんかな？
AstroDome_Butler010.KrKorean:
[icon BlueCursor]로 저를 조준하고 [icon Bbtn]를 눌러
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]스타구슬[setfontcol default]을 먹여 주세요!

AstroDome_Butler012.UsEnglish:
Those [icon StarBit]s are [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default]. To Lumas,
they are the [setfontcol blue]tastiest, most delectable
treats[setfontcol default] imaginable.[newpage]
Aim your [icon WiiRemote] at the screen, and [setfontcol red]point
[setfontcol default]your [icon BlueCursor] at them to pick them up.[newpage]
Once you have some, [setfontcol red]shoot [setfontcol default]them by
aiming with [icon BlueCursor] and pressing [icon Bbtn].
AstroDome_Butler012.EuEnglish:
Those are [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default]. To Lumas,
they are the [setfontcol blue]tastiest, most delectable
treats[setfontcol default] imaginable.[newpage]
Aim your [icon WiiRemote] at the screen, and [setfontcol red]point
[setfontcol default]your [icon BlueCursor] at them to pick them up.[newpage]
Once you have some, [setfontcol red]shoot [setfontcol default]them by
aiming with [icon BlueCursor] and pressing [icon Bbtn].
AstroDome_Butler012.EuDutch:
Those are [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default]. To Lumas,
they are the [setfontcol blue]tastiest, most delectable
treats[setfontcol default] imaginable.[newpage]
Aim your [icon WiiRemote] at the screen, and [setfontcol red]point
[setfontcol default]your [icon BlueCursor] at them to pick them up.[newpage]
Once you have some, [setfontcol red]shoot [setfontcol default]them by
aiming with [icon BlueCursor] and pressing [icon Bbtn].
AstroDome_Butler012.UsFrench:
Ces [icon StarBit] sont des [setfontcol red]Éclats d'Étoile[setfontcol default].[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]Les
Chikos en [setfontcol blue]raffolent[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Vise l'écran avec la [icon WiiRemote] et
[setfontcol red]pointe[setfontcol default]-les avec le [icon BlueCursor] pour les
ramasser.[newpage]
Une fois ramassés, tu peux les [setfontcol red]tirer
sur tes ennemis [setfontcol default]en visant avec le [icon BlueCursor]
et en appuyant sur [icon Bbtn].
AstroDome_Butler012.EuFrench:
Tu as dû remarquer les [setfontcol red]éclats
d'étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit] qu'on voit briller un peu
partout, n'est-ce pas?[newpage]
On les appelle des [setfontcol red]fragments
d'étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit], et nous, les Luma,
en sommes [setfontcol blue]très friands[setfontcol default]![newpage]
C'est notre source d'énergie.[newpage]
Pointe l'écran avec [icon WiiRemote] et [setfontcol red]vise-les[setfontcol default]
avec [icon BlueCursor] pour les ramasser.[newpage]
Tu peux également les utiliser pour
[setfontcol red]tirer[setfontcol default] sur tes ennemis en les [setfontcol red]visant[setfontcol default]
avec [icon BlueCursor] et en appuyant sur [icon Bbtn]!
AstroDome_Butler012.UsSpanish:
Esos [icon StarBit] son [setfontcol red]Trozos de Estrellas[setfontcol default].
¡A los Destellos [setfontcol blue]les encanta comerlos[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Apunta con [icon WiiRemote] a la pantalla y
[setfontcol red]dirige [setfontcol default]tu [icon BlueCursor] hacia ellos
para recogerlos.[newpage]
También puedes apuntar con [icon BlueCursor] y
[setfontcol red]lanzarlos [setfontcol default]con [icon Bbtn].
AstroDome_Butler012.EuSpanish:
¿Has visto por casualidad una
especie de [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]piedras brillantes[setfontcol default]?[newpage]
Son [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]trozos de estrella[setfontcol default]. A nosotros
los destellos [setfontcol blue]nos encantan[setfontcol default], y son la
fuente de nuestra energía. [newpage]
[setfontcol red]Apunta [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] a la pantalla para cogerlos
con [icon BlueCursor]. También puedes
[setfontcol red]lanzarlos [setfontcol default]a los enemigos pulsando [icon Bbtn].
AstroDome_Butler012.EuGerman:
Ist dir der glitzernde [setfontcol red]Sternenstaub[setfontcol default]
aufgefallen, der überall verstreut ist?[newpage]
Das sind so genannte [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Sternenteile[setfontcol default].[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Wir Luma lieben sie[setfontcol default].
Sie sind die Quelle unserer Kraft. [newpage]
Richte die [icon WiiRemote] auf den Bildschirm und 
sammle sie mit dem [icon BlueCursor] auf.[newpage]
Dann [setfontcol red]ziele [setfontcol default]mit dem [icon BlueCursor] und [setfontcol red]schieße 
[setfontcol default]sie durch Drücken von [icon Bbtn] auf deine
Gegner.
AstroDome_Butler012.EuItalian:
Quelle cosine che brillano nelle galas-
sie sono delle [setfontcol red]Astroschegge[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit].[newpage]
Noi Sfavillotti ne [setfontcol blue]siamo ghiotti[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Punta [icon WiiRemote] verso lo schermo e
[setfontcol red]mira bene[setfontcol default] con [icon BlueCursor] per raccoglierle.[newpage]
Dopo aver mirato con [icon BlueCursor],
puoi anche [setfontcol red]sparare[setfontcol default] con [icon Bbtn].
AstroDome_Butler012.JpJapanese:
ギャラクシーで[ruby base]目[ruby top]め[ruby end]にする　キラキラした[icon StarBit][setfontcol red][ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くず[setfontcol default]
…お[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]づきですかな？[newpage]
あれは　[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]スターピース[setfontcol default]と[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]いまして
われわれ[setfontcol blue]チコの[ruby base]好物[ruby top]こうぶつ[ruby end][setfontcol default]、[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]わば　[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]の[ruby base]源[ruby top]みなもと[ruby end]です[newpage]
[icon WiiRemote]を[ruby base]画面[ruby top]がめん[ruby end]に[ruby base]向[ruby top]む[ruby end]け、[icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]でポイント[setfontcol default]して[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]ったり、
[icon BlueCursor]でねらって、[ruby base]相手[ruby top]あいて[ruby end]を[icon Bbtn][setfontcol red]で[ruby base]撃[ruby top]う[ruby end]つ[setfontcol default]こともできます
AstroDome_Butler012.KrKorean:
갤럭시 여기저기에서 반짝이는 [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]별똥별[setfontcol default]
…보셨나요?[newpage]
그건 [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]스타구슬[setfontcol default]이라고 하는데
우리 [setfontcol blue]치코[setfontcol default]들의 힘의 원천이에요[newpage]
[icon WiiRemote]을 화면에 대고 [icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]로 포인트[setfontcol default]해서 얻거나
[icon BlueCursor]로 조준하고 [icon Bbtn][setfontcol red]를 눌러 쏠 수 있습니다

AstroDome_Butler013.UsEnglish:
Why don't we try it out? Aim at me,
and feed me some [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler013.EuEnglish:
Why don't we try it out? Aim at me,
and feed me some [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler013.EuDutch:
Why don't we try it out? Aim at me,
and feed me some [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler013.UsFrench:
Faisons un essai! Vise-moi et
donne-moi des [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Éclats d'Étoile[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler013.EuFrench:
Faisons un essai!
Vise-moi et donne-moi des [setfontcol red]fragments
d'étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit], tu veux bien?
AstroDome_Butler013.UsSpanish:
¡Inténtalo! Apúntame y dame unos
cuantos [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Trozos de Estrellas[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler013.EuSpanish:
Haz la prueba apuntándome y dame
unos cuantos [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]trozos de estrella[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_Butler013.EuGerman:
Lass es uns ausprobieren.
Sammle [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Sternenteile[setfontcol default]
und schieße sie auf mich.
AstroDome_Butler013.EuItalian:
Provaci, dai! Cerca di lanciarmi
un'[setfontcol red]Astroscheggia[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit]!
AstroDome_Butler013.JpJapanese:
ためしに、ワタシを　ねらって
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]スターピース[setfontcol default]を　いただけませんかな？
AstroDome_Butler013.KrKorean:
시험 삼아 저에게
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]스타구슬[setfontcol default]을 쏴 보세요!

AstroDome_Butler015.UsEnglish:
Mmmm, tasty! [pause]Let's call those little
morsels my fee for this lesson.
AstroDome_Butler015.EuEnglish:
Mmmm, tasty! [pause]Let's call those little
morsels my fee for this lesson.
AstroDome_Butler015.EuDutch:
Mmmm, tasty! [pause]Let's call those little
morsels my fee for this lesson.
AstroDome_Butler015.UsFrench:
Mmmm, délicieux! Disons que cette
petite friandise sera ma rémunération
pour cette leçon.
AstroDome_Butler015.EuFrench:
Mmmh, bravo![pause]
Disons que ce sera ma rémunération
pour cette leçon!
AstroDome_Butler015.UsSpanish:
¡Mmm, qué sabrosos! [pause]Me los quedaré
a cambio de toda la información que
te estoy dando.
AstroDome_Butler015.EuSpanish:
¡Mmm! ¡Muy bien! [pause]
Me los quedo a cambio de toda
la información que te estoy dando.
AstroDome_Butler015.EuGerman:
Mmmm, hervorragend![pause]
Die behalte ich als Gebühr für
diese Lektion.
AstroDome_Butler015.EuItalian:
Hmmm! Che delizia![pause] Queste le accetto
come ricompensa per le spiegazioni!
AstroDome_Butler015.JpJapanese:
ウム、おみごと！[pause]
…これは　[ruby base]授業料[ruby top]じゅぎょうりょう[ruby end]として　いただいておきます

AstroDome_Butler016.UsEnglish:
You can also [setfontcol blue]shoot them at enemies
[setfontcol default]or feed them to a [setfontcol blue]hungry Luma[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Either way, I am sure [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default]
will be a big help on your adventure!
AstroDome_Butler016.EuEnglish:
You can also [setfontcol blue]shoot them at enemies
[setfontcol default]or feed them to a [setfontcol blue]hungry Luma[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Either way, I am sure [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default]

Either way, I am sure [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default]
will be a big help on your adventure!
AstroDome_Butler016.UsFrench:
Tu peux aussi les [setfontcol blue]lancer sur tes
ennemis [setfontcol default]ou les donner à des [setfontcol blue]goinfres
Chiko[setfontcol default].[newpage]
De toute façon, je suis sûr que les
[icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Éclats d'Étoile [setfontcol default]te seront d'une
grande aide pendant ton aventure!
AstroDome_Butler016.EuFrench:
Les [setfontcol red]fragments d'étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit] te seront 
utiles dans ton aventure, sois-en sûr.[newpage]
Tu peux les [setfontcol blue]lancer sur tes ennemis[setfontcol default],
mais aussi les partager avec des
[setfontcol blue]Luma affamés[setfontcol default] qui t'en remercieront...
AstroDome_Butler016.UsSpanish:
Puedes [setfontcol blue]lanzarlos a los enemigos[setfontcol default],
o compartirlos con algún [setfontcol blue]Destello
glotón[setfontcol default] a cambio de algo.[newpage]
Los [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Trozos de Estrellas[setfontcol default] serán una
gran ayuda a lo largo de tu aventura.
AstroDome_Butler016.EuSpanish:
Puedes [setfontcol blue]lanzarlos a los enemigos[setfontcol default],
o bien compartirlos con algún [setfontcol blue]destello
hambriento[setfontcol default] a cambio de algo. [newpage]
Los [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]trozos de estrella[setfontcol default] te serán de
gran ayuda a lo largo de tu aventura.
AstroDome_Butler016.EuGerman:
Du kannst sie [setfontcol blue]auf Gegner schießen [setfontcol default]
oder [setfontcol blue]hungrige Luma[setfontcol default] damit füttern...[newpage]
Vielleicht springt dabei eine 
Belohnung für dich heraus.[newpage]
[icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Sternenteile [setfontcol default]werden dir bei 
deinem Abenteuer sehr hilfreich sein.
AstroDome_Butler016.EuItalian:
Ricorda che puoi [setfontcol blue]sparare[setfontcol default] le [setfontcol red]Astro-
schegge[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit] ai[setfontcol blue] nemici [setfontcol default]o puoi condivi-
derle con gli [setfontcol blue]Sfavillotti affamati[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Vedrai come ti saranno utili nel corso
della tua avventura!
AstroDome_Butler016.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]敵[ruby top]てき[ruby end]に[ruby base]当[ruby top]あ[ruby end]てる[setfontcol default]もよし、[setfontcol blue]おなかをすかせたチコ[setfontcol default]に
おすそ[ruby base]分[ruby top]わ[ruby end]けして　お[ruby base]礼[ruby top]れい[ruby end]をしてもらうもよし…[newpage]
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]スターピース[setfontcol default]は　[ruby base]必[ruby top]かなら[ruby end]ずや
あなたの[ruby base]冒険[ruby top]ぼうけん[ruby end]の　[ruby base]手[ruby top]て[ruby end][ruby base]助[ruby top]だす[ruby end]けとなるでしょう
AstroDome_Butler016.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue]적에게 맞혀도 좋고 쫄쫄 굶은 치코[setfontcol default]에게
나눠 주셔도 좋아요…[newpage]
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]스타구슬[setfontcol default]은 분명
당신의 모험에 큰 도움이 될 거예요

AstroDome_Butler018.JpJapanese: その[ruby base]調子[ruby top]ちょうし[ruby end]です！

AstroDome_Butler020.JpJapanese: [ruby base]美味[ruby top]びみ[ruby end]ですな！

AstroDome_Butler021.JpJapanese: ありがたき[ruby base]幸[ruby top]しあわ[ruby end]せ！

AstroDome_Butler022.UsEnglish:
We have discovered the enemy's
[setfontcol blue]forward base[setfontcol default]![pause] I have a really bad
feeling about this...
AstroDome_Butler022.EuEnglish:
We have discovered the enemy's
[setfontcol blue]forward base[setfontcol default]![pause] I have a really bad
feeling about this...
AstroDome_Butler022.EuDutch:
We have discovered the enemy's
[setfontcol blue]forward base[setfontcol default]![pause] I have a really bad
feeling about this...
AstroDome_Butler022.UsFrench:
Nous avons découvert le [setfontcol blue]poste 
d'avant-garde[setfontcol default] de nos ennemis![pause] J'ai un 
mauvais pressentiment...
AstroDome_Butler022.EuFrench:
Nous avons découvert le [setfontcol blue]poste
avancé[setfontcol default] de nos ennemis![pause]
Il est entouré d'une aura maléfique...
AstroDome_Butler022.UsSpanish:
¡Hemos descubierto la [setfontcol blue]base enemiga[setfontcol default]![pause]
Despide un aura muy peligrosa...
AstroDome_Butler022.EuSpanish:
¡Hemos descubierto la [setfontcol blue]base enemiga[setfontcol default]![pause]
Despide un aura muy peligrosa...
AstroDome_Butler022.EuGerman:
Wir haben die [setfontcol blue]Basis [setfontcol default]des Feindes an 
der [setfontcol blue]Front [setfontcol default]entdeckt! [newpage]
Eine dunkle Präsenz ist deutlich 
dort zu spüren...
AstroDome_Butler022.EuItalian:
Abbiamo scoperto la[setfontcol blue] base nemica[setfontcol default]![pause]
Ho veramente una brutta sensazione

AstroDome_Butler022.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]敵[ruby top]てき[ruby end]の　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]前線基地[ruby top]ぜんせんきち[ruby end][setfontcol default]を[ruby base]発見[ruby top]はっけん[ruby end]しましたぞ！[pause]
[ruby base]邪悪[ruby top]じゃあく[ruby end]な[ruby base]気配[ruby top]けはい[ruby end]が　ぷんぷんしておりますな…
AstroDome_Butler022.KrKorean:
적의 [setfontcol blue]전진 기지[setfontcol default]를 발견했습니다![pause]
사악한 기운이 감돌고 있네요…

AstroDome_Butler023.UsEnglish:
Welcome![pause] This [setfontcol red]dome[setfontcol default] acts as an eye
of the observatory. From here, we
can gaze upon distant [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Once this Luma transforms into a [setfontcol red][icon PullStar]
Pull Star[setfontcol default], he will guide you to those
faraway [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Simply point your [icon BlueCursor] at the [setfontcol red][icon PullStar] Pull
Star[setfontcol default], and press [icon Abtn].
AstroDome_Butler023.EuEnglish:
Welcome![pause] This [setfontcol red]dome[setfontcol default] acts as an eye
of the observatory. From here, we
can gaze upon distant [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Once this Luma transforms into a [setfontcol red][icon PullStar]
Pull Star[setfontcol default], he will guide you to those
faraway [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Simply point your [icon BlueCursor] at the [setfontcol red][icon PullStar] Pull
Star[setfontcol default], and press [icon Abtn].
AstroDome_Butler023.EuDutch:
Welcome![pause] This [setfontcol red]dome[setfontcol default] acts as an eye
of the observatory. From here, we
can gaze upon distant [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Once this Luma transforms into a [setfontcol red][icon PullStar]
Pull Star[setfontcol default], he will guide you to those
faraway [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Simply point your [icon BlueCursor] at the [setfontcol red][icon PullStar] Pull
Star[setfontcol default], and press [icon Abtn].
AstroDome_Butler023.UsFrench:
Bienvenue![pause] Ce [setfontcol red]dôme [setfontcol default]est
comme un "œil" de l'observatoire.[newpage]
Depuis ici, on peut contempler les
[setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default] lointaines.[newpage]
Une fois transformé, ce Chiko te
guidera vers ces [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Pointe l'[setfontcol red]Étoile Crampon[setfontcol default] [icon PullStar] avec le
[icon BlueCursor] et appuie sur [icon Abtn].
AstroDome_Butler023.EuFrench:
Bienvenue![pause]
Ce [setfontcol red]dôme [setfontcol default]est un poste d'observation
de l'espace.[newpage]
Il permet d'observer toutes sortes de
[setfontcol blue]galaxies [setfontcol default]et de les étudier.[newpage]
C'est moi qui serai ton guide à
travers les [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Pointe l'[setfontcol red]étoile crampon[setfontcol default] [icon PullStar] avec [icon BlueCursor] et
appuie sur [icon Abtn].
AstroDome_Butler023.UsSpanish:
¡Bienvenido! Esta [setfontcol red]bóveda [setfontcol default]es como la
"pupila" del enorme planetarium.[newpage]
Desde esta "pupila", se divisan las
[setfontcol blue]galaxias[setfontcol default] del espacio exterior.[newpage]
Cuando se transforme en una [setfontcol red]Estrella
Imán[setfontcol default], este Destello te guiará hacia
una de esas [setfontcol blue]galaxias[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Apunta con tu [icon BlueCursor] a la [icon PullStar] [setfontcol red]Estrella
Imán [setfontcol default]y oprime [icon Abtn].
AstroDome_Butler023.EuSpanish:
¡Bienvenido, querido amigo![newpage]
Esta [setfontcol red]Bóveda Celeste[setfontcol default] es una especie
de observatorio del [setfontcol blue]cosmos[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Digamos que es la [setfontcol blue]"pupila"[setfontcol default] de un
enorme Planetarium.[newpage]
Desde esta [setfontcol blue]"pupila"[setfontcol default], se divisan las
[setfontcol blue]galaxias [setfontcol default]del espacio exterior.[newpage]
Yo soy el encargado de guiarte por
el tejido interestelar.[newpage]
Apunta a la [icon PullStar][setfontcol red]Estrella imán [setfontcol default]con [icon BlueCursor]
y pulsa [icon Abtn].
AstroDome_Butler023.EuGerman:
Schön, dass du gekommen bist.[newpage]
Diese [setfontcol red]Kuppel [setfontcol default]ist ein Observatorium
des [setfontcol blue]Universums[setfontcol default]...[pause] In anderen Worten, 
sie ist das [setfontcol blue]Auge[setfontcol default] dieser Sternwarte.[newpage]
Mit diesem [setfontcol blue]Auge[setfontcol default] kann man 
verschiedene [setfontcol blue]Galaxien [setfontcol default]spüren und 
auch sehen.[newpage]
Ich werde dir den Weg zu den 
Galaxien weisen.[newpage]
Wenn er sich verwandelt hat, ziele mit
dem [icon BlueCursor] auf den [icon PullStar] [setfontcol red]Greifstern [setfontcol default]und 
drücke [icon Abtn].
AstroDome_Butler023.EuItalian:
Oh, degli ospiti! Questo luogo è detto
[setfontcol red]planetario [setfontcol default]e da qui si possono osser-
vare le [setfontcol blue]galassie[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Permettimi di farti da guida
nelle [setfontcol blue]galassie[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Punta [icon BlueCursor] verso la [setfontcol red]Stella Manina[setfontcol default] [icon PullStar] e
premi [icon Abtn].
AstroDome_Butler023.JpJapanese:
よくぞ　[ruby base]参[ruby top]まい[ruby end]られました[pause]
ここが　ワタシ[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]が[setfontcol red]ドーム[setfontcol default]と[ruby base]呼[ruby top]よ[ruby end]んでいるところ…[newpage]
[ruby base]様々[ruby top]さまざま[ruby end]な[setfontcol blue]ギャラクシー[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]ることができる、いわば
[ruby base]目[ruby top]め[ruby end]の[ruby base]役割[ruby top]やくわり[ruby end]を　[ruby base]果[ruby top]は[ruby end]たす[ruby base]場所[ruby top]ばしょ[ruby end]でございます[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]ギャラクシー[setfontcol default]へは　この[ruby base]者[ruby top]もの[ruby end]が　[ruby base]案内[ruby top]あんない[ruby end]いたします[newpage]
[ruby base]変身[ruby top]へんしん[ruby end]したら　[icon PullStar][setfontcol red]スターキャプチャー[setfontcol default]を[icon BlueCursor]で
ねらって、　[icon Abtn]を　[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]してくだされ
AstroDome_Butler023.KrKorean:
어서 오세요[pause]
이곳은 우리가 [setfontcol red]돔[setfontcol default]이라고 부르는 장소…[newpage]
여러 [setfontcol blue]갤럭시[setfontcol default]를 보여 주는
눈을 대신해 주는 장소입니다[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]갤럭시[setfontcol default]로 가는 길은 이 아이가 안내하겠습니다[newpage]
이 아이가 변신하면 [icon BlueCursor]로 [icon PullStar][setfontcol red]스타중계소[setfontcol default]를
조준하고 [icon Abtn]를 눌러 주세요

Permettimi di guidarti in

AstroDome_Butler025.JpJapanese:
ギャラクシーへは　この[ruby base]者[ruby top]もの[ruby end]が　[ruby base]案内[ruby top]あんない[ruby end]いたします[newpage]
[ruby base]変身[ruby top]へんしん[ruby end]したら　[icon PullStar][setfontcol red]スターキャプチャー[setfontcol default]を[icon BlueCursor]で
ねらって、　[icon Abtn]を　[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]してくだされ

갤럭시로 가는 길은 이 아이가 안내하겠습니다[newpage]
이 아이가 변신하면 [icon BlueCursor]로 [icon PullStar][setfontcol red]스타중계소[setfontcol default]를
조준하고 [icon Abtn]를 눌러 주세요

Star[setfontcol default], and press [icon Abtn].

Pointe l'[setfontcol red]étoile crampon[setfontcol default] [icon PullStar] avec [icon BlueCursor] et

[icon PullStar][setfontcol red]スターキャプチャー[setfontcol default]を　[icon BlueCursor]でねらって、

AstroDome_ButlerMap000.UsEnglish: Oh, of course, here's the [setfontcol blue]map[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_ButlerMap000.EuEnglish: Oh, of course, here's the [setfontcol blue]map[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_ButlerMap000.EuDutch: Oh, of course, here's the [setfontcol blue]map[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_ButlerMap000.UsFrench: Ah, bien sûr! Voici la [setfontcol blue]carte[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_ButlerMap000.EuFrench:
Oui, tu souhaites voir la [setfontcol blue]carte[setfontcol default]?
Voilà, voilà!
AstroDome_ButlerMap000.UsSpanish: Sí, sí... Ahora te enseño el [setfontcol blue]mapa[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_ButlerMap000.EuSpanish:
Muy bien, ahora mismo te
enseño el [setfontcol blue]MAPA[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_ButlerMap000.EuGerman: Ja, ja, hier ist die [setfontcol blue]Karte[setfontcol default].
AstroDome_ButlerMap000.EuItalian: Sì, sì... Ecco una [setfontcol blue]mappa[setfontcol default]!
AstroDome_ButlerMap000.JpJapanese: はいはい、[setfontcol blue][ruby base]MAP[ruby top]マップ[ruby end][setfontcol default]ですな

AstroDome_Caretaker001.UsEnglish:
Oh, hello. It might get a little rough
from here on out, but just do your
best and you'll be OK!
AstroDome_Caretaker001.EuEnglish:
Oh, hello. It might get a little rough
from here on out, but just do your
best and you'll be OK!
AstroDome_Caretaker001.EuDutch:
Oh, hello. It might get a little rough
from here on out, but just do your
best and you'll be OK!
AstroDome_Caretaker001.UsFrench:
Ah, b'jour. Ça risque dorénavant 
d'être un peu dur, mais fais de ton 
mieux et tu t'en sortiras!
AstroDome_Caretaker001.EuFrench:
Oh! Bonjour![pause] Ça risque d'être un peu
difficile à partir d'ici, alors bon
courage!
AstroDome_Caretaker001.UsSpanish:
Hola. Puede que todo se ponga más
difícil desde aquí. ¡Si lo haces lo
mejor que puedas, todo saldrá bien!
AstroDome_Caretaker001.EuSpanish:
¡Enas, mi arma![pause]
La cosa se pone mu difisililla
de'de aquí, ten mucho cuidao.
AstroDome_Caretaker001.EuGerman:
Ah, guten Tag![pause] Ab hier wird
es richtig schwer, viel Glück!
AstroDome_Caretaker001.EuItalian:
Oh, salve![pause]
D'ora in poi potrebbe diventare
un po' dura, ma metticela tutta!
AstroDome_Caretaker001.JpJapanese:
あ、こんにちは～[pause]
ここから　キツなるやろけど、がんばってな！
AstroDome_Caretaker001.KrKorean:
아, 안녕～[pause] 
앞으로는 힘들어지겠지만 힘내 보그래이!

et tu t'en sortiras!

Ça risque d'être un peu difficile

AstroGalaxy_Butler004.JpJapanese: この[ruby base]上[ruby top]うえ[ruby end][ruby base]無[ruby top]な[ruby end]き[ruby base]幸[ruby top]しあわ[ruby end]せ！

AstroGalaxy_Butler007.UsEnglish:
You rescued a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Green Power Star[setfontcol default]!
These [setfontcol green]stars [setfontcol default]have a [setfontcol blue]special power[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.EuEnglish:
You rescued a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Green Power Star[setfontcol default]!
These [setfontcol green]stars [setfontcol default]have a [setfontcol blue]special power[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.EuDutch:
You rescued a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Green Power Star[setfontcol default]!
These [setfontcol green]stars [setfontcol default]have a [setfontcol blue]special power[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.UsFrench:
Tu as ramené une[setfontcol green] [icon PowerStar] Super Étoile
Verte[setfontcol default]! Les [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Super Étoiles Vertes
[setfontcol default]ont des [setfontcol blue]pouvoirs spéciaux[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.EuFrench:
Tu as ramené une [setfontcol green]super étoile[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar]
[setfontcol green]verte[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Les [setfontcol green]super étoiles [setfontcol default][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]vertes[setfontcol default]
possèdent des [setfontcol blue]pouvoirs particuliers[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.UsSpanish:
¡Veo que has recuperado una
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol green]Superestrella Verde[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Las [setfontcol green]Superestrellas [setfontcol default]de este tipo
encierran un [setfontcol blue]poder muy especial[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.EuSpanish:
¡Veo que has recuperado una
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol green]Superestrella verde[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Las Superestrellas de este tipo
encierran un [setfontcol blue]poder muy especial[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.EuGerman:
Sieht so aus, als hättest du einen 
[setfontcol green]grünen [icon PowerStar] Power-Stern 
[setfontcol default]erhalten![newpage]
[setfontcol green]Grüne [icon PowerStar] Power-Sterne [setfontcol default]haben 
[setfontcol blue]besondere Fähigkeiten[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.EuItalian:
Pare che tu abbia recuperato una [setfontcol green]Su-
perstella Verde[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar]! Le [setfontcol green]Superstelle
Verdi [setfontcol default][icon PowerStar][setfontcol green] [setfontcol default]hanno [setfontcol blue]poteri speciali[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol green][ruby base]緑[ruby top]みどり[ruby end]の[icon PowerStar]パワースター[setfontcol default]を
[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]り[ruby base]返[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]していただいたようですな！[newpage]
[setfontcol green][ruby base]緑[ruby top]みどり[ruby end]の[icon PowerStar]パワースター[setfontcol default]は
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]特別[ruby top]とくべつ[ruby end]な[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end][setfontcol default]を　[ruby base]持[ruby top]も[ruby end]っております
AstroGalaxy_Butler007.KrKorean:
[setfontcol green]초록[icon PowerStar]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 되찾아 주셨군요![newpage]
[setfontcol green]초록[icon PowerStar]파워스타[setfontcol default]는
[setfontcol blue]특별한 힘[setfontcol default]을 갖고 있습니다

AstroGalaxy_Butler008.UsEnglish:
Ask the[setfontcol green] Green Lumas[setfontcol default] about them.
After all, they will transform into
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Green Power Stars[setfontcol default] someday!
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.EuEnglish:
Ask the[setfontcol green] Green Lumas[setfontcol default] about them.
After all, they will transform into
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Green Power Stars[setfontcol default] someday!
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.EuDutch:
Ask the[setfontcol green] Green Lumas[setfontcol default] about them.
After all, they will transform into
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Green Power Stars[setfontcol default] someday!
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.UsFrench:
Pour en savoir plus, demande aux
[setfontcol green]Chikos Verts[setfontcol default]--car ils deviendront des
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Super Étoiles Vertes [setfontcol default]un jour!
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.EuFrench:
Pour en savoir plus sur les [setfontcol green]super
étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]vertes[setfontcol default], demande des
explications aux [setfontcol green]Luma verts[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.UsSpanish:
Habla con los [setfontcol green]Destellos Verdes[setfontcol default].[newpage]
¡Después de todo, se transformarán
en [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Superestrellas Verdes
[setfontcol default]algún día!
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.EuSpanish:
Para saber más de las
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol green]Superestrellas verdes[setfontcol default],
habla con una.[newpage]
Adopta la apariencia de un [setfontcol blue]destello
de color verde[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.EuGerman:
Wenn du mehr wissen willst, frag
den [setfontcol green]grünen Luma[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Er ist die Personifikation eines
[setfontcol green]grünen [icon PowerStar] Power-Sterns[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.EuItalian:
Per maggiori dettagli, chiedi ad uno
[setfontcol green]Sfavillotto Verde[setfontcol default]: un giorno anche lui
diventerà una [setfontcol green]Superstella Verde [setfontcol default][icon PowerStar]!
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]詳[ruby top]くわ[ruby end]しくは　[setfontcol green][ruby base]緑[ruby top]みどり[ruby end]の[icon PowerStar]パワースター[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]化身[ruby top]けしん[ruby end]である
[setfontcol green]グリーンチコ[setfontcol default]に　[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]いてくだされ
AstroGalaxy_Butler008.KrKorean:
자세한 내용은 [setfontcol green]초록[icon PowerStar]파워스타[setfontcol default]의 화신인
[setfontcol green]그린치코[setfontcol default]에게 물어 보세요

AstroGalaxy_Butler009.UsEnglish:
You've managed to recover all of the
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Green Power Stars[setfontcol default] and restore
the [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Green Launch Star[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_Butler009.EuEnglish:
You've managed to recover all of the
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Green Power Stars[setfontcol default] and restore
the [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Green Launch Star[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_Butler009.EuDutch:
You've managed to recover all of the
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Green Power Stars[setfontcol default] and restore
the [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Green Launch Star[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_Butler009.UsFrench:
Vous avez rassemblé toutes les [icon PowerStar]
[setfontcol green]Super Étoiles Vertes[setfontcol default] et ainsi restauré
le [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Super Anneau Étoile Vert[setfontcol default]!

En ramenant toutes les [setfontcol green]super
étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]vertes[setfontcol default], tu as réactivé le
[setfontcol green]portail des épreuves[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar].
AstroGalaxy_Butler009.UsSpanish:
Rescataste a todas las
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol green]Superestrellas Verdes[setfontcol default].[newpage]
El [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Anillo Estelar Verde [setfontcol default]se ha
regenerado.
AstroGalaxy_Butler009.EuSpanish:
Has rescatado a todas las
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol green]Superestrellas verdes[setfontcol default].[newpage]
El [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol green]Portal de los Retos
[setfontcol default]se ha regenerado.
AstroGalaxy_Butler009.EuGerman:
Es sieht so aus, als hättest
du alle [setfontcol green]grünen [icon PowerStar] Power-
Sterne[setfontcol default] wiedererlangt[newpage]
und das [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Tor zu den 
Prüfungen [setfontcol default]reaktiviert.
AstroGalaxy_Butler009.EuItalian:
Pare che tu abbia recuperato tutte
le [setfontcol green]Superstelle Verdi[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] e ripristinato
il [setfontcol green]Varco delle Sfide[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar]!
AstroGalaxy_Butler009.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol green][ruby base]緑[ruby top]みどり[ruby end]の[icon PowerStar]パワースター[setfontcol default]を　[ruby base]全[ruby top]すべ[ruby end]て[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]りもどし、
[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol green][ruby base]試練[ruby top]しれん[ruby end]の[ruby base]扉[ruby top]とびら[ruby end][setfontcol default]が　[ruby base]復活[ruby top]ふっかつ[ruby end]したようですな
AstroGalaxy_Butler009.KrKorean:
[setfontcol green]초록[icon PowerStar]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 모두 되찾아
[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol green]시련의 문[setfontcol default]이 부활했습니다

AstroGalaxy_Butler010.UsEnglish:
Even I don't know what's waiting for
you out there beyond the
[icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Green Launch Star[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.EuEnglish:
Even I don't know what's waiting for
you out there beyond the
[icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Green Launch Star[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.EuDutch:
Even I don't know what's waiting for
you out there beyond the
[icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Green Launch Star[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.UsFrench:
Je ne sais même pas ce qui t'attend 
au-delà du [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Super Anneau Étoile 
Vert[setfontcol default]...
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.EuFrench:
Qu'y a-t-il de l'autre côté du [setfontcol green]portail
des épreuves[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar]?...
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.UsSpanish:
Ni siquiera yo sé qué te espera más
allá del [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Anillo Estelar Verde[setfontcol default]...
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.EuSpanish:
¿A dónde conducirá
el [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol green]Portal de los Retos[setfontcol default]?[newpage]
Ni siquiera yo sé lo que te aguarda
más allá.
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.EuGerman:
Du hast das [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol green]Tor zu den 
Prüfungen [setfontcol default]reaktiviert. Was 
wohl auf dich wartet...
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.EuItalian:
Non so che ne sarà d'ora in poi
del [setfontcol green]Varco delle Sfide[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar]...
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.JpJapanese:
[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol green][ruby base]試練[ruby top]しれん[ruby end]の[ruby base]扉[ruby top]とびら[ruby end][setfontcol default]の[ruby base]先[ruby top]さき[ruby end]が　どうなっていることやら、
このワタシでも　[ruby base]見当[ruby top]けんとう[ruby end]もつきません…
AstroGalaxy_Butler010.KrKorean:
[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol green]시련의 문[setfontcol default] 안에 무엇이 있는지는
아무리 저라도 잘 모르겠습니다…

AstroGalaxy_Butler012.UsEnglish:
The [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] Power Stars[setfontcol default] are our friends.[pause]
I implore you, please help them!

The [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] Power Stars[setfontcol default] are our friends.[pause]
I implore you, please help them!
AstroGalaxy_Butler012.EuDutch:
The [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] Power Stars[setfontcol default] are our friends.[pause]
I implore you, please help them!
AstroGalaxy_Butler012.UsFrench:
Les [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Super Étoiles[setfontcol default] sont nos amies.[pause]
Aide-les, je t'en prie!
AstroGalaxy_Butler012.EuFrench:
Les [setfontcol yellow]super étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] sont nos amies...[pause]
Je t'en prie, tu dois nous aider.
AstroGalaxy_Butler012.UsSpanish:
Las [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas [setfontcol default]son
nuestras amigas.[pause] Por favor,
ayúdanos a rescatarlas.
AstroGalaxy_Butler012.EuSpanish:
Las [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas [setfontcol default]son
nuestras compañeras.[pause]
Por favor, ayúdanos a rescatarlas.
AstroGalaxy_Butler012.EuGerman:
Die [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Sterne [setfontcol default]sind
unsere Freunde...[pause] Hilf ihnen!
AstroGalaxy_Butler012.EuItalian:
Le [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] sono
nostre amiche. Salvale.
AstroGalaxy_Butler012.JpJapanese:
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol default]は　[ruby base]我々[ruby top]われわれ[ruby end]の[ruby base]仲間[ruby top]なかま[ruby end]…[pause]
どうか　あなたのお[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]を　お[ruby base]貸[ruby top]か[ruby end]し[ruby base]下[ruby top]くだ[ruby end]さい
AstroGalaxy_Butler012.KrKorean:
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]파워스타[setfontcol default]는 우리들의 친구…[pause]
부디 당신의 힘을 빌려 주세요

AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.UsEnglish:
The [setfontcol red]beacon [setfontcol default]is lit again![newpage]
It shines weakly, maybe only as bright
as a Class 6 star, but at least the
poor Lumas will survive now.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.EuEnglish:
The [setfontcol red]beacon [setfontcol default]is lit again![newpage]
It shines weakly, maybe only as bright
as a Class 6 star, but at least the
poor Lumas will survive now.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.EuDutch:
The [setfontcol red]beacon [setfontcol default]is lit again![newpage]
It shines weakly, maybe only as bright
as a Class 6 star, but at least the
poor Lumas will survive now.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.UsFrench:
La [setfontcol red]balise [setfontcol default]dans l'observatoire flamboie
de nouveau![newpage]
Elle brille aussi faiblement qu'une
étoile de Classe 6, mais au moins ces
pauvres Chikos survivront.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.EuFrench:
Oh... Le [setfontcol red]brasier[setfontcol default] de l'observatoire
flamboie à nouveau...[newpage]
Il ne brille encore que de la faible
lumière d'une étoile de classe 6, mais
les Luma devraient être rassurés.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.UsSpanish:
Oooh... La luz ha vuelto al [setfontcol red]faro [setfontcol default]del
planetarium...[newpage]
Brilla con tan poca fuerza como una
estrella de Magnitud 6, pero al menos
los Destellos podrán sobrevivir.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.EuSpanish:
Ooooh... La luz ha vuelto al [setfontcol red]Faro [setfontcol default]del
Planetarium. [newpage]
Aún es pequeña, solo llega a 6 en
magnitud luminosa, pero al menos,
ya podremos movernos sin miedo.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.EuGerman:
Oh... Das [setfontcol red]Kraftfeld [setfontcol default]der Sternwarte
scheint wieder Energie zu haben...[newpage]
Sein Licht ist schwach wie das eines 
Klasse 6 Sterns...[newpage]
Aber so brauchen sich die Luma
wenigstens nicht mehr zu fürchten.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.EuItalian:
Il [setfontcol red]braciere[setfontcol default] dell'osservatorio è di
nuovo acceso...[newpage]
Emana una luce fievole, come
una stella di sesta classe.[newpage]
Almeno i poveri Sfavillotti
sopravvivranno.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.JpJapanese:
おお…　[ruby base]天文台[ruby top]てんもんだい[ruby end]の[setfontcol red]トーチ[setfontcol default]に
[ruby base]火[ruby top]ひ[ruby end]が　もどりましたな…[newpage]
まだ６[ruby base]等星[ruby top]とうせい[ruby end]のように　[ruby base]小[ruby top]ちい[ruby end]さな[ruby base]光[ruby top]ひかり[ruby end]ですが、
これでチコたちも　おびえずにすみそうですな
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain011.KrKorean:
아… 천문대의 [setfontcol red]토치[setfontcol default]가
다시 불타오르기 시작했어요…[newpage]
아직은 6등성급의 작은 빛이지만 덕분에
앞으로 치코는 두려움에 떨지 않을 거예요

AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.UsEnglish:
If we do that, we'll be able to restore
the [setfontcol blue]Comet Observatory[setfontcol default]'s ability to
fly like a starship.[newpage]
Then perhaps we can pursue the
thieves who ran off with the
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.EuEnglish:
If we do that, we'll be able to restore
the [setfontcol blue]Comet Observatory[setfontcol default]'s ability to
fly like a starship.[newpage]
Then perhaps we can pursue the
thieves who ran off with the
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.EuDutch:
If we do that, we'll be able to restore
the [setfontcol blue]Comet Observatory[setfontcol default]'s ability to
fly like a starship.[newpage]
Then perhaps we can pursue the
thieves who ran off with the
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.UsFrench:
L'énergie de ces étoiles aidera
l'[setfontcol blue]Observatoire de la Comète [setfontcol default]à
retrouver ses capacités d'astronef.[newpage]
Nous pourrons alors nous lancer à la
poursuite de ceux qui ont volé les [icon PowerStar]
[setfontcol yellow]Super Étoiles[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.EuFrench:
Nous devons faire en sorte que notre
[setfontcol blue]observatoire de la comète[setfontcol default] retrouve
ses capacités d'astronef.[newpage]
Nous pourrons alors nous lancer à la
poursuite de ceux qui ont volé les
[setfontcol yellow]super étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar]!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.UsSpanish:
Sigue así y el [setfontcol blue]Planetarium del Cometa
[setfontcol default]irá recuperando sus funciones de
nave estelar.[newpage]
Quizá entonces podamos perseguir a 
a los seres maléficos que se llevaron
las [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.EuSpanish:
Sigue así y el [setfontcol blue]Planetarium del Cometa
[setfontcol default]irá recuperando sus funciones de
[setfontcol blue]aeronave[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Además, podrás perseguir
a los seres maléficos que han robado
las [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.EuGerman:
Die [setfontcol blue]Sternwarte auf dem Kometen[setfontcol default]
ist in Wahrheit ein [setfontcol blue]Sternenschiff[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Wenn wir es wieder aktivieren, 
können wir auch die Verfolgung[newpage]
der Feinde aufnehmen, die die
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Sterne [setfontcol default]gestohlen haben.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.EuItalian:
Appena ripristiniamo le funzioni di
[setfontcol blue]navicella[setfontcol default] dell'[setfontcol blue]Osservatorio Cometa[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
Si individuerà la posizione del nemico
che ha rubato le [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.JpJapanese:
さすれば、この[setfontcol blue]ほうき[ruby base]星[ruby top]ぼし[ruby end]の[ruby base]天文台[ruby top]てんもんだい[ruby end][setfontcol default]も
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end][ruby base]船[ruby top]ぶね[ruby end][setfontcol default]としての[ruby base]機能[ruby top]きのう[ruby end]を　[ruby base]回復[ruby top]かいふく[ruby end]し[newpage]
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol default]をうばった　[ruby base]敵[ruby top]てき[ruby end]の[ruby base]行方[ruby top]ゆくえ[ruby end]を
[ruby base]追[ruby top]お[ruby end]うことが　できるでしょうな
AstroGalaxy_ButlerExplain012.KrKorean:
그러면 이 [setfontcol blue]별똥별의 천문대[setfontcol default]도
[setfontcol blue]별의 배[setfontcol default]로서의 기능을 회복하고[newpage]
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 빼앗은 적을
쫓을 수 있을 거예요

AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap000.UsEnglish:
Would you like to see the [setfontcol blue]map[setfontcol default]?[pause]
Here you go.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap000.EuEnglish:
Would you like to see the [setfontcol blue]map[setfontcol default]?[pause]
Here you go.

AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap000.UsFrench:

Voilà, voilà!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap000.EuFrench:
Oui, tu souhaites voir la [setfontcol blue]carte[setfontcol default]?
Voilà, voilà!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap000.UsSpanish:
¿Quieres ver el [setfontcol blue]mapa[setfontcol default]?
Mira, aquí lo tienes.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap000.EuSpanish:
Vale, vale, ahora mismo te
enseño el [setfontcol blue]MAPA[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap000.EuGerman: Ja, ja, hier ist die [setfontcol blue]Karte[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap000.EuItalian: Sì, sì... Ecco una [setfontcol blue]mappa[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap000.JpJapanese: はいはい、[setfontcol blue][ruby base]MAP[ruby top]マップ[ruby end][setfontcol default]ですな

AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.UsEnglish: Oh! The power is on in a [setfontcol red]new dome[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.EuEnglish: Oh! The power is on in a [setfontcol red]new dome[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.EuDutch: Oh! The power is on in a [setfontcol red]new dome[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.UsFrench:
Ah! Un [setfontcol red]nouveau dôme[setfontcol default] s'est mis en 
marche!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.EuFrench:
Oh! Un [setfontcol red]nouveau dôme[setfontcol default] s'est mis en
marche!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.UsSpanish:
¡Oh! ¡Ahora puedes entrar en una
nueva [setfontcol red]bóveda[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.EuSpanish:
¡Oh! ¡Ahora puedes entrar en
una nueva [setfontcol red]Bóveda Celeste[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.EuGerman: Oh! Eine [setfontcol red]neue Kuppel [setfontcol default]wurde aktiviert!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.EuItalian:
Oh! Ora è accessibile un [setfontcol red]nuovo
planetario[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.JpJapanese: おお！　[setfontcol red][ruby base]新[ruby top]あたら[ruby end]しいドーム[setfontcol default]が　[ruby base]稼動[ruby top]かどう[ruby end]しましたな！
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap002.KrKorean: 와! [setfontcol red]새로운 돔[setfontcol default]이 움직이기 시작했어요!

AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.UsEnglish:
The newly opened [setfontcol red]dome [setfontcol default]is called the
[setfontcol red]Fountain[setfontcol default]. It's really quite relaxing.[newpage]
By the way, have you looked at the
[setfontcol red]map[setfontcol default]? It contains information about
[setfontcol blue]galaxies [setfontcol default]as well as [setfontcol red]domes[setfontcol default].[newpage]
If you forget the location of a [setfontcol red]dome[setfontcol default],
don't hesitate to speak with [setfontcol blue]me[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.EuEnglish:
The newly opened [setfontcol red]dome [setfontcol default]is called the
[setfontcol red]Fountain[setfontcol default]. It's really quite relaxing.[newpage]
By the way, have you looked at the
[setfontcol red]map[setfontcol default]? It contains information about
[setfontcol blue]galaxies [setfontcol default]as well as [setfontcol red]domes[setfontcol default].[newpage]
If you forget the location of a [setfontcol red]dome[setfontcol default],
don't hesitate to speak with [setfontcol blue]me[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.EuDutch:
The newly opened [setfontcol red]dome [setfontcol default]is called the
[setfontcol red]Fountain[setfontcol default]. It's really quite relaxing.[newpage]
By the way, have you looked at the
[setfontcol red]map[setfontcol default]? It contains information about
[setfontcol blue]galaxies [setfontcol default]as well as [setfontcol red]domes[setfontcol default].[newpage]
If you forget the location of a [setfontcol red]dome[setfontcol default],
don't hesitate to speak with [setfontcol blue]me[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.UsFrench:
Nous appelons le[setfontcol red] dôme[setfontcol default] récemment
ouvert la[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol red]Fontaine[setfontcol default]. C'est très
relaxant.[newpage]
Au fait, as-tu regardé la [setfontcol red]carte[setfontcol default]? Elle
contient des infos non seulement sur
les [setfontcol red]dômes[setfontcol default], mais aussi sur les [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Si tu oublies la position d'un [setfontcol red]dôme[setfontcol default],
n'hésite pas à venir [setfontcol blue]me[setfontcol default] parler.
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.EuFrench:
Nous appelons le [setfontcol red]dôme[setfontcol default] qui vient de
s'ouvrir la [setfontcol red]salle de bains[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Comme tu as pu le voir, la [setfontcol red]carte[setfontcol default]
n'indique pas seulement la position
des [setfontcol red]dômes[setfontcol default],[newpage]
mais aussi celle des [setfontcol blue]galaxies
[setfontcol default]découvertes ainsi que toutes sortes
d'informations utiles.[newpage]
N'hésite pas à [setfontcol blue]me demander[setfontcol default] si tu ne
parviens pas à trouver un [setfontcol red]dôme[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.UsSpanish:
La nueva [setfontcol red]bóveda [setfontcol default]es un lugar
al que llamamos la [setfontcol red]Fuente[setfontcol default].[newpage]
¿Has mirado el [setfontcol red]mapa[setfontcol default]? No solo
están incluidas las [setfontcol red]bóvedas[setfontcol default], sino
también las [setfontcol blue]galaxias[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Habla [setfontcol blue]conmigo [setfontcol default]siempre que te pierdas
y no encuentres una [setfontcol red]bóveda[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.EuSpanish:
La nueva [setfontcol red]Bóveda Celeste[setfontcol default] es una
estancia que llamamos [setfontcol red]Baño[setfontcol default]. [newpage]
En el [setfontcol red]MAPA [setfontcol default]que has visto hace un
momento no solo están incluidas
las [setfontcol red]bóvedas[setfontcol default], sino también las [setfontcol blue]galaxias[setfontcol default][newpage]
que has descubierto y otro tipo
de información. ¡Es muy útil![newpage]
Habla [setfontcol blue]conmigo [setfontcol default]siempre que te pierdas
y no encuentres una [setfontcol red]Bóveda Celeste[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.EuGerman:
Wir nennen die wieder befreite
[setfontcol red]Kuppel [setfontcol default]unser [setfontcol red]Badezimmer[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Die [setfontcol red]Karte[setfontcol default], die ich dir vorhin gezeigt 
habe, zeigt nicht nur die [setfontcol red]Kuppeln[setfontcol default],[newpage]
sondern auch die entdeckten 
[setfontcol blue]Galaxien [setfontcol default]und verschiedene Infos.[newpage]
Wenn du vergisst, wo sich eine [setfontcol red]Kuppel[setfontcol default]
befindet, komm und frag [setfontcol blue]mich[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.EuItalian:
Il nuovo [setfontcol red]planetario[setfontcol default] è una stanza
che noi chiamiamo [setfontcol red]bagno[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Avrai guardato la [setfontcol red]MAPPA[setfontcol default] di prima...
Non indica solo i [setfontcol red]planetari[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
Ma mostra anche le [setfontcol blue]galassie [setfontcol default]e
fornisce altre informazioni...[newpage]
Se dimentichi la posizione di un[setfontcol red]
planetario[setfontcol default], basta chiedere a [setfontcol blue]me[setfontcol default]!
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]新[ruby top]あら[ruby end]たに[ruby base]開放[ruby top]かいほう[ruby end]された[setfontcol red]ドーム[setfontcol default]は
[ruby base]我々[ruby top]われわれ[ruby end]が　[setfontcol red]バスルーム[setfontcol default]と[ruby base]呼[ruby top]よ[ruby end]んでおるところですな[newpage]
[ruby base]先[ruby top]さき[ruby end]ほどの[setfontcol red][ruby base]MAP[ruby top]マップ[ruby end][setfontcol default]なるもの、ごらんになったことが
おありでしょうが、これは[setfontcol red]ドーム[setfontcol default]だけでなく[newpage]
[ruby base]発見[ruby top]はっけん[ruby end]した[setfontcol blue]ギャラクシー[setfontcol default]や　[ruby base]様々[ruby top]さまざま[ruby end]な[ruby base]情報[ruby top]じょうほう[ruby end]を
[ruby base]知[ruby top]し[ruby end]ることができる　スグレモノなのです[newpage]
[setfontcol red]ドーム[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]位置[ruby top]いち[ruby end]が　[ruby base]分[ruby top]わ[ruby end]からなくなったら、
この[setfontcol blue]ワタシ[setfontcol default]に　お[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]きくだされ
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap003.KrKorean:
새로 개방된 [setfontcol red]돔[setfontcol default]은
[setfontcol red]욕실[setfontcol default]이라고 불리우는 곳입니다[newpage]
조금 전에 [setfontcol red]맵[setfontcol default]이라는 것을 보셨을 텐데
그건 [setfontcol red]돔[setfontcol default]뿐 아니라[newpage]
발견한 [setfontcol blue]갤럭시[setfontcol default]나 그 밖의 다양한 정보를
알려 주는 훌륭한 물건입니다[newpage]
[setfontcol red]돔[setfontcol default]의 위치를 잊으셨다면
언제든 [setfontcol blue]저[setfontcol default]에게 물어보세요

N'hésite pas à [setfontcol blue]me demander[setfontcol default] si tu ne

Habla [setfontcol blue]conmigo [setfontcol default]siempre que te pierdas

AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap004.EuGerman:
Wenn du vergisst, wo sich eine
[setfontcol red]Kuppel[setfontcol default] befindet, komm und frag [setfontcol blue]mich[setfontcol default].
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap004.EuItalian:
Se hai problemi a trovare un

[setfontcol red]ドーム[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]位置[ruby top]いち[ruby end]が　[ruby base]分[ruby top]わ[ruby end]からなくなった[ruby base]時[ruby top]とき[ruby end]は
この[setfontcol blue]ワタシ[setfontcol default]に　お[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]きくだされ
AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap004.KrKorean:
[setfontcol red]돔[setfontcol default]의 위치를 잊으셨다면

AstroGalaxy_ButlerMap005.UsEnglish:
This [setfontcol red]map [setfontcol default]shows not only the positions
of the domes, but also the [setfontcol blue]galaxies
[setfontcol default]you've found.[newpage]
You will also be able to observe any
unusual space conditions. It's really
quite a marvel!

This [setfontcol red]map [setfontcol default]shows not only the positions
