Les [setfontcol red]Comètes Casse-Cou[setfontcol default] te laissent
avec peu d'énergie.[newpage]
Les [setfontcol blue]Comètes Cosmiques [setfontcol default]te forcent à
faire la course contre une copie de
toi-même.[newpage]
Les[setfontcol yellow] Comètes Rapides [setfontcol default]permettent à
tes ennemis de se déplacer encore
plus vite.[newpage]
Quant aux autres... à toi de les
découvrir! ♪
AstroGalaxy_TicoComet007.EuFrench:
Ces [setfontcol red]comètes farceuses[setfontcol default] sont
agaçantes, elles changent l'apparence
des [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default].[newpage]
La [setfontcol red]comète rouge[setfontcol default] limite le temps dont
tu disposes,[pause] la comète blanche
abaisse ton énergie à 1,[newpage]
avec la [setfontcol blue]comète d'ombre[setfontcol default], ton double
te défie,[pause] et avec la [setfontcol yellow]comète rapide[setfontcol default],
tes ennemis se déplacent plus vite.[newpage]
Tu devrais jeter un œil par toi-même!
Amuse-toi bien♪
AstroGalaxy_TicoComet007.UsSpanish:
Ese [setfontcol red]Cometa Pícaro[setfontcol default] siempre está
causando problemas, cambiando el
modo en que funcionan las [setfontcol blue]galaxias[setfontcol default]... [newpage]
Los [setfontcol red]Cometas Rojos[setfontcol default] limitan el tiempo 
que puedes pasar ahí.[pause] Los Cometas
Oscuros solo te dejan 1 de energía.[newpage]
Los [setfontcol blue]Cometas Sombras[setfontcol default] hacen que
corras contra una copia de ti mismo.[newpage]
Los [setfontcol yellow]Cometas Rápidos [setfontcol default]hacen que tus
enemigos se muevan más rápido.[newpage]
¡Lo divertido es verlos en
funcionamiento! ♪
AstroGalaxy_TicoComet007.EuSpanish:
Los [setfontcol red]cometas pícaros[setfontcol default] cambian el
estado original de las [setfontcol blue]galaxias[setfontcol default].
¡Son un fastidio![newpage]
El [setfontcol red]Cometa Rojo[setfontcol default] limita el tiempo.[pause]
El Cometa Mortal solo te deja
1 de energía.[newpage]
El [setfontcol blue]Cometa Sombra[setfontcol default] te obliga
a enfrentarte a ti mismo.[pause]
El [setfontcol yellow]Cometa Rapidín [setfontcol default]acelera todo.[newpage]
¡Te lo vas a pasar RE-QUE-TE-BIEN!
AstroGalaxy_TicoComet007.EuGerman:
Die [setfontcol red]Schabernack-Kometen [setfontcol default]sind 
lästige Dinger, sie verwandeln
[setfontcol blue]Galaxien [setfontcol default]in völlig andere Orte...[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Rote Kometen [setfontcol default]begrenzen die Zeit, die
du in einer Galaxie verbringen kannst.[newpage]
[setfontcol green]Risikokometen [setfontcol default]begrenzen deine 
Lebenskraft auf 1.[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Schattenkometen [setfontcol default]lassen dich ein 
Rennen mit einem Klon abhalten.[newpage]
Und [setfontcol yellow]Tempokometen [setfontcol default]machen deine 
Gegner schneller.[newpage]
Den Rest musst du selbst 
herausfinden, viel Spaß!♪
AstroGalaxy_TicoComet007.EuItalian:
Le [setfontcol red]Comete Burlone[setfontcol default] sono dispettose!
Cambiano l'aspetto delle [setfontcol blue]galassie[setfontcol default]![newpage]
La [setfontcol red]Cometa Rossa[setfontcol default] decide il tempo
che si può trascorrere lì.[newpage]
La [setfontcol red]Cometa Pericolo[setfontcol default] fa diminuire
la tua energia a 1.[newpage]
La [setfontcol blue]Cometa Fantasma[setfontcol default] ti fa correre
contro un tuo doppione.[pause] La [setfontcol yellow]Cometa
Rapida [setfontcol default]velocizza il tempo.[newpage]
Le altre... dovrai essere tu
a scoprirle! ♪
AstroGalaxy_TicoComet007.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red]いたずらコメット[setfontcol default]は　[setfontcol blue]ギャラクシー[setfontcol default]を
[ruby base]違[ruby top]ちが[ruby end]う[ruby base]姿[ruby top]すがた[ruby end]に　[ruby base]変[ruby top]か[ruby end]えてしまう　やっかい[ruby base]者[ruby top]もの[ruby end]さ～[newpage]
[setfontcol red]「レッドコメット」[setfontcol default]は　いられる[ruby base]時間[ruby top]じかん[ruby end]が[ruby base]決[ruby top]き[ruby end]まってる～[pause]

BirthdayCakeZone_Kinopio001.UsEnglish:
I tried to blow out the [setfontcol red]candle [setfontcol default]with a
big huff and puff, but it didn't go out.

I tried to blow out the [setfontcol red]candle [setfontcol default]with a

I tried to blow out the [setfontcol red]candle [setfontcol default]with a

[setfontcol red]bougie[setfontcol default];[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]elle ne s'est pas éteinte.

J'ai beau [setfontcol blue]souffler[setfontcol default], je n'arrive pas à

Las [setfontcol red]velas [setfontcol default]no se apagan

Flamme der [setfontcol red]Kerze [setfontcol default]ging nicht aus...

BirthdayCakeZone_Kinopio001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red]ロウソク[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]火[ruby top]ひ[ruby end]、ボクが[setfontcol blue]フー！[setfontcol default]しても

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker001.UsEnglish:
Oh, hey! You want to blow up all this
trash for me?
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker001.EuEnglish:
Oh, hey! You want to blow up all this
trash for me?
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker001.EuDutch:
Oh, hey! You want to blow up all this
trash for me?

Ah, b'jour! T'veux-tu faire exploser
toutes les vidanges icitte pour moé?
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker001.EuFrench: Hein? Tu veux bien t'en charger?
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker001.UsSpanish:
¡Hola! ¿Puedes ayudarme a
deshacerme de esta basura con una
explosión?
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker001.JpJapanese: ん？　やってくれるん？

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.UsEnglish:
Wow! I'm never going to take out the
trash again now that I know you
can just BLOW IT UP![newpage]
Oh! Take [setfontcol red]this [setfontcol default]as my thanks! I found it
lying around. Maybe it will help you.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.EuEnglish:
Wow! I'm never going to take out the
trash again now that I know you
can just BLOW IT UP![newpage]
Oh! Take [setfontcol red]this [setfontcol default]as my thanks! I found it
lying around. Maybe it will help you.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.EuDutch:
Wow! I'm never going to take out the
trash again now that I know you
can just BLOW IT UP![newpage]
Oh! Take [setfontcol red]this [setfontcol default]as my thanks! I found it
lying around. Maybe it will help you.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.UsFrench:
Mille fois merci! Tout est
archi-propre, ast'heure![newpage]
Tiens! J'ai trouvé [setfontcol red]c't'affaire-là[setfontcol default]. J'te
l'donne si tu veux!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.EuFrench:
Merci, merci!
C'est tout propre maintenant![newpage]
Tiens! J'ai trouvé [setfontcol red]c'truc-là[setfontcol default].
J'te l'donne si tu veux!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.UsSpanish:
¡Gracias, gracias! ¡No volveré a sacar
la basura sabiendo que puedes
hacerla explotar![newpage]
¡Oh! ¡Toma [setfontcol red]esto[setfontcol default] como agradecimiento!
Lo encontré por ahí. Quizás te ayude.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.EuSpanish:
¡Grasias, caballerete! Lo ha' dejao to
como los shorros del'oro.[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Esto [setfontcol default]me lo encontré por aquí, toma si
quiere'.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.EuGerman:
Vielen, vielen Dank! 
Jetzt ist es schön sauber![newpage]
Ach, übrigens... Ich hab [setfontcol red]das [setfontcol default]hier
gefunden. Nimm es bitte!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.EuItalian:
Grazie! Grazie! Adesso è proprio
splendente![newpage]
Oh! Prendi [setfontcol red]questa[setfontcol default]! L'ho trovata.
Se ti serve, prendila pure!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.JpJapanese:
おおきに　おおきに！
キレーなったわ！[newpage]
そや！　[setfontcol red]コレ[setfontcol default]　[ruby base]拾[ruby top]ひろ[ruby end]たヤツやけど、
よかったら　[ruby base]持[ruby top]も[ruby end]って[ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]き！
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker002.KrKorean:
고맙데이! 고맙데이!
덕분에 깔끔해졌다 아이가![newpage]
맞다! [setfontcol red]이거[setfontcol default] 어디선가 주운 건데
필요하면 갖다 써라!

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.UsEnglish: NO, NO! You gotta do it faster!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.EuEnglish: NO, NO! You gotta do it faster!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.EuDutch: NO, NO! You gotta do it faster!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.UsFrench:
NON, NON! Cou'don, y'faut que tu le 
fasses plus vite! Embraye!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.EuFrench:
Non, non et non!
Il faut te remuer plus vite!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.EuSpanish:
¡Ere' un desa'tre!
¡Hay que se' má' rápido!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.EuGerman:
Nein, nein! Du musst es schneller 
machen!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.EuItalian: No, no! Devi fare più in fretta!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.JpJapanese:
あかんあかん！
もっと　チャッチャとせな！
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker003.KrKorean:
이라모 안 된다!
좀 더 팍팍 몬하겠드나!

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.UsEnglish:
You know how hard it is keeping a
dreadnought clean?[newpage]
And then someone comes and drops
a load of trash in the ammo depot!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.EuEnglish:
You know how hard it is keeping a
dreadnought clean?[newpage]
And then someone comes and drops
a load of trash in the ammo depot!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.EuDutch:
You know how hard it is keeping a
dreadnought clean?[newpage]
And then someone comes and drops
a load of trash in the ammo depot!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.UsFrench:
C't'une [setfontcol blue]voie sans issue[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Mais, qui donc... Qui a jeté ses
vidanges icitte?!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.EuFrench:
Il n'y a rien par ici, c'est un
[setfontcol blue]cul-de-sac[setfontcol default]! Ce n'est qu'une [setfontcol red]décharge[setfontcol default].[newpage]
... Mais, qui a fait ça? Qui a jeté des
[setfontcol blue]déchets recyclables [setfontcol default]ici?
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.UsSpanish:
¿Sabes lo difícil que es mantener un
acorazado limpio?[newpage]
¡A veces la gente tira basura en el
almacén de la munición!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.EuSpanish:
¡[setfontcol blue]Fin del camino[setfontcol default], maestro!
¡E'to e' un [setfontcol red]verteero[setfontcol default]![newpage]
¡Dita mi suerte! ¿Quién ha osao tirar
aquí too [setfontcol blue]e'to[setfontcol default]?
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.EuGerman:
Das ist eine [setfontcol blue]Sackgasse[setfontcol default]! Du bist in 
der [setfontcol red]Mülldeponie[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Aber wer...? Jemand hat hier 
[setfontcol blue]nichtbrennbaren Müll[setfontcol default] hingeworfen...
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.EuItalian:
Questo è un [setfontcol blue]vicolo cieco[setfontcol default]! Qui c'è
soltanto una [setfontcol red]discarica[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Ehi, ma... qualcuno ci ha buttato
dei [setfontcol blue]rifiuti incombustibili[setfontcol default]!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.JpJapanese:
ココは　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]き[ruby base]止[ruby top]ど[ruby end]まり[setfontcol default]！　ただの[setfontcol red]ゴミ[ruby base]捨[ruby top]す[ruby end]て[ruby base]場[ruby top]ば[ruby end][setfontcol default]や[newpage]
…でも、[ruby base]誰[ruby top]だれ[ruby end]や？
ココに[setfontcol blue][ruby base]燃[ruby top]も[ruby end]えへんゴミ[setfontcol default]　[ruby base]捨[ruby top]す[ruby end]てたん…
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker004.KrKorean:
여긴 [setfontcol blue]막다른 길[setfontcol default]! [setfontcol red]쓰레기 처리장[setfontcol default]이라 카는 데다[newpage]
…근데 누꼬!
이란 데다 [setfontcol blue]재활용 쓰레기[setfontcol default]를 버린 녀석이…

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker005.EuSpanish:
¡Ayúame por lo má'
sagrao de too tu salero!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker005.JpJapanese: ほな、[ruby base]頼[ruby top]たの[ruby end]むわな！

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.UsEnglish:
OK, then... If you need to leave, you
can use that [setfontcol green]pipe [setfontcol default]there.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.EuEnglish:
OK, then... If you need to leave, you
can use that [setfontcol green]pipe [setfontcol default]there.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.EuDutch:
OK, then... If you need to leave, you
can use that [setfontcol green]pipe [setfontcol default]there.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.UsFrench:
OK, d'abord... Si tu dois partir, tu 
peux utiliser ce [setfontcol green]tuyau[setfontcol default] là-bas.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.EuFrench:
Tant pis, je me débrouillerai...[pause]
Ah! Pour repartir, tu peux utiliser le
[setfontcol green]tuyau [setfontcol default]là-bas.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.UsSpanish:
Bueno... Si tienes que marcharte,
puedes usar esa [setfontcol green]tubería[setfontcol default].
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.EuSpanish:
Sí, e'to lo veo mu complicao pa ti.[pause]
Sal por la [setfontcol green]tubería [setfontcol default]cuando te aburra'
de no haser na de na por aquí.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.EuGerman:
Wie auch immer...[pause] Wenn du gehen
willst, verwende die [setfontcol green]Röhre [setfontcol default]dort.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.EuItalian:
Ti ringrazio davvero... Se devi andar
via, usa quel [setfontcol green]tubo[setfontcol default] laggiù.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.JpJapanese:
ホンマ、ナンギやわ～…[pause]
あ、[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]るんやったら　そこの[setfontcol green][ruby base]土管[ruby top]どかん[ruby end][setfontcol default]から　[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]ってな
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker006.KrKorean:
진짜로 어렵지～…[pause]
돌아갈라모 거기에 있는 [setfontcol green]토관[setfontcol default]으로 들어가라

to bits! Thanks!

You blew that trash

echt geholfen!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker007.JpJapanese: おおきに！　[ruby base]助[ruby top]たす[ruby end]かったわ

Heyyyy...[pause]we have plenty of [setfontcol blue]bombs[setfontcol default].
Maybe you could use them to blow
up all this trash?

T'veux-tu t'en servir pour faire
exploser les vidanges dans le coin?
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker008.EuFrench:
Dis, si j'te prête le [setfontcol blue]nécessaire[setfontcol default],

Oye... Tenemos muchas [setfontcol blue]bombas[setfontcol default].

esta basura?

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker008.EuGerman:
Wenn ich dir die [setfontcol blue]Mittel [setfontcol default]gebe,

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker008.EuItalian:
Se ti presto gli [setfontcol blue]arnesi[setfontcol default], che ne dici

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker008.JpJapanese:
アンタ、よかったら　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]道具[ruby top]どうぐ[ruby end][setfontcol default][ruby base]貸[ruby top]か[ruby end]したるから、

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker008.KrKorean:
필요하모 [setfontcol blue]도구[setfontcol default]도 빌려줄 테니까

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.UsEnglish:
There's always more, so come by
again later if you feel like helping!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.EuEnglish:
There's always more, so come by

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.EuDutch:

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.UsFrench:

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.EuFrench:
Y'a toujours plein de déchets, alors

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.UsSpanish:
¡Siempre hay más, así que vuelve
más tarde si quieres ayudar!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.EuSpanish:
La basura nunca se termina.
Vuelve a ayuarme cuando quiera'.
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.EuGerman:
Es gibt hier noch mehr Müll, also wenn

BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.EuItalian:

Torna ancora ad aiutarmi!
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.JpJapanese:
ゴミは　ナンボでもあるから
また　[ruby base]頼[ruby top]たの[ruby end]むわな！
BombTimeAttack2Zone_Caretaker009.KrKorean:
쓰레기는 얼마든지 있으니까는
또 와서 치워주라!

BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.UsEnglish:
This is the [setfontcol blue]AMMO DEPOT[setfontcol default], not a
[setfontcol red]GARBAGE DUMP[setfontcol default]![newpage]
What, do people think they can just
toss their [setfontcol blue]trash[setfontcol default] here and it'll
magically disappear?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.EuEnglish:
This is the [setfontcol blue]AMMO DEPOT[setfontcol default], not a
[setfontcol red]GARBAGE DUMP[setfontcol default]![newpage]
What, do people think they can just
throw their [setfontcol blue]trash[setfontcol default] here and it'll
magically disappear?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.EuDutch:
This is the [setfontcol blue]AMMO DEPOT[setfontcol default], not a
[setfontcol red]GARBAGE DUMP[setfontcol default]![newpage]
What, do people think they can just
throw their [setfontcol blue]trash[setfontcol default] here and it'll
magically disappear?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.UsFrench:
Ici, c'est le [setfontcol blue]DÉPÔT DE MUNITIONS[setfontcol default],
pas le[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol red]DÉPOTOIR[setfontcol default]! C'est pas des
farces![newpage]
On peut pas laisser ses [setfontcol blue]vidanges[setfontcol default]
icitte et s'attendre à ce que je
m'en occupe!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.EuFrench:
Il n'y a rien par ici, c'est un
[setfontcol blue]cul-de-sac[setfontcol default]! Ce n'est qu'une [setfontcol red]décharge[setfontcol default].[newpage]
... Mais, qui a fait ça? Qui a jeté des
[setfontcol blue]déchets recyclables[setfontcol default] ici?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.UsSpanish:
¡Este es el [setfontcol blue]almacén de munición[setfontcol default],
no un [setfontcol red]vertedero[setfontcol default]![newpage]
¿Por qué cree la gente que puede
tirar [setfontcol blue]basura [setfontcol default]aquí y que desaparecerá,
como por arte de magia?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.EuSpanish:
¡[setfontcol blue]Fin del camino[setfontcol default], maestro!
¡E'to e' un [setfontcol red]verteero[setfontcol default]![newpage]
¡Dita mi suerte! ¿Quién ha osao tirar
aquí too [setfontcol blue]e'to[setfontcol default]?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.EuGerman:
Das ist eine [setfontcol blue]Sackgasse[setfontcol default]! Du bist in 
der [setfontcol red]Mülldeponie[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Aber wer...? Jemand hat hier 
[setfontcol blue]nichtbrennbaren Müll[setfontcol default] hingeworfen...
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.EuItalian:
Questo è un [setfontcol blue]vicolo cieco[setfontcol default]! Qui c'è
soltanto una [setfontcol red]discarica[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Ehi, ma... qualcuno ci ha buttato
dei [setfontcol blue]rifiuti incombustibili[setfontcol default]!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.JpJapanese:
ココは　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]き[ruby base]止[ruby top]ど[ruby end]まり[setfontcol default]！　ただの[setfontcol red]ゴミ[ruby base]捨[ruby top]す[ruby end]て[ruby base]場[ruby top]ば[ruby end][setfontcol default]や[newpage]
でも、[ruby base]誰[ruby top]だれ[ruby end]や？
ココに[setfontcol blue][ruby base]燃[ruby top]も[ruby end]えへんゴミ[setfontcol default]　[ruby base]捨[ruby top]す[ruby end]てたん…
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker004.KrKorean:
여긴 [setfontcol blue]막다른 길[setfontcol default]! [setfontcol red]쓰레기 처리장[setfontcol default]이라 카는 데다[newpage]
근데 누꼬!
이란 데다 [setfontcol blue]재활용 쓰레기[setfontcol default]를 버린 녀석이…

BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker005.EuSpanish:
¡Ayúame por lo má'
sagrao de too tu salero!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker005.JpJapanese: ほな、[ruby base]頼[ruby top]たの[ruby end]むわな！

BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.UsEnglish:
OK. If you have to leave, you can use
that [setfontcol green]pipe [setfontcol default]there.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.EuEnglish:
OK. If you have to leave, you can use
that [setfontcol green]pipe [setfontcol default]there.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.EuDutch:
OK. If you have to leave, you can use
that [setfontcol green]pipe [setfontcol default]there.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.UsFrench:
OK, d'abord... Si tu dois partir, tu 
peux utiliser ce [setfontcol green]tuyau[setfontcol default] là-bas.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.EuFrench:
Tant pis, je me débrouillerai...[pause]
Ah! Pour repartir, tu peux utiliser le
[setfontcol green]tuyau [setfontcol default]là-bas.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.UsSpanish:
Está bien... Si quieres irte, puedes
usar esa [setfontcol green]tubería[setfontcol default].
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.EuSpanish:
Sí, e'to lo veo mu complicao pa ti.[pause]
Sal por la [setfontcol green]tubería [setfontcol default]cuando te aburra'
de no haser na de na por aquí.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.EuGerman:
Wie auch immer...[pause] Wenn du gehen
willst, verwende die [setfontcol green]Röhre [setfontcol default]dort.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.EuItalian:
Ti ringrazio davvero... Se devi andar
via, usa quel [setfontcol green]tubo[setfontcol default] laggiù.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.JpJapanese:
ホンマ、ナンギやわ～…[pause]
あ、[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]るんやったら　そこの[setfontcol green][ruby base]土管[ruby top]どかん[ruby end][setfontcol default]から　[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]ってな
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker006.KrKorean:
진짜로 어렵지～…[pause]
돌아갈라모 거기에 있는 [setfontcol green]토관[setfontcol default]으로 들어가라

BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker007.UsEnglish:
Thanks! You really
helped me out there.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker007.EuEnglish:
Thanks! You really
helped me out there.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker007.EuDutch:
Thanks! You really
helped me out there.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker007.UsFrench:
Merci! Tu m'as rendu un 
grand service là!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker007.EuGerman:
Vielen Dank! Du hast mir 
echt geholfen!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker007.JpJapanese: おおきに！　[ruby base]助[ruby top]たす[ruby end]かったわ

BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.UsEnglish:
Heyyyy...[pause]we have plenty of [setfontcol blue]bombs[setfontcol default].
Maybe you could use them to blow
up all this trash?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.EuEnglish:
Heyyyy...[pause]we have plenty of [setfontcol blue]bombs[setfontcol default].
Maybe you could use them to blow
up all this trash?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.EuDutch:
Heyyyy...[pause]we have plenty of [setfontcol blue]bombs[setfontcol default].
Maybe you could use them to blow
up all this trash?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.UsFrench:
Héééé... on a des [setfontcol blue]bombes[setfontcol default] en masse!
T'veux-tu t'en servir pour faire
exploser les vidanges dans le coin?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.EuFrench:
Dis, si j'te prête le [setfontcol blue]nécessaire[setfontcol default],
tu veux bien mettre un peu d'ordre
dans le coin?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.UsSpanish:
Oye... Tenemos muchas [setfontcol blue]bombas[setfontcol default].
¿Puedes utilizarlas para limpiar toda
esta basura?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.EuSpanish:
Si no te importa, te dejo
el [setfontcol blue]instrumental [setfontcol default]y tu me limpia' toico,
¿hase?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.EuGerman:
Wenn ich dir die [setfontcol blue]Mittel [setfontcol default]gebe, 
machst du dann hier sauber?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.EuItalian:
Se ti presto gli [setfontcol blue]arnesi[setfontcol default], che ne dici
di fare un po' di pulizia per me?
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.JpJapanese:
アンタ、よかったら　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]道具[ruby top]どうぐ[ruby end][setfontcol default][ruby base]貸[ruby top]か[ruby end]したるから、
パパーッと　かたづけてんか？
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker008.KrKorean:
필요하모 [setfontcol blue]도구[setfontcol default]도 빌려줄 테니까
팍팍 좀 치워삐라

BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.UsEnglish:
There's always more, so come by
again later if you feel like helping!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.EuEnglish:
There's always more, so come by
again later if you feel like helping!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.EuDutch:
There's always more, so come by
again later if you feel like helping!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.UsFrench:
Y'a toujours plus à nettoyer, fa'que
repasse plus tard si ça adonne!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.EuFrench:
Y'a toujours plein de déchets, alors
t'es le bienvenu pour me filer un coup
de main quand tu veux!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.UsSpanish:
¡Siempre hay más, así que vuelve
más tarde si quieres ayudar!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.EuSpanish:
La basura nunca se termina.
Vuelve a ayuarme cuando quiera'.
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.EuGerman:
Es gibt hier noch mehr Müll, also wenn
du mal wieder helfen willst...
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.EuItalian:
I rifiuti non finiscono mai...
Torna ancora ad aiutarmi!
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.JpJapanese:
ゴミは　ナンボでもあるから
また　[ruby base]頼[ruby top]たの[ruby end]むわな！
BombTimeAttackZone_Caretaker009.KrKorean:
쓰레기는 얼마든지 있으니까는
또 와서 치워주라!

Whew, that was scary! As my way of

[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2][setfontcol red]TRANS[shortpause][playsfx SE_SV_TICOFAT_META]FORM!

[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2][setfontcol red]TRANS-[shortpause]FOR-[shortpause]MA-[shortpause][playsfx SE_SV_TICO_METAMORPHOSE]TION!!

¡Gracias! ¡Para agradecértelo, crearé

[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2][setfontcol red]¡TRANS[shortpause][playsfx SE_SV_TICOFAT_META]FOOORMACIÓNN!

¡Gracias! ¡El atajo es por aquí![newpage]
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]¡[setfontcol red]MU[shortpause]TA[shortpause][playsfx SE_SV_TICO_METAMORPHOSE]CIÓN[setfontcol default]!

Danke! Hier, das ist für dich![newpage]
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2][setfontcol red]Ver-[shortpause]wan-[shortpause]de-[shortpause][playsfx SE_SV_TICO_METAMORPHOSE]luuung!!!

[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2][setfontcol red]TRA-[shortpause]SFOR-[shortpause][playsfx SE_SV_TICO_METAMORPHOSE]MA-[shortpause]ZIO-[shortpause]NE[setfontcol default]!

ありがとうございます！　[ruby base]近道[ruby top]ちかみち[ruby end]は　こちらです！[newpage]
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2][setfontcol red]ヘ　・　[shortpause]ン　・　[shortpause][playsfx SE_SV_TICO_METAMORPHOSE]シ～～～ン！！

BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.UsEnglish:
I tried walking along the path,
but it started disappearing with
every step I took!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.EuEnglish:
I tried walking along the path,
but it started disappearing with
every step I took!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.EuDutch:
I tried walking along the path,
but it started disappearing with
every step I took!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.UsFrench:
J'ai beau essayer de me promener
sur le chemin, mais il s'écroule à
chaque pas!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.EuFrench:
Dès que je pose un pied sur le
plancher, il disparaît!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.UsSpanish:
Intenté caminar por aquí, ¡pero el piso
desaparecía!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.EuSpanish: El suelo de por aquí desaparece.
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.EuGerman:
Ich bin hier herumgelaufen, aber der
Boden ist unter mir verschwunden!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.EuItalian:
Quando ci cammini sopra, il pavimento
sparisce!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]途中[ruby top]とちゅう[ruby end]の[ruby base]床[ruby top]ゆか[ruby end]、いくつか[ruby base]踏[ruby top]ふ[ruby end]んで
[ruby base]消[ruby top]け[ruby end]してしまいました～
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio000.KrKorean:
중간에 있는 바닥 몇 개는
밟아서 지워졌어요～

BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio001.UsFrench:
C'est bien périlleux, je te le 
dis!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio001.JpJapanese: [ruby base]危[ruby top]あぶ[ruby end]ないよねぇ～

BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.UsEnglish:
The floor [setfontcol blue]falls away when you step
on it[setfontcol default]! Be careful!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.EuEnglish:
The floor [setfontcol blue]falls away when you step
on it[setfontcol default]! Be careful!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.EuDutch:
The floor [setfontcol blue]falls away when you step
on it[setfontcol default]! Be careful!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.UsFrench:
Le sol [setfontcol blue]disparaît quand on marche
dessus[setfontcol default]! Fais attention!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.EuFrench:
Ici, le plancher [setfontcol blue]disparaît quand on
marche dessus[setfontcol default]! Fais bien attention!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.UsSpanish:
¡El piso [setfontcol blue]desaparece [setfontcol default]cuando lo pisas!
¡Ten mucho cuidado!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.EuSpanish:
¡El [setfontcol blue]suelo desaparece[setfontcol default] al pisar![pause]
¡Ten mucho cuidado!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.EuGerman:
Dieser Boden [setfontcol blue]verschwindet, wenn man
auf ihn tritt[setfontcol default]! [pause]Pass auf!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.EuItalian:
Fai attenzione! [setfontcol blue]Quando ci cammini[setfontcol default]
sopra, il pavimento [setfontcol blue]sparisce[setfontcol default]!
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.JpJapanese:
ここの[ruby base]床[ruby top]ゆか[ruby end]、[setfontcol blue][ruby base]踏[ruby top]ふ[ruby end]むと[ruby base]消[ruby top]き[ruby end]えます[setfontcol default]！[pause]
[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]をつけて！
BreakDownPlanetGalaxy_Kinopio002.KrKorean:
여기 바닥은 [setfontcol blue]밟으면 사라져요[setfontcol default]![pause]
조심하세요!

interrupted. If the batteries are low,

touching the Control Stick on [icon Nunchuk].

[setwindowtype 3]Communications with [icon WiiRemote] have been
interrupted. If the batteries are low,
replace them and press [icon Abtn] without
touching the Control Stick on [icon Nunchuk].

con el mando de Wii. Cambia
las pilas si están agotadas y

Wiiリモコンの[ruby base]通信[ruby top]つうしん[ruby end]が[ruby base]切[ruby top]き[ruby end]れました

さわらずに[icon Abtn]を[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]してください

Wii 리모컨의 통신이 끊겼습니다.

CannonFleetGalaxy_Caretaker001.JpJapanese: ほな、また[ruby base]来[ruby top]き[ruby end]てな！

Zero? ZEEEERO?[pause] Not even a single
Purple Coin? You must have done
that on purpose![newpage]
That might impress some, but this old
bag of bolts doesn't take kindly to
that kind of stunt.

Zero? ZEEEERO?[pause] Not even a single
Purple Coin? You must have done
that on purpose![newpage]
That might impress some, but this old
bag of bolts doesn't take kindly to
that kind of stunt.
CannonFleetGalaxy_Caretaker002.EuDutch:
Zero? ZEEEERO?[pause] Not even a single
Purple Coin? You must have done
that on purpose![newpage]
That might impress some, but this old
bag of bolts doesn't take kindly to
that kind of stunt.
CannonFleetGalaxy_Caretaker002.UsFrench:
Zéro? Rien? NADDDA?[pause] Même pas

Common_TamakoroTutorial006.UsEnglish:
From that [setfontcol blue]basic position[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]tilt [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]to
move the [setfontcol blue]ball [setfontcol default]in that direction. Then
just press [icon Abtn] to [setfontcol red]jump[setfontcol default]![newpage]
If anything gets in your way, smoosh
it! Anyway, you'll learn more by
doing it yourself.[pause] Good luck!

From that [setfontcol blue]basic position[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]tilt [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]to

Common_TamakoroTutorial006.UsFrench:
À partir de cette[setfontcol blue] position de base[setfontcol default], 
[setfontcol red]incline[setfontcol default] la [icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]pour faire rouler la [setfontcol blue]boule[setfontcol default]
dans cette direction.[newpage]
Appuie sur [icon Abtn] pour [setfontcol red]sauter[setfontcol default]!
Écrabouille ceux qui sont sur ton
chemin![newpage]
Enfin, la pratique vaut mieux qu'un 
long discours.[pause] Bonne chance!
Common_TamakoroTutorial006.EuFrench:
Depuis cette [setfontcol blue]position de base[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]incline[setfontcol default]
[icon WiiRemote] dans la direction de ton choix
pour faire rouler la [setfontcol blue]boule[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Ensuite, [setfontcol red]saute en appuyant sur[setfontcol default] [icon Abtn]![pause]
Ecrabouille ceux qui sont sur ton
chemin![newpage]
Enfin, la pratique vaut mieux qu'un
long discours.[pause]
Allez, essaie d'aller jusqu'au bout!
Common_TamakoroTutorial006.UsSpanish:
Desde esa [setfontcol blue]posición básica[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]inclina [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote]
para mover la [setfontcol blue]bola [setfontcol default]en esa dirección.
¡Después, oprime [icon Abtn] para [setfontcol red]saltar[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Si alguien se cruza en tu camino,
¡lánzate sobre él! Aprenderás más
si lo haces tú mismo.[pause] ¡Buena suerte!
Common_TamakoroTutorial006.EuSpanish:
SI TÚ [setfontcol red]INCLINAR [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote], DESDE
POSICIÓN BÁSICA, LA BOLA
RODAR.[newpage]
¡PARA [setfontcol red]SALTAR[setfontcol default], PULSAR [icon Abtn]![newpage]
¡QUIEN ESTORBAR, ESPACHURRAR!
¡MENOS TEORÍA Y MÁS PRÁCTICA!
¡ADELANTE!
Common_TamakoroTutorial006.EuGerman:
Aus dieser [setfontcol blue]Grundhaltung[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]neige [setfontcol default]die 
[icon WiiRemote], um den [setfontcol blue]Sternenball[setfontcol default] rollen zu 
lassen und ihn zu bewegen.[newpage]
Und mit [icon Abtn] [setfontcol red]springst [setfontcol default]du! [pause] 
Wenn dir jemand im Weg ist, überrolle
ihn einfach![newpage]
Nun, Erfahrung ist der beste 
Lehrmeister.[pause] Probier mal, bis zum
Ziel zu rollen!
Common_TamakoroTutorial006.EuItalian:
Dalla [setfontcol blue]posizione di base[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]inclina [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] per
muovere la [setfontcol blue]sfera [setfontcol default]in quella direzione.
Premi [icon Abtn] per [setfontcol red]saltare[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Se qualcuno ti ostacola, schiaccialo![newpage]
Con un po' di pratica sarà facilissimo.[pause]
Datti da fare!
Common_TamakoroTutorial006.JpJapanese:
その[setfontcol blue][ruby base]基本[ruby top]きほん[ruby end][ruby base]姿勢[ruby top]しせい[ruby end][setfontcol default]から　[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]を[ruby base]傾[ruby top]かたむ[ruby end]ける[setfontcol default]と
[setfontcol blue]タマコロ[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]転[ruby top]ころ[ruby end]がして　[ruby base]移動[ruby top]いどう[ruby end]できるぞ[newpage]
あとは、[icon Abtn][setfontcol red]で　ジャンプ[setfontcol default]！[pause]
ジャマするヤツは　ふみつぶせ！[newpage]
まぁ、[ruby base]習[ruby top]なら[ruby end]うより[ruby base]慣[ruby top]な[ruby end]れろだ[pause]
それで　[ruby base]先[ruby top]さき[ruby end]まで[ruby base]進[ruby top]すす[ruby end]んでみな！
Common_TamakoroTutorial006.KrKorean:
그 [setfontcol blue]기본 자세[setfontcol default]에서 [icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]을 기울이면[setfontcol default]
[setfontcol blue]스타볼[setfontcol default]을 굴려서 이동할 수 있어[newpage]
그리고 [icon Abtn][setfontcol red]를 누르면 점프[setfontcol default]야![pause]
방해하는 녀석은 밟아 버려![newpage]
백 번 듣는 것보다 일단 한 번 해 보자[pause]
앞으로 나가 보는 거야!

CrossRingZone_Caretaker001.EuFrench:
Tu veux te rendre de l'autre côté?
Eh bien, [setfontcol blue]saute[setfontcol default]!

CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.UsEnglish:
Hey! I forgot to tell you something![newpage]
So if you get in a [setfontcol blue]bubble[setfontcol default],[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol default]and you
want to get back to the surface?
Just press [icon Zbtn] to [setfontcol red]get down[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Oh yeah, and if you get pinched
between [setfontcol red]moving obstacles[setfontcol default], that big[setfontcol blue]
bubble[setfontcol default]'s going to burst! [pause]So watch out!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.EuEnglish:
Hey! I forgot to tell you something![newpage]
So if you get in a [setfontcol blue]bubble[setfontcol default],[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol default]and you
want to get back to the surface?

Oh yeah, and if you get pinched
between [setfontcol red]moving obstacles[setfontcol default], that big[setfontcol blue]
bubble[setfontcol default]'s going to burst! [pause]So watch out!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.EuDutch:
Hey! I forgot to tell you something![newpage]
So if you get in a [setfontcol blue]bubble[setfontcol default],[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol default]and you

Oh yeah, and if you get pinched
between [setfontcol red]moving obstacles[setfontcol default], that big[setfontcol blue]
bubble[setfontcol default]'s going to burst! [pause]So watch out!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.UsFrench:
Hé! J'ai oublié de te dire quelque 
chose![newpage]
Alors, si tu veux descendre de la 
[setfontcol blue]bulle[setfontcol default], il te suffit d'appuyer sur [icon Zbtn]![newpage]
Ah, ouais, si ta [setfontcol blue]bulle[setfontcol default] se retrouve 
coincée entre des [setfontcol red]obstacles en 
mouvement[setfontcol default], elle éclatera![pause] Attention!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.EuFrench:
Hé! Je vais te dire un truc que j'ai
oublié tout à l'heure![newpage]
Si tu veux [setfontcol red]descendre [setfontcol default]de la [setfontcol blue]bulle[setfontcol default], il te
suffit d'appuyer sur [icon Zbtn]![newpage]
Ah! Et fais attention: si ta [setfontcol blue]bulle [setfontcol default]se
retrouve coincée entre des [setfontcol red]murs en
mouvement[setfontcol default], elle éclate!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.UsSpanish:
¡Oye! ¡Olvidé decirte algo!
Si entras en una [setfontcol blue]burbuja[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
y quieres volver a la superficie, 
¡oprime [icon Zbtn] para [setfontcol red]salir[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Por cierto, si quedas atrapado por
un [setfontcol red]obstáculo que se mueve[setfontcol default], ¡la
[setfontcol blue]burbuja [setfontcol default]reventará! ¡Ten cuidado!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.EuSpanish:
¡EH! ¡COSA IMPORTANTE![newpage]
TRAS SUBIR A [setfontcol blue]BURBUJAS[setfontcol default],
[setfontcol red]PARA BAJAR[setfontcol default], PULSAR [icon Zbtn].[newpage]
SI TÚ ENTRE [setfontcol red]PAREDES
MUEVE-MUEVE[setfontcol default], A TI ESPACHURRAR.[pause]
¡[setfontcol blue]BURBUJA PAF[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.EuGerman:
Hey! Ich hab etwas vergessen zu 
sagen![newpage]
Wenn du in der [setfontcol blue]großen Blase[setfontcol default] bist und
zu Boden fallen möchtest, drücke
einfach [icon Zbtn], [setfontcol red]um herunterzufallen[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Und lass dich nicht von
[setfontcol red]Hindernissen[setfontcol default] aus der Bahn werfen!
Sonst [setfontcol red]platzt [setfontcol default]die [setfontcol blue]große Blase[setfontcol default]![newpage]
[pause]Also sei vorsichtig!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.EuItalian:
Ehi! Ho dimenticato di dirti una cosa!
Se entri in una [setfontcol blue]Mega Bolla[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
... E vuoi [setfontcol red]riscendere[setfontcol default] a terra...
basta premere [icon Zbtn]![newpage]
Ma attenzione... Stai lontano dagli
[setfontcol red]ostacoli[setfontcol default], altrimenti la [setfontcol blue]Mega Bolla
[setfontcol red]scoppierà[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.JpJapanese:
ヘイ！　さっき　[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]い[ruby base]忘[ruby top]わす[ruby end]れた[ruby base]事[ruby top]こと[ruby end]を[ruby base]伝[ruby top]つた[ruby end]えとくぜ！[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]オオアワ[setfontcol default]に[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]ってて　[ruby base]地面[ruby top]じめん[ruby end]に[ruby base]降[ruby top]お[ruby end]りたくなったら、
[icon Zbtn][setfontcol red]で　[ruby base]降[ruby top]お[ruby end]りられる[setfontcol default]からな！[newpage]
あと、[setfontcol red][ruby base]動[ruby top]うご[ruby end]くカベ[setfontcol default]に　はさまれたら
[setfontcol blue]オオアワ[setfontcol default]は[setfontcol red][ruby base]割[ruby top]わ[ruby end]れちまう[setfontcol default]からな！[pause]　[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]をつけな
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard001.KrKorean:
헤이! 조금 전에 말 안한 게 있어![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]둥둥방울[setfontcol default]을 타다가
[icon Zbtn]를 누르면[setfontcol red] 땅에 내려올 수 있어[setfontcol default]![newpage]
또 [setfontcol red]움직이는 벽[setfontcol default]에 끼이면
[setfontcol blue]둥둥방울[setfontcol default]이 [setfontcol red]터져[setfontcol default] 버려![pause] 조심해!

CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.UsEnglish:
Press [icon Zbtn] while in a [setfontcol blue]bubble[setfontcol default] to pop it
and fall back to the surface. Don't
get pinched by [setfontcol red]moving obstacles[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.EuEnglish:
Press [icon Zbtn] while in a [setfontcol blue]bubble[setfontcol default] to pop it

CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.UsFrench:
Appuie sur [icon Zbtn] pendant que tu es 
dans une [setfontcol blue]bulle[setfontcol default] pour en descendre.[newpage]
Fais attention de ne pas te faire 
coincer entre les [setfontcol red]obstacles en 
mouvement[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.EuFrench:
Pour descendre de la [setfontcol blue]bulle[setfontcol default], appuie

les [setfontcol red]murs en mouvement[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.UsSpanish:
Oprime [icon Zbtn] mientras estés en una
[setfontcol blue]burbuja[setfontcol default] para volver a la superficie.[newpage]
¡Y no dejes que te atrapen los
[setfontcol red]obstáculos que se mueven[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.EuSpanish:
TRAS SUBIR A [setfontcol blue]BURBUJA[setfontcol default], PARA
BAJAR, PULSAR [icon Zbtn].[newpage]
¡CUIDADÍN
CON [setfontcol red]PAREDES MUEVE-MUEVE[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.EuGerman:
Wenn du aus der [setfontcol blue]großen Blase[setfontcol default] zu 
Boden fallen möchtest, drücke [icon Zbtn]![newpage]
Und lass dich nicht von
[setfontcol red]Hindernissen[setfontcol default] aus der Bahn werfen!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.EuItalian:
Se ti trovi in una [setfontcol blue]Mega Bolla[setfontcol default], premi
[icon Zbtn] per scendere a terra![newpage]
E stai lontano[pause] dagli [setfontcol red]ostacoli[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue]オオアワ[setfontcol default]に[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]った[ruby base]後[ruby top]あと[ruby end]、[ruby base]地面[ruby top]じめん[ruby end]に[ruby base]降[ruby top]お[ruby end]りたいなら[icon Zbtn]だ！[pause]
あと、[setfontcol red][ruby base]動[ruby top]うご[ruby end]くカベ[setfontcol default]に　はさまれるなよ
CubeBubbleExAZone_SignBoard002.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue]둥둥방울[setfontcol default]에서 내려오려면 [icon Zbtn]를 눌러![pause]
그리고 [setfontcol red]움직이는 벽[setfontcol default]에 끼이지 말고!

CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.UsEnglish:
Hey, it's me! [setfontcol blue]Phil Board[setfontcol default]! You're going
to need a[setfontcol blue] bubble[setfontcol default] to get past here.[newpage]
So try and remember [setfontcol red]how to control a
bubble[setfontcol default]! Just watch out for those 
[setfontcol blue]electric rails[setfontcol default].[pause]
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.EuEnglish:
Hey, it's me! [setfontcol blue]Phil Board[setfontcol default]! You're going
to need a[setfontcol blue] bubble[setfontcol default] to get past here.[newpage]
So try and remember [setfontcol red]how to control a
bubble[setfontcol default]! Just watch out for those 
[setfontcol blue]electric rails[setfontcol default].[pause]

So try and remember [setfontcol red]how to control a
bubble[setfontcol default]! Just watch out for those

CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.UsFrench:
Holà, c'est moi! [setfontcol blue]Pano Rama[setfontcol default]! Il te 
faudra une [setfontcol blue]bulle[setfontcol default] pour pouvoir aller 
plus loin.[newpage]
Essaie de te rappeler [setfontcol red]comment
manœuvrer une bulle[setfontcol default]! Et fais
attention aux [setfontcol blue]rails électriques[setfontcol default]...[pause]
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.EuFrench:
Hé, c'est moi! [setfontcol blue]Panoda Fichage[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Ici, sans [setfontcol blue]bulle[setfontcol default], tu ne peux aller nulle
part, alors j'espère que tu as retenu
comment on [setfontcol red]la manœuvre[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Ah! Et les [setfontcol blue]rails électriques [setfontcol default]sont assez
dangereux...[pause]
Surtout, ne les touche pas!
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.UsSpanish:
¡Oye, soy yo! ¡[setfontcol blue]Lett Rero[setfontcol default]! Vas a
necesitar una [setfontcol blue]burbuja[setfontcol default] para pasar por
aquí.[newpage]
¡Intenta recordar [setfontcol red]cómo controlar una
burbuja[setfontcol default]! Pero ten cuidado con esos
[setfontcol blue]electrorraíles[setfontcol default]...[pause]
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.EuSpanish:
¡EH, TÚ! SOY YO, EL AMIGO DE LOS
NIÑOS, ¡[setfontcol blue]LETT RERO[setfontcol default]![newpage]
AQUÍ SOLO AVANZAR CON
[setfontcol blue]BURBUJAS[setfontcol default]. TÚ RECORDAR [setfontcol red]CÓMO[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Y MUCHO CUIDADO CON [setfontcol blue]RAÍLES
ELÉCTRICOS[setfontcol default]. ¡TÚ NO TOCAR!
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.EuGerman:
Hey, ich bin's! [setfontcol blue]Schildbürger[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Hier kommst du nur mit der [setfontcol blue]großen 
Blase[setfontcol default] weiter, also erinnere dich, [setfontcol red]wie 
man die große Blase steuert[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Und pass auf, dass du die 
Elektrobarrieren nicht berührst.
Sie sind ziemlich gefährlich!
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.EuItalian:
Sono io, [setfontcol blue]Avvisello[setfontcol default]! Avrai biso-
gno di una [setfontcol blue]Mega Bolla[setfontcol default] per passare
di qua.[newpage]
Perciò cerca di ricordare [setfontcol red]come mano-
vrare la Mega Bolla[setfontcol default]! Fai attenzione ai
[setfontcol blue]fili elettrici[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.JpJapanese:
ヘイ、オレだよ！　[setfontcol blue]デンゴン・バーン[setfontcol default]だよ！[newpage]
ここは　[setfontcol blue]オオアワ[setfontcol default]じゃなきゃ　[ruby base]進[ruby top]すす[ruby end]めないから、
[setfontcol red]オオアワの[ruby base]操作[ruby top]そうさ[ruby end][setfontcol default]を　[ruby base]思[ruby top]おも[ruby end]い[ruby base]出[ruby top]だ[ruby end]せ！[newpage]
あと、[setfontcol blue][ruby base]電撃[ruby top]でんげき[ruby end]レール[setfontcol default]が　かなりヤバイぜ…[pause]
[ruby base]絶対[ruby top]ぜったい[ruby end]に[ruby base]当[ruby top]あ[ruby end]たるなよ！
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard001.KrKorean:
헤이! 나야 나! [setfontcol blue]알림・판[setfontcol default]이야![newpage]
여긴 [setfontcol blue]둥둥방울[setfontcol default]을 타야만 통과할 수 있으니까
[setfontcol red]둥둥방울의 조작 방법[setfontcol default]을 알아야 해![newpage]
그리고 [setfontcol blue]전기 레일[setfontcol default]은 진짜 위험하니까…[pause]
절대 닿지 않도록 조심해!

CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard002.UsEnglish:
Just keep that [setfontcol red]bubble under control[setfontcol default],
and[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]don't think about bumping into
those [setfontcol blue]electric rails[setfontcol default]!

CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard002.EuSpanish:

EN [setfontcol red]BURBUJAS[setfontcol default]! ¡Y CUIDADO CON
[setfontcol blue]RAÍLES ELÉCTRICOS[setfontcol default]!
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard002.EuGerman:
Erinnere dich, [setfontcol red]wie man die große 
Blase steuert[setfontcol default]![pause] Und pass auf die 
[setfontcol blue]Elektrobarrieren [setfontcol default]auf!

CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard002.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red]オオアワの[ruby base]操作[ruby top]そうさ[ruby end][setfontcol default]を　[ruby base]思[ruby top]おも[ruby end]い[ruby base]出[ruby top]だ[ruby end]せ！[pause]
あと　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]電撃[ruby top]でんげき[ruby end]レール[setfontcol default]に　[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]をつけな！
CubeBubbleExBZone_SignBoard002.KrKorean:
[setfontcol red]둥둥방울의 조작 방법[setfontcol default]을 알아야 해![pause]
그리고 [setfontcol blue]전기 레일[setfontcol default]을 조심해!

CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio002.UsEnglish:
Our glorious starship... The
Starshroom... It crashed...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio002.EuEnglish:
Our glorious starship... The
Starshroom... It crashed...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio002.EuDutch:
Our glorious starship... The
Starshroom... It crashed...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio002.EuFrench:
Le vaisseau champignon a
fait un atterrissage forcé...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio002.EuGerman:
Unser [setfontcol blue]Pilz-Schiff[setfontcol default] musste 
hier notlanden...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio002.EuItalian:
L'Ufo Fungo ha fatto un at-
terraggio di emergenza qui.
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio002.JpJapanese: キノコ[ruby base]船[ruby top]せん[ruby end]が　[ruby base]不時着[ruby top]ふじちゃく[ruby end]しました…

CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio004.UsEnglish: Ow... I think I broke my [setfontcol red]bubble [setfontcol default]bone...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio004.EuEnglish: Ow... I think I broke my [setfontcol red]bubble [setfontcol default]bone...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio004.EuDutch: Ow... I think I broke my [setfontcol red]bubble [setfontcol default]bone...

l'os de [setfontcol red]bulle[setfontcol default]...

This is a [setfontcol blue]poisonous swamp[setfontcol default]. If you fall
in there, you're done for...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.EuEnglish:
This is a [setfontcol blue]poisonous swamp[setfontcol default]. If you fall
in there, you're done for...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.EuDutch:
This is a [setfontcol blue]poisonous swamp[setfontcol default]. If you fall
in there, you're done for...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.UsFrench:
Voici un [setfontcol blue]marécage toxique[setfontcol default]... Si 
tu tombes dedans, c'est la fin des 
haricots!
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.EuFrench:
Ce [setfontcol blue]marais[setfontcol default] est [setfontcol blue]empoisonné[setfontcol default]...
Si tu tombes dedans, c'est la fin des
haricots...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.UsSpanish:
Este es un [setfontcol blue]pantano venenoso[setfontcol default]. Si caes
en él, estás acabado...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.EuSpanish:
Esto es una [setfontcol blue]ciénaga venenosa[setfontcol default].
Te va a doler mucho si la pisas.
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.EuGerman:
Das ist ein [setfontcol blue]Giftsumpf[setfontcol default]... Wenn du 
hineinfällst, bist du geliefert...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.EuItalian:
Questa è una [setfontcol blue]palude tossica[setfontcol default].
Se ci cadi dentro, è finita...
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.JpJapanese:
これは　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]毒[ruby top]どく[ruby end]の[ruby base]沼[ruby top]ぬま[ruby end][setfontcol default]…
[ruby base]落[ruby top]お[ruby end]ちると　ひとたまりもないですね…
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio005.KrKorean:
이것은 [setfontcol blue]독의 늪[setfontcol default]…
떨어지면 국물도 없어요…

CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio006.EuSpanish:
Cuidado con

CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.UsEnglish:
Woo! The wind sure is strong here,
eh? Don't you think it'd be awesome
if you could ride that wind?
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.EuEnglish:
Woo! The wind sure is strong here,
eh? Don't you think it'd be awesome
if you could ride that wind?
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.EuDutch:
Woo! The wind sure is strong here,
eh? Don't you think it'd be awesome
if you could ride that wind?
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.UsFrench:
Le vent souffle bien fort ici, hein? Ça
doit être génial de se laisser porter
dans un tel courant!
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.EuFrench:
Le vent souffle fort![newpage]
Mais ce doit être agréable de s'y
laisser porter!
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.UsSpanish:
¡El viento sopla muy fuerte!
Seguro que sienta bien ir montado
sobre la corriente de aire.
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.EuSpanish:
¡El viento sopla muy fuerte![newpage]
Seguro que sienta bien ir montado
sobre la corriente de aire.
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.EuGerman:
Der Wind weht stark![newpage]
Wenn man sich von ihm tragen lässt,
ist das bestimmt ein tolles Gefühl!
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.EuItalian:
Che vento forte![newpage]
Sai che bello se riuscissimo
a cavalcarlo!?
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]風[ruby top]かぜ[ruby end]が[ruby base]強[ruby top]つよ[ruby end]いですね～！[newpage]
でも　あの[ruby base]風[ruby top]かぜ[ruby end]に　[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]れたら、
きっと　[ruby base]気持[ruby top]きも[ruby end]ちいいでしょうね！
CubeBubbleExSZone_Kinopio007.KrKorean:
바람이 강해요～![newpage]
하지만 그 바람을 타면
기분이 정말 좋을 거예요!

CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.UsEnglish:
Hey![pause] Before you ride any [setfontcol red]bubbles[setfontcol default], let
yours truly, [setfontcol blue]Phil Board[setfontcol default], bend your ear
for a sec.[newpage]
You can move around in your [setfontcol blue]bubble
[setfontcol default]by holding down [icon Abtn]. But do it while
your [icon BlueCursor] is blowing on the bubble.[newpage]
If you [setfontcol blue]go too far[setfontcol default] to one side, use [icon BlueCursor]
to blow[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]on the other side!
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.EuEnglish:
Hey![pause] Before you ride any [setfontcol red]bubbles[setfontcol default], let
yours truly, [setfontcol blue]Phil Board[setfontcol default], bend your ear
for a sec.[newpage]
You can move around in your [setfontcol blue]bubble
[setfontcol default]by holding down [icon Abtn]. But do it while
your [icon BlueCursor] is blowing on the bubble.[newpage]
If you [setfontcol blue]go too far[setfontcol default] to one side, use [icon BlueCursor]
to blow[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]on the other side!
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.EuDutch:
Hey![pause] Before you ride any [setfontcol red]bubbles[setfontcol default], let
yours truly, [setfontcol blue]Phil Board[setfontcol default], bend your ear
for a sec.[newpage]
You can move around in your [setfontcol blue]bubble
[setfontcol default]by holding down [icon Abtn]. But do it while
your [icon BlueCursor] is blowing on the bubble.[newpage]
If you [setfontcol blue]go too far[setfontcol default] to one side, use [icon BlueCursor]
to blow[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]on the other side!
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.UsFrench:
Hé![pause] Avant de monter dans une [setfontcol red]bulle[setfontcol default],
permets-moi, [setfontcol blue]Pano Rama[setfontcol default], de te
donner quelques conseils.[newpage]
Une fois dans la [setfontcol blue]bulle[setfontcol default], appuie sur[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol default][icon Abtn]
pendant que le [icon BlueCursor] souffle de l'air.[newpage]
Si tu[setfontcol red] [setfontcol blue]avances trop loin[setfontcol default] d'un côté,
utilise le [icon BlueCursor] pour souffler sur l'autre
côté!
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.EuFrench:
Hé![pause] Si tu comptes monter dans cette
[setfontcol red]bulle[setfontcol default], tu ferais mieux de m'écouter,
moi, le grand [setfontcol blue]Panoda Fichage[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Une fois dans la [setfontcol blue]bulle[setfontcol default], appuie sur [icon Abtn]
pour que le [setfontcol red]curseur [setfontcol default][icon BlueCursor] [setfontcol blue]souffle de
l'air[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Utilise ce souffle pour [setfontcol red]pousser [setfontcol default]la
[setfontcol blue]bulle [setfontcol default]dans la direction de ton choix![newpage]
Ça demande un peu de maîtrise, mais
tu devrais t'en sortir.
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.UsSpanish:
¡Eh! ¡Antes de subirte en una [setfontcol red]burbuja[setfontcol default],
léeme! ¡Soy [setfontcol blue]Lett Rero[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Puedes moverte dentro de la [setfontcol blue]burbuja
[setfontcol default]manteniendo oprimido [icon Abtn].[newpage]
Pero hazlo con tu [icon BlueCursor] en un lado,
[setfontcol red]empujando [setfontcol default]la burbuja.[newpage]
¡Si te [setfontcol blue]vas demasiado hacia un lado[setfontcol default],
usa tu [icon BlueCursor] para soplar hacia el otro
lado!
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.EuSpanish:
¡EH! ¡SI TÚ SUBIR A [setfontcol red]BURBUJA[setfontcol default],
TÚ ESCUCHAR BIEN![newpage]
¡SOY LA VOZ AMIGA! ¡[setfontcol blue]LETT RERO[setfontcol default]![newpage]
¡TRAS SUBIR, PULSA [icon Abtn]![pause]
ASÍ, [setfontcol blue]AIRE SALIR[setfontcol default] DE
[icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]CURSOR ESTELAR[setfontcol default][newpage]
ENTONCES, TÚ [setfontcol red]EMPUJAR [setfontcol blue]BURBUJA
[setfontcol default]CON AIRE[pause]
DIFÍCIL SER, PERO TÚ PODER
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.EuGerman:
Hey! Wenn du die [setfontcol blue]große Blase[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]reiten
willst, dann hör besser zu, was 
[setfontcol blue]Schildbürger [setfontcol default]dir zu sagen hat![newpage]
Wenn du in der [setfontcol blue]großen Blase [setfontcol default]bist, 
drücke [icon Abtn]![newpage]
Damit [setfontcol blue]bläst du Luft [setfontcol default]aus dem 
[icon BlueCursor] [setfontcol red]Sternenzeiger[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Mit dieser Luft kannst du die [setfontcol blue]große 
Blase[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]von der Seite bewegen[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Du musst vorsichtig steuern, aber es 
wird schon schief gehen!
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.EuItalian:
Ehi! Se vuoi entrare in quella[setfontcol red] Mega
Bolla[setfontcol default], ascolta le parole di [setfontcol blue]Avvisello[setfontcol default],
che sarei io![newpage]
Entra nella [setfontcol blue]Mega Bolla[setfontcol default] e tieni premuto
[icon Abtn]. Dal [setfontcol red]Cursore Stella[setfontcol default] [icon BlueCursor][setfontcol blue] esce l'aria[setfontcol default]
che [setfontcol red]spinge[setfontcol default] la [setfontcol blue]Mega Bolla[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]dai lati[setfontcol default]. [newpage]
Potrebbe essere necessario
regolare la direzione!
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.JpJapanese:
ヘイ！[pause]　あの[setfontcol red]オオアワ[setfontcol default]に[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]るなら
この[setfontcol blue]デンゴン・バーン[setfontcol default][ruby base]様[ruby top]さま[ruby end]の[ruby base]話[ruby top]はなし[ruby end]を[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]きな！[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]オオアワ[setfontcol default]に[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]ったら　[icon Abtn]を[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]しな！[pause]　そうすりゃ
[icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]ポインター[setfontcol default]から　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]空気[ruby top]くうき[ruby end]が[ruby base]出[ruby top]で[ruby end]る[setfontcol default]からよ[newpage]
その[ruby base]空気[ruby top]くうき[ruby end]で　[setfontcol blue]オオアワ[setfontcol default]を　[setfontcol red][ruby base]横[ruby top]よこ[ruby end]から[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]して[setfontcol default]いくんだ！[pause]
ビミョーな[ruby base]調節[ruby top]ちょうせつ[ruby end]が[ruby base]必要[ruby top]ひつよう[ruby end]だが　なんとかなるだろ
CubeBubbleExSZone_SignBoard001.KrKorean:
헤이![pause] 저 [setfontcol red]둥둥방울[setfontcol default]을 타려면
이 [setfontcol blue]알림・판[setfontcol default]님의 말씀을 잘 듣도록 해![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]둥둥방울[setfontcol default]을 타면 [icon Abtn]를 눌러 봐![pause]
그럼 [icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]포인터[setfontcol default]에서 [setfontcol blue]공기가 나올 거야[setfontcol default][newpage]
그 공기로 [setfontcol blue]둥둥방울[setfontcol default]을 [setfontcol red]밀면서 [setfontcol default]가면 돼![pause]
섬세한 조작이 필요하긴 하지만 잘 되겠지 뭐

DesertDiskZone_Kinopio001.UsEnglish:
[player_ml_normal]! Use the [setfontcol red]tornadoes [setfontcol default]to reach
the [setfontcol purple][icon PurpleCoin] Purple Coins[setfontcol default] way up high!
Step into the [setfontcol red]tornado [setfontcol default]and [setfontcol red]shake [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote]!

[player_ml_normal]! Use the [setfontcol red]tornadoes [setfontcol default]to reach
the [setfontcol purple][icon PurpleCoin] Purple Coins[setfontcol default] way up high!

les [setfontcol purple]pièces violettes[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin] qui sont en

[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]monedas púrpura[setfontcol default].[newpage]

[setfontcol red]sacude [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote].

[setfontcol red]schüttele [setfontcol default]die [icon WiiRemote]!

DesertDiskZone_Kinopio001.JpJapanese:
[player_ml_normal]さん！　[setfontcol red][ruby base]竜巻[ruby top]たつまき[ruby end][setfontcol default]で　[ruby base]高[ruby top]たか[ruby end]いところの
[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]パープルコイン[setfontcol default]を　[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]れそうです！[newpage]
[setfontcol red][ruby base]竜巻[ruby top]たつまき[ruby end][setfontcol default]の[ruby base]中[ruby top]なか[ruby end]に[ruby base]入[ruby top]はい[ruby end]ったら　[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]を　ふって[setfontcol default]ください！

DiskGardenZone_LuigiEvent001.UsEnglish:

could count on you, Bro![newpage]
Whaaa? The [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default]?[pause] Yeah, I
got it right here!

DiskGardenZone_SignBoard001.UsEnglish:
If you get tired and want to return to
the [setfontcol blue]observatory[setfontcol default], press [icon MinusBtn] or [icon PlusBtn] and
select [setfontcol blue]Return to the Observatory[setfontcol default].[newpage]
But you [setfontcol red]can't bring back[setfontcol default] any [setfontcol red][icon StarBit] Star
Bits[setfontcol default] you picked up, so be careful!

DiskGardenZone_SignBoard001.UsFrench:
Si tu es fatigué et que tu veux
revenir à l'[setfontcol blue]observatoire[setfontcol default],[pause] 
appuie sur [icon MinusBtn] ou [icon PlusBtn].[newpage]
Sélectionne [setfontcol blue]Retourner à 
l'Observatoire [setfontcol default]pour t'y rendre.[newpage]
Tu ne peux pourtant pas[setfontcol red] ramener[setfontcol default] tes 
[icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Éclats d'Étoile[setfontcol default]!
DiskGardenZone_SignBoard001.EuFrench:
Si tu es fatigué et que tu veux
revenir à l'[setfontcol blue]observatoire[setfontcol default],
appuie sur [icon MinusBtn] ou [icon PlusBtn].[newpage]
Sélectionne [setfontcol blue]"Retourner à
l'observatoire" [setfontcol default]pour t'y rendre.[newpage]
Attention, les [setfontcol red]fragments d'étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit]
que tu as ramassés seront [setfontcol red]perdus[setfontcol default]!
DiskGardenZone_SignBoard001.UsSpanish:
Si te cansas y quieres volver al
[setfontcol blue]planetarium[setfontcol default], oprime [icon MinusBtn] o [icon PlusBtn] 
y elige [setfontcol blue]Volver al Planetarium[setfontcol default].[newpage]
¡Pero ten cuidado, porque [setfontcol red]no podrás
llevarte [setfontcol default]los [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Trozos de Estrellas
[setfontcol default]que recojas!
DiskGardenZone_SignBoard001.EuSpanish:
Si te cansas y quieres volver al
[setfontcol blue]Planetarium[setfontcol default], pulsa [icon MinusBtn] o [icon PlusBtn].[newpage]
Elige [setfontcol blue]Volver al Planetarium[setfontcol default]
y regresarás.[newpage]
Pero cuidado, porque
[setfontcol red]no te puedes llevar[setfontcol default] contigo
los [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]trozos de estrella[setfontcol default].
DiskGardenZone_SignBoard001.EuGerman:
Wenn du zwischendurch müde wirst,
drücke einfach [icon MinusBtn] oder [icon PlusBtn].[newpage]
Wähle dann [setfontcol blue]Zurück zur Sternwarte[setfontcol default],
um zurückzukehren.[newpage]
Aber Vorsicht! [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Sternenteile
kannst du nicht mitnehmen[setfontcol default]!
DiskGardenZone_SignBoard001.EuItalian:
Se ti stanchi e vuoi tornare
all'[setfontcol blue]osservatorio[setfontcol default], premi [icon MinusBtn] o [icon PlusBtn]
e scegli [setfontcol blue]Torna all'osservatorio[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Fai attenzione, però: [setfontcol red]non puoi
portare[setfontcol default] con te le [setfontcol red]Astroschegge[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit].
DiskGardenZone_SignBoard001.JpJapanese:
もし、つかれて　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]天文台[ruby top]てんもんだい[ruby end][setfontcol default]に[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]りたかったら、
[icon MinusBtn]か[icon PlusBtn]を　[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]しましょう[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]「[ruby base]天文台[ruby top]てんもんだい[ruby end]に[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]る」[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]選[ruby top]えら[ruby end]ぶと　[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]ることができます[pause]
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]スターピース[setfontcol default]は　[setfontcol red][ruby base]持[ruby top]も[ruby end]って[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]れない[setfontcol default]から[ruby base]注意[ruby top]ちゅうい[ruby end]！
DiskGardenZone_SignBoard001.KrKorean:
혹시 지쳐서 [setfontcol blue]천문대[setfontcol default]로 돌아가시려면
[icon MinusBtn] 또는 [icon PlusBtn]를 눌러 주세요[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]「천문대로 돌아가기」[setfontcol default]를 선택하면 돌아갑니다[pause]
참고로 [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]스타구슬[setfontcol default]은 [setfontcol red]가져갈 수 없습니다[setfontcol default]!

DiskGardenZone_Tico001.UsEnglish:
To pick up [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default] scattered
around the galaxies, [setfontcol blue]touch [setfontcol default]them with
your [icon BlueCursor].[newpage]
Collect [setfontcol red]50[setfontcol default] to get a [setfontcol green]1-Up[setfontcol default], and it really
wouldn't hurt to store some up.[newpage]
Now, point [icon WiiRemote] at the [setfontcol blue]screen[setfontcol default], and
collect as many [setfontcol red]Star Bits [setfontcol default]as you can!
DiskGardenZone_Tico001.EuEnglish:
To pick up [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default] scattered

DiskGardenZone_Tico001.UsFrench:
Pour ramasser les [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Éclats d'Étoile
[setfontcol default]éparpillés de par les [setfontcol blue]galaxies[setfontcol default],
[setfontcol blue]touche-les[setfontcol default] avec le [icon BlueCursor].[newpage]
Au bout de [setfontcol red]50[setfontcol default], tu recevras une [setfontcol green]vie
supplémentaire[setfontcol default]! Tu ferais mieux d'en
accumuler.[newpage]
Commence par pointer la [icon WiiRemote] vers
l'[setfontcol blue]écran [setfontcol default]et ramasse autant d'[setfontcol red]Éclats
d'Étoiles[setfontcol default] que possible!
DiskGardenZone_Tico001.EuFrench:
Tu peux ramasser les [setfontcol red]fragments
d'étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit] simplement en les
[setfontcol blue]touchant [setfontcol default]avec le [setfontcol red]curseur étoile [setfontcol default][icon BlueCursor].[newpage]
[setfontcol red]50 fragments[setfontcol default] récoltés te donnent [setfontcol green]une
vie supplémentaire[setfontcol default]! Alors pointe [icon WiiRemote]
[setfontcol blue]vers l'écran[setfontcol default], et bonne récolte!
DiskGardenZone_Tico001.UsSpanish:
Para recoger los [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Trozos de
Estrellas[setfontcol default] que encontrarás, [setfontcol blue]tócalos
[setfontcol default]con tu [icon BlueCursor].[newpage]
¡Recoge [setfontcol red]50[setfontcol default] y conseguirás una [setfontcol green]Vida 
Extra[setfontcol default]! ¡Apunta a [setfontcol blue]la pantalla[setfontcol default] con [icon WiiRemote]
y recoge todos los que puedas!
DiskGardenZone_Tico001.EuSpanish:
Puedes recoger los [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]trozos de
estrella[setfontcol default] de toda la galaxia con solo[setfontcol red]
[setfontcol blue]pasar [setfontcol default]el[setfontcol red] [icon BlueCursor]cursor estelar[setfontcol default] sobre ellos.[newpage]
¡Cada [setfontcol red]50[setfontcol default], obtendrás una [setfontcol green]vida extra[setfontcol default]![pause]
¡Apunta bien a [setfontcol blue]la pantalla[setfontcol default] con [icon WiiRemote]!
DiskGardenZone_Tico001.EuGerman:
Du kannst in den Galaxien verstreute 
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red] Sternenteile [setfontcol default]aufsammeln...[newpage]
...indem du sie mit dem 
[icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red] Sternenzeiger [setfontcol default]berührst.[newpage]
Wenn du [setfontcol red]50 [setfontcol default]aufhebst, bekommst du 
ein [setfontcol green]1-Up[setfontcol default]. [newpage]
Es schadet also nicht, sie zu sammeln![newpage]
Nun richte die [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol blue]auf den Bildschirm[setfontcol default]
und sammle so viele wie möglich!
DiskGardenZone_Tico001.EuItalian:
Per raccogliere le [setfontcol red]Astroschegge[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit]
sparse per le galassie basta [setfontcol blue]toccarle[setfontcol default]
con il [setfontcol red]Cursore Stella[setfontcol default] [icon BlueCursor].[newpage]
Quando ne avrai raccolte [setfontcol red]50[setfontcol default], otterrai
un [setfontcol green]1-Up[setfontcol default], quindi non fermarti!
[setfontcol blue]Punta[setfontcol default] [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol blue]verso lo schermo[setfontcol default]!
DiskGardenZone_Tico001.JpJapanese:
ギャラクシーに[ruby base]落[ruby top]お[ruby end]ちている　[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]スターピース[setfontcol default]は
[icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]ポインター[setfontcol default]で[setfontcol blue][ruby base]触[ruby top]ふ[ruby end]れるだけ[setfontcol default]で[ruby base]集[ruby top]あつ[ruby end]められます[newpage]
[setfontcol red]50[ruby base]個[ruby top]こ[ruby end][setfontcol default]で[setfontcol green]1UP[setfontcol default]しますし、[ruby base]貯[ruby top]た[ruby end]めて[ruby base]損[ruby top]そん[ruby end]はありません！[pause]
さあ、[icon WiiRemote]を[setfontcol blue][ruby base]画面[ruby top]がめん[ruby end]に[ruby base]向[ruby top]む[ruby end]け[setfontcol default]、[ruby base]集[ruby top]あつ[ruby end]めまくってください
DiskGardenZone_Tico001.KrKorean:
갤럭시에 떨어진 [icon StarBit][setfontcol red]스타구슬[setfontcol default]은
[icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]포인터[setfontcol default]에 [setfontcol blue]닿기[setfontcol default]만 해도 모입니다[newpage]
[setfontcol red]50개[setfontcol default]면 [setfontcol green]1UP[setfontcol default]도 되니까 손해 볼 건 없어요![pause]
[icon WiiRemote]이 [setfontcol blue]화면을 향하게 해서[setfontcol default] 마음껏 모으세요

DiskGardenZone_Tico003.UsEnglish:
I've got a [setfontcol blue]hungry[setfontcol default] friend up ahead...[pause]
You don't mind sharing your snacks,
do you?
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.EuEnglish:
I've got a [setfontcol blue]hungry[setfontcol default] friend up ahead...[pause]
You don't mind sharing your snacks,
do you?
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.EuDutch:
I've got a [setfontcol blue]hungry[setfontcol default] friend up ahead...[pause]
You don't mind sharing your snacks,
do you?
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.UsFrench:
J'ai un ami [setfontcol blue]affamé[setfontcol default] par là...[pause]
Dis donc, ça ne te dérangerait pas de
partager tes friandises?
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.EuFrench:
Par là, il y a un de mes camarades
[setfontcol blue]très gourmand[setfontcol default]...[pause] Si tu le rencontres,
tu voudras bien écouter sa requête?
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.UsSpanish:
Por aquí anda un amigo mío
muy [setfontcol blue]glotón[setfontcol default].[pause]
¿Podrías hacer lo que te pide?
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.EuSpanish:
Por aquí anda un amigo mío
muy [setfontcol blue]glotoncete[setfontcol default].[pause]
¿Podrías hacer lo que te pide?
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.EuGerman:
Ein Stück weiter ist ein Vielfraß...[newpage]
Kannst du ihm nicht seine Bitte 
erfüllen?
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.EuItalian:
Più avanti troverai il mio amico
[setfontcol blue]ghiottone[setfontcol default]... Se vuoi proseguire,
ascoltalo!
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.JpJapanese:
この[ruby base]先[ruby top]さき[ruby end]に　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]食[ruby top]く[ruby end]いしんぼう[setfontcol default]な[ruby base]仲間[ruby top]なかま[ruby end]が　いるんです…[pause]
よければ、[ruby base]彼[ruby top]かれ[ruby end]の[ruby base]願[ruby top]ねが[ruby end]いを　[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]いてくれませんか？
DiskGardenZone_Tico003.KrKorean:
이 앞에는 [setfontcol blue]먹보[setfontcol default] 친구가 있어요…[pause]
혹시 그 친구의 부탁을 들어주시겠어요?

DiskGardenZone_Tico004.UsFrench:
Mes compagnons sont juste par là...
Awaille!
DiskGardenZone_Tico004.EuFrench:
Mon ami est par là-bas...
Vite! Dépêche-toi!
DiskGardenZone_Tico004.EuSpanish:
Mi amigo está muy cerca.[pause]
¡Date prisa!
DiskGardenZone_Tico004.EuGerman:
Ein Stück weiter ist ein Freund von 
mir... Beeil dich! Schnell!
DiskGardenZone_Tico004.EuItalian:
I miei amici sono più avanti!
Sbrigati, presto!
DiskGardenZone_Tico004.JpJapanese:
この[ruby base]先[ruby top]さき[ruby end]に[ruby base]仲間[ruby top]なかま[ruby end]が…[pause]
[ruby base]急[ruby top]いそ[ruby end]いで！　[ruby base]早[ruby top]はや[ruby end]く！

DiskGardenZone_Tico006.UsEnglish:
Oh, get this![pause] You can shoot those
[icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Star Bits[setfontcol default] with [icon Bbtn]! Zap zap zapow![newpage]
Just aim your [icon BlueCursor] at your target and
fire with [icon Bbtn]![newpage]
[setfontcol red]Run into [setfontcol default]your [setfontcol blue]enemies [setfontcol default]while they're
[setfontcol blue]stunned [setfontcol default]to finish them off!

Oh, get this![pause] You can shoot those

DiskGardenZone_Tico006.UsFrench:
Hé, accroche-toi![pause] Tu peux tirer ces 
[icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Éclats d'Étoile[setfontcol default] avec [icon Bbtn]! Pan pan 
pannn![newpage]
Tu n'as qu'à viser avec le [icon BlueCursor] et tirer 
avec [icon Bbtn]! [setfontcol red]Cogne-toi[setfontcol default] contre tes 
[setfontcol blue]ennemis assommés [setfontcol default]pour les vaincre!
DiskGardenZone_Tico006.EuFrench:
Tu te souviens?[pause] Tu peux tirer des
[setfontcol red]fragments d'étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit] en appuyant
sur [icon Bbtn]![newpage]
Vise bien ta cible avec le [setfontcol red]curseur
étoile[setfontcol default] [icon BlueCursor] et appuie sur [icon Bbtn]![newpage]
C'est très efficace contre les [setfontcol blue]ennemis
[setfontcol default]et certains [setfontcol blue]obstacles[setfontcol default]!
DiskGardenZone_Tico006.UsSpanish:
¡Oye! ¡También  puedes lanzar esos
[icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Trozos de Estrellas[setfontcol default] con [icon Bbtn]![newpage]
¡Apunta con tu [icon BlueCursor] al objetivo

¡[setfontcol red]Toca [setfontcol default]a tus [setfontcol blue]enemigos [setfontcol default]mientras están
[setfontcol blue]aturdidos[setfontcol default] para acabar con ellos!
DiskGardenZone_Tico006.EuSpanish:
¿Sabías que [pause]puedes lanzar
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]trozos de estrella[setfontcol default] con [icon Bbtn]?[newpage]
¡Apunta cuidadosamente con
el [icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]cursor estelar
[setfontcol default]y pulsa [icon Bbtn]![newpage]
Así podrás poner [setfontcol blue]en pajaritos[setfontcol default] a los
[setfontcol blue]enemigos [setfontcol default]molestos y acabar con ellos
de un [setfontcol red]buen golpe acercándote[setfontcol default].
DiskGardenZone_Tico006.EuGerman:
Schon gewusst?!? [pause] Durch Drücken
von [icon Bbtn] kannst du [icon StarBit] [setfontcol red]Sternenteile
[setfontcol default]abfeuern![newpage]
Visiere mit dem [icon BlueCursor] [setfontcol red]Sternenzeiger
[setfontcol default]dein Ziel an und drücke [icon Bbtn]![newpage]
Wenn sie [setfontcol blue]torkeln[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]ramm [setfontcol default]deine [setfontcol blue]Gegner[setfontcol default]!
DiskGardenZone_Tico006.EuItalian:
Vuoi sapere una cosa? Con [icon Bbtn]
puoi sparare le [setfontcol red]Astroschegge[setfontcol default] [icon StarBit]![newpage]
Prendi la mira con il [setfontcol red]Cursore Stella
[setfontcol default][icon BlueCursor] e spara con [icon Bbtn]![newpage]
Vai incontro al [setfontcol blue]nemico[setfontcol default] e [setfontcol red]colpiscilo
[setfontcol default]mentre è ancora [setfontcol blue]stordito[setfontcol default]!
DiskGardenZone_Tico006.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]知[ruby top]し[ruby end]ってますか？！[pause]
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]スターピース[setfontcol default]は　[icon Bbtn]で[ruby base]撃[ruby top]う[ruby end]てるんです！[newpage]
[icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]ポインター[setfontcol default]で　[ruby base]標的[ruby top]ひょうてき[ruby end]をじっくり[ruby base]狙[ruby top]ねら[ruby end]って[icon Bbtn]！[pause]
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]気絶[ruby top]きぜつ[ruby end][setfontcol default]してる[ruby base]間[ruby top]あいだ[ruby end]に[setfontcol red][ruby base]体当[ruby top]たいあ[ruby end]たり[setfontcol default]して、[setfontcol blue][ruby base]敵[ruby top]てき[ruby end][setfontcol default]を　けちらして！
DiskGardenZone_Tico006.KrKorean:
알고 계시나요!?[pause]
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]스타구슬[setfontcol default]은 [icon Bbtn]를 눌러 쏠 수 있어요![newpage]
[icon BlueCursor][setfontcol red]포인터[setfontcol default]로 목표물을 겨냥해서 [icon Bbtn]！[pause]
[setfontcol blue]기절[setfontcol default]했을 때 [setfontcol red]몸으로 쳐서[setfontcol default] [setfontcol blue]적[setfontcol default]을 쓰러뜨리세요!

DiskGardenZone_Tico007.EuFrench:
Tu peux tirer des [icon StarBit] en
appuyant sur [icon Bbtn]!
DiskGardenZone_Tico007.JpJapanese: [icon Bbtn]で[icon StarBit]を[ruby base]撃[ruby top]う[ruby end]てます！
DiskGardenZone_Tico007.KrKorean: [icon Bbtn]를 누르면 [icon StarBit]을 쏠 수 있어요!

ElectricBegomanSpikeZone_Tico001.UsEnglish:
The [setfontcol red]power lines[setfontcol default] are keeping my
friend locked inside! [setfontcol blue]Hit them with
something[setfontcol default] to cut off the [setfontcol red]power[setfontcol default]!
ElectricBegomanSpikeZone_Tico001.EuEnglish:
The [setfontcol red]power lines[setfontcol default] are keeping my
friend locked inside! [setfontcol blue]Hit them with
something[setfontcol default] to cut off the [setfontcol red]power[setfontcol default]!

The [setfontcol red]power lines[setfontcol default] are keeping my
friend locked inside! [setfontcol blue]Hit them with
something[setfontcol default] to cut off the [setfontcol red]power[setfontcol default]!
ElectricBegomanSpikeZone_Tico001.UsFrench:
Les[setfontcol red] lignes électriques[setfontcol default] me bloquent le
passage! Je ne peux pas sauver mon
ami![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Lance[setfontcol default] [setfontcol blue]quelque chose dessus [setfontcol default]pour
couper le[setfontcol red] courant[setfontcol default]!

Impossible d'avancer à cause de ces
fichues [setfontcol red]lignes électriques[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Tu peux [setfontcol red]les[setfontcol default] désactiver en [setfontcol blue]envoyant[setfontcol default]
quelque chose dessus en [setfontcol blue]tournoyant[setfontcol default]!
ElectricBegomanSpikeZone_Tico001.UsSpanish:
