EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.UsEnglish:
Do you hear the baby stars?[pause]
These newborns will grow up to
become galaxies someday.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.EuEnglish:
Do you hear the baby stars?[pause]
These newborns will grow up to
become galaxies someday.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.EuDutch:
Do you hear the baby stars?[pause]
These newborns will grow up to
become galaxies someday.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.UsFrench:
Vous entendez les bébés étoiles?
Un jour, ils deviendront des galaxies.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.EuFrench:
De nouveaux bébés étoiles sont nés.[newpage]
Un jour, ils formeront sûrement une
nouvelle galaxie.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.UsSpanish:
Acaban de nacer más estrellas. Estos
pequeños también crecerán hasta
convertirse en galaxias, ¿sabes?
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.EuSpanish:
Acaban de nacer una gran cantidad
de retoños de estrella.[newpage]
Estoy segura de que llegará un día
en que mis chiquitines serán
grandes constelaciones.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.EuGerman:
Ein Sternenbaby wurde geboren.[newpage]
Dieses Kind wird sicherlich dereinst 
eine neue Galaxie werden.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.EuItalian:
È sorto un piccolo pianeta![newpage]
Un giorno sarà una nuova galassia!
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]の[ruby base]赤[ruby top]あか[ruby end]ちゃんが、[ruby base]産[ruby top]う[ruby end]まれたわ[newpage]
この[ruby base]子達[ruby top]こたち[ruby end]は、いずれ[ruby base]新[ruby top]あたら[ruby end]しい[ruby base]銀河[ruby top]ぎんが[ruby end]になるでしょう
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta001.KrKorean:
아기 별이 태어났습니다[newpage]
그 아기들도 언젠간 새로운 은하가 되겠죠

EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.UsEnglish:
When stars die, they turn to stardust
and scatter across the cosmos.[newpage]
Eventually, that stardust reforms to
create a new star... And so the cycle
of life continues.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.EuEnglish:
When stars die, they turn to stardust
and scatter across the cosmos.[newpage]
Eventually, that stardust reforms to
create a new star... And so the cycle
of life continues.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.EuDutch:
When stars die, they turn to stardust
and scatter across the cosmos.[newpage]
Eventually, that stardust reforms to
create a new star... And so the cycle
of life continues.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.UsFrench:
Lorsqu'une étoile s'éteint, elle 
s'effrite en poussière d'étoile et se 
disperse dans l'univers.[newpage]
Finalement, cette poussière d'étoile 
s'amasse et forme une nouvelle 
étoile...[newpage]
Et ainsi le cycle de la vie 
recommence.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.EuFrench:
Lorsque qu'une étoile s'éteint, elle se
brise et vole en éclats...[newpage]
Puis, lorsque ceux-ci s'amassent, ils
forment une nouvelle étoile...[newpage]
Et le cycle de la vie recommence.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.UsSpanish:
Al concluir la vida de una estrella, se
convierte en polvo de estrellas que
se reparte por el cosmos.[newpage]
Llegado el momento, volverá a unirse
para formar una nueva estrella
y recuperar así la vida.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.EuSpanish:
Siempre que una estrella se apaga,
esta se convierte en polvo cósmico
que...[newpage]
en su momento, volverá a unirse
para formar un nuevo todo
y recuperar la vida.[newpage]
Así es nuestro ciclo vital.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.EuGerman:
Wenn das Licht eines Sterns
verblasst, zerbirst er zu
Sternenstaub...[newpage]
Wenn man diesen sammelt und
zusammenfügt, wird er wieder
zu einem Stern...[newpage]
Und so dreht sich der Kreis des
Lebens weiter.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.EuItalian:
Quando i pianeti esauriscono la loro
energia vitale, si frantumano...[newpage]
Quei frammenti a loro volta si unisco-
no per dare vita ad un altro pianeta.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]は、[ruby base]命[ruby top]いのち[ruby end]が[ruby base]終[ruby top]お[ruby end]わると、[ruby base]砕[ruby top]くだ[ruby end]け[ruby base]散[ruby top]ち[ruby end]り[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずになる…[newpage]
それが[ruby base]集[ruby top]あつ[ruby end]まって、また[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]に…[newpage]
[ruby base]命[ruby top]いのち[ruby end]は　くり[ruby base]返[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]します
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta002.KrKorean:
별은 생명이 다하면
부서져서 별똥별이 됩니다…[newpage]
그것은 모여서 다시 별이 되죠…[newpage]
생명은 그렇게 반복됩니다

EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.UsEnglish:
But the cycle never repeats itself in
quite the same way...
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.EuEnglish:
But the cycle never repeats itself in
quite the same way...
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.EuDutch:
But the cycle never repeats itself in
quite the same way...
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.UsFrench:
Cependant, chaque fois qu'une étoile 
renaît, elle n'est jamais tout à fait
la même étoile qu'auparavant...
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.EuFrench:
Cependant, ce n'est jamais tout à fait
la même étoile...
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.UsSpanish:
Sin embargo, no es una repetición
idéntica...
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.EuSpanish:
Esa nueva existencia es
completamente distinta a la anterior.[newpage]
Cada estrella es singular
y vive de forma única...
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.EuGerman:
Aber es wiederholt sich nie das 
Gleiche, es ist immer wieder neu.
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.EuItalian:
Ma il nuovo pianeta non è identico
al precedente...
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.JpJapanese:
けれど
[ruby base]一[ruby top]ひと[ruby end]つとして[ruby base]同[ruby top]おな[ruby end]じくり[ruby base]返[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]しはありません…
EpilogueDemoStage_Rosetta003.KrKorean:
하지만 그 무엇 하나
같은 모습으로는 태어나지 않습니다…

FloaterLandZone_Caretaker001.UsEnglish:
This here's a floating fortress. We
call it [setfontcol blue]Buoy Base[setfontcol default].[newpage]
But nobody's using it now, so we're
just here for upkeep.
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker001.EuEnglish:
This here's a floating fortress. We
call it [setfontcol blue]Buoy Base[setfontcol default].[newpage]
But nobody's using it now, so we're
just here for upkeep.
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker001.EuDutch:
This here's a floating fortress. We
call it [setfontcol blue]Buoy Base[setfontcol default].[newpage]
But nobody's using it now, so we're
just here for upkeep.
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker001.UsFrench:
Ceci est une forteresse flottante. On 
l'appelle l'[setfontcol blue]Île Flottante[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Personne ne s'en sert à présent, alors
nous sommes là pour l'entretien.
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker001.EuFrench:
Nous nous trouvons dans l'ancienne
forteresse marine, l'[setfontcol blue]île flottante[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Plus personne ne s'en sert, mais nous
nous occupons de son entretien.

¡Esta es una fortaleza de las [setfontcol blue]Tierras
Flotantes[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Pero nadie la utiliza ahora, así que
estamos aquí de mantenimiento.
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker001.EuSpanish:
¡E'ta e' la fortalesa de
[setfontcol blue]Tierra' Flotante'[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Pero ahora naide la utilisa y mi
menda e'tá aquí para mantenel'la.
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker001.EuGerman:
Das hier war früher mal eine Wasser-
festung, genannt [setfontcol blue]Schwimmland[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Aber jetzt ist sie verlassen und 
wir schieben hier Wache.
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker001.EuItalian:

detta [setfontcol blue]Piattaforma[setfontcol default].[newpage]

quindi siamo di guardia qui.

FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.UsEnglish:
You destroyed the weight![pause] So you
just go around breaking stuff, eh?!
You think that's OK? Breaking stuff?
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.EuEnglish:
You destroyed the weight![pause] So you
just go around breaking stuff, eh?!
You think that's OK? Breaking stuff?
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.EuDutch:
You destroyed the weight![pause] So you
just go around breaking stuff, eh?!
You think that's OK? Breaking stuff?
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.UsFrench:
Tu as détruit le poids! Tu t'éclates 
à tout casser, hein?!
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.EuFrench:
C'est toi qui as cassé le poids?
Héhé... Je m'en doutais.
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.UsSpanish:
¡Destruiste la pesa! Así que vas por
ahí destruyendo cosas, ¿no?
¿Te parece bien? ¿Romper cosas?
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.EuSpanish:
Tú... te ha' cargao los peso', ¿no?
¡Pillín, pillín!
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.EuGerman:
Hast das Senkblei zerstört, wie? Jetzt
ist das Geheimnis aufgeflogen...
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.EuItalian:
Hai distrutto il peso![pause]
Ti diverti a spaccare tutto, eh?
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.JpJapanese:
オモリ　こわしたん、アンタやな？[pause]
フフ…　バレバレやで
FloaterLandZone_Caretaker006.KrKorean:
닻을 부순 거 니 맞제?[pause]
후후… 안 봐도 삼천리다

So there's a [setfontcol red]planet [setfontcol default]at the top of the
tower? How do you get up there?

[ruby base]塔[ruby top]とう[ruby end]の[ruby base]上[ruby top]うえ[ruby end]のほうにある[setfontcol red][ruby base]惑星[ruby top]わくせい[ruby end][setfontcol default]、[pause]

ForestHomeZone_HoneyQueen001.UsEnglish:
The [setfontcol red]neighbors [setfontcol default]are causing trouble
again! We would be most grateful for
your assistance!

The [setfontcol red]neighbors [setfontcol default]are causing trouble
again! We would be most grateful for
your assistance!
ForestHomeZone_HoneyQueen001.EuDutch:
The [setfontcol red]neighbors [setfontcol default]are causing trouble
again! We would be most grateful for
your assistance!

Ah, les [setfontcol red]voisins[setfontcol default] font encore du boucan.
Nous te serions bien reconnaissants
de bien vouloir nous aider!

Nos [setfontcol red]voisins[setfontcol default] nous font encore des
misères...[newpage]
Dis-moi, tu voudrais bien leur faire

problemas otra vez...

una buena charla con ellos?

[setfontcol red]おとなりさん[setfontcol default]が　また

ForestHomeZone_Kinopio001.UsEnglish:
Oh, wow! It's [player_ml_normal]![pause] We escaped
from [setfontcol blue]Peach's Castle[setfontcol default] too![newpage]

[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]つけたんですよ！[newpage]
これから　きっと　[ruby base]必要[ruby top]ひつよう[ruby end]になると[ruby base]思[ruby top]おも[ruby end]うので
[ruby base]持[ruby top]も[ruby end]っててください！

[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 찾았어요![newpage]
앞으로 분명히 필요해질 테니까
갖고 가세요!

n'en aurais pas besoin? Allez, tiens.

... Ah! Au fait![pause]
Nous avons trouvé une [setfontcol red]super

ForestHomeZone_Kinopio010.UsSpanish:

ForestHomeZone_Kinopio010.EuSpanish:

¡He encontrado una [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]Superestrella[setfontcol default]![newpage]

ForestHomeZone_Kinopio010.EuGerman:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]Kreisch! Eine Biene!!![newpage]

ForestHomeZone_Kinopio010.EuItalian:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]AHHH! UN'APE![newpage]

Anche noi siamo scappati dal [setfontcol blue]Castello

Ah, dimenticavo![pause] Abbiamo trovato
una [setfontcol red]Superstella[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar]! Ne avrai di certo

ForestHomeZone_Kinopio010.JpJapanese:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]ギャーー！　ハチーー！！[newpage]
…あれ？！　[player_ml_normal]さん？　…ですよね！[pause]
ワタシ[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]も　[setfontcol blue]ピーチ[ruby base]城[ruby top]じょう[ruby end][setfontcol default]を[ruby base]脱出[ruby top]だっしゅつ[ruby end]したんです！[newpage]
でも　[ruby base]逃[ruby top]に[ruby end]げる[ruby base]途中[ruby top]とちゅう[ruby end]で、[setfontcol red]クッパ[setfontcol default]に　やられるわ、
もう[ruby base]一人[ruby top]ひとり[ruby end]の[icon Luigi][setfontcol green]ルイージ[setfontcol default]さんと　はぐれるわ…[newpage]
………あ！　そうだ！[pause]
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]つけたんですよ！[newpage]
これから　きっと　[ruby base]必要[ruby top]ひつよう[ruby end]になると[ruby base]思[ruby top]おも[ruby end]うので
[ruby base]持[ruby top]も[ruby end]っててください！
ForestHomeZone_Kinopio010.KrKorean:

[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 찾았어요![newpage]

ForestHomeZone_SignBoard004.EuSpanish:

MUY, MUY, MUY ARRIBA[newpage]

Vous avez obtenu 
une Grande Étoile!

Vous avez obtenu

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.UsEnglish:
We're currently on vaca...er...I mean,
galactic survey duty! Please be
patient with us.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.EuEnglish:
We're currently on vaca...er...I mean,
galactic survey duty! Please be
patient with us.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.EuDutch:
We're currently on vaca...er...I mean,
galactic survey duty! Please be
patient with us.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.UsFrench:
On est en vacan... euh... 'fin,
en mission d'inspection
galactique! Sois patient.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.EuFrench:
Pour le moment, nous sommes en
vac... euh... en mission![pause]
Attends un instant, je te prie...
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.UsSpanish:
Estamos de vacac... ¡No! ¡Explorando!
¡Estamos explorando! Ten paciencia.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.EuGerman:
Gegenwärtig im Urlau... öh... ich meine,
[setfontcol blue]auf Erkundung[setfontcol default]. [pause]Warte einen Moment...
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.EuItalian:
Sono in viaggio... di lavoro![pause]
Perlustrazione in corso! Attendere.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.JpJapanese:
ただ[ruby base]今[ruby top]いま[ruby end]、バカンス…じゃなくて、[ruby base]調査中[ruby top]ちょうさちゅう[ruby end]です！[pause]
[ruby base]少々[ruby top]しょうしょう[ruby end]お[ruby base]待[ruby top]ま[ruby end]ちを…
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio001.KrKorean:
지금은 바캉스…가 아니라 조사 중이에요![pause]
조금만 기다려 주세요…

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio002.JpJapanese: ただ[ruby base]今[ruby top]いま[ruby end]、[ruby base]調査中[ruby top]ちょうさちゅう[ruby end]！

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio003.UsEnglish:
Cannon! Get all you
can in the cannon! ♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio003.EuEnglish:
Cannon! Get all you
can in the cannon! ♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio003.EuDutch:
Cannon! Get all you
can in the cannon! ♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio003.UsFrench:
Montons toujours et encore
dans le canon! ♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio003.EuFrench:
Monter dans le canon, c'est
canon♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio003.UsSpanish:
¡Cañón! ¡Pon todo lo que
puedas dentro del cañón! ♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio003.EuItalian:
Sul cannone salta su ♪
e spara se vuoi tu! ♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio003.JpJapanese: ホウダイ　[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]りホウダイ♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio003.KrKorean: 타는 거야! 마음껏 타 보는 거야♪

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.UsEnglish:
The team is surveying an
[setfontcol blue]underground lake[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.EuEnglish:
The team is surveying an
[setfontcol blue]underground lake[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.EuDutch:
The team is surveying an
[setfontcol blue]underground lake[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.UsFrench:
L'équipe inspecte un [setfontcol blue]lac 
souterrain[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.EuFrench:
La brigade inspecte un [setfontcol blue]lac
souterrain[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.UsSpanish:
El escuadrón explora
un [setfontcol blue]lago subterráneo[setfontcol default].
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.EuSpanish:
La cuadrilla explora
el [setfontcol blue]fondo del lago[setfontcol default].
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.EuGerman:
Der Suchtrupp erkundet einen 
[setfontcol blue]unterirdischen See[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.EuItalian:
La truppa sta sorvegliando
il [setfontcol blue]fondo del lago[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.JpJapanese: [ruby base]隊員[ruby top]たいいん[ruby end]が[setfontcol blue][ruby base]地底[ruby top]ちてい[ruby end][ruby base]湖[ruby top]こ[ruby end][setfontcol default]を[ruby base]調査[ruby top]ちょうさ[ruby end]しています！
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio005.KrKorean: 대원들이 [setfontcol blue]호수 바닥[setfontcol default]을 조사하고 있어요!

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio006.UsEnglish: There's a [setfontcol red]tunnel [setfontcol default]right [setfontcol blue]here[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio006.EuEnglish: There's a [setfontcol red]tunnel [setfontcol default]right [setfontcol blue]here[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio006.EuDutch: There's a [setfontcol red]tunnel [setfontcol default]right [setfontcol blue]here[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio006.UsFrench: Il y a un[setfontcol red] tunnel[setfontcol default] par [setfontcol blue]ici[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio006.EuFrench: Il y a un [setfontcol red]tunnel [setfontcol default]par [setfontcol blue]ici[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio006.EuGerman: [setfontcol blue]Hier[setfontcol default] ist ein [setfontcol red]Tunnel[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio006.JpJapanese: [setfontcol blue]ここ[setfontcol default]に　[setfontcol red][ruby base]横穴[ruby top]よこあな[ruby end][setfontcol default]があります！

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.UsEnglish:
That [setfontcol red]Undergrunt Gunner[setfontcol default] is keeping us
from exploring the area!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.EuEnglish:
That [setfontcol red]Undergrunt Gunner[setfontcol default] is keeping us
from exploring the area!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.EuDutch:
That [setfontcol red]Undergrunt Gunner[setfontcol default] is keeping us
from exploring the area!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.UsFrench:
Ce [setfontcol red]Soldat Mogu[setfontcol default] gêne
notre inspection!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.EuFrench:
Ce [setfontcol red]soldat Mogu [setfontcol default]nous gêne dans nos
recherches!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.UsSpanish:
Ese [setfontcol red]Soldado Topete [setfontcol default]no nos deja
explorar.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.EuSpanish:
Ese [setfontcol red]Soldado Topete [setfontcol default]no nos
deja explorar.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.EuItalian:
Quel [setfontcol red]Talpone Soldato [setfontcol default]sta interferendo
con la sorveglianza!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.JpJapanese:
あの[setfontcol red]モグ[ruby base]兵[ruby top]へい[ruby end][setfontcol default]が
[ruby base]調査[ruby top]ちょうさ[ruby end]のジャマをするんです！
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio008.KrKorean:
저 [setfontcol red]두덩병[setfontcol default]이
자꾸 제가 조사하는 걸 방해해요!

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio009.UsEnglish:
Thank you! Now we can get on
with our survey!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio009.EuEnglish:
Thank you! Now we can get on
with our survey!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio009.EuDutch:
Thank you! Now we can get on
with our survey!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio009.UsFrench:
Merci! Nous pouvons maintenant 
continuer avec l'inspection!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio009.EuFrench:
Merci! A présent, nous allons pouvoir
reprendre nos recherches!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio009.EuGerman:
Danke! [pause]Jetzt können wir unsere 
Erkundung fortsetzen!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio009.EuItalian:
Grazie![pause] Adesso possiamo proseguire
con la sorveglianza.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio009.JpJapanese:
ありがとうございます！[pause]
これで[ruby base]調査[ruby top]ちょうさ[ruby end]が[ruby base]続[ruby top]つづ[ruby end]けられます！
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio009.KrKorean:
고맙습니다![pause]
이젠 마음 놓고 조사할 수 있어요!

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio011.JpJapanese: ホウダイが　[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]っ[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]られました…

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio012.EuFrench:
Montons toujours et encore
dans le canon♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio012.EuItalian:
Spara più che mai ♪
se sul cannone salir vorrai! ♪
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio012.JpJapanese: またまた　[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]りホウダイ♪

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio013.JpJapanese: お[ruby base]肉[ruby top]にく[ruby end]…　[setfontsize 0]ムニャ…

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.UsEnglish:
There's a [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol default] hidden
inside that watermelon![newpage]
Use [setfontcol blue]ground pounds[setfontcol default] to make those
[setfontcol yellow]tennis balls[setfontcol default] hit that watermelon to
get that [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol default].
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.EuEnglish:
There's a [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol default] hidden
inside that watermelon![newpage]
Use [setfontcol blue]Ground Pounds[setfontcol default] to make those
[setfontcol yellow]tennis balls[setfontcol default] hit that watermelon to
get that [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol default].
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.EuDutch:
There's a [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol default] hidden
inside that watermelon![newpage]
Use [setfontcol blue]Ground Pounds[setfontcol default] to make those
[setfontcol yellow]tennis balls[setfontcol default] hit that watermelon to
get that [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol default].
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.UsFrench:
Il y a une [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Super Étoile[setfontcol default] cachée
dans ce melon d'eau![newpage]
Pour le briser, utilise des [setfontcol blue]charges
au sol [setfontcol default]pour lui envoyer une [setfontcol yellow]balle
de tennis[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.EuFrench:
Il y a une [setfontcol red]super étoile[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] cachée
dans la pastèque qui se trouve 
au centre![newpage]
Brise-la en lui envoyant les [setfontcol yellow]balles
de tennis [setfontcol default]avec des [setfontcol blue]charges au sol[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.UsSpanish:
¡Hay una [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Superestrella[setfontcol default] en el
centro de esa sandía![newpage]
¡Usa el [setfontcol blue]salto bomba[setfontcol default] para lanzarle
las [setfontcol yellow]pelotas de tenis[setfontcol default] y romperla!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.EuSpanish:
¡Hay una [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]Superestrella [setfontcol default]oculta
en la sandía del centro![newpage]
¡Usa el [setfontcol blue]Salto Bomba[setfontcol default] para lanzarle
las [setfontcol yellow]pelotas de tenis[setfontcol default] y rómpela!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.EuGerman:
In der Wassermelone im Zentrum ist 
ein [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power-Stern[setfontcol default] versteckt![newpage]
Schieße die [setfontcol yellow]Tennisbälle [setfontcol default]mit 
[setfontcol blue]Stampfattacken [setfontcol default]auf die Melone und
zerstöre sie!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.EuItalian:
C'è una [setfontcol red]Superstella[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] nascosta
in quell'anguria![newpage]
Fai uno [setfontcol blue]schianto a terra [setfontcol default]per
lanciare una[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol yellow]pallina da tennis [setfontcol default]e
spaccare l'anguria!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]中心[ruby top]ちゅうしん[ruby end]のスイカに
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]が　かくれてます！[newpage]
あの　スイカに　[setfontcol blue]ヒップドロップ[setfontcol default]で
[setfontcol yellow]テニスボール[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]当[ruby top]あ[ruby end]てて　こわしてください！
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio014.KrKorean:
가운데 있는 수박에
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]가 숨어 있어요![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]엉덩이 찍기[setfontcol default]를 해서 [setfontcol yellow]테니스 볼[setfontcol default]을
그 수박에 맞혀서 깨뜨리세요!

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.UsEnglish:
If you freeze these jets of water, you
can use them to get up above.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.EuEnglish:
If you freeze these jets of water, you
can use them to get up above.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.EuDutch:
If you freeze these jets of water, you
can use them to get up above.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.UsFrench:
Si ces jets d'eau étaient 
gelés, tu pourrais te rendre
là-haut.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.EuFrench:
Si le lac était [setfontcol blue]gelé[setfontcol default], on
pourrait aller là-haut, non?
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.UsSpanish:
Yo creo que se puede subir
[setfontcol blue]congelando[setfontcol default] el agua, ¿no?
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.EuSpanish:
Yo creo que se puede subir
[setfontcol blue]congelando [setfontcol default]el agua, ¿no?
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.EuGerman:
Kannst du darüber nach
oben laufen, wenn du das
Wasser [setfontcol blue]gefrierst[setfontcol default]?
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.EuItalian:
Credo che [setfontcol blue]congelando[setfontcol default]
l'acqua si possa salire.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.JpJapanese:
この[ruby base]水[ruby top]みず[ruby end]　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]凍[ruby top]こお[ruby end]らせたら[setfontcol default]
[ruby base]上[ruby top]うえ[ruby end]へ　[ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]けないでしょうか？
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio015.KrKorean:
이 물을 [setfontcol blue]얼리면[setfontcol default]
위로 갈 수 있지 않을까요?

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.UsEnglish:
That mean [setfontcol red]Guppy [setfontcol default]is down below!
But I fear no fish!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.EuEnglish:
That mean [setfontcol red]Guppy [setfontcol default]is down below!
But I fear no fish!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.EuDutch:
That mean [setfontcol red]Guppy [setfontcol default]is down below!
But I fear no fish!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.UsFrench:
[setfontcol red]Guppy[setfontcol default], l'épaulard trouble-fête, est 
dans ces eaux!
Mais je ne crains aucun poisson!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.EuFrench:
Voilà [setfontcol red]Paulo[setfontcol default], l'épaulard trouble-fête![newpage]
Mais pas d'inquiétude! Moi,
le capitaine de la brigade Toad,
vais lui donner une bonne leçon!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.UsSpanish:
¡Ahí está esa [setfontcol red]Orca[setfontcol default]![pause]
¡Pero no me asusta ningún pez!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.EuSpanish:
¡La [setfontcol red]Orca [setfontcol default]infame ha vuelto![pause]
¡Esta vez el jefe, o sea, yo, le
pegaré una buena regañina!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.EuGerman:
Der [setfontcol red]Meeresganove [setfontcol default]ist wieder 
aufgetaucht![newpage]
Ich als Kapitän werde ihm ordentlich
den Marsch blasen!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.EuItalian:
È apparso il [setfontcol red]brigante dell'oceano[setfontcol default]! In
qualità di Capitano, lo fermerò io!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end]のギャング[setfontcol default]が[ruby base]現[ruby top]あらわ[ruby end]れました！[pause]
[ruby base]隊長[ruby top]たいちょう[ruby end]のワタシが　とっちめてやるんです！
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio017.KrKorean:
[setfontcol red]바다의 불량배[setfontcol default]가 나타났어요![pause]
대장인 제가 따끔하게 혼내 주고 올게요!

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio018.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Guppy[setfontcol default], huh...?
[setfontsize 0]You don't scare me...
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio018.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Guppy[setfontcol default], huh...?
[setfontsize 0]You don't scare me...
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio018.EuDutch:
[setfontcol red]Guppy[setfontcol default], huh...?
[setfontsize 0]You don't scare me...
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio018.UsFrench:
[setfontcol red]Guppy[setfontcol default]? [setfontcol red]GUPPY[setfontcol default]? 
[setfontsize 0]Je n'ai pas peur...

There's a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default] in the
center of that watermelon, but I don't
know how to get it![newpage]
Hmmm... Maybe you could [setfontcol blue]ground-
pound[setfontcol default] to knock a [setfontcol yellow]tennis ball [setfontcol default]into
the watermelon!

There's a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default] in the

Pound[setfontcol default] to knock a [setfontcol yellow]tennis ball [setfontcol default]into

[setfontcol blue]Stampfattacke [setfontcol default]auf die Melone und

[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]が　かくれてます！[newpage]
あの　スイカに　[setfontcol blue]ヒップドロップ[setfontcol default]で

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio044.UsEnglish:

snorkel-toad certification!

I've got a level one
snorkel-toad certification!

Toad de la Plongée Libre!

Le navire est immobilisé au
fond du lac!

El barco está anclado

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio044.EuSpanish:
Hemos fijado el barco

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio044.EuGerman:

Boden des Sees fixiert!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio044.EuItalian:

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.UsEnglish:
Wow, what's a [setfontcol blue]ghost ship[setfontcol default] doing here?
Scared? Don't worry, I'll protect you.[newpage]
If any ghosts come out, I'll send them
running scared! Too bad I don't see
any ghosts.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.EuEnglish:
Wow, what's a [setfontcol blue]ghost ship[setfontcol default] doing here?
Scared? Don't worry, I'll protect you.[newpage]
If any ghosts come out, I'll send them
running scared! Too bad I don't see
any ghosts.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.EuDutch:
Wow, what's a [setfontcol blue]ghost ship[setfontcol default] doing here?
Scared? Don't worry, I'll protect you.[newpage]
If any ghosts come out, I'll send them
running scared! Too bad I don't see
any ghosts.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.UsFrench:
Un [setfontcol blue]vaisseau fantôme[setfontcol default]? Ici?! 
Ne t'inquiète pas, je vais te protéger.[newpage]
S'il y avait des fantômes, je me ferais
une joie de les chasser...
Malheureusement, il n'y en a pas!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.EuFrench:
Un [setfontcol blue]vaisseau fantôme[setfontcol default]? Ici?![newpage]
S'il y avait des fantômes, je me ferais
une joie de les chasser...
Malheureusement, il n'y en a pas!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.UsSpanish:
¡Un [setfontcol blue]barco fantasma[setfontcol default]!
¡No te asustes! Yo te protegeré.[newpage]
¡Si aparece algún fantasma, lo
exterminaré! Es una pena que no haya
ninguno...
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.EuSpanish:
¡Un [setfontcol blue]barco fantasma[setfontcol default]![newpage]
¡Como se me plante un fantasma
delante, lo extermino![newpage]
Es una pena que no haya...
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.EuGerman:
Wer hätte gedacht, dass hier ein 
[setfontcol blue]Geisterschiff [setfontcol default]ist![newpage]
Wenn sich hier Geister rumtrieben,
würde ich sie austreiben...[newpage]
Aber leider sind hier keine!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.EuItalian:
Cosa ci fa qui una [setfontcol blue]Nave Spettrale[setfontcol default]?
Paura? Non ti preoccupare...
Ci penso io![newpage]
Se escono degli spettri, gli farò
vedere i sorci verdi! Peccato che
non se ne vedano in giro.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.JpJapanese:
こんなところに　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]幽霊船[ruby top]ゆうれいせん[ruby end][setfontcol default]が！[newpage]
ここに　オバケがいたら　ワタシが
[ruby base]退治[ruby top]たいじ[ruby end]してやるんですが…　いやぁ、[ruby base]残念[ruby top]ざんねん[ruby end]です～！
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio045.KrKorean:
이런 곳에 [setfontcol blue]유령선[setfontcol default]이![newpage]
여기에 유령이 있다면
제가 물리칠 텐데… 아이고 아깝네요～!

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio046.UsEnglish:
No ghosts here! Too bad you
don't get to see me in action.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio046.EuEnglish:
No ghosts here! Too bad you
don't get to see me in action.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio046.EuDutch:
No ghosts here! Too bad you
don't get to see me in action.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio046.UsFrench:
Aucun fantôme en vue...
Quel dommage!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio046.EuFrench:
Aucun fantôme en vue...
Quel dommage!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio046.UsSpanish:
No hay fantasmas. Qué pena...
No podrás verme en acción.
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio046.EuSpanish:
Aquí no hay fantasmas,
qué pena más grande...
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio046.JpJapanese: オバケ、いませんねぇ…　[ruby base]残念[ruby top]ざんねん[ruby end]！

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio047.JpJapanese: ギャー！　オバケーー！！！

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio048.UsFrench:
Est-ce que ce fantôme
s'est enfui?
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio048.EuFrench:
Poltrons de fantômes...
Ils se sont enfuis?
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio048.JpJapanese: オバケめ…　[ruby base]逃[ruby top]に[ruby end]げたか？

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Guppy[setfontcol default] is back again. I'm the leader,
so I'll deal with him!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Guppy[setfontcol default] is back again. I'm the leader,
so I'll deal with him!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.EuDutch:
[setfontcol red]Guppy[setfontcol default] is back again. I'm the leader,
so I'll deal with him!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.UsFrench:
[setfontcol red]Guppy [setfontcol default]est de retour. C'est moi le
leader, donc c'est moi qui m'en
occupe!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.EuFrench:
Revoilà [setfontcol red]Paulo l'épaulard[setfontcol default]![pause]
Ne vous inquiétez pas, votre capitaine
va lui donner une bonne leçon!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.UsSpanish:
¡La [setfontcol red]Orca[setfontcol default] ha vuelto![pause]
¡Esta vez el jefe, es decir, yo, le
daré su merecido!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.EuSpanish:
¡La [setfontcol red]Orca [setfontcol default]infame ha vuelto![pause]
¡Esta vez, el jefe, o sea, yo, le
pegaré una buena regañina!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.EuGerman:
Der [setfontcol red]Meeresganove [setfontcol default]ist wieder 
aufgetaucht![newpage]
Ich bin der Kapitän, also werde ich
ihm den Marsch blasen!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.EuItalian:
È apparso il [setfontcol red]brigante dell'oceano[setfontcol default]! In
qualità di Capitano, lo fermerò io!
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.JpJapanese:
また　[setfontcol red][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end]のギャング[setfontcol default]が[ruby base]現[ruby top]あらわ[ruby end]れました！[pause]
[ruby base]隊長[ruby top]たいちょう[ruby end]のワタシが　とっちめてやるんです！
GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio053.KrKorean:
또 [setfontcol red]바다의 불량배[setfontcol default]가 나타났어요![pause]
대장인 제가 따끔하게 혼내고 올게요!

GhostShipCaveZone_Kinopio054.JpJapanese: [setfontcol red][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end]のギャング[setfontcol default]か…　[setfontsize 0]ブルブル…

GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.UsEnglish:
What, you again?[newpage]
You got to be kiddin' me. You want to
run me out of this [setfontcol blue]lake[setfontcol default]? You got to
get through all [setfontcol red]eight rings[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.EuEnglish:
What, you again?[newpage]
You got to be kiddin' me. You want to
run me out of this [setfontcol blue]lake[setfontcol default]? You got to
get through all [setfontcol red]eight rings[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.EuDutch:
What, you again?[newpage]
You got to be kiddin' me. You want to
run me out of this [setfontcol blue]lake[setfontcol default]? You got to
get through all [setfontcol red]eight rings[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.UsFrench:
Quoi, toi encore?[newpage]
Si tu veux que je quitte le [setfontcol blue]coin[setfontcol default], tu 
dois passer à travers [setfontcol red]huit anneaux[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.EuFrench:
Hummm...[pause] Tu es bien sûr de toi pour
un humain![newpage]
Si tu veux que je quitte les [setfontcol blue]parages[setfontcol default],
essaie de passer dans [setfontcol red]huit anneaux[setfontcol default]!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.UsSpanish:
¿Otra vez tú?[newpage]
¡Si quieren que les devuelva este
[setfontcol blue]charco[setfontcol default], tendrás que pasar por los
[setfontcol red]ocho anillos[setfontcol default] que iré dejando!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.EuSpanish:
Puaj... Un humano apestoso...[newpage]
Si quieres que me porte bien y os
devuelva este charquito, pasa
por los [setfontcol blue]8 anillos[setfontcol default] que iré dejando.
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.EuGerman:
Du schon wieder![newpage]
Wenn du diesen [setfontcol blue]See [setfontcol default]zurückhaben
willst, musst du durch die [setfontcol blue]acht
[setfontcol default]Ringe schwimmen!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.EuItalian:
Di nuovo tu?[newpage]
Se rivuoi l'[setfontcol blue]oceano[setfontcol default], devi passare
attraverso [setfontcol blue]8[setfontcol default] anelli!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.JpJapanese:
ケッ…[pause]　ニンゲンのクセに　いまいましい！[newpage]
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end][setfontcol default]を[ruby base]返[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]して[ruby base]欲[ruby top]ほ[ruby end]しいなら、
[setfontcol red]リングを８つ[setfontcol default]、くぐってみな！
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing000.KrKorean:
칫…[pause] 인간 주제에 끈질기긴![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]바다[setfontcol default]를 되찾고 싶다면
[setfontcol red]8개의 링[setfontcol default]을 통과해 봐!

GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing001.UsEnglish:
All right, I'm a fish of
my word. Take this.
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing001.EuEnglish:
All right, I'm a fish of
my word. Take this.
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing001.EuDutch:
All right, I'm a fish of
my word. Take this.
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing001.UsFrench:
Bon, une promesse est une
promesse... Prends ceci.
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing001.EuFrench:
Bon, une promesse est une
promesse... Prends ça.
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing001.UsSpanish:
De acuerdo, es palabra
de pez. Esto es tuyo.
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing001.EuGerman:
Versprochen ist verspro-
chen... Nimm dies mit dir!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing001.EuItalian:
Mantengo sempre le pro-
messe! Ecco, prendi!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing001.JpJapanese: [ruby base]約束[ruby top]やくそく[ruby end]だ…　[ruby base]持[ruby top]も[ruby end]って[ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]きな

GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.UsEnglish:
You think you got the flippers to
challenge me? Think again!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.EuEnglish:
You think you got the flippers to
challenge me? Think again!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.EuDutch:
You think you got the flippers to
challenge me? Think again!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.UsFrench:
Tu as les nageoires pour me lancer un
défi? Dans tes rêves!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.EuFrench:
Et tu pensais pouvoir rivaliser avec
moi?![pause] Retourne t'entraîner!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.UsSpanish:
¿Para qué me has retado?[pause]
¡La próxima vez, piénsalo dos veces!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.EuSpanish:
¿Para qué me has retado?[pause]
Eres un inútil. Vuelve otro día.
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.EuGerman:
Glaubst du, damit kannst du
jemanden beeindrucken? [newpage]
Versuch's nochmal!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.EuItalian:
Credi di essere in grado di
fermarmi?[pause] Allora riprovaci!
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.JpJapanese:
そんなんで　オレ[ruby base]様[ruby top]さま[ruby end]の[ruby base]相手[ruby top]あいて[ruby end]がつとまるか！[pause]
[ruby base]出直[ruby top]でなお[ruby end]してきな！
GhostShipCaveZone_SyatiRing002.KrKorean:
그래서 어디 내 상대나 되겠어!?[pause]
더 연습하고 와!

HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.UsEnglish:
If you want to know about [setfontcol blue]swimmin'[setfontcol default],
ask us penguins. We're friendly.
HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.EuEnglish:
If you want to know about [setfontcol blue]swimmin'[setfontcol default],
ask us penguins. We're friendly.
HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.EuDutch:

ask us penguins. We're friendly.
HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.UsFrench:
Si tu veux apprendre à [setfontcol blue]nager[setfontcol default],
adresse-toi à nous, les pingouins.
Nous sommes adonnants!
HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.EuFrench:
Si tu veux apprendre à [setfontcol blue]nager[setfontcol default],
demande à mes camarades, sous l'eau.
Ils t'expliqueront.
HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.UsSpanish:
¿Quieres saber cómo [setfontcol blue]nadar[setfontcol default]? 
¡Pregunta a los pingüinos!
Somos amables.

Para aprender a [setfontcol blue]nadar[setfontcol default], pregunta
a mis coleguillas del agua.
HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.EuGerman:

[setfontcol blue]schwimmt[setfontcol default]. Sie werden dir's sagen!
HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.EuItalian:
Se vuoi sapere qualcosa sul [setfontcol blue]nuoto[setfontcol default],

Ti sapranno senz'altro aiutare.
HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]泳[ruby top]およ[ruby end]ぎ[setfontcol default]のことなら
[ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end]の[ruby base]仲間[ruby top]なかま[ruby end]に[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]けば　[ruby base]教[ruby top]おし[ruby end]えてくれるぞ
HeavenlyBeachZone_Penguin001.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue]헤엄[setfontcol default]치는 방법은
바다 속 친구들이 알려 줄 거야

If you look closely, there's
a [setfontcol red]crack [setfontcol default]here...

If you look closely, there's

HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.UsEnglish:
There are other students taking the
test right now, so it's going to turn
into a [setfontcol red]mad grab[setfontcol default] for the [setfontcol yellow]gold shell[setfontcol default].
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.EuEnglish:
There are other students taking the
test right now, so it's going to turn
into a [setfontcol red]mad grab[setfontcol default] for the [setfontcol yellow]gold shell[setfontcol default].
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.EuDutch:
There are other students taking the
test right now, so it's going to turn
into a [setfontcol red]mad grab[setfontcol default] for the [setfontcol yellow]gold shell[setfontcol default].
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.UsFrench:
Les autres étudiants passant l'examen
vont [setfontcol red]se[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]disputer[setfontcol default] la [setfontcol yellow]carapace dorée[setfontcol default].
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.EuFrench:
D'autres élèves passent l'examen en
même temps, alors vous devrez vous
[setfontcol red]disputer [setfontcol default]la [setfontcol yellow]carapace dorée[setfontcol default]...
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.UsSpanish:
Puede que los otros estudiantes
se [setfontcol red]peleen[setfontcol default] por el [setfontcol yellow]caparazón dorado[setfontcol default].
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.EuSpanish:
Esta vez se presentan
unos cuantos al examen.[newpage]
Vais a tener que [setfontcol red]quitaros [setfontcol default]unos a
otros el [setfontcol yellow]caparazón dorado[setfontcol default].
Será una lucha feroz.
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.EuGerman:
Es gibt noch andere Schüler, die den 
Test ablegen, also kann es sein...[newpage]
...dass es ein [setfontcol red]Gerangel [setfontcol default]um den 
[setfontcol yellow]goldenen Panzer[setfontcol default] gibt...
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.EuItalian:
Ci sono altri che provano l'esame.
È una [setfontcol red]gara[setfontcol default] per accaparrarsi
il [setfontcol yellow]Guscio d'Oro[setfontcol default].
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]試験[ruby top]しけん[ruby end]を[ruby base]受[ruby top]う[ruby end]けてる[ruby base]生徒[ruby top]せいと[ruby end]は　[ruby base]他[ruby top]ほか[ruby end]にもいるから
[setfontcol yellow][ruby base]金[ruby top]きん[ruby end]のコウラ[setfontcol default]は　[setfontcol red][ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]り[ruby base]合[ruby top]あ[ruby end]い[setfontcol default]になるかもねぇ…
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach001.KrKorean:
시험 보는 학생은 자네 말고도 있으니까
[setfontcol yellow]황금등껍질[setfontcol default]을 두고 [setfontcol red]경쟁[setfontcol default]하게 될 거야…

HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.UsEnglish:
Amazing! I didn't think you'd
actually be able to bring it back![newpage]
Well then, here's a big [setfontcol yellow]Gold Medal
[setfontcol default]for you!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.EuEnglish:
Amazing! I didn't think you'd
actually be able to bring it back![newpage]
Well then, here's a big [setfontcol yellow]Gold Medal
[setfontcol default]for you!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.EuDutch:
Amazing! I didn't think you'd
actually be able to bring it back![newpage]
Well then, here's a big [setfontcol yellow]Gold Medal
[setfontcol default]for you!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.UsFrench:
Oh là! Je ne pensais pas que
tu arriverais à la ramener![newpage]
Tiens, cette grosse [setfontcol yellow]médaille
d'or [setfontcol default]est pour toi!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.EuFrench:
Oh! Je ne pensais pas que tu
arriverais à la ramener![newpage]
Tiens, je te donne cette grosse
[setfontcol yellow]médaille d'or[setfontcol default].
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.UsSpanish:
¡Oh! No pensaba que lo fueras a
lograr.[newpage]
¡Te mereces una [setfontcol yellow]Medalla de Oro
[setfontcol default]enorme!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.EuSpanish:
¡Oh! No creía que lo lograras.[newpage]
¡Te mereces una [setfontcol yellow]medalla de oro[setfontcol default]
enorme!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.EuGerman:
Oh! Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass du
ihn tatsächlich bringen würdest![newpage]
Nun, dann gebe ich dir eine riesige
[setfontcol yellow]Goldmedaille[setfontcol default]!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.EuItalian:
Non credevo che ce l'avresti fatta![newpage]
Ecco una [setfontcol yellow]Medaglia d'Oro[setfontcol default] gigante!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.JpJapanese:
お！　[ruby base]本当[ruby top]ほんとう[ruby end]に[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]ってくるとは[ruby base]思[ruby top]おも[ruby end]わなかったよ！[newpage]
じゃ、でっかい[setfontcol yellow][ruby base]金[ruby top]きん[ruby end]メダル[setfontcol default]をやろう
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach002.KrKorean:
와! 정말로 가져올 줄 몰랐어![newpage]
커다란 [setfontcol yellow]금메달[setfontcol default]을 줄게

HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.UsEnglish:
Nice job on the test! But...are you
even one of my students?
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.EuEnglish:
Nice job on the test! But...are you
even one of my students?
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.EuDutch:
Nice job on the test! But...are you
even one of my students?
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.UsFrench:
Tu as réussi l'examen! Hmmmmmmm.
Hé... Es-tu un de mes élèves?
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.EuFrench:
Au fait... Tout cela est très bien,
mais... es-tu un de mes élèves?!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.UsSpanish:
¡Buen trabajo! Ahora que lo pienso...
¿Tú eres alumno mío?
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.EuSpanish:
Ahora que lo pienso...
¿Tú eres alumno mío?
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.EuGerman:
Das hast du gut gemacht... Aber bist
du überhaupt einer meiner Schüler?!?
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.EuItalian:
Immagino che lo accetterò, ma...
Fai parte del mio corso?
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.JpJapanese:
それは　よいとして…
キミ、わたしの[ruby base]生徒[ruby top]せいと[ruby end]？
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach004.KrKorean:
그건 그렇다 치고…
자네 우리 학생이었던가?

HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach006.UsEnglish:
Is that so? Well, come on by and visit
again sometime!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach006.EuEnglish:
Is that so? Well, come on by and visit
again sometime!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach006.EuDutch:
Is that so? Well, come on by and visit
again sometime!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach006.UsFrench:
C'est vrai? Enfin, reviens me
rendre visite quand tu veux!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach006.EuFrench:
Très bien...[pause] Je t'attends, si tu veux
relever le défi!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach006.EuGerman:
Aha...[pause] Ich warte hier.
Komm wieder, wenn du bereit bist.
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach006.JpJapanese:
そーか…[pause]
またの[ruby base]挑戦[ruby top]ちょうせん[ruby end]を　[ruby base]待[ruby top]ま[ruby end]ってるぞ！

HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach007.UsEnglish:
In this test, you must [setfontcol red]collect shells in
the ocean[setfontcol default]![newpage]
If you bring me the [setfontcol yellow]gold shell[setfontcol default], it's an
automatic A for you!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach007.EuEnglish:
This test is all about [setfontcol red]underwater shell
collecting[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Bring me back the [setfontcol yellow]gold shell[setfontcol default] and
it's an automatic 'A' grade for you!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach007.EuDutch:
This test is all about [setfontcol red]underwater shell
collecting[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Bring me back the [setfontcol yellow]gold shell[setfontcol default] and
it's an automatic 'A' grade for you!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach007.UsFrench:
Pour cet examen, tu dois [setfontcol red]ramasser
des carapaces dans l'océan[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Apporte-moi la [setfontcol yellow]carapace
dorée[setfontcol default] et tu réussiras!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach007.EuFrench:
L'examen consiste à [setfontcol red]ramasser une
carapace[setfontcol default]! Rapporte-moi la [setfontcol yellow]carapace
dorée [setfontcol default]qui se trouve dans la mer!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach007.UsSpanish:
El examen consiste en [setfontcol red]recoger
caparazones del océano[setfontcol default].[newpage]
¡Si me traes el [setfontcol yellow]caparazón dorado[setfontcol default],
conseguirás la puntuación máxima
automáticamente!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach007.EuSpanish:
El examen consiste en recoger
un [setfontcol red]caparazón del mar[setfontcol default].[pause] 
Tráeme el [setfontcol yellow]caparazón dorado[setfontcol default].
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach007.EuGerman:
Der Test besteht darin, [setfontcol red]Panzer im
Meer aufzusammeln[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Bring mir den [setfontcol yellow]goldenen Panzer[setfontcol default], der
irgendwo im Meer liegt!
HeavenlyBeachZone_PenguinCoach007.EuItalian:
Per l'esame [setfontcol red]raccogli gusci nell'ocea-
no[setfontcol default]! Devi portarmi il [setfontcol yellow]Guscio d'Oro[setfontcol default]!

aver [setfontcol red]saltato[setfontcol default]! PION-PION!
HeavenlyBeachZone_Rabbit000.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]高[ruby top]たか[ruby end]いところの[setfontcol blue]モノ[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]りたいなら、
[setfontcol red]ジャンプ[setfontcol default]したあと　[setfontcol red]スピン[setfontcol default]だピョン！
HeavenlyBeachZone_Rabbit000.KrKorean:
높은 곳에 있는 [setfontcol blue]물건[setfontcol default]을 잡으려면
[setfontcol red]점프[setfontcol default]한 다음에 [setfontcol red]스핀[setfontcol default]하면 돼 깡총!

HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.UsEnglish:
Hi there! Good to see you![newpage]
I have some bad news, though. See, I
HAD a [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Launch Star[setfontcol default] all ready
for you, but a meteor smashed it up![newpage]
You can't leave without it, so find all
the [icon StarChip] [setfontcol red]Star Chips[setfontcol default] to fix it. Oh, and
be sure not to fall in the [setfontcol blue]black hole[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.EuEnglish:
Hi there! Good to see you![newpage]
I have some bad news, though. See, I
HAD a [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Launch Star[setfontcol default] all ready
for you, but a meteor smashed it up![newpage]
You can't leave without it, so find all
the [icon StarChip] [setfontcol red]Star Chips[setfontcol default] to fix it. Oh, and
be sure not to fall in the [setfontcol blue]black hole[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.EuDutch:
Hi there! Good to see you![newpage]
I have some bad news, though. See, I
HAD a [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Launch Star[setfontcol default] all ready
for you, but a meteor smashed it up![newpage]
You can't leave without it, so find all
the [icon StarChip] [setfontcol red]Star Chips[setfontcol default] to fix it. Oh, and
be sure not to fall in the [setfontcol blue]black hole[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.UsFrench:
Salut! Content de te voir![newpage]
J'ai de mauvaises nouvelles...[newpage]
J'AVAIS un [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Super Anneau Étoile
[setfontcol default]pour toi, mais il a été écrasé par un
météore![newpage]
Tu ne peux pas partir sans cet
anneau, alors trouve tous les [icon StarChip]
[setfontcol red]Morceaux d'Étoile[setfontcol default] pour le réparer![newpage]
Oh, tant qu'à faire, ne tombe pas
dans le [setfontcol blue]trou noir[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.EuFrench:
Je t'attendais![pause]
Je t'avais préparé un [setfontcol red]anneau
étoile[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar]...[newpage]
... mais une météorite est tombée et il
a éclaté en morceaux! Tu ne vas pas
pouvoir partir de cette planète...[newpage]
Où sont tombés les [setfontcol red]morceaux [setfontcol default][icon StarChip]?
Cherche-les, mais fais attention [setfontcol blue]où tu
mets les pieds[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.UsSpanish:
¡Hola! ¡Te había preparado un
[icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Anillo Estelar[setfontcol default], pero un meteorito
lo hizo pedazos![newpage]
¡No puedes salir del planeta sin él,
así que debes encontrar los
[icon StarChip] [setfontcol red]Fragmentos[setfontcol default] para arreglarlo![newpage]
Oh, y mientras los buscas... ¡no caigas
dentro de ese [setfontcol blue]agujero negro[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.EuSpanish:
¡Te estaba esperando![pause] ¡Te tenía
preparado un [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]Anillo estelar[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Pero un meteorito lo ha destruido...[pause]
y no puedes saltar a otro astro.[newpage]
¿Dónde estarán los [icon StarChip][setfontcol red]fragmentos[setfontcol default]?[pause]
Búscalos, pero [setfontcol blue]no te caigas[setfontcol default], ¿eh?
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.EuGerman:
Ich hab schon auf dich gewartet!!![newpage]
Und einen [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Sternenring [setfontcol default]hatte ich 
auch schon für dich vorbereitet!!![newpage]
Aber er ist von einem Meteoriten 
getroffen worden und in lauter
kleine Stücke zerborsten...[newpage]
So kannst du nicht abfliegen!
Wo sind nur die [icon StarChip] [setfontcol red]Splitter[setfontcol default]?[newpage]
Such sie, aber pass auf, wo du 
[setfontcol blue]hintrittst[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.EuItalian:
Ti stavo aspettando![pause] Avevo prepa-
rato una [setfontcol red]Stella Lancio [setfontcol default][icon LaunchStar], ma è stata
frantumata da una meteorite![newpage]
Non puoi lasciare questo pianeta
senza di essa, quindi cerca tutti gli
[setfontcol red]Spicchi Stellari[setfontcol default] [icon StarChip] per ricomporla![newpage]
Ah! Mentre li cerchi... fai attenzione
a dove metti i [setfontcol blue]piedi[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.JpJapanese:
お[ruby base]待[ruby top]ま[ruby end]ちしてましたー！！[pause]
[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]スターリング[setfontcol default][ruby base]用意[ruby top]ようい[ruby end]しました！！[newpage]
けど　[ruby base]隕石[ruby top]いんせき[ruby end]に[ruby base]当[ruby top]あ[ruby end]たって　コナゴナに…[pause]
これじゃ　[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]から[ruby base]飛[ruby top]と[ruby end]び[ruby base]出[ruby top]だ[ruby end]せませ～ん！[newpage]
[icon StarChip][setfontcol red]カケラ[setfontcol default]は　どこだ～？[pause]
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]足元[ruby top]あしもと[ruby end][setfontcol default]に[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]をつけながら　[ruby base]探[ruby top]さが[ruby end]してください！
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico001.KrKorean:
기다리고 있었어요!![pause]
[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]스타링[setfontcol default]을 준비했습니다!![newpage]
하지만 운석에 부딪혀 산산조각이 났어요…[pause]
이대로는 별에서 나갈 수 없어요～![newpage]
[icon StarChip][setfontcol red]조각[setfontcol default]은 어디에 있을까요～?[pause]
[setfontcol blue]발밑[setfontcol default]을 잘 살피면서 찾아 주세요!

HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico002.UsEnglish:
Where are all those
[setfontcol red][icon StarChip] Star Chips[setfontcol default]?
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico002.EuEnglish:
Where are all those
[setfontcol red][icon StarChip] Star Chips[setfontcol default]?
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico002.EuDutch:
Where are all those
[setfontcol red][icon StarChip] Star Chips[setfontcol default]?
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico002.UsFrench:
Où sont ces [setfontcol red][icon StarChip] Morceaux
d'Étoile[setfontcol default]?
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico002.EuFrench:
Où sont les [setfontcol red]morceaux
[setfontcol default]d'étoiles [icon StarChip]?!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico002.EuGerman:
Wo sind nur die
[icon StarChip] [setfontcol red]Splitter[setfontcol default]?
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico002.EuItalian:
Dove potrebbero essere
gli [setfontcol red]Spicchi Stellari[setfontcol default] [icon StarChip]?
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico002.JpJapanese: [icon StarChip][setfontcol red]カケラ[setfontcol default]は　どこだ～？！

HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.UsEnglish:
Yay! The [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Launch Star[setfontcol default] is ready to
go now! [setfontcol red]Spin [setfontcol default]to blast off!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.EuEnglish:
Yay! The [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Launch Star[setfontcol default] is ready to
go now! [setfontcol red]Spin [setfontcol default]to blast off!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.EuDutch:
Yay! The [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Launch Star[setfontcol default] is ready to
go now! [setfontcol red]Spin [setfontcol default]to blast off!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.UsFrench:
Tiguidou! Le [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Super Anneau Étoile[setfontcol default]
est fin prêt! [setfontcol red]Tourbillonne[setfontcol default] pour
t'envoler!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.EuFrench:
L'[setfontcol red]anneau étoile[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar] est réparé!
Allez, [setfontcol red]tournoie [setfontcol default]pour t'envoler!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.UsSpanish:
¡El [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Anillo Estelar [setfontcol default]está completo!
Ahora, ¡[setfontcol red]gira[setfontcol default] para despegar!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.EuSpanish:
¡Ya tenemos listo el [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]Anillo estelar[setfontcol default]!
¡Aaaaaaa [setfontcol red]giraaaaaaaaaar[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.EuGerman:
Der [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Sternenring [setfontcol default]ist jetzt fertig!
Dann [setfontcol red]dreh [setfontcol default]dich, um abzufliegen!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.EuItalian:
La [setfontcol red]Stella Lancio [setfontcol default][icon LaunchStar] è completa![pause]
Ora vai con le [setfontcol red]piroette[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.JpJapanese:
[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]スターリング[setfontcol default]が　[ruby base]完成[ruby top]かんせい[ruby end]しました～！[pause]
それでは[setfontcol red]スピ～～～ン[setfontcol default]で　[ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]ってらっしゃいませ～
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico003.KrKorean:
[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]스타링[setfontcol default]이 완성됐어요～![pause]
그럼 [setfontcol red]스핀～～～[setfontcol default]해서 다녀오세요～

HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico004.EuFrench:
Quand tu as des ennuis,
[setfontcol red]tournoie[setfontcol default]!!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico004.EuSpanish:
Si estás en apuros,
ya sabes, ¡a [setfontcol red]girar[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico004.EuItalian:
Se ti trovi in difficoltà, ba-
sta eseguire delle [setfontcol red]piroette[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico004.JpJapanese: [ruby base]困[ruby top]こま[ruby end]ったら[setfontcol red]スピ～～～ン[setfontcol default]です！！

HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico005.EuFrench:
Fais attention [setfontcol blue]où tu mets
les pieds[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico005.EuSpanish:
Cuidado dónde pisas.
¡[setfontcol blue]No te caigas[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico005.EuGerman: Pass auf, wo du [setfontcol blue]hintrittst[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico005.EuItalian:
Fai attenzione a dove
metti i[setfontcol blue] piedi[setfontcol default]!
HeavensBlackHoleZone_Tico005.JpJapanese: [setfontcol blue][ruby base]足元[ruby top]あしもと[ruby end][setfontcol default]には　[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]をつけて！

HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico002.EuGerman: Wir haben schon auf dich gewartet!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico002.JpJapanese: お[ruby base]待[ruby top]ま[ruby end]ちしてました！

HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.UsEnglish:
That's a [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Star[setfontcol default]! We have to
save it!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.EuEnglish:
That's a [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Star[setfontcol default]! We have to
save it!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.EuDutch:
That's a [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Star[setfontcol default]! We have to
save it!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.UsFrench:
Voilà une [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grande Étoile[setfontcol default]!
Nous devons la sauver!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.EuFrench:
Ceci est une [setfontcol red]grande étoile[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]...
C'est notre amie!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.UsSpanish:
Es una [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Maxiestrella[setfontcol default].
¡Tenemos que salvarla!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.EuSpanish:
¡Eso es una [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]Maxiestrella[setfontcol default]![pause]
¡Es nuestra compañera!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.EuGerman:
Das ist ein [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Großer Stern[setfontcol default]...[pause]
Er ist ein Freund von uns!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.EuItalian:
Quella è una [setfontcol red]Megastella[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]...
È una di noi!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.JpJapanese:
あれは[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]グランドスター[setfontcol default]…[pause]
ボク[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]の[ruby base]仲間[ruby top]なかま[ruby end]です！
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico003.KrKorean:
저건 [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]그랜드스타[setfontcol default]…[pause]
우리들의 친구예요!

HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.UsEnglish:
They're using the [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar][setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol default] to
power that awful [setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default]. It looks
like it's making...something.
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.EuEnglish:
They're using the [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar][setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol default] to
power that awful [setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default]. It looks
like it's making...something.
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.EuDutch:
They're using the [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar][setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol default] to
power that awful [setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default]. It looks
like it's making...something.
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.UsFrench:
Ils utilisent la [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar][setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]Grande Étoile[setfontcol default] pour 
alimenter cette maudite [setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default].[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]Elle 
a l'air de fabriquer... quelque chose.
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.EuFrench:
Ils veulent construire quelque chose
avec cette [setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default], en se servant de
la puissance de la [setfontcol red]grande étoile[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.UsSpanish:
Están tratando de usar la energía de
la [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Maxiestrella [setfontcol default]para hacer
algo malo con esa [setfontcol red]máquina[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.EuSpanish:
Están tratando de usar la energía de
la [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]Maxiestrella [setfontcol default]para hacer
algo malo con esa [setfontcol red]máquina[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.EuGerman:
Sie verwenden die Kraft des
[icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Großen Sterns[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
...um mit dieser [setfontcol red]Maschine [setfontcol default]irgendetwas
herzustellen.
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.EuItalian:
Stanno usando quella [setfontcol red]macchina[setfontcol default]
per creare qualcosa con il potere
della [setfontcol red]Megastella[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.JpJapanese:
あの[setfontcol red]マシン[setfontcol default]で　[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]グランドスター[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]を
[ruby base]吸[ruby top]す[ruby end]い[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]って、[ruby base]何[ruby top]なに[ruby end]か[ruby base]作[ruby top]つく[ruby end]ろうとしています！
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico004.KrKorean:
저 [setfontcol red]머신[setfontcol default]으로 [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]그랜드스타[setfontcol default]의 힘을 빨아들여
무언가를 만드려는 것 같아요!

HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.UsEnglish:
We have to do something before the
[setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Star[setfontcol default]'s power is drained![newpage]
Quick! Find a way to stop that
terrible [setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.EuEnglish:
We have to do something before the
[setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Star[setfontcol default]'s power is drained![newpage]
Quick! Find a way to stop that
terrible [setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.EuDutch:
We have to do something before the
[setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Star[setfontcol default]'s power is drained![newpage]
Quick! Find a way to stop that
terrible [setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.UsFrench:
Nous devons faire quelque chose
avant que la force de la [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grande
Étoile [setfontcol default]ne soit épuisée![newpage]
Vite! Trouve un moyen d'arrêter
cette [setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.EuFrench:
Si ça continue, ils vont aspirer toute
l'énergie de la [setfontcol red]grande étoile[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar],
et elle s'éteindra!![newpage]
Je t'en prie, tu dois arrêter cette
[setfontcol red]machine[setfontcol default]!!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.UsSpanish:
¡Deprisa! ¡Si no hacemos algo, el
poder de la [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Maxiestrella[setfontcol default]
será absorbido![newpage]
¡Tienes que encontrar la manera
de detener esa [setfontcol red]máquina[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.EuSpanish:
Si no lo impedimos, la [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]Maxiestrella
[setfontcol default]perderá toda su energía y morirá.[newpage]
¡Desconecta la [setfontcol red]máquina[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.EuGerman:
Wenn wir nichts unternehmen, wird 
die Energie komplett abgesaugt und...[newpage]
der [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Große Stern [setfontcol default]verblasst!!! Halte
irgendwie diese [setfontcol red]Maschine [setfontcol default]auf!!!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.EuItalian:
Se non ti sbrighi, tutta l'energia
della [setfontcol red]Megastella[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar] verrà risucchiata![newpage]
Devi fermare quella [setfontcol red]macchina[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.JpJapanese:
このままでは　[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]グランドスター[setfontcol default]が
[ruby base]死[ruby top]し[ruby end]んでしまいます！！[newpage]
どうか　[setfontcol red]マシン[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]止[ruby top]と[ruby end]めてください！！
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico005.KrKorean:
이대로라면 [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]그랜드스타[setfontcol default]가
죽어 버려요!![newpage]
제발 [setfontcol red]머신[setfontcol default]을 멈춰 주세요!!

HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico006.UsEnglish:
Please! Save the [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand
Star[setfontcol default] before it's too late!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico006.EuEnglish:
Please! Save the [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand
Star[setfontcol default] before it's too late!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico006.EuDutch:
Please! Save the [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand
Star[setfontcol default] before it's too late!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico006.UsFrench:
S'il te plaît! Sauve la
[icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grande Étoile[setfontcol default]![setfontcol red]
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico006.EuFrench: Sauve la [setfontcol red]grande étoile[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico006.UsSpanish:
¡Por favor, salva a
la [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Maxiestrella[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico006.EuGerman:
Rette den
[icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Großen Stern[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico006.EuItalian:
Devi salvare la
[setfontcol red]Megastella [setfontcol default][icon GrandStar]!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico006.JpJapanese: [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]グランドスター[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]助[ruby top]たす[ruby end]けて！

HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.UsEnglish:
You did it! Now hurry and take the
[setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Star[setfontcol default] back to our mama!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.EuEnglish:
You did it! Now hurry and take the
[setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Star[setfontcol default] back to our mama!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.EuDutch:
You did it! Now hurry and take the
[setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Star[setfontcol default] back to our mama!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.UsFrench:
Tu as réussi! Vite, rapporte la [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar]
Grande Étoile [setfontcol default]à notre maman!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.EuFrench:
Tu as réussi! Merci![pause]
Ramène vite la [setfontcol red]grande étoile[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]
à maman!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.UsSpanish:
¡Lo conseguiste! ¡Ahora, rápido!
¡Lleva la [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Maxiestrella [setfontcol default]con nuestra
mamá!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.EuSpanish:
¡Hurra! ¡Gracias![pause] ¡Ahora lleva
la [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]Maxiestrella [setfontcol default]con mamá!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.EuGerman:
Geschafft! Danke![pause] Nun bring den 
[icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Großen Stern [setfontcol default]schnell zu Mama!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.EuItalian:
Ce l'hai fatta! Grazie! E ora sbrigati!
Riporta la [setfontcol red]Megastella[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]
dalla mamma!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.JpJapanese:
やった！　ありがとう！[pause]
[ruby base]早[ruby top]はや[ruby end]く[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]グランドスター[setfontcol default]を　ママの[ruby base]元[ruby top]もと[ruby end]へ！
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico007.KrKorean:
야호! 고마워![pause]
어서 [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]그랜드스타[setfontcol default]를 엄마한테 갖다 줘!

HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico008.UsEnglish:
Take the [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red] Grand Star[setfontcol default] to
our mama!
HeavensDoorInsideZone_Tico008.EuEnglish:
Take the [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red] Grand Star[setfontcol default] to
