HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta003.EuDutch:
[setfontcol red]Luma [setfontcol default]can give you this power. I will
entrust you with his care.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta003.UsFrench:
[setfontcol red]Chiko[setfontcol default] peut vous donner ce pouvoir. 
Je vous le confie.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta003.EuFrench: Je te confie ce [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta003.UsSpanish:
[setfontcol red]Destello[setfontcol default] puede darte este poder.
Confío en que lo cuides.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta003.EuSpanish:
Te otorgo el poder de los
[setfontcol red]destellos[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta003.EuGerman: Ich leihe dir das [setfontcol red]Sternenkind[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta003.JpJapanese: あなたに　[setfontcol red][ruby base]星の子[ruby top]チコ[ruby end][setfontcol default]を　お[ruby base]貸[ruby top]か[ruby end]ししましょう

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.UsEnglish:
Disaster has struck us, just as it
has visited you. With [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol default], I hope
you can rescue the [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Stars[setfontcol default].[newpage]
May the stars shine down on you...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.EuEnglish:
Disaster has struck us, just as it
has visited you. With [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol default], I hope
you can rescue the [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Stars[setfontcol default].[newpage]
May the stars shine down on you...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.EuDutch:
Disaster has struck us, just as it
has visited you. With [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol default], I hope
you can rescue the [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grand Stars[setfontcol default].[newpage]
May the stars shine down on you...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.UsFrench:
Tout comme vous, un grand malheur 
s'est abattu sur nous.[newpage]
Avec [setfontcol red]Chiko[setfontcol default], j'espère que vous pouvez
secourir les [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] Grandes Étoiles[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Que les étoiles vous protègent...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.EuFrench:
Tout comme toi, un grand malheur
s'est abattu sur nous...[newpage]
Avec l'aide de ce [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol default], tu dois
sauver nos amies les [setfontcol red]grandes
étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]![newpage]
Que les éclats d'étoiles te protègent...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.UsSpanish:
La desgracia ha caído sobre nosotros,
al igual que ha caído sobre ti...[newpage]
Espero que, junto a [setfontcol red]Destello[setfontcol default], puedas
rescatar a nuestras amigas,
las [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Maxiestrellas[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Que las estrellas te acompañen.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.EuSpanish:
Al igual que a ti, la desgracia
ha venido a nuestro encuentro.[newpage]
Te lo ruego, ve con el [setfontcol red]destello [setfontcol default]que te
he concedido a rescatar a nuestras
amigas las [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]Maxiestrellas[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Que la fuerza estelar te acompañe.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.EuGerman:
Genau wie du sind auch wir von einer
Katastrophe heimgesucht worden...[newpage]
Rette bitte zusammen mit [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol default]
unseren Freund, den [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Großen Stern[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Mögen die Sterne mit dir sein...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.EuItalian:
Anche noi, come te, stiamo
attraversando un periodo
difficile.[newpage]
Devi salvare le [setfontcol red]Megastelle [setfontcol default][icon GrandStar]
con l'aiuto di [setfontcol red]Sfavillotto[setfontcol default].
Che la polvere stellare ti protegga...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.JpJapanese:
あなたと[ruby base]同[ruby top]おな[ruby end]じく
わたし[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]にも　[ruby base]災[ruby top]わざわ[ruby end]いが　ふりかかりました…[newpage]
その[setfontcol red][ruby base]星の子[ruby top]チコ[ruby end][setfontcol default]と[ruby base]共[ruby top]とも[ruby end]に、どうか　わたし[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]の[ruby base]仲間[ruby top]なかま[ruby end]、
[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]グランドスター[setfontcol default]を　お[ruby base]救[ruby top]すく[ruby end]いください[newpage]
[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずの[ruby base]恵[ruby top]めぐ[ruby end]みが　あらんことを…
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta004.KrKorean:
당신과 마찬가지로
우리도 재난을 당했습니다…[newpage]
부디 [setfontcol red]치코[setfontcol default]와 함께
우리의 친구 [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]그랜드스타[setfontcol default]를 구해 주세요[newpage]
별의 은총이 함께 하기를…

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.UsEnglish:
This planet...[newpage]
It's very dear to me.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.EuEnglish:
This planet...[newpage]
It's very dear to me.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.EuDutch:
This planet...[newpage]
It's very dear to me.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.UsFrench:
Cette planète...[newpage]
Elle me rend tellement nostalgique.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.EuFrench:
... Cette planète...[newpage]
Elle me rend tellement nostalgique.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.UsSpanish:
Este planeta...[newpage]
Me trae recuerdos lejanos.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.EuSpanish:
Este planeta...[newpage]
Me trae recuerdos lejanos.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.EuGerman:
Dieser Stern... ruft viele Erinnerungen
wach.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.EuItalian:
Questo pianeta...[newpage]
Mi è così familiare...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta101.JpJapanese:
…この[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]は[newpage]
とても　なつかしい　においがするのです

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.UsEnglish:
I looked forward to visiting this
planet with the Lumas every one
hundred years...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.EuEnglish:
I looked forward to visiting this
planet with the Lumas every one
hundred years...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.EuDutch:
I looked forward to visiting this
planet with the Lumas every one
hundred years...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.UsFrench:
Je me réjouissais tant de visiter 
cette planète avec les Chikos
tous les cent ans...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.EuFrench:
Je me réjouissais tant de venir lui
rendre notre visite séculaire avec
mes Luma...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.UsSpanish:
Tenía mucha ilusión de volver aquí
después de cien años, junto a mis
Destellos.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.EuSpanish:
Tenía mucha ilusión de volver aquí
después de cien años,
junto a mis destellos.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.EuGerman:
Ich habe mich sehr gefreut, ihn mit 
den Luma zu besuchen.[newpage]
Wir kommen nämlich bloß ein Mal in
hundert Jahren hier vorbei...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.EuItalian:
Non vedevo l'ora di visitare questo
pianeta dopo 100 anni...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]百年[ruby top]ひゃくねん[ruby end]に[ruby base]一度[ruby top]いちど[ruby end]　チコたちと[ruby base]訪[ruby top]おとず[ruby end]れることが
とても[ruby base]楽[ruby top]たの[ruby end]しみだった…
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta102.KrKorean:
백 년에 한 번 치코들과 이곳에 오는 날을
손꼽아 기다렸습니다…

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.UsEnglish:
The [setfontcol red]Luma [setfontcol default]that's been traveling with
you may also grow up to become a
[setfontcol red]star [setfontcol default]someday.[newpage]
Some Lumas become planets...some
become comets...and a few become
[setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Stars[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.EuEnglish:
The [setfontcol red]Luma [setfontcol default]that's been traveling with
you may also grow up to become a
[setfontcol red]star [setfontcol default]someday.[newpage]
Some Lumas become planets...some
become comets...and a few become
[setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Stars[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.EuDutch:
The [setfontcol red]Luma [setfontcol default]that's been traveling with
you may also grow up to become a
[setfontcol red]star [setfontcol default]someday.[newpage]
Some Lumas become planets...some
become comets...and a few become
[setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Stars[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.UsFrench:
Il se peut que [setfontcol red]Chiko[setfontcol default] devienne
une [setfontcol red]étoile[setfontcol default] un jour.[newpage]
Certains Chikos deviennent des
planètes... d'autres des soleils... et
d'autres encore des [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Super Étoiles[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.EuFrench:
Le [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol default] qui est en toi grandira lui
aussi jusqu'à devenir un jour un
[setfontcol red]astre[setfontcol default] à son tour.[newpage]
Certains deviennent des planètes...
d'autres des soleils...[newpage]
... et d'autres encore des [setfontcol red]super
étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.UsSpanish:
Puede que el [setfontcol red]Destello[setfontcol default] que ha estado
viajando contigo también se convierta
en una [setfontcol red]estrella[setfontcol default] algún día.[newpage]
Algunos Destellos se convierten en
planetas, otros en soles, y unos pocos
se convierten en [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Superestrellas[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.EuSpanish:
El [setfontcol red]destello [setfontcol default]que hay en ti,
algún día llegará a ser una [setfontcol red]estrella[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Algunas estrellas en el futuro serán
planetas, y otras llegarán a soles.[newpage]
Finalmente, habrá otras que se
transformarán en [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]Superestrellas[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.EuGerman:
Der [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol default], der mit dir reist, wird auch
bald wachsen und ein [setfontcol red]Stern [setfontcol default]werden.[newpage]
Manche werden Planeten... andere 
werden Sonnen...[newpage]
Und manche werden [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power-Sterne[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.EuItalian:
Lo [setfontcol red]Sfavillotto [setfontcol default]che è in te cresce e
un giorno diverrà una [setfontcol red]stella[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Alcuni Sfavillotti diventano pianeti...
Altri si mutano in sole. [newpage]
Altri ancora in [setfontcol red]Superstelle[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.JpJapanese:
あなたの[ruby base]中[ruby top]なか[ruby end]にいる[setfontcol red]チコ[setfontcol default]も
いずれ[ruby base]成長[ruby top]せいちょう[ruby end]し[setfontcol red]「[ruby base]星[ruby top]スター[ruby end]」[setfontcol default]になります[newpage]
あるものは[ruby base]惑星[ruby top]わくせい[ruby end]になり…あるものは[ruby base]太陽[ruby top]たいよう[ruby end]に[newpage]
そして　あるものは　[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]になります
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta103.KrKorean:
당신 안에 있는 [setfontcol red]치코[setfontcol default]도
언젠가는 성장해서 [setfontcol red]「별」[setfontcol default]이 됩니다[newpage]
행성이 되기도 하고… 태양이 되기도 하고…[newpage]
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]가 되기도 합니다

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.UsEnglish:
I'm traveling with them while they
look for a place to be reborn.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.EuEnglish:
I'm traveling with them while they
look for a place to be reborn.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.EuDutch:
I'm traveling with them while they
look for a place to be reborn.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.UsFrench:
Je voyage avec eux à la recherche de
l'endroit où ils pourront renaître.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.EuFrench:
Je voyage avec eux à la recherche
d'endroits où ils pourront renaître.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.UsSpanish:
Estoy viajando con ellos mientras
buscan un lugar donde renacer.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.EuSpanish:
Viajo con los destellos hasta que
encuentren un lugar donde renacer.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.EuGerman:
Ich reise mit ihnen, während sie nach 
einem Ort suchen, an dem sie 
wiedergeboren werden können.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.EuItalian:
Sto viaggiando con loro mentre
cercano un posto in cui rinascere.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.JpJapanese:
わたしは、[ruby base]彼[ruby top]かれ[ruby end]らが[ruby base]生[ruby top]う[ruby end]まれかわれる[ruby base]場所[ruby top]ばしょ[ruby end]を[ruby base]求[ruby top]もと[ruby end]めて
ともに　[ruby base]旅[ruby top]たび[ruby end]をしているのです
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta104.KrKorean:
저는 그들이 다시 태어날 장소를 찾아
함께 여행하고 있었습니다

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta105.UsEnglish:
But I never thought all this would
happen...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta105.EuEnglish:
But I never thought all this would
happen...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta105.EuDutch:
But I never thought all this would
happen...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta105.UsFrench:
Mais je n'aurais jamais pensé
que cela se produirait...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta105.EuFrench:
Mais je ne pensais pas qu'un tel
incident pouvait se produire...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta105.UsSpanish:
Pero nunca imaginé que ocurriría todo
esto...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta105.EuGerman:
Aber wer konnte schon ahnen, dass 
so etwas passieren würde...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta105.EuItalian:
Non avrei mai immaginato che potesse
succedere una cosa del genere...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Rosetta105.JpJapanese: それが、こんなことに　なるなんて…

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.UsEnglish: Aw, if only I'd hidden in the [setfontcol red]pipe[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.EuEnglish: Aw, if only I'd hidden in the [setfontcol red]pipe[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.EuDutch: Aw, if only I'd hidden in the [setfontcol red]pipe[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.UsFrench:
Aww, si seulement je m'étais
caché dans le [setfontcol red]tuyau[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.EuFrench:
Aaah!
J'aurais dû me cacher dans le [setfontcol red]tuyau[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.UsSpanish:
¡Vaya! Sabía que tenía que
haberme escondido en la [setfontcol red]tubería[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.EuSpanish:
¡Huy! Me tendría que haber escondido
en una [setfontcol red]tubería[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.EuGerman:
Ich hätte mich in der [setfontcol red]Röhre [setfontcol default]
verstecken sollen...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.EuItalian:
Mi sarei dovuto nascondere in
un [setfontcol red]tubo[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico012.JpJapanese: [setfontcol red][ruby base]土管[ruby top]どかん[ruby end][setfontcol default]に　かくれりゃよかったな～

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.UsEnglish: I should've hidden in the [setfontcol red]grass[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.EuEnglish: I should've hidden in the [setfontcol red]grass[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.EuDutch: I should've hidden in the [setfontcol red]grass[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.UsFrench: J'aurais dû me cacher dans l'[setfontcol red]herbe[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.EuFrench:
Mince! J'aurais dû me cacher dans les
[setfontcol red]hautes herbes[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.UsSpanish:
Vaya... Debería haberme escondido
en la [setfontcol red]hierba[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.EuSpanish:
Vaaaya... Me tendría que haber
escondido entre la [setfontcol red]hierba[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.EuGerman:
Ah... Ich hätte mich im hohen
[setfontcol red]Gras [setfontcol default]verstecken sollen...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.EuItalian:
Ah! Mi sarei dovuto nascondere fra
i [setfontcol red]cespugli[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.JpJapanese:
あー…
[setfontcol red][ruby base]草[ruby top]くさ[ruby end]のしげみ[setfontcol default]に　かくれるんだった…
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico014.KrKorean:
에이…
[setfontcol red]무성한 풀 속[setfontcol default]에 숨을걸…

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default]'s[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]waiting up above. Please help
her with whatever she asks!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default]'s[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]waiting up above. Please help
her with whatever she asks!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.EuDutch:
[setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default]'s[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default]waiting up above. Please help
her with whatever she asks!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.UsFrench:
[setfontcol red]Maman[setfontcol default] t'attend là-haut. S'il te 
plaît, fais ce qu'elle te demande!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.EuFrench:
Notre [setfontcol red]maman[setfontcol default] t'attend là-haut.
Va, et écoute [setfontcol red]sa requête[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.UsSpanish:
[setfontcol red]Mamá [setfontcol default]te espera arriba. ¡Por favor,
haz lo que te pida!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.EuSpanish:
[setfontcol red]Mamá [setfontcol default]está arriba. Ayúdala.
Haz lo que te va a pedir, por favor.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.EuGerman:
Da oben ist unsere [setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default]. Bitte hör 
dir [setfontcol red]Mamas [setfontcol default]Bitte an.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.EuItalian:
La [setfontcol red]mamma[setfontcol default] ti aspetta lì in alto.
Ascolta bene quello che ha da dirti.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]上[ruby top]うえ[ruby end]に　ワタシ[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]の[setfontcol red]ママ[setfontcol default]がいます
[setfontcol red]ママ[setfontcol default]の　お[ruby base]願[ruby top]ねが[ruby end]いを　[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]いてあげて
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico015.KrKorean:
위에 우리 [setfontcol red]엄마[setfontcol default]가 있어요
[setfontcol red]엄마[setfontcol default]의 부탁을 들어주세요

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.UsEnglish:
Aw, I knew I should've hidden in
the [setfontcol red]crater[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.EuEnglish:
Aw, I knew I should've hidden in
the [setfontcol red]crater[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.EuDutch:
Aw, I knew I should've hidden in
the [setfontcol red]crater[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.UsFrench:
Aw, j'aurais dû me cacher
dans le [setfontcol red]cratère[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.EuFrench:
Zut! J'aurais dû me cacher dans un
[setfontcol red]trou[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.UsSpanish:
¡Ah! ¡Me encontraste! Debería
haberme escondido en el [setfontcol red]cráter[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.EuSpanish:
¡Tsk! Me tendría que haber escondido
en un [setfontcol red]agujero[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.EuGerman:
Oh nein, ich hätte mich in einem [setfontcol red]Loch[setfontcol default]
verstecken sollen...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.EuItalian:
Ah! Mi sarei dovuto nascondere
in un [setfontcol red]cratere[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico016.JpJapanese: あ～あ、[setfontcol red][ruby base]穴[ruby top]あな[ruby end]の[ruby base]中[ruby top]なか[ruby end][setfontcol default]に　かくれりゃよかった

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.UsEnglish:
Sorry about bringing you here so
suddenly. We should probably tell
you where you are![newpage]
There's a [setfontcol blue]connection here to deep
space[setfontcol default], far from your lands. We call it
the [setfontcol red]gateway to the starry sky[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.EuEnglish:
Sorry about bringing you here so
suddenly. We should probably tell
you where you are![newpage]
There's a [setfontcol blue]connection here to deep
space[setfontcol default], far from your lands. We call it
the [setfontcol red]gateway to the starry sky[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.EuDutch:
Sorry about bringing you here so
suddenly. We should probably tell
you where you are![newpage]
There's a [setfontcol blue]connection here to deep
space[setfontcol default], far from your lands. We call it
the [setfontcol red]gateway to the starry sky[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.UsFrench:
Désolé de t'amener ici si
soudainement. Nous devrions
te dire où tu es![newpage]
Cet endroit est [setfontcol blue]lié à l'espace lointain[setfontcol default],
très éloigné de la terre que tu
connais.[newpage]
Nous l'appelons le [setfontcol red]portail céleste au
ciel étoilé[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.EuFrench:
Désolé de t'avoir fait venir ici si
soudainement...[newpage]
Nous nous trouvons sur un [setfontcol blue]astre qui
relie la terre et l'espace[setfontcol default]...[pause]
Nous l'appelons le [setfontcol red]portail céleste[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.UsSpanish:
Perdona por haberte traído hasta
aquí de repente. Ni siquiera te
dijimos dónde estás.[newpage]
Existe [setfontcol blue]una conexión desde este lugar
al espacio[setfontcol default], lejos de la tierra que
conoces.[pause] Este es el [setfontcol red]portal celeste[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.EuSpanish:
Perdona por haberte traído hasta
aquí tan de repente.[newpage]
Estás en la [setfontcol blue]estrella puente entre el
Cielo y la Tierra[setfontcol default].[pause]
La llamamos [setfontcol red]Puerta Celestial[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.EuGerman:
Tut mir leid, dich so plötzlich hierher
zu bringen...[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Dieser Stern verbindet die Erde und 
die Galaxien[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
Wir nennen ihn das [setfontcol red]Sternentor[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.EuItalian:
Mi dispiace averti portato qui così
all'improvviso...[newpage]
Questo [setfontcol blue]pianeta collega la terra
con l'universo[setfontcol default]... Lo chiamiamo
[setfontcol red]Varco del Firmamento[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]突然[ruby top]とつぜん[ruby end]　[ruby base]連[ruby top]つ[ruby end]れてきたりして
ゴメンナサイ…[newpage]
ここは　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]大地[ruby top]だいち[ruby end]と[ruby base]宇宙[ruby top]うちゅう[ruby end]を[ruby base]架[ruby top]か[ruby end]ける[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end][setfontcol default]…[pause]
ワタシ[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]は　[setfontcol red][ruby base]天の扉[ruby top]ヘブンズドア[ruby end][setfontcol default]　と[ruby base]呼[ruby top]よ[ruby end]んでいます
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico017.KrKorean:
갑자기 데려와서 죄송해요…[newpage]
이곳은 [setfontcol blue]대지와 우주를 잇는 별[setfontcol default]…[pause]
우리는 [setfontcol red]하늘 문[setfontcol default]이라고 부르고 있어요

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.UsEnglish:
Wow! You caught all of us? Maybe
you really can help [setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.EuEnglish:
Wow! You caught all of us? Maybe
you really can help [setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.EuDutch:
Wow! You caught all of us? Maybe
you really can help [setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.UsFrench:
Au boutte! Tu nous as tous attrapés![newpage]
Peut-être que tu pourras
vraiment aider [setfontcol red]Maman[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.EuFrench:
Bravo! Tu nous as tous attrapés![newpage]
Tu devrais certainement pouvoir aider
[setfontcol red]maman[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.UsSpanish:
¡Qué rabia! ¡Nos encontraste a todos!
Tú podrás ayudar a nuestra [setfontcol red]mamá[setfontcol default].
Seguro.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.EuSpanish:
¡Qué fastidio!
¡Nos has cogido a todos!
Tú podrías ayudar a [setfontcol red]mamá[setfontcol default]. Seguro.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.EuGerman:
Klasse! Du hast uns alle gefangen![newpage]
Jemand wie du kann unserer Mama 
bestimmt helfen...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.EuItalian:
Incredibile! Ci hai catturati tutti![newpage]
Forse puoi veramente aiutare
la [setfontcol red]mamma[setfontcol default]...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.JpJapanese:
すご～い！　みんなつかまえたね！[newpage]
アナタなら　[setfontcol red]ママ[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]に　なれるはず…
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico018.KrKorean:
대단해～! 모두 잡았구나![newpage]
당신이라면 [setfontcol red]엄마[setfontcol default]의 힘이 될 수 있을 거야…

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico019.JpJapanese: ちぇ！！　つかまっちゃった！

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico020.UsEnglish: I can't believe I let myself get caught!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico020.EuEnglish: I can't believe I let myself get caught!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico020.EuDutch: I can't believe I let myself get caught!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico020.UsFrench:
Je n'en reviens pas que je
me sois fait attraper!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico020.JpJapanese: あ～あ、[ruby base]残念[ruby top]ざんねん[ruby end]！

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico021.UsEnglish: Please do as [setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default] asks.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico021.EuEnglish: Please do as [setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default] asks.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico021.EuDutch: Please do as [setfontcol red]Mama[setfontcol default] asks.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico021.UsFrench:
Fais ce que [setfontcol red]Maman[setfontcol default] te 
demande, s'il te plaît.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico021.EuFrench:
Ecoute la requête de
[setfontcol red]maman[setfontcol default].
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico021.UsSpanish:
Por favor, haz lo
que [setfontcol red]mamá [setfontcol default]te pida.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico021.EuSpanish:
Ve a hablar con [setfontcol red]mamá[setfontcol default].
Quiere pedirte un favor.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico021.EuItalian:
Hai già parlato con
la [setfontcol red]mamma[setfontcol default]?
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_RunawayTico021.JpJapanese: [setfontcol red]ママ[setfontcol default]の　お[ruby base]願[ruby top]ねが[ruby end]いを　[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]いてあげて

There's a [setfontcol blue]connection here to deep
space[setfontcol default], far from your lands. We call it
the[setfontcol red] gateway to the starry sky[setfontcol default].

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Shake [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] to [setfontcol red]spin [setfontcol default]into [setfontcol blue]things that
look breakable[setfontcol default]! You can even [setfontcol red]spin
[setfontcol default]enemies to [setfontcol blue]stun [setfontcol default]them.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Shake [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] to [setfontcol red]Spin [setfontcol default]into [setfontcol blue]things that
look breakable[setfontcol default]! You can even [setfontcol red]Spin
[setfontcol default]enemies to [setfontcol blue]stun [setfontcol default]them.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.EuDutch:
[setfontcol red]Shake [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] to [setfontcol red]Spin [setfontcol default]into [setfontcol blue]things that
look breakable[setfontcol default]! You can even [setfontcol red]Spin
[setfontcol default]enemies to [setfontcol blue]stun [setfontcol default]them.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.UsFrench:
Quand tu vois une[setfontcol red] [setfontcol blue]chose à l'air fragile
[setfontcol default]comme celle-ci, [setfontcol red]secoue [setfontcol default]la [icon WiiRemote]
pour [setfontcol red]tourbillonner[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Et si tu touches un ennemi en
[setfontcol red]tourbillonnant[setfontcol default], il sera [setfontcol blue]assommé[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.EuFrench:
Quand tu vois une [setfontcol blue]chose à l'air fragile[setfontcol default]
comme celle-là, [setfontcol red]agite [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] pour
[setfontcol red]tournoyer[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Et si tu touches un ennemi en
[setfontcol red]tournoyant[setfontcol default], il sera [setfontcol blue]assommé[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.UsSpanish:
Cuando veas algo que te [setfontcol blue]parezca
frágil[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]agita[setfontcol default] [icon WiiRemote] para hacer un [setfontcol red]salto
giro[setfontcol default].[newpage]
¡También puedes [setfontcol red]girar[setfontcol default] para [setfontcol blue]aturdir[setfontcol default] a
tus enemigos!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.EuSpanish:
Cuando veas algo que te parezca
[setfontcol blue]frágil[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]sacude [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] para hacer un [setfontcol red]Giro[setfontcol default].[newpage]
De la misma forma, puedes [setfontcol blue]poner en
pajaritos[setfontcol default] a tus enemigos.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.EuGerman:
Wenn es [setfontcol blue]aussieht, als könnte man es 
zerbrechen[setfontcol default], dann [setfontcol red]schüttele [setfontcol default]die [icon WiiRemote]
und mach eine [setfontcol red]Drehattacke[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Du kannst damit auch Feinde 
[setfontcol blue]betäuben[setfontcol default]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.EuItalian:
[setfontcol red]Scuoti [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] e colpisci gli [setfontcol blue]oggetti
che sembrano fragili [setfontcol default]con una[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol red]piroetta[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Con la stessa tecnica puoi [setfontcol blue]stordire[setfontcol default]
i nemici!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.JpJapanese:
こういう　[setfontcol blue]こわせそうなモノ[setfontcol default]には
[icon WiiRemote]を[setfontcol red]ふって[setfontcol default]　[setfontcol red]スピン！　[setfontcol default]です！[newpage]
[setfontcol red]スピン[setfontcol default]を　[ruby base]敵[ruby top]てき[ruby end]に[ruby base]当[ruby top]あ[ruby end]てれば
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]気絶[ruby top]きぜつ[ruby end][setfontcol default]させたりもできますよ！
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico007.KrKorean:
이렇게 [setfontcol blue]약해 보이는 물건 [setfontcol default]앞에서는
[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]을[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]흔들어서[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]스핀[setfontcol default]하세요![newpage]
[setfontcol red]스핀[setfontcol default]해서 적과 부딪히면
[setfontcol blue]기절[setfontcol default]시킬 수도 있어요!

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico008.JpJapanese: そう！　その[ruby base]調子[ruby top]ちょうし[ruby end]です！

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.UsEnglish:
This is a [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Launch Star[setfontcol default]. [setfontcol red]Shake [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote]
when you're near one to shoot
through space like a comet![newpage]
Now, go and explore the universe!
There are lots and lots of [setfontcol red]galaxies
[setfontcol default]for you to discover![pause]
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.EuEnglish:
This is a [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Launch Star[setfontcol default]. [setfontcol red]Shake [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote]
when you're near one to shoot
through space like a comet![newpage]
Now, go and explore the universe!
There are lots and lots of [setfontcol red]galaxies
[setfontcol default]for you to discover![pause]
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.EuDutch:
This is a [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Launch Star[setfontcol default]. [setfontcol red]Shake [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote]
when you're near one to shoot
through space like a comet![newpage]
Now, go and explore the universe!
There are lots and lots of [setfontcol red]galaxies
[setfontcol default]for you to discover![pause]
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.UsFrench:
Ceci est un [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Anneau Étoile[setfontcol default]. Il te
permet de t'envoler dans l'espace.[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Secoue [setfontcol default]la [setfontcol red][icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol default]quand tu en es proche
pour t'envoler comme une comète.[newpage]
Embraye! Va explorer cet univers
plein de [setfontcol red]galaxies[setfontcol default]![pause] Il y en a
en masse à découvrir![pause]
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.EuFrench:
Ceci est un [setfontcol red]anneau étoile[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar].
Il sert de base de lancement pour
s'envoler d'une planète.[newpage]
Place-toi à proximité et [setfontcol red]agite [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote]
pour voyager à travers les étoiles.[newpage]
Allez! Envole-toi vers les [setfontcol red]galaxies[setfontcol default]![pause]
Je te souhaite de tout cœur de
réussir...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.UsSpanish:
Esto es un [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Anillo Estelar[setfontcol default]. ¡[setfontcol red]Agita
[setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] cuando estés cerca de uno y
saldrás disparado como un cometa![newpage]
¡Vamos! ¡Comienza tu [setfontcol red]viaje galáctico[setfontcol default]![pause]
¡Te deseo la mejor suerte del cosmos!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.EuSpanish:
Esto es un [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]Anillo estelar[setfontcol default].
Sirve para saltar a
otras estrellas y planetas.[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Sacude [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] cuando estés cerca.[pause]
¡Así saldrás disparado![newpage]
¡Vamos! ¡Comienza tu [setfontcol red]viaje galáctico[setfontcol default]![pause]
¡Te deseo la mejor suerte del cosmos!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.EuGerman:
Das ist ein [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Sternenring[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Er ist eine Abschussrampe, um auf 
andere Sterne zu fliegen.[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Schüttele [setfontcol default]die [icon WiiRemote] in seiner Reichweite.[newpage]
Er ruft dich zu einer Reise zu den 
Sternen.[newpage]
Nun! Auf zu den [setfontcol red]Galaxien[setfontcol default]!!! Möge das
Glück auf deiner Seite sein...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.EuItalian:
Questa è una [setfontcol red]Stella Lancio[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar].
È come una rampa di lancio per
viaggiare fra i pianeti.[newpage]
Quando ti trovi nelle sue vicinanze,
[setfontcol red]scuoti[setfontcol default] [icon WiiRemote] e volerai come un razzo![newpage]
Vai... l'[setfontcol red]universo[setfontcol default] ti aspetta!!![pause]
Che la fortuna ti accompagni!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.JpJapanese:
これは　[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]スターリング[setfontcol default]と[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]って、
[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]を[ruby base]飛[ruby top]と[ruby end]び[ruby base]出[ruby top]だ[ruby end]すための　[ruby base]発射台[ruby top]はっしゃだい[ruby end]です[newpage]
そばで　[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]を　ふって[setfontcol default]ください[pause]
あなたを[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]の[ruby base]旅[ruby top]たび[ruby end]に　いざないます[newpage]
さあ！　[setfontcol red][ruby base]銀河の世界[ruby top]ギャラクシー[ruby end][setfontcol default]へ！！[pause]
ご[ruby base]武運[ruby top]ぶうん[ruby end]を　お[ruby base]祈[ruby top]いの[ruby end]りしております…
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico009.KrKorean:
이건 [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]스타링[setfontcol default]이라고 하는데
별을 여행하도록 도와주는 발사대예요[newpage]
가까이 다가가서 [icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]을[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]흔들어[setfontcol default] 주세요[pause]
당신을 별의 여행에 초대합니다[newpage]
자! [setfontcol red]갤럭시의 세계[setfontcol default]에 어서 오세요!![pause]
당신의 행운을 빌어 드릴게요…

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.UsEnglish:
Go on! Go up to the [setfontcol red][icon LaunchStar] Launch Star
[setfontcol default]and [setfontcol red]shake[setfontcol default] [icon WiiRemote]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.EuEnglish:
Go on! Go up to the [setfontcol red][icon LaunchStar] Launch Star
[setfontcol default]and [setfontcol red]shake[setfontcol default] [icon WiiRemote]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.EuDutch:
Go on! Go up to the [setfontcol red][icon LaunchStar] Launch Star
[setfontcol default]and [setfontcol red]shake[setfontcol default] [icon WiiRemote]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.UsFrench:
Allez! Approche-toi du [setfontcol red][icon LaunchStar] Super 
Anneau Étoile [setfontcol default]et [setfontcol red]secoue [setfontcol default]la [icon WiiRemote]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.EuFrench:
Allez! Approche-toi de l'[setfontcol red]anneau
étoile[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar] et [setfontcol red]agite [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.UsSpanish:
¡Adelante! ¡Acércate al [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Anillo
Estelar [setfontcol default]y [setfontcol red]agita[setfontcol default] [icon WiiRemote]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.EuSpanish:
Acércate al [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]Anillo estelar[setfontcol default] y
[setfontcol red]sacude [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote]. ¡Adelante!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.EuGerman:
Nun! Nähere dich dem [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol red]Sternenring[setfontcol default]
und [setfontcol red]schüttele [setfontcol default]die [icon WiiRemote]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.EuItalian:
Su! Vai sulla [setfontcol red]Stella Lancio[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar]
e [setfontcol red]scuoti[setfontcol default] [icon WiiRemote]!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.JpJapanese:
さあ！　[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]スターリング[setfontcol default]に[ruby base]近[ruby top]ちか[ruby end]づいて、
[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]を　ふって[setfontcol default]ください！
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico010.KrKorean:
자! [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol red]스타링[setfontcol default]에 다가가서
[icon WiiRemote]을 [setfontcol red]흔들어[setfontcol default] 주세요!

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.UsEnglish:
Wow...[pause] Mama must really trust you.[newpage]
Well, how about this?
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.EuEnglish:
Wow...[pause] Mama must really trust you.[newpage]
Well, how about this?
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.EuDutch:
Wow...[pause] Mama must really trust you.[newpage]
Well, how about this?
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.UsFrench:
Ha... on dirait que Maman
te fait confiance.[newpage]
Alors, qu'est-ce que
tu dirais d'un défi?
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.EuFrench:
Humpf... Hé, toi![pause] On dirait que maman
te fait confiance...[newpage]
Alors, qu'est-ce que tu dirais d'un
défi?
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.UsSpanish:
Vaya... Parece que mamá confía en ti.[newpage]
Entonces, ¿qué te parece esto?
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.EuSpanish:
Mmmm...[pause]
Parece que mamá confía mucho en ti.[newpage]
Entonces, creo que ya puedes probar
una cosita muy interesante.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.EuGerman:
Hmmm, es scheint, dass Mama dir
vertraut.[newpage]
Tja, wie schaut's hiermit aus?
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.EuItalian:
Hmmm...[pause] Sembra che la mamma si fidi
di te. E allora... che ne dici di provare
questo?
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.JpJapanese:
フン…　アンタ、[pause]
ちょっとは　ママから[ruby base]信用[ruby top]しんよう[ruby end]されてるようね[newpage]
じゃあ、これなら　どうかしら？
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico101.KrKorean:
흠…[pause]
넌 엄마의 사랑을 많이 받고 있구나[newpage]
그럼 이건 어때?

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico102.UsEnglish:
If you grab all [setfontcol red]100[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple] Purple Coins
[setfontcol default]here, then you'll earn my trust too.

[setfontcol default]here, then you'll earn my trust too.

[setfontcol default]here, then you'll earn my trust too.

Pièces Violettes [setfontcol default]qui sont[setfontcol purple] [setfontcol default]ici, moi

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico102.EuFrench:

[setfontcol purple]pièces violettes[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin] qui sont ici,

Púrpuras[setfontcol default], yo también confiaré en ti.

Coge [setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol default][icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]monedas púrpura[setfontcol default] y yo

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico102.EuGerman:
Wenn du die [setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol default][icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]lila Münzen [setfontcol default]hier

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico102.EuItalian:
Se prendi tutte e [setfontcol red]100[setfontcol default] le [setfontcol purple]Monete Viola

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico102.JpJapanese:
ここの[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]パープルコイン　[setfontcol red]100[ruby base]枚[ruby top]まい[ruby end][setfontcol default]、

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico103.EuFrench:
Humpf... Tu te débrouilles pas trop
mal...
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico103.EuSpanish:
Vaya, ¡eres mejor
de lo que creía!

HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.UsEnglish:
This is a [setfontcol red]Red Star[setfontcol default].[pause] It holds the
power of the Red Lumas.[newpage]
But the really amazing part about it
is, it allows you to [setfontcol red]fly [setfontcol default]after you [setfontcol blue]spin
in midair[setfontcol default]. Yes, FLY![newpage]
While pressing [icon Abtn], you can [setfontcol red]pick the
direction you want to fly[setfontcol default] with [icon ControlStick].[newpage]
If you can collect [setfontcol red]100 [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Purple
Coins[setfontcol default], I'll let you use my power
somewhere else.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Red Stars[setfontcol default][pause] hold the power of the
Red Lumas.[newpage]
But the really amazing part about
them is, they allow you to [setfontcol red]fly [setfontcol default]after
you [setfontcol blue]Spin in midair[setfontcol default]. Yes, FLY![newpage]
While pressing [icon Abtn], you can [setfontcol red]pick the
direction you want to fly[setfontcol default] with [icon ControlStick].[newpage]
If you can collect [setfontcol red]100 [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Purple
Coins[setfontcol default], I'll let you use my power
somewhere else.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.EuDutch:
[setfontcol red]Red Stars[setfontcol default][pause] hold the power of the
Red Lumas.[newpage]
But the really amazing part about
them is, they allow you to [setfontcol red]fly [setfontcol default]after
you [setfontcol blue]Spin in midair[setfontcol default]. Yes, FLY![newpage]
While pressing [icon Abtn], you can [setfontcol red]pick the

Coins[setfontcol default], I'll let you use my power
somewhere else.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.UsFrench:
Voici une [setfontcol red]Étoile Rouge[setfontcol default],[pause] elle 
renferme le pouvoir des Chikos 
Rouges.[newpage]
Le truc incroyable est qu'elle 
te permet de [setfontcol red]t'envoler [setfontcol default]si tu 
tourbillonnes[setfontcol red] [setfontcol blue]en plein ciel[setfontcol default]. T'envoler![newpage]
Tout en appuyant sur [icon Abtn], tu peux 
[setfontcol red]changer de direction avec[setfontcol default] le [icon ControlStick].[newpage]
Si tu parviens à ramasser [setfontcol red]100 [icon PurpleCoin] 
[setfontcol purple]Pièces Violettes[setfontcol default], je te laisserai le 
faire en dehors, aussi!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.EuFrench:
Cette [setfontcol red]étoile rouge[setfontcol default] renferme notre
pouvoir.[pause] [setfontcol blue]Tournoie en sautant[setfontcol default] et tu
[setfontcol red]t'envoleras[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Maintiens [icon Abtn] et incline [icon ControlStick] pour
[setfontcol red]changer de direction[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Si tu parviens à ramasser [setfontcol red]100[setfontcol default] [setfontcol purple]pièces
violettes [setfontcol default][icon PurpleCoin], alors moi aussi je
t'accorderai ma confiance!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.UsSpanish:
Esta es una [setfontcol red]Estrella Roja[setfontcol default],[pause] y contiene
el poder de los Destellos Rojos.[newpage]
Te permite [setfontcol red]volar[setfontcol default] por el cielo después
de [setfontcol blue]girar en el aire[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Mientras oprimes [icon Abtn], podrás [setfontcol red]elegir
la dirección en la que quieres volar[setfontcol default]
con [icon ControlStick].[newpage]
¡Si puedes encontrar [setfontcol red]100 [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Monedas
Púrpuras[setfontcol default], también te permitiré usar
mi poder fuera de aquí!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.EuSpanish:
Las [setfontcol red]estrellas rojas[setfontcol default] encierran nuestras
energías. Te permiten [setfontcol red]salir volando
[setfontcol default]si haces un [setfontcol blue]Giro[setfontcol default] en el aire.[newpage]
Mantén pulsado [icon Abtn], y usa [icon ControlStick]
para [setfontcol red]dirigirte [setfontcol default]a donde quieras.[newpage]
Si eres capaz de coger
[setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol default][icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]monedas púrpura[setfontcol default],
reconoceré tus cualidades.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.EuGerman:
Das ist ein [setfontcol red]roter Stern[setfontcol default]. Ihm wohnt 
unsere Kraft inne.[newpage]
Wenn du [setfontcol blue]in der Luft einen Dreher 
ausführst[setfontcol default], kannst du [setfontcol red]durch den 
Himmel fliegen[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Drücke [icon Abtn] und [setfontcol red]bestimme die 
Richtung[setfontcol default], in die du fliegen willst, mit
dem [icon ControlStick]![newpage]
Wenn du alle [setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol default][icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]lila Münzen [setfontcol default]
gesammelt hast, erlaube ich dir, den
[setfontcol red]roten Stern [setfontcol default]auch woanders zu nutzen.
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.EuItalian:
Le [setfontcol red]Stelle Rosse [setfontcol default]detengono il nostro
potere.[newpage]
Ti permettono di [setfontcol red]solcare i cieli [setfontcol default]dopo
aver eseguito una [setfontcol blue]piroetta in aria[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Premi [icon Abtn] e [setfontcol red]decidi la direzione
in cui vuoi volare[setfontcol default] con [icon ControlStick].[newpage]
Se riesci a prendere [setfontcol red]100[setfontcol purple] Monete Vio-
la [setfontcol default][icon PurpleCoin], riconoscerò il tuo valore!
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.JpJapanese:
これは、アタイ[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]の[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]が[ruby base]宿[ruby top]やど[ruby end]る　[setfontcol red]レッドスター[pause][setfontcol default]
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]空中[ruby top]くうちゅう[ruby end]でスピン[setfontcol default]すれば[setfontcol red][ruby base]空[ruby top]そら[ruby end]を[ruby base]飛[ruby top]と[ruby end]べる[setfontcol default]し、[newpage]
[icon Abtn]を[ruby base]押[ruby top]お[ruby end]しながら[icon ControlStick]で
[ruby base]進[ruby top]すす[ruby end]みたい[setfontcol red][ruby base]方向[ruby top]ほうこう[ruby end]を[ruby base]決[ruby top]き[ruby end]められる[setfontcol default]わ[newpage]
これで[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]パープルコイン　[setfontcol red]100[ruby base]枚[ruby top]まい[ruby end][setfontcol default][ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]れたら、
アタイも[ruby base]認[ruby top]みと[ruby end]めてあげる！
HeavensDoorMysteriousZone_Tico104.KrKorean:
이것은 우리들의 힘이 잠들어 있는 [setfontcol red]레드스타[pause][setfontcol default]
[setfontcol blue]공중에서 스핀[setfontcol default]하면 [setfontcol red]하늘을 날 수 있고[setfontcol default][newpage]
[icon Abtn]를 누른 상태에서 [icon ControlStick]을 조작하면
진행 [setfontcol red]방향을 정할 수 있어[setfontcol default][newpage]
네가 [icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]퍼플코인 [setfontcol red]100개[setfontcol default]를 모으면
나도 인정해 줄게!

they're stunned, just [setfontcol blue]run into them[setfontcol default]!

HeavensDoorSmallZone_Tico002.EuSpanish:

HeavensDoorSmallZone_Tico002.EuGerman:

[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]을[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]흔들어 스핀[setfontcol default]![pause]
적이 [setfontcol blue]기절하면 몸으로 치세요[setfontcol default]!

HellBallZone_SignBoard001.UsEnglish:
Hey! My name is [setfontcol blue]Bill Board[setfontcol default]![pause] Say,
have we met somewhere before?[newpage]
Anyway, you'll need to hop on that
[setfontcol blue]ball[setfontcol default] to get through here.[pause] Once you're
on, [setfontcol red]hold up[setfontcol default] your [icon WiiRemote]![newpage]
Then [setfontcol red]tilt [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] to [setfontcol red]move around[setfontcol default] and
press [icon Abtn] to [setfontcol red]jump[setfontcol default]![pause] Try not to fall in
any holes!

HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen001.UsEnglish:

bravery, New Bee. [pause]We trust that we
may rely on you in the future!

bravery, New Bee. [pause]We trust that we
may rely on you in the future!

bravery, New Bee. [pause]We trust that we

bravoure, Nouvelle Abeille.[newpage]
On fera appel à toi si on
a besoin d'autre chose!

Merci à toi, nouveau sujet♪

d'autre chose♪

valentía, Abeja Nueva.[pause] ¡Puede que te
vuelva a pedir ayuda algun día!

Gracias, aprendiz.
Ahora estoy mucho mejor.[newpage]
En caso de volver a requerir
de tu asistencia, te haré llamar.

gleich viel besser!♪[newpage]
Wenn mal wieder etwas ist, kümmere
dich drum, ja?♪

ありがとう、[ruby base]新入[ruby top]しんい[ruby end]りさん♪　すっきりしたわ[pause]

HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.UsEnglish:
And who might you be?[pause] A physician,
we presume?[newpage]
No matter. We are in the most vexing
predicament and require assistance.[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY]The most furious itchiness plagues
our [setfontcol blue]entire being[setfontcol default]![pause] It must be stopped!
Please find the source at once!
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.EuEnglish:
And who might you be?[pause] A physician,
we presume?[newpage]
No matter. We are in the most vexing
predicament and require assistance.[newpage]

And who might you be?[pause] A physician,
we presume?[newpage]
No matter. We are in the most vexing
predicament and require assistance.[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY]The most furious itchiness plagues
our [setfontcol blue]entire being[setfontcol default]![pause] It must be stopped!
Please find the source at once!
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.UsFrench:
Qui serais-tu donc? Un médecin,
nous supposons?[newpage]
Peu importe. Là, nous nous trouvons
dans une situation très délicate et
nous avons besoin de tes services.[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY]Une irritation brûlante infecte notre
[setfontcol blue]être entier[setfontcol default]! Il faut que ça s'arrête!
Trouve l'origine, s'il te plaît!
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.EuFrench:
Tiens, qui es-tu? Un nouveau sujet?[newpage]
Enfin, peu importe. J'ai un service
à te demander.[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY]Ça me gratte [setfontcol blue]un peu partout[setfontcol default]...[pause]
Veux-tu bien jeter un œil?
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.UsSpanish:
¿Quién eres? ¿Un doctor, supongo?
Doctor, necesito tu ayuda.[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY]¡Tengo picazón por [setfontcol blue]todo el cuerpo[setfontcol default]
y hay que detenerla![newpage]
¡Por favor, encuentra la raíz de esta
picazón real!
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.EuSpanish:
¿Qué eres tú?[newpage]
Bah, me da igual, pero me gustaría
que me hicieras un enorme favor.[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY]Tengo un picor muy molesto en
[setfontcol blue]distintas partes del cuerpo[setfontcol default].[newpage]
¿Te importaría echar un vistazo
a ver qué es?
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.EuGerman:
Oh, wer bist du denn?!?[newpage]
Egal wer du bist, ich habe eine Bitte
an dich.[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY]Mich juckt es [setfontcol blue]am ganzen Körper[setfontcol default]...[pause]
Kannst du dir das nicht mal ansehen?
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.EuItalian:
E chi saresti tu?[newpage]
Dopotutto il tuo nome non è importan-
te... L'essenziale è che mi aiuti![newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY]Mi prude [setfontcol blue]tutto il corpo[setfontcol default]![pause]
Ho bisogno di un dottore!
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.JpJapanese:
あら、どちらさん？[newpage]
どなたでもいいけど、ちょっと　たのみがあるの[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY][setfontcol blue][ruby base]体[ruby top]からだ[ruby end]のあちこち[setfontcol default]が　ムズムズするの…[pause]
ちょっと　[ruby base]診[ruby top]み[ruby end]てくれないかしら？
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen002.KrKorean:
어머, 누구시더라?[newpage]
아무나 좋으니까 내 부탁 좀 들어줘[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_HONEYQUEEN_TALK_WORRY][setfontcol blue]몸 여기저기[setfontcol default]가 간지러워…[pause]
봐 주지 않을래?

HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen004.EuGerman:
Ah!♪ Das fühlt sich gut
an...
HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen004.JpJapanese: あン♪　[ruby base]気持[ruby top]きも[ruby end]ちいい…

HoneyQueenZone_HoneyQueen005.JpJapanese: うふふ…　くすぐったい♪

IceMountainZone_Kinopio005.UsEnglish:
The summit.[pause] It is always the pure
essence of challenge that burns in an
adventurer's heart.[newpage]
Leaping from here will take all
the boldness you possess. You better
make sure it's a [setfontcol red]long jump[setfontcol default].

The summit.[pause] It is always the pure
essence of challenge that burns in an
adventurer's heart.[newpage]

make sure it's a [setfontcol red]Long Jump[setfontcol default].

Le sommet.[pause] C'est toujours

IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.UsEnglish:
The [setfontcol blue]water [setfontcol default]here is cold! Really, really
cold. Seriously! If you fall in, it's
going to [setfontcol red]hurt[setfontcol default]!
IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.EuEnglish:
The [setfontcol blue]water [setfontcol default]here is cold! Really, really
cold. Seriously! If you fall in, it's
going to [setfontcol red]hurt[setfontcol default]!

The [setfontcol blue]water [setfontcol default]here is cold! Really, really
cold. Seriously! If you fall in, it's
going to [setfontcol red]hurt[setfontcol default]!
IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.UsFrench:
L'[setfontcol blue]eau[setfontcol default] est FRETTE ici! Archifrette! Si 
tu tombes dedans, ça va [setfontcol red]faire mal[setfontcol default]!
IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.EuFrench:
Dans le coin, l'[setfontcol blue]eau [setfontcol default]est super froide!
[setfontcol red]Fais gaffe [setfontcol default]à ne pas tomber dedans!
IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.UsSpanish:
¡El [setfontcol blue]agua [setfontcol default]está TAN FRÍA que si caes
adentro, te va a [setfontcol red]doler[setfontcol default]!
IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.EuSpanish:
¡[setfontcol blue]AGUA [setfontcol default]AQUÍ CONGELADA!
SI TÚ CAER [setfontcol red]HUYUYUY
IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.EuGerman:
Das [setfontcol blue]Wasser [setfontcol default]hier ist bitterkalt!
Wenn du hineinfällst, steckst du echt
in [setfontcol red]Schwierigkeiten[setfontcol default]!
IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.EuItalian:
Com'è fredda l'[setfontcol blue]acqua[setfontcol default], qui! Se ci
cadi dentro, sentirai che brividi!
IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.JpJapanese:
ここの[setfontcol blue][ruby base]水[ruby top]みず[ruby end][setfontcol default]は　チョー[ruby base]冷[ruby top]つめ[ruby end]たい！
[ruby base]落[ruby top]お[ruby end]ちたら　[setfontcol red]ヤバイ[setfontcol default]！
IceMountainZone_SignBoard000.KrKorean:

IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.UsEnglish:
Hey, old man! Are you practicing how
to [setfontcol blue]skate[setfontcol default] too? Well, why don't we
play a game? Can you catch me?
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.EuEnglish:
Hey, old man! Are you practicing how
to [setfontcol blue]skate[setfontcol default] too? Well, why don't we
play a game? Can you catch me?
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.EuDutch:
Hey, old man! Are you practicing how
to [setfontcol blue]skate[setfontcol default] too? Well, why don't we
play a game? Can you catch me?
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.UsFrench:
Hé, le vieux! Tu pratiques le [setfontcol blue]patinage[setfontcol default] 
aussi? Pourquoi pas jouer à un jeu? 
Peux-tu m'attraper?
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.EuFrench:
Hé, le vieux![pause]
Toi aussi tu t'entraînes à faire du
[setfontcol blue]patin à glace[setfontcol default]?[newpage]
Alors fais la course avec moi![pause]
Tu crois que tu pourras m'attraper?!
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.UsSpanish:
¡Oye, amigo! ¿También sabes [setfontcol blue]patinar[setfontcol default]?
Entonces, ¿por qué no jugamos?
¿Crees que puedes atraparme?
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.EuSpanish:
¡Eh, carroza![pause]
¿Quieres hacer un poco de [setfontcol blue]skate[setfontcol default]?[newpage]
¡Compite conmigo![pause]
¡A ver si puedes atraparme!
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.EuGerman:
Hey, Opa![pause] Übst du auch 
Eisrutschen?[newpage]
Dann lass uns gegeneinander
antreten![pause] Kannst du mich fangen?!?
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.EuItalian:
Ehi![pause] Anche tu stai facendo
esercizio di [setfontcol blue]pattinaggio[setfontcol default]?[newpage]
Allora facciamo una gara!
Prova a prendermi se ce la fai!
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.JpJapanese:
おー、オヤジ！[pause]
オマエも　[setfontcol blue]スケート[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]練習[ruby top]れんしゅう[ruby end]？[newpage]
だったら　オイラと[ruby base]競争[ruby top]きょうそう[ruby end]！[pause]
オイラを　つかまえることが　できるか～？！
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater001.KrKorean:
와, 아저씨![pause]
아저씨도 [setfontcol blue]스케이트[setfontcol default] 연습하러 온 거야?[newpage]
그럼 나랑 시합하자![pause]
나 잡아 봐～라!

IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater002.UsEnglish:
How could one penguin move
SO fast?! ♪
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater002.EuEnglish:
How could one penguin move
SO fast?! ♪
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater002.EuDutch:
How could one penguin move
SO fast?! ♪
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater002.UsFrench:
Comment un pingouin 
pourrait-il se déplacer si VITE? ♪
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater002.UsSpanish:
¿Cómo puede un pingüino
moverse tan rápido? ♪

IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.UsEnglish:
Not bad, old man! With [setfontcol blue]skating [setfontcol default]skills
like that, you might have a chance.
A small chance, maybe, but a chance!
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.EuEnglish:
Not bad, old man! With [setfontcol blue]skating [setfontcol default]skills
like that, you might have a chance.
A small chance, maybe, but a chance!
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.EuDutch:
Not bad, old man! With [setfontcol blue]skating [setfontcol default]skills
like that, you might have a chance.
A small chance, maybe, but a chance!
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.UsFrench:
Pas mal pour un vieux![newpage]
Avec de telles compétences en 
[setfontcol blue]patinage[setfontcol default], tu pourrais avoir une 
chance! Une petite, pareil.
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.EuFrench:
Pas mal pour un vieux![newpage]
Avec autant de [setfontcol blue]technique[setfontcol default], tu devrais
pouvoir t'en sortir, là-bas!
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.UsSpanish:
¡No está mal! Con tu habilidad para
[setfontcol blue]patinar[setfontcol default], puede que tengas una
pequeña posibilidad.
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.EuSpanish:
¡Carroza, eres un fenómeno![newpage]
Con una habilidad como la tuya,
seguro que puedes hacer [setfontcol blue]skate[setfontcol default]
por donde quieras.
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.EuGerman:
Du hast's drauf, Opa![newpage]
Wenn es jemand schaffen kann, dann
du!
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.EuItalian:
Ben fatto![newpage]
Con le abilità di [setfontcol blue]pattinaggio [setfontcol default]che ti
ritrovi potresti avere delle chance!
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.JpJapanese:
やるなー！　オヤジー！[newpage]
オマエなら　この[ruby base]先[ruby top]さき[ruby end]も
[setfontcol blue]スケート[setfontcol default]で　[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]り[ruby base]切[ruby top]き[ruby end]れるかもな！
IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater003.KrKorean:
제법인걸 아저씨![newpage]
이 정도라면 앞으로도
[setfontcol blue]스케이트[setfontcol default]를 타고 헤쳐 나갈 수 있을 거야!

IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater004.UsFrench:

IceRingAZone_PenguinSkater004.EuSpanish:
¡Vamos a echar otra
carrerita un día de estos!

[playsfx SE_BV_KOOPA_TLK_EXCITED][setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]Ouvre bien grand tes
yeux!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuFrench:
... L'heure est enfin venue...[pause]
Il est temps...[newpage]
... de mettre la touche finale à la
grande planète impériale qui sera
le cœur de mon nouvel univers![newpage]
[playsfx SE_BV_KOOPA_TLK_EXCITED][setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]Ouvre bien grand tes
yeux!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.UsSpanish:
Ha llegado el momento.[newpage]
¡Llegaste justo a tiempo para ver la
creación de mi galaxia en el centro
del universo![newpage]
[playsfx SE_BV_KOOPA_TLK_EXCITED][setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]¡FÍJATE BIEN!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuSpanish:
Ha llegado el momento.[newpage]
¡Solo quedan los últimos retoques
al Astro Rey de
mi nuevo espacio cosmogónico![newpage]
[playsfx SE_BV_KOOPA_TLK_EXCITED][setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]¡CONTEMPLA!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuGerman:
Die Zeit ist gekommen.[newpage]
Der [setfontcol yellow]Große Königsstern[setfontcol default], der der Kern
meines neuen Universums sein wird,
nähert sich seiner Vollendung![newpage]
[playsfx SE_BV_KOOPA_TLK_EXCITED][setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]Sieh genau hin!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuItalian:
Ora basta! È arrivato il momento...[newpage]
Adesso attiverò lo stratagemma che
mi farà diventare il re dell'universo![newpage]
[playsfx SE_BV_KOOPA_TLK_EXCITED][setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]Stai a guardare!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.JpJapanese:
…[ruby base]時[ruby top]とき[ruby end]は[ruby base]満[ruby top]み[ruby end]ちた[newpage]
ワガハイの　[ruby base]新[ruby top]あたら[ruby end]しい[ruby base]宇宙[ruby top]うちゅう[ruby end]の[ruby base]核[ruby top]かく[ruby end]となる
[ruby base]大王星[ruby top]だいおうせい[ruby end]の[ruby base]仕上[ruby top]しあ[ruby end]げにかかるのだ！[newpage]
[playsfx SE_BV_KOOPA_TLK_EXCITED][setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]これを　[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]るがよい！
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.KrKorean:
…때가 왔다[newpage]
나의 새로운 우주, 그 중심이 될

[playsfx SE_BV_KOOPA_TLK_EXCITED][setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]똑똑히 봐라!

KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.UsEnglish:
From this galaxy, I'll rule a [setfontcol blue]great
galactic empire[setfontcol default] with Peach by my
side. It will last forever![newpage]
I will rule every pitiful corner of
the universe.[newpage]
So, [player_ml_normal], as you can see, I got big
plans. And stomping you is at the
top of my list!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuEnglish:
From this galaxy, I'll rule a [setfontcol blue]great
galactic empire[setfontcol default] with Peach by my
side. It will last forever![newpage]
I will rule every pitiful corner of
the universe.[newpage]
So, [player_ml_normal], as you can see, I got big

KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuDutch:
From this galaxy, I'll rule a [setfontcol blue]great
galactic empire[setfontcol default] with Peach by my
side. It will last forever![newpage]
I will rule every pitiful corner of
the universe.[newpage]
So, [player_ml_normal], as you can see, I got big
plans. And stomping you is at the
top of my list!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.UsFrench:
À partir de cette galaxie, je régnerai
sur un [setfontcol blue]Grand Empire Galactique[setfontcol default] avec
Peach à mes côtés.[newpage]
Il durera à jamais! L'univers 
entier sera à moi![newpage]
Comme tu peux le voir, [player_ml_normal], j'ai
de grands plans. La prochaine étape,
tu dis? Je vais t'écrabouiller!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuFrench:
Autour de cette étoile, avec Peach,
je vais bâtir notre [setfontcol blue]Grand Empire
Galactique [setfontcol default]Millénaire![newpage]
Et tel un nouveau big-bang, mon
empire s'étendra bientôt dans tout
l'univers![newpage]
Mais avant cela, [player_ml_normal]...[pause] je vais te
faire disparaître!
Une bonne fois pour toutes!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.UsSpanish:
Desde esta galaxia, gobernaré un
[setfontcol blue]gran imperio galáctico[setfontcol default] junto con
Peach. ¡Perdurará milenios![newpage]
Mi imperio se extenderá a todos los
rincones del universo.[newpage]
¿Lo ves? ¡[player_ml_normal]![pause] Tengo planes
muy interesantes. ¡Así que te enviaré
a otra dimensión!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuSpanish:
¡Edificaré un [setfontcol blue]Imperio Galáctico[setfontcol default] que
perdurará milenios! ¡Y lo gobernaré
junto a Peach desde esta estrella![newpage]
¡Será el centro de MI imperio![newpage]
¡Mis dominios se extenderán como el
Big Bang a todo el espacio conocido![newpage]
¡Y he de asegurarme de que tú,
[player_ml_normal], desaparezcas de la faz
del espacio!
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuGerman:
Mit diesem Stern im Zentrum werde 
ich zusammen mit Peach mein 10 000
Jahre währendes [newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Großes Galaxie-Imperium [setfontcol default]errichten![newpage]
Und mein Imperium wird sich wie der 
Urknall im ganzen Universum 
ausbreiten![newpage]
Und das heißt: [player_ml_normal], du musst
zuerst aus dem Weg geräumt werden!
Das verstehst du doch, oder?!?
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.EuItalian:
Partendo da questa stella io e Peach
costruiremo un [setfontcol blue]megaimpero galattico
[setfontcol default]che durerà 10000 anni![newpage]
Il mio impero si allargherà ad ogni
angolo dell'universo.[newpage]
Senti, [player_ml_normal]![pause] Perché non mi fai
il piacere di sparire, così mi posso
occupare dei miei progetti?
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.JpJapanese:
この[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]を[ruby base]中心[ruby top]ちゅうしん[ruby end]に　ワガハイはピーチと[ruby base]共[ruby top]とも[ruby end]に
[ruby base]一万年[ruby top]いちまんねん[ruby end]の[setfontcol blue][ruby base]大銀河[ruby top]だいぎんが[ruby end][ruby base]帝国[ruby top]ていこく[ruby end][setfontcol default]を[ruby base]築[ruby top]きず[ruby end]くのだ！[newpage]
そして、ワガハイの[ruby base]帝国[ruby top]ていこく[ruby end]は　ビッグバンのように
[ruby base]全[ruby top]ぜん[ruby end][ruby base]宇宙[ruby top]うちゅう[ruby end]に　[ruby base]広[ruby top]ひろ[ruby end]がっていくのだ！[newpage]
だから　[player_ml_normal]よ！[pause]　その[ruby base]前[ruby top]まえ[ruby end]に　オマエは
この[ruby base]場[ruby top]ば[ruby end]で　[ruby base]消[ruby top]き[ruby end]えねばならん！　[ruby base]分[ruby top]わ[ruby end]かるな…？
KoopaBattleVs3BossZone_DemoKoopaVs3Start.KrKorean:
이 별을 중심으로, 나는 피치와 함께
1만 년의 [setfontcol blue]대은하 제국[setfontcol default]을 만들 것이다![newpage]
그리고 나의 제국은
빅뱅처럼 전 우주로 퍼지는 것이지![newpage]
그러니까 [player_ml_normal]![pause] 그 전에 네 녀석은
여기에서 사라져 줘야겠다! 알아 들었느냐…?

KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.UsEnglish:
Mama says this fight isn't just
for us, it's also about saving
your [setfontcol red]special one[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Please be careful![pause] Whatever you
do...DON'T FAIL!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.EuEnglish:
Mama says this fight isn't just
for us, it's also about saving
your [setfontcol red]special one[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Please be careful![pause] Whatever you
do...DON'T FAIL!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.EuDutch:
Mama says this fight isn't just
for us, it's also about saving
your [setfontcol red]special one[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Please be careful![pause] Whatever you
do...DON'T FAIL!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.UsFrench:
J'ai demandé à Maman.[newpage]
Ce n'est pas que pour nous que tu
te bats, mais aussi pour sauver [setfontcol red]celle
qui t'est chère[setfontcol default],[setfontcol red] [setfontcol default][player_ml_normal].[newpage]
Fais bien attention![pause] Et surtout... NE
LÂCHE PAS LA PATATE!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.EuFrench:
Maman m'a expliqué.[pause]
Tu ne te bats pas que pour nous,
[player_ml_normal],[newpage]
mais aussi pour sauver [setfontcol red]celle qui
occupe tes pensées[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
Fais bien attention...[pause]
Et surtout, surtout, tu dois gagner!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.UsSpanish:
Mamá me lo dijo.[newpage]
Sé que todo esto no es solo por
nosotros, también para salvar a tu
[setfontcol red]ser querido[setfontcol default]. [player_ml_normal].[newpage]
Ten mucho cuidado...[pause] Y, por lo que
más quieras, ¡NO FALLES!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.EuSpanish:
Mamá me ha contado todo.[newpage]
Esta lucha no es solo por la paz del
universo, sino también para salvar a
la [setfontcol red]persona que más quieres[setfontcol default], [player_ml_normal].[newpage]
Ten mucho cuidado.[pause]
¡No dejes que nadie te derrote!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.EuGerman:
Ich habe Mama gefragt.[newpage]
Du kämpfst nicht nur für uns, 
sondern auch, um deine 
[setfontcol red]geliebte Person[setfontcol default] zu befreien...[newpage]
Pass gut auf dich auf...[pause] Und was 
auch geschieht, verlier bloß nicht!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.EuItalian:
Ho chiesto alla mamma
e mi ha spiegato che...[newpage]
Questa lotta è per la salvezza non
solo dell'[setfontcol blue]universo[setfontcol default], ma anche della [setfontcol red]tua
amica[setfontcol default], [player_ml_normal]...[newpage]
Per favore, fai attenzione...[pause]
E non farti battere!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.JpJapanese:
ママに[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]きました[pause]
この[ruby base]戦[ruby top]たたか[ruby end]いはボクらのためだけでなく[newpage]
[player_ml_normal]さんの　[setfontcol red][ruby base]想[ruby top]おも[ruby end]い[ruby base]人[ruby top]びと[ruby end][setfontcol default]を[ruby base]救[ruby top]すく[ruby end]うための
[ruby base]戦[ruby top]たたか[ruby end]いでもあるんですね…[newpage]
どうか　お[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]をつけて…[pause]
そして、ゼッタイゼッタイ　[ruby base]負[ruby top]ま[ruby end]けないで！
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico000.KrKorean:
엄마에게 들었어요[pause]
이 싸움은 우리뿐만 아니라[newpage]
[player_ml_normal]님의 [setfontcol red]소중한 사람[setfontcol default]을 구하기 위한
싸움이기도 하군요…[newpage]
부디 조심하세요…[pause]
그리고 절대로 절대로 지면 안 돼요!

KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico001.UsEnglish:
Those [setfontcol yellow]spotlights[setfontcol default] have their own
[setfontcol blue]gravity[setfontcol default].[pause] Try sticking to them!

[setfontcol blue]gravity[setfontcol default].[pause] Try sticking to them!

Ces [setfontcol yellow]endroits illuminés[setfontcol default] sont à l'origine 
de la [setfontcol blue]gravité[setfontcol default]![pause] Essaie de te cantonner

KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico001.EuFrench:
Ce sont ces [setfontcol yellow]endroits illuminés[setfontcol default] qui
sont à l'origine de la [setfontcol blue]gravité[setfontcol default].[pause]
Utilise-les pour avancer!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico001.UsSpanish:
Esos [setfontcol yellow]círculos luminosos [setfontcol default]tienen
[setfontcol blue]gravedad[setfontcol default].[pause] Síguelos.
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico001.EuSpanish:
Esos [setfontcol yellow]círculos luminosos
[setfontcol default]tienen [setfontcol blue]gravedad[setfontcol default].[pause] Síguelos.
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico001.EuGerman:
Diese [setfontcol yellow]Lichtkegel [setfontcol default]haben ihre eigene [setfontcol yellow]
[setfontcol blue]Gravitation[setfontcol default]![pause] Folge ihnen!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico001.EuItalian:
La [setfontcol blue]forza di gravità[setfontcol default] ha origine da
quei [setfontcol yellow]fasci di luce[setfontcol default].[pause] Devi seguirli!
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico001.JpJapanese:
あの[setfontcol yellow][ruby base]光[ruby top]ひか[ruby end]ってる[ruby base]部分[ruby top]ぶぶん[ruby end][setfontcol default]に　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]重力[ruby top]じゅうりょく[ruby end][setfontcol default]が[ruby base]発生[ruby top]はっせい[ruby end]してます！[pause]
そこを　たどって[ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]ってください！
KoopaBattleVs3StartZone_Tico001.KrKorean:
저기 [setfontcol yellow]반짝이는 곳[setfontcol default]에는 [setfontcol blue]중력[setfontcol default]이 존재해요![pause]
그곳을 이용해서 가세요!

KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.UsEnglish:
You just don't give up! Fine, then. I
guess I'll just whup you myself![newpage]
You want this [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star [setfontcol default]so bad?
You're gonna have to take it from me!
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.EuEnglish:
You just don't give up! Fine, then. I
guess I'll just whup you myself![newpage]
You want this [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star [setfontcol default]so bad?
You're gonna have to take it from me!
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.EuDutch:
You just don't give up! Fine, then. I
guess I'll just whup you myself![newpage]
You want this [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star [setfontcol default]so bad?
You're gonna have to take it from me!
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.UsFrench:
Tu n'abandonnes jamais! Bon, je 
m'occupe de te tabasser![newpage]
Si tu veux cette [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grande Étoile[setfontcol default], 
tu vas devoir me la prendre!
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.EuFrench:
Tu es vraiment coriace! Puisque c'est
comme ça, je vais m'occuper de ton
cas personnellement![newpage]
Tu veux la [setfontcol red]grande étoile[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]?
Alors il faudra me la prendre de
force!
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.UsSpanish:
¿Sigues sin rendirte? ¡Qué pesado!
¡Bien, entonces supongo que tendré 
que destruirte yo mismo![newpage]
¿Quieres esta [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Maxiestrella[setfontcol default]?
¡Tendrás que venir a quitármela!
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.EuSpanish:
¡Eres un plasta!
¡No me dejas otra!
¡Tengo que acabar contigo![newpage]
¡Ven y quítame la [icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]Maxiestrella[setfontcol default]
por la fuerza si puedes!
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.EuGerman:
Du gibst wohl nie auf! Dann muss ich
dich eben persönlich plattwalzen![newpage]
Wenn du den [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Großen Stern [setfontcol default]haben
willst, dann versuch doch, ihn zu
erbeuten!
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.EuItalian:
Non molli tanto facilmente, eh? Allora
mi occuperò direttamente io di te![newpage]
Vuoi veramente la [setfontcol red]Megastella[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]?
Allora vieni a prenderla!
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.JpJapanese:
しつこいヤツだなー！
こうなったら　ボクが[ruby base]直接[ruby top]ちょくせつ[ruby end]　ぶったおしてやる！[newpage]
[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]グランドスター[setfontcol default]が[ruby base]欲[ruby top]ほ[ruby end]しいなら、
[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]ずくで　うばってみろ！
KoopaJrShipBattleLv1Tmp1Zone_KoopaJr000.KrKorean:
끈질긴 녀석이군!
이렇게 된 이상 내가 직접 상대해 주마![newpage]
[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]그랜드스타[setfontcol default]를 갖고 싶다면
어디 한번 덤벼 봐라!

KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.UsEnglish:
[player_ml_normal]! You finally made it! I was
starting to worry.
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.EuEnglish:
[player_ml_normal]! You finally made it! I was
starting to worry.
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.EuDutch:
[player_ml_normal]! You finally made it! I was
starting to worry.
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.UsFrench:
[player_ml_normal]! Alors, tu es enfin arrivé! 
Mon cœur battait la chamade à cause
de ces soucis.
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.EuFrench:
[player_ml_normal]! Te voilà enfin![pause]
... Je suis si excité que mon petit
cœur est sur le point d'exploser!
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.UsSpanish:
¡[player_ml_normal]! ¡Por fin llegaste hasta aquí!
No podía dejar de preocuparme...
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.EuSpanish:
¡[player_ml_normal]! ¡Por fin![pause]
El corazón me late tan fuerte que se
me va a salir del pecho.
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.EuGerman:
[player_ml_normal]! Es ist endlich so weit!
Mein Herz pocht so sehr, als
wolle es zerreißen!
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.EuItalian:
[player_ml_normal]! Meno male che ce l'hai
fatta! Stavo fremendo per te...
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.JpJapanese:
[player_ml_normal]さん！　いよいよですね！[pause]
…ドキドキしすぎて　[ruby base]小[ruby top]ちい[ruby end]さな[ruby base]胸[ruby top]むね[ruby end]が　[ruby base]張[ruby top]は[ruby end]りさけそう！
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio001.KrKorean:
[player_ml_normal]님! 때가 왔어요![pause]
…너무 떨려서 작은 심장이 터질 것 같아요!

KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio002.UsFrench:
Tu es enfin arrivé... 
[setfontsize 0]Hou là là...
KoopaJrShipLv1Galaxy_Kinopio002.UsSpanish:
Por fin estás aquí..
[setfontsize 0]Oh, qué bien...

Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.UsEnglish:
Bro! I got a star, but now I
can't get back. This picture
shows where I am! HELP ME!
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.EuEnglish:
Bro! I got a star, but now I
can't get back. This picture
shows where I am! HELP ME!
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.EuDutch:
Bro! I got a star, but now I
can't get back. This picture
shows where I am! HELP ME!
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.UsFrench:
Hé, frérot! J'ai trouvé une étoile
mais je suis coincé! Regarde
la photo et viens m'aider!
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.EuFrench:
J'ai trouvé une super étoile,
mais je suis coincé! Regarde
la photo et viens m'aider!
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.UsSpanish:
Encontré la estrella, pero no
puedo volver. Estoy en el
lugar de la foto. ¡AYÚDAME!
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.EuSpanish:
¡Hola! ¡He encontrado una estrella,
pero ahora no puedo volver!
Estoy donde la foto.
¡Ven a ayudarme!
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.EuGerman:
Ich hab den Stern, aber jetzt
komme ich nicht mehr 
zurück... Das Foto hilft dir, 
mich zu finden.
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.EuItalian:
Ho trovato la Superstella,
ma non riesco a tornare...
Vieni ad aiutarmi!
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.JpJapanese:
パワースターを[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]つけたけど
[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]れなくなっちゃった…
[ruby base]写真[ruby top]しゃしん[ruby end]の[ruby base]場所[ruby top]ばしょ[ruby end]にいるから　[ruby base]助[ruby top]たす[ruby end]けに[ruby base]来[ruby top]き[ruby end]て！
Layout_LuigiLetterLuigiTxt.KrKorean:
파워스타는 찾았는데 갈 수가 없어…

Layout_PeachLetterMiniBody.UsEnglish:
I'll be waiting for you at the
castle on the night of the
Star Festival. There's
something I'd like to give you.
Layout_PeachLetterMiniBody.EuEnglish:
I'll be waiting for you at the
castle on the night of the
Star Festival. There's
something I'd like to give you.

I'll be waiting for you at the
castle on the night of the
Star Festival. There's
something I'd like to give you.

Je vous attendrai au

des Étoiles. J'ai quelque
chose à vous remettre.
Layout_PeachLetterMiniBody.EuFrench:
Je t'attendrai au château,

Layout_PeachLetterMiniBody.UsSpanish:
En la noche del Festival de

Layout_PeachLetterMiniBody.EuSpanish:
La noche del Festival de las
Estrellas, te espero en el

Ich warte am Abend des

Layout_PeachLetterMiniBody.EuItalian:
raggiungimi al castello la
sera del Festival delle
Stelle. Ho qualcosa per te.
Layout_PeachLetterMiniBody.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くず[ruby base]祭[ruby top]まつり[ruby end]の[ruby base]夜[ruby top]よる[ruby end]にお[ruby base]城[ruby top]しろ[ruby end]で[ruby base]待[ruby top]ま[ruby end]ってます。
わたしたい[ruby base]物[ruby top]もの[ruby end]があるの。
Layout_PeachLetterMiniBody.KrKorean:
별 축제날 밤에

드릴 선물이 있거든요.
