Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.UsEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]Every hundred years, a comet
appears in the skies above the
Mushroom Kingdom.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.EuEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]Every hundred years, a comet
appears in the skies above the
Mushroom Kingdom.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.EuDutch:
[setwindowtype 3]Every hundred years, a comet
appears in the skies above the
Mushroom Kingdom.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.UsFrench:
[setwindowtype 3]Tous les cent ans, une comète
apparaît dans le ciel au-dessus
du Royaume Champignon.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.EuFrench:
Cette année-là, au-dessus du
royaume Champignon, apparut
une comète qui couvrit le
firmament.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.UsSpanish:
[setwindowtype 3]Cada cien años, un cometa
pasa por el cielo del Reino
Champiñón.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.EuSpanish:
Cada cien años, un cometa
gigantesco pasa cubriendo
el cielo del Reino Champiñón.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.EuGerman:
Es gab einmal einen Kometen, der
war so groß, dass er den Himmel
über dem Pilz-Königreich füllte.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.EuItalian:
Quell'anno apparve una cometa
tanto grande da sovrastare tutto
il cielo nel Regno dei Funghi.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.JpJapanese:
その[ruby base]年[ruby top]とし[ruby end]の
キノコ[ruby base]王国[ruby top]おうこく[ruby end]の[ruby base]空[ruby top]そら[ruby end]には、[ruby base]天[ruby top]てん[ruby end]をおおうほどの
[ruby base]大[ruby top]おお[ruby end]きな「ほうき[ruby base]星[ruby top]ぼし[ruby end]」がありました。
Layout_PrologueDemoPro01.KrKorean:
그해 버섯왕국에는
하늘이 안 보일 정도로 커다란
「별똥별」이 떨어졌습니다.

Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.UsEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]The comet was so large one year, it
filled the skies and sent countless
shooting stars raining down.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.EuEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]The comet was so large one year, it
filled the skies and sent countless
shooting stars raining down.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.EuDutch:
[setwindowtype 3]The comet was so large one year, it
filled the skies and sent countless
shooting stars raining down.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.UsFrench:
[setwindowtype 3]Une année, la comète était si
grande qu'elle couvrit le
firmament, et de cette comète
tomba une pluie d'innombrables
étoiles filantes.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.EuFrench:
De cette comète qui revient tous
les cent ans tomba une pluie
d'étoiles filantes...
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.UsSpanish:
[setwindowtype 3]En cierta ocasión, el cometa fue
tan grande que cubrió el cielo y
dejó caer una gran cantidad de
estrellas fugaces.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.EuSpanish:
En cierta ocasión, de aquel
cometa cayó gran cantidad
de polvo de estrellas.
Fue un espectáculo precioso.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.EuGerman:
Von diesem Kometen, der bloß 
ein Mal in hundert Jahren 
auftaucht, regneten zahlreiche 
Sternschnuppen auf die Erde...
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.EuItalian:
La cometa, che si mostrava una
volta ogni cent'anni, rilasciò
una pioggia di stelle cadenti...
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]百年[ruby top]ひゃくねん[ruby end]に[ruby base]一度[ruby top]いちど[ruby end]　[ruby base]訪[ruby top]おとず[ruby end]れる　その「ほうき[ruby base]星[ruby top]ぼし[ruby end]」から
たくさんの[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずが　[ruby base]大地[ruby top]だいち[ruby end]に[ruby base]降[ruby top]ふ[ruby end]りそそぎ…
Layout_PrologueDemoPro02.KrKorean:
백 년에 한 번 찾아온다는
그 「별똥별」에서
많은 별들이 땅으로 떨어졌습니다.

Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.UsEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]The Toads brought the shooting stars
to the castle, where they became
a great Power Star.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.EuEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]The Toads brought the shooting stars
to the castle, where they became
a great Power Star.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.EuDutch:
[setwindowtype 3]The Toads brought the shooting stars
to the castle, where they became
a great Power Star.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.UsFrench:
[setwindowtype 3]Les Toads ramenèrent ces étoiles
filantes au château, où elles se
transformèrent en Super Étoile.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.EuFrench:
Les Toad ramenèrent ces éclats
d'étoiles au château, où ils se
transformèrent en super étoile.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.UsSpanish:
[setwindowtype 3]Los Toad recogieron las estrellas
fugaces y las llevaron al castillo. Allí,
las estrellas se convirtieron en una
gran Superestrella.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.EuSpanish:
Los Toad recogieron todo el
polvo que pudieron para llevarlo
hasta el castillo. Así fue como
nacieron las Superestrellas.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.EuGerman:
Die Sternschnuppen wurden von 
den Toads ins Schloss gebracht
und wurden zu einem großen
Power-Stern.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.EuItalian:
I Toad portarono le stelle cadenti 
al loro castello e le riunirono per
dare forma ad una grande
Superstella.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずは、キノピオたちによって　お[ruby base]城[ruby top]しろ[ruby end]にあつめられ
それはそれは　[ruby base]大[ruby top]おお[ruby end]きなパワースターになりました。
Layout_PrologueDemoPro03.KrKorean:
키노피오 친구들이 별을 성으로 가져왔고
별은 커다란 파워스타로 다시 태어났습니다.

Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.UsEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]It should have been a very happy
time for the citizens of the
Mushroom Kingdom.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.EuEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]It should have been a very happy
time for the citizens of the
Mushroom Kingdom.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.EuDutch:
[setwindowtype 3]It should have been a very happy
time for the citizens of the
Mushroom Kingdom.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.UsFrench:
[setwindowtype 3]Cela aurait dû être une grande
joie pour les habitants du Royaume
Champignon.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.EuFrench:
Cela aurait dû être une grande
joie pour les habitants du
royaume Champignon...
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.UsSpanish:
[setwindowtype 3]Este debería haber sido un momento
muy feliz para los habitantes del
Reino Champiñón.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.EuSpanish:
Ese acontecimiento traía siempre
gran felicidad al Reino, pero
alguien estaba a punto de
arruinar la armonía existente.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.EuGerman:
Das hätte Anlass zu großer
Freude im Pilz-Königreich
sein sollen...
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.EuItalian:
Dovette essere un evento
davvero meraviglioso...
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.JpJapanese:
キノコ[ruby base]王国[ruby top]おうこく[ruby end]の[ruby base]人[ruby top]ひと[ruby end]たちにとって
とても[ruby base]幸[ruby top]しあわ[ruby end]せなことのはずでした…
Layout_PrologueDemoPro04.KrKorean:
그날은 버섯왕국 사람들에게
행복한 추억이 될 수도 있었습니다.

Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.UsEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]That was the night of the Star
Festival, held once every hundred
years to celebrate the comet.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.EuEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]That was the night of the Star
Festival, held once every hundred
years to celebrate the comet.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.EuDutch:
[setwindowtype 3]That was the night of the Star
Festival, held once every hundred
years to celebrate the comet.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.UsFrench:
[setwindowtype 3]C'était la nuit du Festival des
Étoiles, qui se tient tous les cent
ans en l'honneur des bénédictions
de la comète.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.EuFrench:
C'était la nuit du festival des
éclats d'étoiles, qui se tient tous
les cent ans en l'honneur de la
comète...
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.UsSpanish:
[setwindowtype 3]Esa fue la noche del Festival de
las Estrellas, celebrado una vez
cada cien años.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.EuSpanish:
Nuestra historia empieza en
la noche del Festival de las
Estrellas, celebrado una vez
cada cien años.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.EuGerman:
Es war die Nacht des "Sternen-
staubfestes", welches ein Mal in
100 Jahren stattfindet und den
Segen der Sterne feiert.
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.EuItalian:
Poiché non poteva esserci modo
migliore per celebrare il Festival
delle Stelle, che aveva luogo ogni
cent'anni in onore della cometa...
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.JpJapanese:
それは　[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]のめぐみをお[ruby base]祝[ruby top]いわ[ruby end]いする
[ruby base]百年[ruby top]ひゃくねん[ruby end]に[ruby base]一度[ruby top]いちど[ruby end]の『[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くず[ruby base]祭[ruby top]まつり[ruby end]』の[ruby base]夜[ruby top]よる[ruby end]…
Layout_PrologueDemoPro05.KrKorean:
백 년에 한 번, 하늘이 주는 선물에 감사하는
『별 축제』의 밤….

Layout_StoryDemoKameckTalk000.EuFrench: Toi, écrase-toi au sol et souffre!

Layout_StoryDemoKameckTalk000.JpJapanese: オマエは、[ruby base]地[ruby top]じ[ruby end]ベタで　のたうちまわってろ！

¡Ven a contemplar el nacimiento

Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk001.EuGerman:
Das ist die Geburt der neuen

Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk001.JpJapanese: ワガハイの[ruby base]作[ruby top]つく[ruby end]る、[ruby base]新[ruby top]あたら[ruby end]しい[ruby base]銀河[ruby top]ぎんが[ruby end]の[ruby base]誕生[ruby top]たんじょう[ruby end]に

Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk002.UsEnglish: To the creation of my new galaxy!
Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk002.EuEnglish: To the creation of my new galaxy!
Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk002.EuDutch: To the creation of my new galaxy!
Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk002.EuFrench:

¡A la creación de mi nueva

Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk002.EuGerman:

Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk002.EuItalian:

Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk002.JpJapanese: [ruby base]立[ruby top]た[ruby end]ち[ruby base]会[ruby top]あ[ruby end]ってもらうぞ！！

Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk003.EuSpanish: ¡A mí el poder de las estrellas!
Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk003.EuGerman:
Bedanke dich bei den

Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk003.JpJapanese: [ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずの[ruby base]恵[ruby top]めぐ[ruby end]みに[ruby base]感謝[ruby top]かんしゃ[ruby end]を！！
Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk003.KrKorean: 별을 내려 주는 하늘의 은총에 감사하라!!

Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk005.EuItalian: Il mio universo! Le mie galassie!
Layout_StoryDemoKoopaTalk005.JpJapanese: ワガハイの[ruby base]銀河[ruby top]ぎんが[ruby end]が！　[ruby base]宇宙[ruby top]うちゅう[ruby end]が！！

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.UsEnglish:
There is a warp field
inside the castle!
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.EuEnglish:
There is a warp field
inside the castle!
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.EuDutch:
There is a warp field
inside the castle!
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.UsFrench:
Il y a un tourbillon
dans le château!
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.EuFrench:
L'intérieur du château est relié
à une autre dimension!
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.UsSpanish:
¡El interior del castillo está
comunicado con el otro espacio!
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.EuSpanish:
¡El interior del castillo está
comunicado con el otro espacio!
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.EuGerman:
Über das Schloss gelangst du an

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.EuItalian:
Fatti largo fra le anomalie

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.JpJapanese: お[ruby base]城[ruby top]しろ[ruby end]の[ruby base]中[ruby top]なか[ruby end]は[ruby base]異[ruby top]い[ruby end][ruby base]空間[ruby top]くうかん[ruby end]へと　つながっています！
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk000.KrKorean: 성 안은 다른 세계와 이어져 있어요!

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk001.JpJapanese: [ruby base]新[ruby top]あたら[ruby end]しい[ruby base]命[ruby top]いのち[ruby end]には

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk002.UsFrench:
... hérite de la mémoire

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk002.EuFrench:

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk002.UsSpanish:
Hereda la esencia de las

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk002.EuSpanish: la memoria del polvo de estrellas.
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk002.EuItalian:
Verrà tramandato il ricordo delle

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk002.JpJapanese: 「[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずの[ruby base]記憶[ruby top]きおく[ruby end]」が　[ruby base]引[ruby top]ひ[ruby end]きつがれています

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk003.EuFrench: C'est aussi le cas pour vous.
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk003.EuSpanish: Vosotros ya sois parte de ella.
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk003.JpJapanese: そして　それは、あなたたちにも

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk004.EuSpanish:
Gracias por todo. Ahora puedo
continuar mi cometido.

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.UsEnglish:
I will watch over you from
beyond the stars.
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.EuEnglish:
I will watch over you from
beyond the stars.
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.EuDutch:
I will watch over you from
beyond the stars.
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.UsFrench:
Je veillerai sur vous depuis
les étoiles lointaines.
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.EuFrench:
Depuis les lointaines étoiles, 
je continuerai de veiller sur vous.
Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.UsSpanish:

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.EuSpanish:

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.EuGerman:

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.EuItalian:

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk005.JpJapanese: [ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]の[ruby base]彼方[ruby top]かなた[ruby end]から　これからも[ruby base]見守[ruby top]みまも[ruby end]っているわ

Layout_StoryDemoRosettaTalk006.JpJapanese: [ruby base]彼[ruby top]かれ[ruby end]らは　そこに！　[ruby base]急[ruby top]いそ[ruby end]いで！！

Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.UsEnglish:
SUPER MARIO GALAXY can be displayed in
60Hz (480i) Mode. Your current setting is
50Hz (576i) Mode. If your TV - like most TV
models - supports 60Hz Mode, please select
this TV Type in the Wii System Settings for
a better display quality.

To change your TV Type setting to 60Hz Mode, 
please press the HOME Button and go to
the Wii Menu.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.EuEnglish:
Super Mario Galaxy can be displayed in
60Hz (480i) Mode. Your current setting is
50Hz (576i) Mode. If your TV - like most TV
models - supports 60Hz Mode, please select
this TV Type in the Wii System Settings for
a better display quality.

To change your TV Type setting to 60Hz Mode, 
please press the HOME Button and go to
the Wii Menu.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.EuDutch:
Super Mario Galaxy kan gespeeld worden in 
60Hz (480i).
De huidige weergavestand is 50Hz (576i). 
Als je tv, zoals de meeste tv’s, de 60Hz-
weergavestand ondersteunt, selecteer dan 
dit tv-type in de Wii-instellingen voor een 
hogere beeldkwaliteit.

Om het tv-type op 60Hz in te stellen, druk je 
op de HOME-knop en ga je naar het Wii-menu.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.UsFrench:
SUPER MARIO GALAXY peut être affiché avec
le mode 60Hz (480i). Vous utilisez actuellement 
le mode 50Hz (576i). Si votre téléviseur, comme 
de nombreux modèles, est compatible avec le 
mode 60Hz, sélectionnez-le dans la section 
TYPE DE TÉLÉVISEUR des Paramètres Wii pour 
obtenir une image de meilleure qualité.

Pour changer le paramètre du type de
téléviseur en 60Hz, appuyez sur le
bouton HOME et accédez au Menu Wii.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.EuFrench:
Super Mario Galaxy peut être affiché avec
le mode 60Hz (480i).
Vous utilisez actuellement le mode 50Hz (576i).
Si votre téléviseur, comme de nombreux
modèles, est compatible avec le mode 60Hz,
sélectionnez-le dans la section TYPE DE
TELEVISEUR des paramètres Wii pour obtenir
une image de meilleure qualité.

Pour changer le paramètre du type de
téléviseur en 60Hz, appuyez sur le
bouton HOME et accédez au menu Wii.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.UsSpanish:
SUPER MARIO GALAXY es compatible con el
modo de 60Hz (480i). Tu configuración actual
está en el modo de 50Hz (576i). Si tu televisión,
al igual que la mayoría de los modelos, es
compatible con el Modo de 60Hz, selecciona este
tipo de televisión en las Opciones de Wii para
disfrutar de una mejor calidad de imagen.

Si deseas cambiar la configuración al modo de
60Hz, oprime el Botón HOME y vuelve al Menú
de Wii.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.EuSpanish:
Super Mario Galaxy es compatible con el modo
60 Hz (480i). Tu configuración actual está en
modo 50 Hz (576i). Si tu televisor, como ocurre
con la mayoría de los modelos, es compatible
con el modo 60 Hz, selecciona esta opción
dentro de la configuración de Wii y podrás
disfrutar de una mejor calidad de imagen.

Si deseas cambiar la configuración al modo
60 Hz, pulsa el Botón HOME y ve al menú de Wii.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.EuGerman:
Super Mario Galaxy lässt sich im
60Hz (480i)-Modus darstellen. Derzeit
ist der 50Hz (576i)-Modus ausgewählt.
Falls dein Fernsehgerät - wie die meisten
gängigen Modelle - auch den 60Hz-Modus
unterstützt, wähle bitte diesen Typ in den
Wii-Systemeinstellungen aus, um eine
bessere Darstellung zu erzielen.

Möchtest du für dein Fernsehgerät den
60Hz-Modus auswählen, drücke den
HOME-Knopf und rufe das Wii-Menü auf.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.EuItalian:
Super Mario Galaxy è compatibile con la
modalità 60Hz (480i). L'impostazione attuale
è 50Hz (576i). Se il tuo televisore - come la
maggior parte dei modelli - supporta la
modalità 60Hz, seleziona questo Tipo di TV
nelle Impostazioni console Wii, per una
migliore qualità delle immagini.

Per cambiare il Tipo di TV selezionato,
premi il pulsante HOME e vai al menu Wii.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.JpJapanese:
Super Mario Galaxy can be displayed in
60Hz (480i) Mode. Your current setting is
50Hz (576i) Mode. If your TV - like most TV
models - supports 60Hz Mode, please select
this TV Type in the Wii System Settings for
a better display quality.

To change your TV Type setting to 60Hz Mode, 
please press the HOME Button and go to
the Wii Menu.
Layout_SysPALInfoPALInfo.KrKorean:
Super Mario Galaxy can be displayed in
60Hz (480i) Mode. Your current setting is
50Hz (576i) Mode. If your TV - like most TV
models - supports 60Hz Mode, please select
this TV Type in the Wii System Settings for
a better display quality.

To change your TV Type setting to 60Hz Mode, 
please press the HOME Button and go to
the Wii Menu.

NAND_02.UsEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]There isn't enough available space in
Wii system memory. Create 1 block of free
space either by moving data to an SD Card
or deleting data in the Data Management
screen. Quit the game and go to the
Wii Menu?
NAND_02.EuEnglish:
[setwindowtype 3]There is not enough available
space in the Wii System Memory.
Create 1 block of free space by
either moving data to an SD Card
or deleting data in the Data
Management Screen. Quit the
game and go to the Wii Menu?
NAND_02.EuDutch:
[setwindowtype 3]Er is te weinig vrije ruimte in het
interne geheugen van het Wii-
systeem. Maak 1 blok vrij door
gegevens te wissen of te
verplaatsen naar een SD-kaart
via het geheugenbeheer. Wil je
stoppen en terug gaan naar het
Wii-menu?
NAND_02.UsFrench:
[setwindowtype 3]Il n'y a pas assez d'espace libre
dans la mémoire de la console
Wii. Libérez 1 bloc en transférant
des données à une carte SD ou
en effaçant des données depuis
l'écran de Gestion des Données.
Voulez-vous quitter le jeu et
accéder à l'écran Menu Wii?
NAND_02.EuFrench:
Il n'y a pas assez d'espace libre dans la
mémoire de la console. Libérez 1 bloc en
transférant des données vers une carte
SD ou en les effaçant depuis l'écran de
gestion des données.
Voulez-vous quitter le jeu et retourner
au menu Wii?
NAND_02.UsSpanish:
[setwindowtype 3]No hay suficiente espacio libre
en la memoria de la consola Wii.
Bloques libres necesarios: 1.
Transfiere datos a una tarjeta
SD o borra los que no necesites en la
pantalla de Gestión de datos.
¿Salir del juego y volver al Menú
de Wii?
NAND_02.EuSpanish:
No hay suficiente espacio libre
en la memoria de la consola Wii.
Bloques libres necesarios: 1.
Transfiere datos a una tarjeta SD
o borra los que no necesites en
la pantalla de gestión de datos.
¿Quieres abandonar la partida y
volver al menú de Wii?
NAND_02.EuGerman:
Der Speicher der Wii-Konsole ist
belegt. Bitte rufe den Datenver-
waltungsbildschirm auf, um Daten
auf eine SD Card zu verschieben
oder zu löschen (erforderliche
Blöcke: 1).
Das Spiel unterbrechen und zum 
Wii-Menü gehen?
NAND_02.EuItalian:
Non c'è abbastanza spazio libero
nella memoria della console Wii.
Blocchi liberi necessari: 1.
Per creare spazio, vai allo
schermo Gestione dati e cancella
alcuni dati o trasferiscili in una
scheda SD. Vuoi uscire dal gioco
e tornare al menu Wii?
NAND_02.JpJapanese:
Wii[ruby base]本体保存[ruby top]ほんたいほぞん[ruby end]メモリの[ruby base]空[ruby top]あ[ruby end]き[ruby base]容量[ruby top]ようりょう[ruby end]が[ruby base]不足[ruby top]ふそく[ruby end]しています。
セーブデータ[ruby base]画面[ruby top]がめん[ruby end]でデータをSDカードに
[ruby base]移動[ruby top]いどう[ruby end]するか、データを[ruby base]消去[ruby top]しょうきょ[ruby end]して
1ブロックの[ruby base]空[ruby top]あ[ruby end]きブロックを[ruby base]用意[ruby top]ようい[ruby end]してください。
ゲームを[ruby base]中止[ruby top]ちゅうし[ruby end]し、Wiiメニューに[ruby base]移動[ruby top]いどう[ruby end]しますか？
NAND_02.KrKorean:
Wii 본체 저장 메모리가 부족합니다.
저장 데이터 화면에서 데이터를
SD 카드로 이동하거나 삭제하여
1블록의 공간을 확보해 주십시오.
중지하고 Wii 메뉴로 가시겠습니까?

NAND_03.UsEnglish:

[ruby base]不足[ruby top]ふそく[ruby end]しています。

ゲームを[ruby base]中止[ruby top]ちゅうし[ruby end]し、Wiiメニューに[ruby base]移動[ruby top]いどう[ruby end]しますか？
NAND_03.KrKorean:
Wii 본체 저장 메모리의 파일 수가

This [icon LaunchStar] oughta take you to the
captain in one shot! Pow!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.EuEnglish:
This [icon LaunchStar] oughta take you to the
captain in one shot! Pow!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.EuDutch:
This [icon LaunchStar] oughta take you to the
captain in one shot! Pow!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.UsFrench:
En utilisant cet [icon LaunchStar], tu rejoindras le 
capitaine en un seul tir! Pataboum!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.EuFrench:
Utilise cet [setfontcol yellow]anneau étoile[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar]
pour rejoindre le capitaine!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.UsSpanish:
¡Seguro que este [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol yellow]Anillo Estelar [setfontcol default]te
llevará hasta el jefe de un disparo!
¡Bum!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.EuSpanish:
¡Con este [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol yellow]Anillo estelar [setfontcol default]puedes
volar hasta donde está el jefe!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.EuGerman:
Mit diesem [icon LaunchStar] [setfontcol yellow]Sternenring [setfontcol default]solltest du
mit einem Satz zum Kapitän gelangen!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.EuItalian:
Questa [setfontcol yellow]Stella Lancio[setfontcol default] [icon LaunchStar] ti porterà
dal Capitano in un battibaleno!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.JpJapanese:
この[icon LaunchStar][setfontcol yellow]スターリング[setfontcol default]で
[ruby base]隊長[ruby top]たいちょう[ruby end]のところへ　ひとっ[ruby base]飛[ruby top]と[ruby end]びです！
OceanRingZone_Kinopio014.KrKorean:
이 [icon LaunchStar][setfontcol yellow]스타링[setfontcol default]을 타면
대장님이 계신 곳까지 단숨에 날아가요!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.UsEnglish:
There are no [setfontcol purple][icon PurpleCoin] Purple Coins [setfontcol default]in the
ocean!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.EuEnglish:
There are no [setfontcol purple][icon PurpleCoin] Purple Coins [setfontcol default]in the
ocean!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.EuDutch:
There are no [setfontcol purple][icon PurpleCoin] Purple Coins [setfontcol default]in the
ocean!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.UsFrench:
Il n'y a pas de [setfontcol purple][icon PurpleCoin] Pièces
Violettes [setfontcol default]dans l'océan!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.EuFrench:
Il n'y a pas de [setfontcol purple]pièces
violettes[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin] sous la mer!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.UsSpanish:
En el mar no hay ninguna
[setfontcol purple][icon PurpleCoin] Moneda Púrpura[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.EuSpanish:
En el mar no hay
[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]monedas púrpura[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.EuGerman:
Im Meer sind keine [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]lila 
Münzen[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.EuItalian:
Non ci sono [setfontcol purple]Monete Viola[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin]
nell'oceano.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end]の[ruby base]中[ruby top]なか[ruby end]に　[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]パープルコイン[setfontcol default]は
ありません！
OceanRingZone_Kinopio016.KrKorean: 바다 속에는 [icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]퍼플코인[setfontcol default]이 없습니다!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio017.JpJapanese: [ruby base]高[ruby top]たか[ruby end]いところ、こわい～！

OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.UsEnglish:
Look! I got some [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Purple
Coins [setfontcol default]for you! ♪
OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.EuEnglish:
Look! I got some [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Purple
Coins [setfontcol default]for you! ♪
OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.EuDutch:
Look! I got some [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Purple
Coins [setfontcol default]for you! ♪
OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.UsFrench:
Regarde! J'ai ramassé quelques 
[icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Pièces Violettes [setfontcol default]pour toi![setfontcol purple] [setfontcol default]♪
OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.EuFrench:
Tu as ramassé toutes les
[setfontcol purple]pièces violettes[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin]♪
OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.UsSpanish:
¡Conseguí algunas [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Monedas
Púrpuras[setfontcol default] para ti! ♪
OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.EuSpanish:
¿Has cogido todas
las [icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]monedas púrpura[setfontcol default]?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.EuGerman:
Du hast [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]lila Münzen[setfontcol default]
gesammelt.♪
OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.EuItalian:
Hai raccolto tutte le
[setfontcol purple]Monete Viola[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin]? ♪
OceanRingZone_Kinopio018.JpJapanese: [icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]パープルコイン[setfontcol default][ruby base]集[ruby top]あつ[ruby end]めました～♪

OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.UsEnglish:
It doesn't look like there are any 
[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple] Purple Coins[setfontcol default] on that island in
the middle.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.EuEnglish:
It doesn't look like there are any 
[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple] Purple Coins[setfontcol default] on that island in
the middle.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.EuDutch:
It doesn't look like there are any 
[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple] Purple Coins[setfontcol default] on that island in
the middle.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.UsFrench:
Il semblerait qu'il n'y ait plus
de [icon PurpleCoin] sur cette île au milieu.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.EuFrench:
On dirait qu'il n'y a pas de [setfontcol purple]pièces
violettes[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin] sur l'île au centre!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.UsSpanish:
¡No hay [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Monedas Púrpuras
[setfontcol default]en la isla del medio!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.EuSpanish:
No creo que haya [icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]monedas púrpura
[setfontcol default]en la isla del medio.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.EuGerman:
Auf der Insel in der Mitte gibt es 
anscheinend keine [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]lila Münzen[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.EuItalian:
Pare che non ci siano [setfontcol purple]Monete Viola[setfontcol default] 
[icon PurpleCoin] in quell'isola al centro.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]真[ruby top]ま[ruby end]ん[ruby base]中[ruby top]なか[ruby end]の[ruby base]島[ruby top]しま[ruby end]に　[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]パープルコイン[setfontcol default]は
[ruby base]無[ruby top]な[ruby end]いようです！
OceanRingZone_Kinopio019.KrKorean:
가운데 섬에는
[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]퍼플코인[setfontcol default]이 없나 봐요!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.UsEnglish:
If you need help collecting all those
[icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Purple Coins[setfontcol default], I've got the [setfontcol blue]Toad
Brigade[setfontcol default] and several ships in position.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.EuEnglish:
If you need help collecting all those
[icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Purple Coins[setfontcol default], I've got the [setfontcol blue]Toad
Brigade[setfontcol default] and several ships in position.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.EuDutch:
If you need help collecting all those
[icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Purple Coins[setfontcol default], I've got the [setfontcol blue]Toad
Brigade[setfontcol default] and several ships in position.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.UsFrench:
La [setfontcol blue]Brigade Toad[setfontcol default] et plusieurs 
vaisseaux se tiennent prêts pour 
t'aider à attraper toutes ces [icon PurpleCoin].
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.EuFrench:
La [setfontcol blue]brigade[setfontcol default] et le [setfontcol blue]vaisseau[setfontcol default] se tiennent
prêts pour t'aider à attraper les
[setfontcol purple]pièces violettes[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin] plus facilement!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.UsSpanish:
Si necesitas ayuda recogiendo todas
esas [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]Monedas Púrpuras[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
Tengo al [setfontcol blue]Escuadrón Toad[setfontcol default] y la
[setfontcol blue]Champinave[setfontcol default] a tu disposición.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.EuSpanish:
¡A tu disposición la [setfontcol blue]Champinave y mis
compañeros [setfontcol default]para que te sea más fácil
reunir las [icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]monedas púrpura[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.EuGerman:
Um dir das Aufsammeln der [icon PurpleCoin] [setfontcol purple]lila 
Münzen [setfontcol default]zu erleichtern...[newpage]
...sind der [setfontcol blue]Toad-Suchtrupp [setfontcol default]und das 
[setfontcol blue]Pilz-Schiff[setfontcol default] in Bereitschaft!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.EuItalian:
Per raccogliere più facilmente le
[setfontcol purple]Monete Viola[setfontcol default] [icon PurpleCoin] ho messo in allerta
la [setfontcol blue]truppa [setfontcol default]e l'[setfontcol blue]Ufo Fungo[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.JpJapanese:
[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]パープルコイン[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]りやすくするため、
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]隊員[ruby top]たいいん[ruby end][setfontcol default]と[setfontcol blue]キノコ[ruby base]船[ruby top]せん[ruby end][setfontcol default]を　[ruby base]待機[ruby top]たいき[ruby end]させてます！
OceanRingZone_Kinopio020.KrKorean:
[icon PurpleCoin][setfontcol purple]퍼플코인[setfontcol default]을 쉽게 얻으려고
[setfontcol blue]대원[setfontcol default]들과 [setfontcol blue]버섯호[setfontcol default]를 대기시켰어요!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio021.EuGerman:
Ist doch aufmerksam von 
mir, oder?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio021.JpJapanese: ふふっ…　[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]が[ruby base]利[ruby top]き[ruby end]くでしょ？

OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.UsEnglish:
I couldn't win the penguin race.
I'm more of a slow, leisurely snorkel-
in-the-reef kind of Toad.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.EuEnglish:
I couldn't win the penguin race.
I'm more of a slow, leisurely snorkel-
in-the-reef kind of Toad.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.EuDutch:
I couldn't win the penguin race.
I'm more of a slow, leisurely snorkel-
in-the-reef kind of Toad.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.UsFrench:
Je n'ai pas pu remporter la
course des pingouins. Je
préfère la plongée libre!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.EuFrench:
La course des pingouins,
c'est trop dur pour moi!...
OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.UsSpanish:
No pude ganar la carrera de
pingüinos. Qué pena.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.EuSpanish:
Yo no pude hacer nada
en la Carrera Pingüino.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.EuGerman:
Ich konnte das [setfontcol blue]Pinguin-Rennen [setfontcol default]
nicht gewinnen...
OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.EuItalian:
Alla Gara Pinguotto...
non ho vinto...
OceanRingZone_Kinopio022.JpJapanese:
ペンギンレース、
ボクでは　[ruby base]勝[ruby top]か[ruby end]てませんでした…

OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.UsEnglish:
I'm not much of a swimmer, so I'll just
watch from here, if that's OK.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.EuEnglish:
I'm not much of a swimmer, so I'll just
watch from here, if that's OK.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.EuDutch:
I'm not much of a swimmer, so I'll just
watch from here, if that's OK.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.UsFrench:
Je suis nul en natation, d'abord je 
vais juste regarder d'ici, si ça ne te 
dérange pas.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.EuFrench:
Je... je ne sais pas nager,
alors j'observe d'ici.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.UsSpanish:
Nado bastante mal. Si no te
importa, me quedaré aquí a mirar.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.EuSpanish:
No sé nadar, así que...
me quedo de espectador.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.EuGerman:
Ich... kann nicht schwimmen, also sehe
ich es mir von hier aus an.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.EuItalian:
Io non so nuotare, quindi
rimango qui a guardare!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.JpJapanese:
ボク…　[ruby base]泳[ruby top]およ[ruby end]げないので、
ここで　[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]てますね
OceanRingZone_Kinopio024.KrKorean:
전… 헤엄칠 줄 모르니까
여기에서 보고 있을게요

OceanRingZone_Kinopio025.JpJapanese: おめでとうございます～！

OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.UsEnglish:
If you want to get in on one of those
[setfontcol blue]penguin races[setfontcol default], go talk to [setfontcol red]Coach[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.EuEnglish:
If you want to get in on one of those
[setfontcol blue]penguin races[setfontcol default], go talk to [setfontcol red]Coach[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.EuDutch:
If you want to get in on one of those
[setfontcol blue]penguin races[setfontcol default], go talk to [setfontcol red]Coach[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.UsFrench:
Si tu veux t'inscrire à une
[setfontcol blue]course des pingouins[setfontcol default], va
parler à l'[setfontcol red]Entraîneur[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.EuFrench:
Si tu veux participer à la[setfontcol blue] course[setfontcol default],
va parler au [setfontcol red]chef [setfontcol default]des pingouins!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.UsSpanish:
Habla con el [setfontcol red]Entrenador [setfontcol default]si quieres
participar en la [setfontcol blue]carrera[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.EuSpanish:
Habla con el [setfontcol red]pingujefe [setfontcol default]si quieres
participar en la [setfontcol blue]carrera[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.EuGerman:
Wenn du am [setfontcol blue]Pinguin-Rennen[setfontcol default]
teilnehmen willst, rede mit dem
[setfontcol red]Anführer [setfontcol default]der Pinguine!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.EuItalian:
Se vuoi partecipare alla [setfontcol blue]Gara Pin-
guotto[setfontcol default], parla all'[setfontcol red]istruttore[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue]ペンギンレース[setfontcol default]に[ruby base]参加[ruby top]さんか[ruby end]するなら
ペンギンの[setfontcol red]リーダー[setfontcol default]に[ruby base]話[ruby top]はな[ruby end]しかけて！
OceanRingZone_Kinopio026.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue]펭귄 레이스[setfontcol default]에 참가하려면
[setfontcol red]리더[setfontcol default] 펭귄에게 말을 걸어 보세요!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio027.EuSpanish:
¡Tu nombre queda grabado
en los anales pingüinos!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.UsEnglish:
Seems like that[setfontcol blue] hooligan [setfontcol default]is finally
going to straighten up and swim right.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.EuEnglish:
Seems like that[setfontcol blue] brute [setfontcol default]is finally
going to straighten up and swim right.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.EuDutch:
Seems like that[setfontcol blue] brute [setfontcol default]is finally
going to straighten up and swim right.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.UsFrench:
Il semblerait que cette [setfontcol blue]rogne[setfontcol default] ait enfin
décidé de rentrer dans la bonne voie
et de nager correctement.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.EuFrench:
On dirait que [setfontcol blue]Paulo[setfontcol default] a décidé de faire
profil bas.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.UsSpanish:
Parece que la [setfontcol red]Orca[setfontcol default] decidió hacer
las cosas bien y nadar correctamente.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.EuSpanish:
La [setfontcol red]Orca [setfontcol default]no parece con ganas de
volver a portarse mal.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.EuGerman:
Der [setfontcol blue]Ganove [setfontcol default]stellt keine bösen Sachen
mehr an.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.EuItalian:
D'ora in poi quel[setfontcol blue] brigante [setfontcol default]non farà
più niente di male!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue]ギャング[setfontcol default]は　もう
[ruby base]悪[ruby top]わる[ruby end]さをしてこないみたいですね
OceanRingZone_Kinopio028.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue]불량배[setfontcol default]는 더 이상
나쁜 짓을 하지 않나 봐요

OceanRingZone_Kinopio029.EuFrench: C'est une [setfontcol red]super étoile [setfontcol default][icon PowerStar]!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio029.JpJapanese: [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]発見[ruby top]はっけん[ruby end]しました！

OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.UsEnglish:
So that's the [setfontcol red]hooligan[setfontcol default] that's been
causing trouble?[pause] Yeah, well,
I'll teach him!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.EuEnglish:
So that's the [setfontcol red]brute[setfontcol default] that's been
causing trouble?[pause] Yeah, well,
I'll teach him!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.EuDutch:
So that's the [setfontcol red]brute[setfontcol default] that's been
causing trouble?[pause] Yeah, well,
I'll teach him!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.UsFrench:
Voilà donc cette [setfontcol red]rogne de mer[setfontcol default] 
malfaisante qui cause des problèmes?[newpage]
Bon, je vais lui régler son
compte en un clin d'œil!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.EuFrench:
Ah! Voilà le fameux [setfontcol red]Paulo[setfontcol default]...[pause]
Je vais lui régler son compte en un
clin d'œil...
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.UsSpanish:
Esa es la [setfontcol red]Orca[setfontcol default].[pause]
Yo me encargaré de hacer que
entre en razón.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.EuSpanish:
Esa es la [setfontcol red]Orca [setfontcol default]infame.[pause]
Yo me encargaré de hacer que
entre en razón.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.EuGerman:
Das ist also der [setfontcol red]Meeresganove[setfontcol default]...[pause]
Dem werd ich mal eine verpassen...
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.EuItalian:
Quello sarebbe il [setfontcol red]brigante del-
l'oceano[setfontcol default]... Adesso ci penso io!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.JpJapanese:
あれが[setfontcol red][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end]のギャング[setfontcol default]か…[pause]
こうなったらワタシが　ガツンと[ruby base]一発[ruby top]いっぱつ[ruby end]…
OceanRingZone_Kinopio030.KrKorean:
저 녀석이 [setfontcol red]바다의 불량배[setfontcol default]구나…[pause]
이렇게 된 이상 내가 따끔하게 한 번…

OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.UsEnglish:
That...that...[setfontcol red]ruffian[setfontcol default]! He scared me
and then left!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.EuEnglish:
That...that...[setfontcol red]ruffian[setfontcol default]! He scared me
and then left!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.EuDutch:
That...that...[setfontcol red]ruffian[setfontcol default]! He scared me
and then left!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.UsFrench:
Cette... cette... [setfontcol red]brute[setfontcol default]! Il m'a
effrayé puis s'en est allé!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.UsSpanish:
¡Ese... ese... [setfontcol red]rufián[setfontcol default]!
¡Me asustó y se marchó!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.EuSpanish:
¡Seguro que la [setfontcol red]Orca [setfontcol default]se ha
ido porque me tiene miedo!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.EuGerman:
Der [setfontcol red]Meeresganove[setfontcol default] ist 
abgehauen! Er hatte wohl 
Angst vor mir!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.EuItalian:
Quel [setfontcol red]brigante[setfontcol default]... mi ha spa-
ventato... e sono scappato!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.JpJapanese:
あそこに　[setfontcol red][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end]のギャング[setfontcol default]が　いたのですが、
ワタシをおそれて　[ruby base]逃[ruby top]に[ruby end]げたようです！
OceanRingZone_Kinopio031.KrKorean:
저쪽에 [setfontcol red]바다의 불량배[setfontcol default]가 있었는데
제가 무서운지 도망갔나 봐요!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio032.UsEnglish:
Yay, [player_ml_normal]! I was going to teach
him a lesson, but you beat me to it!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio032.EuEnglish:
Yay, [player_ml_normal]! I was going to teach
him a lesson, but you beat me to it!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio032.EuDutch:
Yay, [player_ml_normal]! I was going to teach
him a lesson, but you beat me to it!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio032.UsFrench:
Youpi, [player_ml_normal]! J'allais lui donner une
leçon, mais tu m'as devancé!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio032.EuFrench:
[player_ml_normal], tu m'as encore volé mon
heure de gloire!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio032.UsSpanish:
¡Vaya! ¡[player_ml_normal]! ¡Iba a enseñarle una
lección, pero te adelantaste!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio032.EuSpanish:
¡[player_ml_normal] se ha vuelto a llevar
la mejor parte del pastel!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio032.EuItalian:
[player_ml_normal], mi hai preceduto
ancora una volta!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio032.JpJapanese:
また　[player_ml_normal]さんに、
おいしいところを　[ruby base]持[ruby top]も[ruby end]ってかれました！

OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.UsEnglish:
Something fishy is going on in that
corner of the sky.[newpage]
I'll ready a [setfontcol blue]cannon [setfontcol default]to blast you
over there!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.EuEnglish:
Something fishy is going on in that
corner of the sky.[newpage]
I'll ready a [setfontcol blue]cannon [setfontcol default]to blast you
over there!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.EuDutch:
Something fishy is going on in that
corner of the sky.[newpage]
I'll ready a [setfontcol blue]cannon [setfontcol default]to blast you
over there!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.UsFrench:
Il y a quelque chose qui cloche
là-haut dans le ciel.[newpage]
Je vais préparer un[setfontcol blue] canon[setfontcol default] pour te
propulser jusque là-haut!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.EuFrench:
Il y a quelque chose de louche là-bas
dans le ciel... Je vais préparer un
[setfontcol blue]canon[setfontcol default] pour que tu t'y rendes.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.UsSpanish:
Algo muy sospechoso ocurre en ese
rincón del cielo.[newpage]
¡Te prepararé un [setfontcol blue]cañón [setfontcol default]para lanzarte
hasta allí!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.EuSpanish:
El cielo está muy sospechoso.[newpage]
Te voy a preparar un [setfontcol blue]cañón
[setfontcol default]para que puedas ir
hasta el meollo del asunto.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.EuGerman:
Der Himmel da drüben ist irgendwie
verdächtig, deshalb baue ich eine
[setfontcol blue]Kanone[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
...mit der du rüberfliegen kannst!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.EuItalian:
C'è qualcosa di strano in quella parte
del cielo. Con un [setfontcol blue]cannone[setfontcol default] potrei
spararti lassù!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]空[ruby top]そら[ruby end]の[ruby base]向[ruby top]む[ruby end]こうが　[ruby base]怪[ruby top]あや[ruby end]しいので、
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]砲台[ruby top]ほうだい[ruby end][setfontcol default]で　[ruby base]飛[ruby top]と[ruby end]んで[ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]けるようにします！
OceanRingZone_Kinopio033.KrKorean:
하늘 너머가 수상합니다
[setfontcol blue]발사대[setfontcol default]로 날아갈 수 있도록 해 놓겠습니다!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio034.UsSpanish:
¡Estoy preparando el
[setfontcol blue]cañón[setfontcol default]! ¡Está casi listo!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio034.JpJapanese: [setfontcol blue][ruby base]砲台[ruby top]ほうだい[ruby end][setfontcol default]　[ruby base]作[ruby top]つく[ruby end]り[ruby base]中[ruby top]ちゅう[ruby end]～♪

OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.UsEnglish:
We came here to find a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power
Star[setfontcol default], but there's something freaky
in that water. No way I'm going in!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.EuEnglish:
We came here to find a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power
Star[setfontcol default], but there's something freaky
in that water. No way I'm going in!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.EuDutch:
We came here to find a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power
Star[setfontcol default], but there's something freaky
in that water. No way I'm going in!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.UsFrench:
On est venus ici pour trouver une [icon PowerStar]
[setfontcol red]Super Étoile[setfontcol default], mais il y a quelque
chose de louche dans l'eau!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.EuFrench:
Nous sommes venus chercher une
[setfontcol red]super étoile [setfontcol default][icon PowerStar], mais ce n'est pas le
moment, on dirait...
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.UsSpanish:
He venido a buscar una
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Superestrella[setfontcol default], pero hay algo raro
en el agua. ¡No pienso entrar!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.EuSpanish:
Hemos venido a buscar
una [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]Superestrella[setfontcol default], pero todo
parece indicar que no es el momento.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.EuGerman:
Wir sind hier auf der Suche nach 
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power-Sternen[setfontcol default], aber im Moment
haben wir andere Probleme...
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.EuItalian:
Siamo venuti a cercare una [setfontcol red]Superstel-
la[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar], ma non sembra il mo-
mento giusto...
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.JpJapanese:
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]探[ruby top]さが[ruby end]しにきたのですが、
[ruby base]今[ruby top]いま[ruby end]は　それどころじゃないようです…
OceanRingZone_Kinopio035.KrKorean:
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 찾으러 왔지만
지금은 그럴 때가 아닌가 봐요…

OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.UsEnglish:
Is that a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default] I see over
by [setfontcol blue]Guppy[setfontcol default]?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.EuEnglish:
Is that a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default] I see over
by [setfontcol blue]Guppy[setfontcol default]?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.EuDutch:
Is that a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default] I see over
by [setfontcol blue]Guppy[setfontcol default]?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.UsFrench:
Est-ce une [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Super Étoile[setfontcol default] que

OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.EuFrench:
Dis, ce ne serait pas une [setfontcol red]super
étoile[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] que j'aperçois près de
[setfontcol blue]Paulo[setfontcol default]?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.UsSpanish:
Eso que está al lado de la [setfontcol red]Orca[setfontcol default],
¿No es una [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Superestrella[setfontcol default]?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.EuSpanish:
Eso que hay cerca de la [setfontcol red]Orca[setfontcol default]...
¿No es una [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]Superestrella[setfontcol default]?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.EuGerman:
Ist das ein [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power-Stern[setfontcol default], den ich
da bei dem [setfontcol blue]Ganoven [setfontcol default]sehe?!?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.EuItalian:
Quella che si vede vicino al [setfontcol blue]brigante[setfontcol default]
è una [setfontcol red]Superstella[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar]?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue]ギャング[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]近[ruby top]ちか[ruby end]くに[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]えるのは
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]でしょうか？
OceanRingZone_Kinopio036.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue]불량배[setfontcol default] 주변에 있는 것은
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]인가요?

OceanRingZone_Kinopio037.UsEnglish:
The penguins sure look
happy! [setfontsize 0]Hmph, simpletons!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio037.EuEnglish:
The penguins sure look
happy! [setfontsize 0]Hmph, fools!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio037.EuDutch:
The penguins sure look
happy! [setfontsize 0]Hmph, fools!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio037.UsFrench:
Les pingouins ont l'air très 
heureux! [setfontsize 0]Pff, niaiseux!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio037.UsSpanish:
¡Esos pingüinos se ven
muy felices! [setfontsize 0]¡Qué inocentes!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio037.EuGerman:
Die Pinguine scheinen sich 
zu freuen!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio037.JpJapanese: ペンギン[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]、うれしそうですー！

OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.UsEnglish:
It's going to take a while to get
the cannon ready. Hang on!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.EuEnglish:
It's going to take a while to get
the cannon ready. Hang on!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.EuDutch:
It's going to take a while to get
the cannon ready. Hang on!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.UsFrench:
Ça va prendre un petit bout de temps
pour rendre ce canon opérationnel.[newpage]
Sois donc patient.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.EuFrench:
La construction du canon va prendre
quelque temps.[pause]
Un peu de patience!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.UsSpanish:
Nos va a tomar un rato tener este
cañón listo. Por favor, espera un
poco más.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.EuSpanish:
Voy a tardar un poco en terminar
el cañón.[pause] ¡Espérate un pelín más!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.EuGerman:
Bis zur Vollendung der Kanone dauert
es noch. [pause]Warte noch ein bisschen!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.EuItalian:
Ci vorrà un po' prima di completare il
cannone.[pause] Un attimo di pazienza!
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]砲台[ruby top]ほうだい[ruby end]は　[ruby base]完成[ruby top]かんせい[ruby end]まで　[ruby base]時間[ruby top]じかん[ruby end]がかかります[pause]
[ruby base]少々[ruby top]しょうしょう[ruby end]　お[ruby base]待[ruby top]ま[ruby end]ちを～！
OceanRingZone_Kinopio039.KrKorean:
발사대를 완성하려면 시간이 걸립니다[pause]
조금 더 기다려 주세요～!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio041.JpJapanese: おつかれ[ruby base]様[ruby top]さま[ruby end]でした～！

OceanRingZone_Kinopio042.UsFrench:
Mm-hmm... Je suis assez 
intimidant, n'est-ce pas?
OceanRingZone_Kinopio042.EuFrench:
Huhuhu... Je suis
impressionnant, je sais...
OceanRingZone_Kinopio042.EuSpanish:
¡Je! Me tiene miedo.
Me he impuesto sobre ella.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio042.JpJapanese: フフ…ワタシに[ruby base]恐[ruby top]おそ[ruby end]れをなしたか…

OceanRingZone_Kinopio043.UsEnglish:
Everyone here is helping us look for
those [icon SilverStar] [setfontcol red]Silver Stars[setfontcol default].

Everyone here is helping us look for
those [icon SilverStar] [setfontcol red]Silver Stars[setfontcol default].

[icon SilverStar] [setfontcol red]Étoiles d'Argent[setfontcol default].

Todos los habitantes de la galaxia nos

Acuático [setfontcol default]están buscando las

OceanRingZone_Kinopio044.UsEnglish:

[icon SilverStar] [setfontcol red]Silver Stars[setfontcol default].

OceanRingZone_Kinopio045.UsEnglish:
Look, it's a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default]![pause]
Don't space out and forget to grab it.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio045.EuEnglish:
Look, it's a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default]![pause]
Don't space out and forget to grab it.
OceanRingZone_Kinopio045.EuDutch:
Look, it's a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default]![pause]
Don't space out and forget to grab it.

Regarde, c'est une [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Super Étoile[setfontcol default]!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio045.EuFrench:
Oh, c'est une [setfontcol red]super étoile[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar]!

OceanRingZone_Kinopio045.EuGerman:

OceanRingZone_Kinopio046.UsEnglish:

Use [setfontcol blue][icon Zbtn] [setfontcol default]to [setfontcol red]slow

down[setfontcol default] your [setfontcol blue]shell[setfontcol default].

OceanRingZone_Penguin001.KrKorean: [setfontcol blue]등껍질 헤엄[setfontcol default]을 칠 때는 [icon Zbtn][setfontcol red]로[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]브레이크

OceanRingZone_Penguin002.JpJapanese: オマエ、[ruby base]速[ruby top]はや[ruby end]いな～…

OceanRingZone_Penguin006.UsEnglish:
I'm pretty sure I saw something way,
[setfontcol red]waaaay up on top[setfontcol default] of that [setfontcol blue]palm tree[setfontcol default]...
OceanRingZone_Penguin006.EuEnglish:
I'm pretty sure I saw something way,
[setfontcol red]waaaay up on top[setfontcol default] of that [setfontcol blue]palm tree[setfontcol default]...
OceanRingZone_Penguin006.EuDutch:
I'm pretty sure I saw something way,
[setfontcol red]waaaay up on top[setfontcol default] of that [setfontcol blue]palm tree[setfontcol default]...
OceanRingZone_Penguin006.UsFrench:
Je suis assez sûr d'avoir vu quelque 
chose [setfontcol red]touuuut au-dessus[setfontcol default] de ce 
[setfontcol blue]palmier[setfontcol default]...
OceanRingZone_Penguin006.EuFrench:
J'ai vu quelque chose loin,[setfontcol red] très loin

Me ha parecido ver algo [setfontcol red]arriba[setfontcol default],
[setfontcol red]arriba[setfontcol default],[setfontcol red] arriba[setfontcol default], y un poquito más
arriba de esa [setfontcol blue]palmera[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_Penguin006.EuSpanish:
Me ha parecido ver algo [setfontcol red]arriba,
arriba, arriba[setfontcol default], y un poquito más
arriba de esa [setfontcol blue]palmera[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_Penguin006.EuGerman:
Ich hab etwas gesehen, [setfontcol red]total hoch[setfontcol default]
über dem [setfontcol blue]Palmenbaum[setfontcol default]...
OceanRingZone_Penguin006.EuItalian:
Ho visto qualcosa sulla [setfontcol red]cima[setfontcol default] di quella
[setfontcol blue]palma[setfontcol default]...
OceanRingZone_Penguin006.JpJapanese:
あの[setfontcol blue]ヤシの[ruby base]木[ruby top]き[ruby end][setfontcol default]の[ruby base]上[ruby top]うえ[ruby end]の[ruby base]上[ruby top]うえ[ruby end]の

OceanRingZone_Penguin009.UsEnglish:
Since we can play in the [setfontcol blue]water [setfontcol default]again,
we're [setfontcol red]racing [setfontcol default]to see who's the fastest!
OceanRingZone_Penguin009.EuEnglish:
Since we can play in the [setfontcol blue]water [setfontcol default]again,
we're [setfontcol red]racing [setfontcol default]to see who's the fastest!
OceanRingZone_Penguin009.EuDutch:
Since we can play in the [setfontcol blue]water [setfontcol default]again,
we're [setfontcol red]racing [setfontcol default]to see who's the fastest!
OceanRingZone_Penguin009.UsFrench:
Comme on peut à nouveau jouer dans
l'[setfontcol blue]eau[setfontcol default], on [setfontcol red]fait la course [setfontcol default]pour voir qui
est le plus rapide!
OceanRingZone_Penguin009.EuFrench:
Comme on peut jouer dans la [setfontcol blue]mer[setfontcol default] de
nouveau, on fait une [setfontcol red]course[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Penguin009.UsSpanish:
¡Como ya podemos jugar en el [setfontcol blue]agua[setfontcol default],
estamos haciendo [setfontcol red]competiciones de
velocidad[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Penguin009.EuSpanish:
Ahora que podemos jugar en el [setfontcol blue]mar[setfontcol default],
¡vamos a echar una [setfontcol red]carrera[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Penguin009.EuGerman:
Weil wir wieder im [setfontcol blue]Meer [setfontcol default]spielen 
können, veranstalten wir ein [setfontcol red]Rennen[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_Penguin009.EuItalian:
Ora che si può finalmente giocare
nell'[setfontcol blue]acqua[setfontcol default], facciamo una [setfontcol red]gara [setfontcol default]tutti
quanti insieme!
OceanRingZone_Penguin009.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end][setfontcol default]で[ruby base]遊[ruby top]あそ[ruby end]べるようになったから

OceanRingZone_Penguin009.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue]바다[setfontcol default]를 되찾아서 그런지

OceanRingZone_Penguin013.UsEnglish:
This is one awesome loop of ocean,[pause]
but that big [setfontcol red]hooligan[setfontcol default] is causing
trouble and keeping us out of it!

This is one awesome loop of ocean,[pause]
but that big [setfontcol red]brute[setfontcol default] is causing
trouble and keeping us out of it!

This is one awesome loop of ocean,[pause]
but that big [setfontcol red]brute[setfontcol default] is causing

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.UsEnglish:
Now, who do we have here?[pause] You
some friend of those penguins?[newpage]
Let's get something clear here,
landwalker. This [setfontcol blue]sea[setfontcol default]'s mine, see?[newpage]
If you want it back, show some gills
and make it through [setfontcol red]eight rings[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.EuEnglish:
Now, who do we have here?[pause] You
some friend of those penguins?[newpage]
Let's get something clear here,
landwalker. This [setfontcol blue]sea[setfontcol default]'s mine, see?[newpage]
If you want it back, show some gills
and make it through [setfontcol red]eight rings[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.EuDutch:
Now, who do we have here?[pause] You
some friend of those penguins?[newpage]
Let's get something clear here,
landwalker. This [setfontcol blue]sea[setfontcol default]'s mine, see?[newpage]
If you want it back, show some gills
and make it through [setfontcol red]eight rings[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.UsFrench:
Ben, qui es-tu donc?[pause] T'es un
ami à ces pingouins, hein?[newpage]
Mettons les choses au clair,
sans-nageoires. La [setfontcol blue]mer[setfontcol default],
elle est à moi, tu vois?[newpage]
Si tu veux que je te la rende,
montre-moi de quoi tu es capable
et traverse les [setfontcol red]huit anneaux[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.EuFrench:
T'es qui, toi?[pause]
Un pote des pingouins?![newpage]
Si tu veux que je vide les [setfontcol blue]lieux[setfontcol default], passe
à travers les[setfontcol red] huit anneaux[setfontcol default] que je vais
envoyer!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.UsSpanish:
¿Qué tenemos aquí? Eres amigo de
esos pingüinos, ¿verdad?[newpage]
Dejemos algo muy claro. Este [setfontcol blue]mar[setfontcol default] es
mío, ¿sabes? [newpage]
¡Si quieres que lo devuelva, tendrás
que pasar por los [setfontcol red]ocho anillos[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.EuSpanish:
¿Qué pasa contigo, tío?[pause]
¿Eres coleguilla de los pingüinos?[newpage]
Si quieres que les devuelva
su [setfontcol blue]territorio[setfontcol default], pasa por los [setfontcol red]8 anillos[setfontcol default]
que vaya dejando caer.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.EuGerman:
Wer bist du denn?[pause] Ein Freund der
Pinguine?!?[newpage]
Wenn du dieses [setfontcol blue]Meer [setfontcol default]zurückhaben 
willst, musst du durch die [setfontcol red]acht Ringe[setfontcol default] 
schwimmen!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.EuItalian:
Che c'è? I Pinguotti sono tuoi amici?[newpage]
Se rivuoi indietro l'[setfontcol blue]oceano[setfontcol default],
passa per questi [setfontcol red]8 anelli[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.JpJapanese:
なんだオメェ？[pause]
ペンギンどもの　[ruby base]仲間[ruby top]なかま[ruby end]か？！[newpage]
この[setfontcol blue][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end][setfontcol default]を　[ruby base]返[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]してほしいなら、
オレ[ruby base]様[ruby top]さま[ruby end]の[ruby base]出[ruby top]だ[ruby end]す[setfontcol red]リングを８つ　[setfontcol default]くぐってみろ！
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing000.KrKorean:
너 뭐야?[pause]
펭귄 친구야!?[newpage]
이 [setfontcol blue]바다[setfontcol default]를 되찾으려면
내가 만드는 [setfontcol red]8개의 링[setfontcol default]을 통과해 봐!

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.UsEnglish:
Not bad, for a landwalker.[pause] Well, I'm a
fish of my word. The [setfontcol blue]sea[setfontcol default]'s all yours,
buddy.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.EuEnglish:
Not bad, for a landwalker.[pause] Well, I'm a
fish of my word. The [setfontcol blue]sea[setfontcol default]'s all yours,
buddy.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.EuDutch:
Not bad, for a landwalker.[pause] Well, I'm a
fish of my word. The [setfontcol blue]sea[setfontcol default]'s all yours,
buddy.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.UsFrench:
Pas mal, pour un sans-nageoires.[newpage]
Bon, je suis un poisson qui tient 
parole. La [setfontcol blue]mer[setfontcol default] est à toi, mon ami.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.EuFrench:
Hé, tu te débrouilles pas mal pour un
humain![pause] Bon, tu avais ma parole:
ce [setfontcol blue]coin de mer[setfontcol default] est à vous!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.UsSpanish:
¡No está nada mal, para ser un
humano! Bueno, te di mi palabra de
pez. El [setfontcol blue]mar [setfontcol default]es todo tuyo, amigo.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.EuSpanish:
¡No lo haces tan mal para ser
un pobre humano![pause]
Un macho siempre cumple su palabra.[newpage]
Usad el [setfontcol blue]mar [setfontcol default]como os venga en gana.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.EuGerman:
Nicht schlecht für einen Menschen![pause]
Ein Hai, ein Wort. Du kannst nun frei
im [setfontcol blue]Meer [setfontcol default]schwimmen.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.EuItalian:
Per essere un umano, sei in gamba![pause]
Ti prometto che potrai usare l'[setfontcol blue]oceano
[setfontcol default]come ti pare.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.JpJapanese:
ニンゲンのくせに　やるじゃねぇか！[pause]
[ruby base]男[ruby top]おとこ[ruby end]の[ruby base]約束[ruby top]やくそく[ruby end]だ　[setfontcol blue][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end][setfontcol default]は[ruby base]自由[ruby top]じゆう[ruby end]に[ruby base]使[ruby top]つか[ruby end]ってくれ
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing001.KrKorean:
인간 주제에 제법인걸![pause]
약속했으니 지켜야지, 바다는 마음대로 써라

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.UsEnglish:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]Gahahaha![newpage]
If you can't handle my little challenge,
no way am I returning this [setfontcol blue]sea[setfontcol default], see?
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.EuEnglish:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]Gahahaha![newpage]
If you can't handle my little challenge,
no way am I returning this [setfontcol blue]sea[setfontcol default], see?
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.EuDutch:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]Gahahaha![newpage]
If you can't handle my little challenge,
no way am I returning this [setfontcol blue]sea[setfontcol default], see?
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.UsFrench:
[setfontsize 2]Hahahaha![newpage]
Si tu n'es pas à la hauteur de mon 
petit défi, pas question que je te 
rende cette [setfontcol blue]mer[setfontcol default], tu vois?
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.EuFrench:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]GAHAHAHA!![newpage]
Si t'es incapable de relever mon défi,
ce [setfontcol blue]coin de mer[setfontcol default] reste à moi!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.UsSpanish:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]¡Ajajajaja![newpage]
¡Si no puedes ganar mi pequeño
desafío, no te devolveré este [setfontcol blue]mar[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.EuSpanish:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]¡JUEEEE, JUEEE, JEE![newpage]
¡No te entregaré el [setfontcol blue]mar[setfontcol default]
sin pasar la prueba!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.EuGerman:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]Hahahahaha!!![newpage]
Wenn du meine kleine Prüfung nicht 
bestehst, werde ich dir das [setfontcol blue]Meer [setfontcol default]
auch nicht überlassen!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.EuItalian:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]GAHAHAHA![newpage]
Se non riesci a superare la prova,
non ti restituirò l'[setfontcol blue]oceano[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.JpJapanese:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]ガーッハッハッハ！！[newpage]
オレ[ruby base]様[ruby top]さま[ruby end]の[ruby base]試練[ruby top]しれん[ruby end]を　[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]り[ruby base]越[ruby top]こ[ruby end]えられないなら、
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end][setfontcol default]は　わたせねぇな！
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing002.KrKorean:
[setwindowtype 2][setfontsize 2]크헤헤헤!![newpage]
나의 시련을 극복하지 못했는데
[setfontcol blue]바다[setfontcol default]를 돌려줄 순 없지!

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.UsEnglish:
Here's a little tip for you.[pause] If you pass
through those underwater [setfontcol yellow]rings[setfontcol default], you'll
[setfontcol red]speed up[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.EuEnglish:
Here's a little tip for you.[pause] If you pass
through those underwater [setfontcol yellow]rings[setfontcol default], you'll
[setfontcol red]speed up[setfontcol default].

Here's a little tip for you.[pause] If you pass
through those underwater [setfontcol yellow]rings[setfontcol default], you'll
[setfontcol red]speed up[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.UsFrench:
Hé, voici un petit conseil pour toi.[newpage]
Traverse les [setfontcol yellow]Accelanneaux 
[setfontcol default]sous-marins pour [setfontcol red]accélérer[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.EuFrench:
... Je vais te donner un truc.[pause]
En passant à travers les [setfontcol yellow]anneaux
[setfontcol default]aquatiques, tu peux [setfontcol red]accélérer[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.UsSpanish:
Déjame darte un pequeño consejo.
Pasa a través de los [setfontcol yellow]anillos[setfontcol default] del agua[setfontcol yellow]
[setfontcol default]para [setfontcol red]aumentar tu velocidad[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.EuSpanish:
Te voy a contar algo interesante.[pause]
Si pasas por los [setfontcol yellow]anillos [setfontcol default]del agua,
recibes un buen [setfontcol red]acelerón[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.EuGerman:
Ich verrate dir etwas Nützliches.[pause]
Wenn du durch [setfontcol yellow]Ringe [setfontcol default]im Wasser 
schwimmst, wirst du [setfontcol red]schneller[setfontcol default]!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.EuItalian:
Ti darò un consiglio.[pause] Passa attraverso
gli [setfontcol yellow]anelli[setfontcol default] non numerati per riuscire
ad [setfontcol red]accelerare[setfontcol default].
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.JpJapanese:
…いいことを[ruby base]教[ruby top]おし[ruby end]えてやろう[pause]
[ruby base]水中[ruby top]すいちゅう[ruby end]の[setfontcol yellow]リング[setfontcol default]をくぐると、[setfontcol red]スピードアップ[setfontcol default]するぜ
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing004.KrKorean:
…재밌는 거 알려 줄까?[pause]
물속의 [setfontcol yellow]링[setfontcol default]을 통과하면 [setfontcol red]속도가 빨라져

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing005.UsEnglish:
Nice going. I knew you
had the right stuff.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing005.EuEnglish:
Nice going. I knew you
had the right stuff.
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing005.EuDutch:
Nice going. I knew you

Bien joué. Je savais

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing005.EuFrench:
Je ne m'étais pas trompé

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing005.UsSpanish:
¡Sabía que lo lograrías!

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing005.EuSpanish:
¡Sabía que lo lograrías!
¡No me has decepcionado!

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing005.JpJapanese: さすが、オレ[ruby base]様[ruby top]さま[ruby end]が[ruby base]見込[ruby top]みこ[ruby end]んだ[ruby base]男[ruby top]おとこ[ruby end]だぜ

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing007.UsEnglish:
I checked around, but there's nothing
between [setfontcol blue]here and the lighthouse[setfontcol default]...
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing007.EuEnglish:

J'ai bien cherché, mais il n'y

J'ai bien cherché, mais il n'y a rien

Estuve mirando, pero no hay nada

Ich hab die Gegend überprüft, aber

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing007.EuItalian:
Ho provato a cercare velocemente,

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing007.JpJapanese:
ざっと[ruby base]調[ruby top]しら[ruby end]べてみたが、

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing007.KrKorean:
대강 조사해 봤는데

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing009.UsEnglish:
Don't you got somewhere
to be? Go on now, get!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing009.EuEnglish:
Don't you got somewhere
to be? Go on now, get!
OceanRingZone_SyatiRing009.EuDutch:
Don't you got somewhere

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing009.EuSpanish:

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing009.EuGerman:

OceanRingZone_SyatiRing009.JpJapanese: …チンタラしてねぇで　[ruby base]早[ruby top]はや[ruby end]く[ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]け

OceanTwinPiratesZone_Kinopio001.UsEnglish:
Your attacks won't reach those
[setfontcol blue]mean-looking aliens[setfontcol default]![newpage]
But here's a great idea! What if you
tried to [setfontcol red]bounce [setfontcol default]something back
at them?

Your attacks won't reach those

Your attacks won't reach those

Tu ne peux pas attaquer ces 
[setfontcol blue]monstres [setfontcol default]d'ici![newpage]

On ne peut pas attaquer [setfontcol blue]ces satanés

ellos?

Desde aquí no llegan tus ataques
a [setfontcol blue]esos pulpos[setfontcol default].[newpage]

hacer [setfontcol red]rebotar[setfontcol default].
OceanTwinPiratesZone_Kinopio001.EuGerman:
Von hier aus erreichen deine

ここからじゃ　[setfontcol blue]あのタコ[setfontcol default]に[ruby base]攻撃[ruby top]こうげき[ruby end]が[ruby base]届[ruby top]とど[ruby end]きません！[pause]
[ruby base]何[ruby top]なに[ruby end]か[setfontcol red]はね[ruby base]返[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]して[setfontcol default]　ぶつけられないですか？

여기에선 [setfontcol blue]저 문어[setfontcol default]를 공격할 수 없어요![pause]

keep going!
OceanTwinPiratesZone_Kinopio002.EuEnglish:
Nice work! But you gotta
keep going!

OtaKingStageZone_Tico001.UsEnglish:
Be careful! There's big, big danger
up ahead![newpage]
If things get really bad, shoot a [icon StarBit]
[setfontcol red]Star Bit[setfontcol default] at one of those [setfontcol yellow]lights on
the ground[setfontcol default].[newpage]

d'Étoile[setfontcol default] sur une de ces[setfontcol red]

Attrape-la pour[setfontcol red] [setfontcol blue]regagner de l'énergie[setfontcol default]!

C'est dangereux, par là![pause]

d'étoiles [setfontcol default][icon StarBit] sur les [setfontcol yellow]lumières au sol[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Tu feras pousser des pièces [icon Coin] qui

l'énergie[setfontcol default]!

A partir de aquí hay mucho peligro.[pause]

[setfontcol default]y podrás [setfontcol blue]recuperar la energía[setfontcol default].

A partir de aquí hay mucho peligro.[newpage]

[setfontcol default]a los [setfontcol yellow]focos de luz del suelo[setfontcol default].[newpage]

y podrás [setfontcol blue]recuperar la energía[setfontcol default].

Von hier ab ist es ganz schön

[setfontcol yellow]Lichter zu deinen Füßen[setfontcol default].[newpage]

kannst!

[player_ml_normal]! [pause]Can I have your autograph?

Je... je suis toute excitée![pause]

ante alguien tan imponente.

こ、コーフンしてるであります！[pause]
こんな　すごい[ruby base]人[ruby top]ひと[ruby end]、[ruby base]初[ruby top]はじ[ruby end]めてであります！

nos van a ascender al rango de

¡No dejaremos que nadie le ponga
la mano encima a la princesa Peach!
¡Ni Bowser ni ningún fantasma!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Kinopio055.EuGerman:
[player_ml_long] Hör dir das an![newpage]
Wir haben so gute Arbeit 
geleistet, dass wir vom [setfontcol blue]Suchtrupp[setfontcol default]
zur [setfontcol red]Leibgarde [setfontcol default]befördert werden![newpage]
Mit mir als [setfontcol red]Leibgardenanführer[setfontcol default] 
wird niemand auch nur seine Finger 
auf Prinzessin Peach legen können![newpage]
Sei es Bowser oder Buu Huus, sie 
sollen nur kommen!!!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Kinopio055.EuItalian:
[player_ml_long]! Ascolta![newpage]
Abbiamo lavorato così bene, che
i membri della nostra truppa sono
stati promossi a [setfontcol red]Guardie Reali[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Io sarò il [setfontcol red]Comandante[setfontcol default] e non permet-
terò a nessuno di allungare le sue
manacce sulla Principessa Peach![newpage]
Né a Bowser... Né ai Boo... A nessuno!
Fatevi sotto!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Kinopio055.JpJapanese:
[player_ml_long]！　[ruby base]聞[ruby top]き[ruby end]いてください！[newpage]
ワタシ[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]、[ruby base]今回[ruby top]こんかい[ruby end]の[ruby base]活躍[ruby top]かつやく[ruby end]が[ruby base]認[ruby top]みと[ruby end]められて、
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]探検[ruby top]たんけん[ruby end][ruby base]隊[ruby top]たい[ruby end][setfontcol default]から[setfontcol red][ruby base]親衛隊[ruby top]しんえいたい[ruby end][setfontcol default]に　[ruby base]昇格[ruby top]しょうかく[ruby end]するんです！[newpage]
ワタシが　[setfontcol red][ruby base]親衛隊隊長[ruby top]しんえいたいたいちょう[ruby end][setfontcol default]に　なったあかつきには
ピーチ[ruby base]姫[ruby top]ひめ[ruby end]には　[ruby base]指[ruby top]ゆび[ruby end][ruby base]一本[ruby top]いっぽん[ruby end]　[ruby base]触[ruby top]ふ[ruby end]れさせません！[newpage]
クッパだろうが　オバケだろうが、
かかって[ruby base]来[ruby top]こ[ruby end]い～っ！！
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Kinopio055.KrKorean:
[player_ml_long]! 제 말을 들어 주세요![newpage]
이번에 우리들이 활약을 인정받아서
[setfontcol blue]탐험대[setfontcol default]에서 [setfontcol red]친위대[setfontcol default]로 승격돼요![newpage]
제가 [setfontcol red]친위대 대장[setfontcol default]이 되면 피치공주님을
손가락 하나 건드리지 못하게 할 거예요![newpage]
쿠파든 유령이든 다 덤벼～!!

Meinen Schülern scheint es auch Spaß
zu machen. Ich bin froh, dass ich sie
mitgebracht habe!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinCoach001.EuItalian:
Oh, sei tu! Come stai?[pause]
Questo festival è bellissimo![newpage]
Gli studenti si stanno divertendo!
Ho fatto bene a portarli!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinCoach001.JpJapanese:
やぁ、キミかぁ！　[ruby base]元気[ruby top]げんき[ruby end]してる？[pause]
ここの　お[ruby base]祭[ruby top]まつり[ruby end]って　すごいねぇ！[newpage]
[ruby base]生徒[ruby top]せいと[ruby end][ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]も　[ruby base]喜[ruby top]よろこ[ruby end]んでるみたいだし、
[ruby base]連[ruby top]つ[ruby end]れてきて　よかったよ！
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinCoach001.KrKorean:
와, 자네 오랜만이야! 잘 지내?[pause]
축제가 정말 멋있다![newpage]
학생들도 기뻐하는 걸 보니
데려오길 잘했어!

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinCoach002.JpJapanese: どう？　[ruby base]楽[ruby top]たの[ruby end]しんでる？

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster001.UsEnglish:
Look at Peach's Castle![pause] It's even
more impressive than I imagined!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster001.EuEnglish:
Look at Peach's Castle![pause] It's even
more impressive than I imagined!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster001.EuDutch:
Look at Peach's Castle![pause] It's even
more impressive than I imagined!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster001.UsFrench:
Ah! Le château de la princheche
Peach![pause] Cha beauté est digne de
cha réputachion!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster001.EuFrench:
Ah! Le château de la princheche
Peach![pause] Cha beauté est digne de cha
réputachion!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster001.UsSpanish:
¡Mira el Castillo de Peach![pause] ¡Es aún
más impresionante de lo que creía!

¡Eshte es el Cashtillo de Peach![pause]
Esh enorme. ¡Másh de lo que pensaba!

Das also ist Peachs Schloss![pause]
Es ist wirklich so schön, wie alle 
sagen!

Guarda il Castello di Peach![pause] È ancor
più bello di quanto si dica!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster001.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]しゃしゅが[ruby top]さすが[ruby end]　ピーチ[ruby base]城[ruby top]じょう[ruby end]！[pause]
ウワサに　たがわぬ　[ruby base]美[ruby top]うつく[ruby end]しさじゃ！

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster002.UsFrench:
Le château de Peach est 
vraiment chplendide!

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster002.EuItalian:
Il Castello di Peach è...

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinMaster002.JpJapanese: ピーチ[ruby base]城[ruby top]じょう[ruby end]、[ruby base]シュテキ[ruby top]ステキ[ruby end]じゃ…

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacer001.EuGerman:
Hi! Siehst gut aus, wie 
immer!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacer001.EuItalian:
Oh, vedo che sei in gamba,
come sempre!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacer001.JpJapanese: よう！　あいかわらずだな～！

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.UsEnglish:
Well, well, well.[pause] So you still want
to race, huh?
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.EuEnglish:
Well, well, well.[pause] So you still want
to race, huh?
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.EuDutch:
Well, well, well.[pause] So you still want
to race, huh?
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.UsFrench:
Tiens, tiens, tiens.[pause] Tu veux encore 
faire la course, hein?
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.EuFrench:
Oh! C'est toi, le moustachu![pause]
Il faudra qu'on refasse une course!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.UsSpanish:
Bien, bien, bien.[pause] 
Así que quieres correr, ¿eh?
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.EuGerman:
Oh! Der alte Opa![pause]
Wir müssen unbedingt mal wieder ein
Rennen abhalten!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.EuItalian:
Bene, bene.[pause] Allora
vuoi fare una gara, eh?
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.JpJapanese:
おー！　オヤジか！[pause]
また、レースで[ruby base]勝負[ruby top]しょうぶ[ruby end]したいな！

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.UsEnglish:
I am NOT going to
lose next time!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.EuEnglish:
I am NOT going to
lose next time!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.EuDutch:
I am NOT going to
lose next time!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.UsFrench:
Je ne vais PAS perdre
la prochaine fois!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.EuFrench:
Et cette fois, ce sera moi
le gagnant!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_PenguinRacerLeade.JpJapanese: [ruby base]今度[ruby top]こんど[ruby end]は　[ruby base]負[ruby top]ま[ruby end]けねー！

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit001.UsEnglish:
STAR Festival?[pause] STAR bunnies?[pause]
Yes, I'm sensing a connection here.
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit001.EuEnglish:
STAR Festival?[pause] STAR bunnies?[pause]
Yes, I'm sensing a connection here.
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit001.EuDutch:
STAR Festival?[pause] STAR bunnies?[pause]
Yes, I'm sensing a connection here.
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit001.EuFrench:
On s'est bien amusés ensemble!![pause]
Il faudra qu'on recommence!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit001.EuSpanish:
Gracias por jugar siempre
con nosotros.
¡Espero que haya una próxima vez!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit001.EuGerman:
Danke, dass du bisher mit uns 
gespielt hast! [pause]Lass uns mal wieder
spielen!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit001.EuItalian:
Grazie per aver giocato con me!
PION-PION![pause] Alla prossima!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit001.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]今[ruby top]いま[ruby end]まで[ruby base]一緒[ruby top]いっしょ[ruby end]に　[ruby base]遊[ruby top]あそ[ruby end]んでくれて　ありがとピョン！[pause]
また　[ruby base]遊[ruby top]あそ[ruby end]ぼうピョン！
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit001.KrKorean:
지금까지 같이 놀아 줘서 고마워 깡총![pause]
다음에도 또 놀자 깡총!

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit002.UsEnglish:
We know who the REAL
heroes of this story are!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit002.EuEnglish:
We know who the REAL
heroes of this story are!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit002.EuDutch:
We know who the REAL
heroes of this story are!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit002.UsFrench:
Nous savons qui sont les VRAIS

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit002.EuFrench:
Reviens jouer avec nous
quand tu veux!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit002.JpJapanese: また　[ruby base]一緒[ruby top]いっしょ[ruby end]に[ruby base]遊[ruby top]あそ[ruby end]ぼうピョン！

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit003.EuGerman:
Sieh dir nur den tollen
Sternenstaub an!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit003.EuItalian:
Guarda le Astroschegge!
Che belle! PION-PION!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit003.JpJapanese: すごい　[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずだピョン！

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit004.UsSpanish:
¡Hay Trozos de Estrellas
cayendo por todas partes!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit004.EuItalian:
Sono arrivati i due fratelli...
PION-PION!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit004.JpJapanese: [ruby base]兄弟[ruby top]きょうだい[ruby end]で　[ruby base]来[ruby top]き[ruby end]たんだピョン！

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit005.UsEnglish:
I've never seen
anything like it!

I've never seen
anything like it!

I've never seen
anything like it!

Je n'ai jamais

C'est la première fois que
j'assiste à telle réception!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit005.EuSpanish:
Nunca había visto nada

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit005.EuGerman:
So etwas Tolles habe ich 
noch nie gesehen!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit005.EuItalian:
Non ho mai visto niente
del genere! PION-PION!
PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit005.JpJapanese: こんなにすごいの[ruby base]初[ruby top]はじ[ruby end]めてピョン！

PeachCastleFinalGalaxy_Rabbit006.UsEnglish:

right, boiyoing?
