[ruby base]少[ruby top]すこ[ruby end]し[ruby base]風[ruby top]かぜ[ruby end]の[ruby base]強[ruby top]つよ[ruby end]い[ruby base]晴[ruby top]は[ruby end]れた[ruby base]日[ruby top]ひ[ruby end]、

PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.UsEnglish:
"I want to go home! I want to go
home right now!"

The girl burst into tears, and the
Lumas didn't know what to do.
PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.EuEnglish:
"I want to go home! I want to go
home right now!"

The girl burst into tears, and the
Lumas didn't know what to do.
PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.EuDutch:
"I want to go home! I want to go
home right now!"

The girl burst into tears, and the
Lumas didn't know what to do.
PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.UsFrench:
"Je veux rentrer! Je veux rentrer à
cet instant!"

La fillette éclata en sanglots, et les
Chikos ne savaient pas quoi faire.
PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.EuFrench:
"Je veux rentrer chez moi! Je veux
retrouver ma maison!"
Les Luma semblaient perdus,
ne sachant que faire pour consoler
la fillette qui avait éclaté en
sanglots.
PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.UsSpanish:
—¡Quiero volver! ¡Quiero ir a mi
casa ahora mismo!

La muchacha comenzó a llorar, y los
Destellos estaban desconcertados.
No sabían qué podían hacer.
PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.EuSpanish:
Rompió súbitamente en sollozos:
—¡Quiero volver! ¡Quiero ir a mi casa!

Los destellos estaban desconcertados.
No sabían lo que pasaba.
PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.EuGerman:
"Ich will heim! Ich will heim!!!"

Die Luma wussten nicht, was
vorgefallen war, und standen dem
Mädchen, das plötzlich angefangen
hatte zu weinen, ratlos gegenüber.

"Voglio tornare a casa!
Voglio tornare a casa!!!"
Di fronte alla ragazza scoppiata

villotti rimasero sgomenti, senza
capire cosa stesse succedendo.
PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.JpJapanese:
「[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]りたい！　[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]りたいよう！！」

[ruby base]突然[ruby top]とつぜん[ruby end][ruby base]泣[ruby top]な[ruby end]き[ruby base]出[ruby top]だ[ruby end]した[ruby base]女[ruby top]おんな[ruby end]の[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]に、チコたちは

PictureBookChapter7_Page7_000.KrKorean:
「돌아갈래! 돌아갈래!!」

갑자기 울기 시작한 여자 아이를 보고
치코들은 영문도 모르고 허둥지둥댈 뿐입니다.

PictureBookChapter7_Page7_001.UsEnglish:
"I want to go home! I want to go
back to my house by the hill! I want
to see my mother!"

The girl was shouting now, her face
wet with tears.

"I want to go home! I want to go

"I want to go home! I want to go

to see my mother!"

The girl was shouting now, her face
wet with tears.

"Je veux rentrer! Je veux rentrer à

La fillette criait à présent, le visage

chez moi, au pied de la colline!"
La fillette criait, le visage inondé de

casa en la colina! ¡Quiero ver a mi
madre!

La muchacha comenzó a llorar, y sus

Las lágrimas cubrían su cara,

PictureBookChapter8_Page1_000.UsEnglish:
Though usually quite cheery, one
day the girl became sad again.
Luma drew close and tried to
comfort her.

"Mama, you still have me!"

anderen Luma, die dem Ganzen

 엄마의 흔적은 네 안에 있어.」

Erdoberfläche kräftig durchge-
schüttelt und aus dem Loch, in das
Luma gestürzt war, drang ein grelles
Licht und ergoss sich über den
Stern.
PictureBookChapter8_Page3_001.EuItalian:
BABAM!

Per il gran colpo il suolo cominciò
a tremare e il fascio di luce bianca
iniziò a traboccare dall'interno del
buco in cui Sfavillotto era caduto.
PictureBookChapter8_Page3_001.JpJapanese:
ズドドン！　ズドドン！　ズドドン！

[ruby base]地面[ruby top]じめん[ruby end]がズンズン[ruby base]震[ruby top]ふる[ruby end]えだし、[ruby base]飛[ruby top]と[ruby end]び[ruby base]込[ruby top]こ[ruby end]んだ[ruby base]穴[ruby top]あな[ruby end]から
まばゆい[ruby base]光[ruby top]ひかり[ruby end]の[ruby base]帯[ruby top]おび[ruby end]が、こぼれだしました。
PictureBookChapter8_Page3_001.KrKorean:
콰광! 콰광! 콰광!

땅은 흔들렸고 치코가 뚫고 들어간 구멍에서는
눈부신 빛의 띠가 만들어졌습니다.

PictureBookChapter8_Page4_000.UsEnglish:
The bands of light twisted together
to form a comet tail.
PictureBookChapter8_Page4_000.EuEnglish:
The bands of light twisted together
to form a comet tail.
PictureBookChapter8_Page4_000.EuDutch:
The bands of light twisted together
to form a comet tail.

Les rayons de lumière s'enroulèrent

Des rayons de lumière jaillirent dans

PictureBookChapter8_Page4_000.UsSpanish:
La estela de luz comenzó a dar
vueltas como un torbellino frenético,
y finalmente se hizo un todo hasta
formar la cola de un cometa.

La estela de luz comenzó a dar
vueltas como un torbellino frenético,
y finalmente se hizo un todo hasta
formar la cola de un cometa fastuoso.

Als der Lichtgürtel sich rund herum
drehte, wurde er zu einem
prächtigen Kometenschweif.
PictureBookChapter8_Page4_000.EuItalian:
Il fascio di luce girò vorticosamente

PictureBookChapter8_Page4_000.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]光[ruby top]ひかり[ruby end]の[ruby base]帯[ruby top]おび[ruby end]は、クルリと[ruby base]渦[ruby top]うず[ruby end]まくと　[ruby base]一本[ruby top]いっぽん[ruby end]にまとまって
[ruby base]立派[ruby top]りっぱ[ruby end]な、ほうき[ruby base]星[ruby top]ぼし[ruby end]の[ruby base]尾[ruby top]お[ruby end]になりました。

빛의 띠는 치코가 한 바퀴를 돌자 하나로 모여

PictureBookChapter8_Page4_001.UsEnglish:
And then Luma emerged, reborn
as a comet.
PictureBookChapter8_Page4_001.EuEnglish:
And then Luma emerged, reborn
as a comet.
PictureBookChapter8_Page4_001.EuDutch:
And then Luma emerged, reborn
as a comet.
PictureBookChapter8_Page4_001.UsFrench:
C'est alors que Chiko sortit du trou;

PictureBookChapter8_Page4_001.EuFrench:
Le Luma était devenu une étoile
filante.
PictureBookChapter8_Page4_001.UsSpanish:
El Destello renació en forma de
cometa.
PictureBookChapter8_Page4_001.EuSpanish: El destello renació en forma de estrella.
PictureBookChapter8_Page4_001.EuItalian:
Lo Sfavillotto si era trasformato

PictureBookChapter8_Page4_001.JpJapanese: チコは、「[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]」に[ruby base]生[ruby top]う[ruby end]まれ[ruby base]変[ruby top]か[ruby end]わったのです。

PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.UsEnglish:
The girl could scarcely believe
her eyes.

"But...how?" she kept asking.
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.EuEnglish:
The girl could scarcely believe
her eyes.

"But...how?" she kept asking.
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.EuDutch:
The girl could scarcely believe
her eyes.

"But...how?" she kept asking.
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.UsFrench:
La fillette ne pouvait guère en croire
ses yeux.

"Mais... comment?" répétait-elle 
sans cesse.
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.EuFrench:
La fillette ne comprenait pas ce qui
se produisait sous ses yeux.
"Comment est-ce possible?..."
ne cessait-elle de répéter.
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.UsSpanish:
La muchacha no podía comprender
lo que ocurría. No cesaba de
preguntarse qué estaba pasando:

—¿Por qué? ¿Cómo?
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.EuSpanish:
La chica no alcanzaba a comprender
lo que ocurría. No cesaba de
preguntarse qué estaba pasando:

—¿Por qué? ¿Cómo?
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.EuGerman:
Das Mädchen verstand nicht, was da

Es sagte immer nur: "Was...? Was...?"

La ragazza non riusciva a capire
cosa stesse accadendo.
"Perché? Perché?" continuava

PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]女[ruby top]おんな[ruby end]の[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]は、[ruby base]目[ruby top]め[ruby end]の[ruby base]前[ruby top]まえ[ruby end]の[ruby base]出来事[ruby top]できごと[ruby end]がわかりません。
「どうして・・・？どうして・・・？」と、[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]うばかり。
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_000.KrKorean:
여자 아이는 이해할 수 없었습니다.
그저 「왜…? 왜…?」라는 말만 할 뿐입니다.

PictureBookChapter8_Page5_001.UsEnglish:
"Our destiny as Lumas is to
transform into different things,"
said a red Luma who had suddenly
appeared. "Stars, comets, planets...
We can become all of these things!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_001.EuEnglish:
"Our destiny as Lumas is to
transform into different things,"
said a red Luma who had suddenly
appeared. "Stars, comets, planets...
We can become all of these things!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_001.EuDutch:
"Our destiny as Lumas is to
transform into different things,"
said a red Luma who had suddenly
appeared. "Stars, comets, planets...
We can become all of these things!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_001.UsFrench:
"Notre destin en tant que Chikos 
est de nous transformer," dit un 
Chiko rouge qui était soudain

en planètes... Nous pouvons devenir
toutes ces choses!"

S'approchant, un Luma rouge
expliqua:
"Notre destin, à nous autres Luma,
est de nous transformer en corps
célestes."

Entonces, un Destello rojo dijo:

—Nuestro destino como Destellos es
transformarnos en estrellas,
cometas, planetas... ¡Podemos
convertirnos en todas esas cosas!
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_001.EuSpanish:
Justo entonces, un destello rojo dijo:

—Nosotros los destellos existimos
para ser algún día estrellas.

Da erschien ein weiterer Luma
und sagte:
"Wir Luma wurden geboren,
um Sterne zu werden."

Lo Sfavillotto rosso si fece avanti

そこへ、[ruby base]赤[ruby top]あか[ruby end]いチコが[ruby base]来[ruby top]き[ruby end]て、[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]いました。
「アタイたちチコは、[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]になるために　[ruby base]生[ruby top]う[ruby end]まれてきたの。」
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_001.KrKorean:
빨간 치코가 말했습니다.
「우리들은 별이 되기 위해 태어났어.」

PictureBookChapter8_Page5_002.UsEnglish:
"When I grow up, I want to become a
star that makes someone special
smile," said a green Luma.
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_002.EuEnglish:
"When I grow up, I want to become a
star that makes someone special
smile," said a green Luma.
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_002.EuDutch:
"When I grow up, I want to become a
star that makes someone special
smile," said a green Luma.
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_002.UsFrench:
"Quand je serai grand, je voudrai
être l'étoile qui fera sourire
quelqu'un de spécial," dit un Chiko
vert.

Un Luma vert poursuivit:
"Notre vœu le plus cher est de nous
transformer en étoiles pour
apporter le bonheur aux personnes
que nous aimons..."

Un Destello verde dijo:
—Cuando crezca, quiero convertirme
en una estrella que traiga la sonrisa
a un ser querido.

Un destello verde continuó:

—Si eso es lo que ha de ocurrir,
quiero que sea para traer la
sonrisa a un ser querido.

Ein grüner Luma sagte:
"Nach Möglichkeit will ich für das
Lächeln einer mir wichtigen Person
zu einem Stern werden..."
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_002.EuItalian:
Lo Sfavillotto verde aggiunse:
"Io vorrei diventare una stella per
far sorridere quelli che amo."
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_002.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]緑[ruby top]みどり[ruby end]のチコが、[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]いました。
「できれば、[ruby base]大切[ruby top]たいせつ[ruby end]なヒトの[ruby base]笑顔[ruby top]えがお[ruby end]のために　[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]になりたい・・・」
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_002.KrKorean:
초록색 치코가 말했습니다.
「우린 소중한 사람을 위해 별이 되고 싶어….」

PictureBookChapter8_Page5_003.UsEnglish:
A blue Luma chimed in, "That Luma
turned into a real cutie of a comet,
didn't he!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_003.EuEnglish:
A blue Luma chimed in, "That Luma
turned into a real cutie of a comet,
didn't he!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_003.EuDutch:
A blue Luma chimed in, "That Luma
turned into a real cutie of a comet,
didn't he!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_003.UsFrench:
Un Chiko bleu ajouta: "Il s'est 
transformé en une superbe comète, 
tu ne trouves pas?"
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_003.EuFrench:
Un Luma bleu ajouta:
"Celui-ci est heureux, car il a pu
devenir une superbe étoile."

Por último, un Destello azul dijo:

—Se transformó en un cometa muy
bonito, ¿verdad?

Por último, un destello azul:

—Es el destello más feliz de todos.
Si no, no habría podido transformarse
en una estrella tan bonita.

Ein blauer Luma sagte:
"Er ist glücklich.
Denn er ist ein sehr schöner
Stern geworden."
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_003.EuItalian:
E lo Sfavillotto blu:
"Adesso lui è felice perché è di-
ventato una stella meravigliosa."
PictureBookChapter8_Page5_003.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]青[ruby top]あお[ruby end]いチコが、[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]いました。
「アイツは、しあわせさ。とても　いい[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]になれた。」

파란 치코가 말했습니다.
「그 아이는 행복할 거야. 아름다운 별이 됐어.」

PictureBookChapter8_Page6_000.UsEnglish:
All of the Lumas together said, 
"No more crying, Mama!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_000.EuEnglish:
All of the Lumas together said, 
"No more crying, Mama!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_000.EuDutch:
All of the Lumas together said,

plus!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_000.EuFrench:
Et les Luma, tous en chœur :

Todos los Destellos gritaron a la
vez:

—¡No llores más, mamá!
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_000.EuSpanish:

—¡Mamá, por favor, no llores más!

Die Luma sagten im Chor:
"Deshalb, Mama! Weine nicht mehr!"
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_000.EuItalian:
E tutti gli Sfavillotti dissero insieme:
"Perciò, mamma, ora non hai

チコたちが、みんなで　[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]いました。
「だからママ！　もう　[ruby base]泣[ruby top]な[ruby end]かないで！」

치코들이 입을 모아 말했습니다.

PictureBookChapter8_Page6_001.UsEnglish:
"Thank you..." said the girl in a
whisper, and she pulled the Lumas
close and hugged them.
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_001.EuEnglish:
"Thank you..." said the girl in a
whisper, and she pulled the Lumas
close and hugged them.
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_001.EuDutch:
"Thank you..." said the girl in a
whisper, and she pulled the Lumas
close and hugged them.

"Merci..." dit la fillette d'une voix 
presque inaudible.

Elle prit tous les Chikos dans ses 
bras et les serra tous contre son 
cœur.

"Merci..." dit la fillette d'une voix
presque inaudible en prenant les
Luma dans ses bras.

La muchacha dijo con un susurro:

Y seguidamente, abrazó a los
Destellos.

De su garganta surgió una voz que
no era voz:

—Gracias.

Y seguidamente, abrazó a los destellos.

"Danke...",
sagte das Mädchen mit kaum
hörbarer Stimme.
Dann umarmte es die Luma.
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_001.EuItalian:
"Grazie..."
Dicendo ciò in una voce flebile,
si avvicinò agli Sfavillotti e
li abbracciò.
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_001.JpJapanese:
「ありがとう・・・」
[ruby base]声[ruby top]こえ[ruby end]にならない[ruby base]声[ruby top]こえ[ruby end]でそう[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]うと、[ruby base]女[ruby top]おんな[ruby end]の[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]はチコたちを
[ruby base]抱[ruby top]だ[ruby end]き[ruby base]寄[ruby top]よ[ruby end]せました。
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_001.KrKorean:
「고마워….」
들리지도 않는 목소리로 그렇게 말하고
여자 아이는 치코들을 끌어안았습니다.

PictureBookChapter8_Page6_002.UsEnglish:
From that day on, Star Bits no
longer fell from the girl's eyes.
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_002.EuEnglish:
From that day on, Star Bits no
longer fell from the girl's eyes.
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_002.EuDutch:
From that day on, Star Bits no
longer fell from the girl's eyes.
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_002.UsFrench:
Depuis ce jour-là, plus aucun Éclat

fillette.

Depuis ce jour, la fillette ne laissa

Desde aquel día, los Trozos de
Estrellas dejaron de brotar de los
ojos de la muchacha.

Seit diesem Tag floss kein

Da quel giorno, le Astroschegge

PictureBookChapter8_Page6_002.JpJapanese:
その[ruby base]日[ruby top]ひ[ruby end][ruby base]以来[ruby top]いらい[ruby end]
[ruby base]女[ruby top]おんな[ruby end]の[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]の[ruby base]目[ruby top]め[ruby end]から、[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずは　[ruby base]流[ruby top]なが[ruby end]れなくなりました。
PictureBookChapter8_Page6_002.KrKorean:
그날 이후
여자 아이의 눈에서는 별이 떨어지지 않았습니다.

PictureBookChapter8_Page7_000.UsEnglish:
The comet set forth for the girl's
home planet, its long tail blazing
proudly behind it.
PictureBookChapter8_Page7_000.EuEnglish:
The comet set forth for the girl's
home planet, its long tail blazing
proudly behind it.
PictureBookChapter8_Page7_000.EuDutch:
The comet set forth for the girl's
home planet, its long tail blazing
proudly behind it.
PictureBookChapter8_Page7_000.UsFrench:
La comète étira fièrement son
panache étincelant et vogua en
direction de la planète natale de la
fillette.

La comète étira fièrement son
panache étincelant et mit le cap

PictureBookChapter8_Page7_000.UsSpanish:
El cometa, con gran dignidad y
belleza, extendió su estela surcando
el cosmos rumbo al hogar de la
muchacha.
PictureBookChapter8_Page7_000.EuSpanish:
El cometa, con gran dignidad y belleza,
extendió su estela surcando el cosmos
rumbo al hogar de la chica.

Der Komet nahm, seinen Schweif
stolz hinter sich herziehend, Kurs
auf die Heimat des Mädchens und

Sternenmeer vorwärts.

La cometa, trascinando orgoglio-
samente la stupenda coda, avanzò
nell'oceano stellato in direzione

PictureBookChapter8_Page7_000.JpJapanese:
ほうき[ruby base]星[ruby top]ぼし[ruby end]は、[ruby base]誇[ruby top]ほこ[ruby end]らしげに　[ruby base]光[ruby top]ひか[ruby end]る[ruby base]尾[ruby top]お[ruby end]を[ruby base]引[ruby top]ひ[ruby end]いて
[ruby base]女[ruby top]おんな[ruby end]の[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]の、ふるさとの[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]をめざし　[ruby base]進[ruby top]すす[ruby end]むのでした。
PictureBookChapter8_Page7_000.KrKorean:
별똥별은 반짝이는 꼬리를 만들며
여자 아이의 고향으로 날아갔습니다.

PictureBookChapter8_Title.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]第八章[ruby top]だいはっしょう[ruby end]
-ねがいごと-

PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.UsEnglish:
With its many Lumas and telescopes,
the comet was quite a sight to
behold. The girl and the Lumas were
proud to call it home.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.EuEnglish:
With its many Lumas and telescopes,
the comet was quite a sight to
behold. The girl and the Lumas were
proud to call it home.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.EuDutch:
With its many Lumas and telescopes,
the comet was quite a sight to
behold. The girl and the Lumas were
proud to call it home.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.UsFrench:
Au fil du temps, la comète accueillait
un nombre toujours grandissant de
Chikos, qui passaient leur temps à
observer les étoiles.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.EuFrench:
Au fil du temps, la comète accueillait
un nombre toujours grandissant de
Luma, qui passaient leur temps à
observer les étoiles.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.UsSpanish:
Destellos mil. Telescopios mil.
El cometa era tan bonito que la
muchacha y los Destellos lo
convirtieron en su hogar.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.EuSpanish:
Destellos mil. Telescopios mil.
El cometa se convirtió en el hogar
de incontables destellos.

Zahlreiche Luma und zahlreiche
Teleskope befanden sich auf dem
Kometen, der wirklich hübsch war.
Die Luma und das Mädchen waren
stolz, ihn ihr Zuhause zu nennen.
Es fanden sich immer mehr
Luma ein und die Zeit verging wie
im Flug.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.EuItalian:
Tantissimi Sfavillotti...
E tantissimi planetari...
La cometa divenne una stupenda
abitazione per gli Sfavillotti.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.JpJapanese:
たくさんのチコと、たくさんの[ruby base]望遠鏡[ruby top]ぼうえんきょう[ruby end]。
ほうき[ruby base]星[ruby top]ぼし[ruby end]は、チコたちの[ruby base]立派[ruby top]りっぱ[ruby end]な[ruby base]家[ruby top]いえ[ruby end]になりました。
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_000.KrKorean:
치코와 망원경.
별똥별은 치코들의 훌륭한 집이 되었습니다.

PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.UsEnglish:
At a welcoming party for a new
Luma, the girl gathered everyone in
the kitchen and said in a louder
voice than usual...
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.EuEnglish:
At a welcoming party for a new
Luma, the girl gathered everyone in
the kitchen and said in a louder
voice than usual...
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.EuDutch:
At a welcoming party for a new
Luma, the girl gathered everyone in
the kitchen and said in a louder
voice than usual...
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.UsFrench:
À une fête d'accueil pour un
nouveau Chiko, la fillette rassembla
tous les autres dans la cuisine pour
préparer un gâteau.

Mais ce n'était pas un gâteau
ordinaire...
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.EuFrench:
"Aujourd'hui, nous accueillons
un nouvel ami!" dit un jour la fillette
d'une voie plus enjouée qu'à
l'accoutumée, en entraînant les Luma
vers la cuisine.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.UsSpanish:
En la fiesta de bienvenida para
un nuevo Destello, la muchacha
reunió a todos los Destellos en la
cocina y dijo...

Hoy se celebra una fiesta de
acogida para un nuevo compañero.
La chica reunió a todos y
les dijo en voz alta lo siguiente:
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.EuGerman:
Heute gab es ein Willkommensmahl
für die neuen Freunde. Das Mädchen
versammelte die Luma und sagte
mit lauter Stimme:
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.EuItalian:
"Oggi faremo una festicciola!"
disse la ragazza ad alta voce
riunendo intorno alla tavola
tutti gli Sfavillotti.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]今日[ruby top]きょう[ruby end]は、[ruby base]新[ruby top]あたら[ruby end]しい[ruby base]仲間[ruby top]なかま[ruby end]の[ruby base]歓迎会[ruby top]かんげいかい[ruby end]。

[ruby base]女[ruby top]おんな[ruby end]の[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]は、チコたちをキッチンに[ruby base]集[ruby top]あつ[ruby end]め
いつもより　[ruby base]少[ruby top]すこ[ruby end]し[ruby base]大[ruby top]おお[ruby end]きな[ruby base]声[ruby top]こえ[ruby end]で[ruby base]言[ruby top]い[ruby end]いました。
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_001.KrKorean:
오늘은 새로운 친구의 환영회.

여자 아이는 치코들을 부엌으로 불러
평소보다 조금 큰 목소리로 말했습니다.

PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.UsEnglish:
"All right, everyone! Let's make a
cake! A cake sprinkled with Star
Bits! Then it will be a star cake!"

The Lumas excitedly began to gather
the ingredients.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.EuEnglish:
"All right, everyone! Let's make a
cake! A cake sprinkled with Star
Bits! Then it will be a star cake!"

The Lumas excitedly began to gather
the ingredients.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.EuDutch:
"All right, everyone! Let's make a
cake! A cake sprinkled with Star
Bits! Then it will be a star cake!"

The Lumas excitedly began to gather
the ingredients.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.UsFrench:
"Parsemons la pâte d'Éclats
d'Étoile! Comme ça, ça sera un
gâteau aux étoiles!"

Les Chikos furent ravis! Ils se
pressèrent donc pour aller chercher
les ingrédients.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.EuFrench:
"Nous allons faire du pain!
Un délicieux pain aux éclats
d'étoiles!"
Les Luma furent ravis! Ils se
pressèrent pour rassembler les
ingrédients.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.UsSpanish:
—¡Hagamos un pastel y rociémoslo
con Trozos de Estrellas! ¡Así será un
pastel de estrellas!

Los Destellos, emocionados,
comenzaron a reunir los
ingredientes.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.EuSpanish:
—¡Vamos a hacer hoy pan!
¡Espolvorearemos polvo de estrellas
y será pan estrellado!

Los destellos estaban radiantes de
la alegría, y se apresuraron a
buscar los ingredientes.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.EuGerman:
"Nun, ihr alle! Heute wollen wir Brot
backen. Ein mit Sternenstaub üppig
bestreutes Sternenstaubbrot."

Die Luma waren außer sich vor
Freude! Eiligst liefen sie und holten
die Zutaten.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.EuItalian:
"Prepareremo tutti insieme il pan
astrale, ricco di Astroschegge!"
Gli Sfavillotti erano entusiasti e
si affrettarono a raccogliere gli
ingredienti.
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.JpJapanese:
「さあ、みんな！[ruby base]今日[ruby top]きょう[ruby end]はパンを[ruby base]作[ruby top]つく[ruby end]りましょう。
　[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずを、たくさんふりかけた、[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずパンよ。」

チコたちは、[ruby base]大喜[ruby top]おおよろこ[ruby end]び！いそいそ[ruby base]材料[ruby top]ざいりょう[ruby end]をそろえに[ruby base]走[ruby top]はし[ruby end]ります。
PictureBookChapter9_Page1_002.KrKorean:
「얘들아! 오늘은 빵을 만들어 보자.
 메뉴는 별을 잔뜩 뿌린 별빵이야.」

치코들은 기뻐하며 재료 준비에 들어갔습니다.

PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.UsEnglish:
As she watched the Lumas scurry
about, the girl smiled and thought to
herself, "This is my family now, and I
will stay with them until they're
ready to leave the nest. And when
they do leave, I'll see them off with
a smile."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.EuEnglish:
As she watched the Lumas scurry
about, the girl smiled and thought to
herself, "This is my family now, and I
will stay with them until they're
ready to leave the nest. And when
they do leave, I'll see them off with
a smile."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.EuDutch:
As she watched the Lumas scurry
about, the girl smiled and thought to
herself, "This is my family now, and I
will stay with them until they're
ready to leave the nest. And when
they do leave, I'll see them off with
a smile."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.UsFrench:
Pendant qu'elle les regardait courir
çà et là, elle sourit et se dit à
elle-même, "Ils sont ma famille 
maintenant, et je resterai auprès 
d'eux jusqu'à ce qu'ils soient prêts à
quitter le nid. Et quand ce jour 
viendra, je les regarderai partir en 
souriant."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.EuFrench:
En elle-même, la fillette se disait:
"Je resterai pour toujours auprès
d'eux. Je ferai en sorte qu'aucun
d'eux ne se sente seul jusqu'au jour
où ils quittent la maison. Et même
le jour de leur départ, je les
regarderai partir en souriant."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.UsSpanish:
Al ver a los Destellos correr de un
lado para otro, la muchacha pensó:

—Ahora, esta es mi familia, y estaré
con ellos hasta que estén listos para
dejar el nido. Y cuando se marchen,
los despediré con una sonrisa.
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.EuSpanish:
La chica pensó algo.

—Me agrada la idea de estar para
siempre junto a estos chiquitines,
porque cada vez que a alguno le
llega la hora de partir del nido,
todos podemos despedirle con una
gran sonrisa.
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.EuGerman:
Das Mädchen dachte bei sich:
"Ich will für immer bei diesen
Kindern bleiben. Bis zu dem Tag, an
dem sie flügge werden, soll keiner
von ihnen einsam sein.
Und wenn der Tag des Abschieds
kommt, will ich sie mit einem Lächeln
verabschieden."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.EuItalian:
La ragazza pensò fra sé: "Voglio
stare per sempre accanto a questi
piccoli. Voglio renderli felici fino
al giorno in cui lasceranno questo
tetto. E quando giungerà quel mo-
mento, lo accoglierò con il sorriso
sulle labbra."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]女[ruby top]おんな[ruby end]の[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]は、[ruby base]一人[ruby top]ひとり[ruby end][ruby base]思[ruby top]おも[ruby end]うのでした。
「ずっと、この[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]たちのそばにいよう。
　いつか[ruby base]巣立[ruby top]すだ[ruby end]つ[ruby base]日[ruby top]ひ[ruby end]が[ruby base]来[ruby top]く[ruby end]るまでは、だれも[ruby base]寂[ruby top]さみ[ruby end]しくないように。
　[ruby base]別[ruby top]わか[ruby end]れの[ruby base]日[ruby top]ひ[ruby end]が[ruby base]来[ruby top]き[ruby end]ても　[ruby base]笑顔[ruby top]えがお[ruby end]で[ruby base]見送[ruby top]みおく[ruby end]ってあげたいわ。」
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_000.KrKorean:
여자 아이는 조용히 생각했습니다.
「앞으로도 영원히 이 아이들 옆에 있어야지.
 아이들이 떠날 때까지는 아무도 외롭지 않도록.
 이별하는 날이 다가와도 웃으며 보내 주고 싶어.」

PictureBookChapter9_Page2_001.UsEnglish:
"Because that's what makes a
mother happiest."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_001.EuEnglish:
"Because that's what makes a
mother happiest."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_001.EuDutch:
"Because that's what makes a
mother happiest."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_001.UsFrench:
"Car c'est ce qui rend une maman la 
plus heureuse."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_001.EuFrench: "Car c'est cela, la joie d'être mère."
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_001.UsSpanish:
—Porque ese es el mayor motivo de
felicidad para una madre.
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_001.EuSpanish: —¡Ese es el motivo de mi felicidad!
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_001.EuItalian:
"Solo questo può rendere felice
una mamma!"
PictureBookChapter9_Page2_001.JpJapanese: 「それが、[ruby base]ママ[ruby top]わたし[ruby end]のしあわせなの。」

PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.UsEnglish:
That night, when the girl lay down
to sleep, a soft light enveloped her
and reminded her of the blue planet
she once called home.

"But it would be nice to return home
once every one hundred years to
nap in my favorite sleeping nook."
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.EuEnglish:
That night, when the girl lay down
to sleep, a soft light enveloped her
and reminded her of the blue planet
she once called home.

"But it would be nice to return home
once every one hundred years to
nap in my favorite sleeping nook."
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.EuDutch:
That night, when the girl lay down
to sleep, a soft light enveloped her
and reminded her of the blue planet
she once called home.

"But it would be nice to return home
once every one hundred years to
nap in my favorite sleeping nook."
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.UsFrench:
Ce soir-là, lorsque la fillette
s'endormait, une douce lumière
l'enveloppa et elle se souvint de la
planète bleue. "Mais, une fois tous 
les cent ans, j'aimerais bien 
retourner sur ma planète bleue, et 
m'assoupir dans mon recoin préféré."
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.EuFrench:
Fermant les yeux, la fillette se
remémora sa petite planète
enveloppée d'une douce lumière.
"Mais j'aimerais bien, une fois tous
les cent ans, retourner sur ma
planète bleue, et m'assoupir sur les
genoux de mon papa en caressant
cette moustache qui fait sa fierté."
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.UsSpanish:
Aquella noche, cuando la muchacha
se acostó, una suave luz la envolvió
y le hizo recordar su planeta azul.

—Pero sería estupendo volver a
casa una vez cada cien años y
dormir en mi rincón favorito.
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.EuSpanish:
La chica cerró los ojos y pensó con
fuerza en aquella estrella azul
rodeada de brillo intenso.

—Al menos, me gustaría volver allí
cada cierto tiempo para tocarle
la barba a mi padre y dormir sin
nada que temer.
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.EuGerman:
Das Mädchen schloss die Augen und
dachte an den blauen Stern, der von
einem weichen Licht umhüllt war.
"Aber ein Mal in hundert Jahren will
ich zu diesem blauen Stern zurück-
kehren und im Dunkel der Nacht die
vorbeiziehenden Sterne beobachten."
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.EuItalian:
La ragazza chiuse gli occhi e pensò
al suo pianeta azzurro, avvolto da
una tenue luce...
"Mi piacerebbe tornare almeno una
volta ogni cent'anni sul mio pianeta
azzurro per riposarmi sulle ginocchia
di papà e accarezzargli la barba..."
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]女[ruby top]おんな[ruby end]の[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]は、[ruby base]目[ruby top]め[ruby end]を[ruby base]閉[ruby top]と[ruby end]じて、やわらかい[ruby base]光[ruby top]ひかり[ruby end]に[ruby base]包[ruby top]つつ[ruby end]まれた
あの[ruby base]青[ruby top]あお[ruby end]い[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]を、[ruby base]想[ruby top]おも[ruby end]いました。
「でも、[ruby base]百年[ruby top]ひゃくねん[ruby end]に[ruby base]一度[ruby top]いちど[ruby end]くらいは、あの[ruby base]青[ruby top]あお[ruby end]い[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]に[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]って
　パパの、[ruby base]自慢[ruby top]じまん[ruby end]のおヒゲにさわりながら
　[ruby base]暖[ruby top]あたた[ruby end]かいひざの[ruby base]上[ruby top]うえ[ruby end]で、うとうとお[ruby base]昼寝[ruby top]ひるね[ruby end]したいわ。」
PictureBookChapter9_Page3_000.KrKorean:
여자 아이는 눈을 감고
포근한 빛으로 쌓였을 파란 별을 생각했습니다.
「하지만 백 년에 한 번은 파란 별로 돌아가서
 아빠의 수염을 만지면서
 따뜻한 무릎 위에서 꾸벅꾸벅 낮잠 자고 싶어.」

PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.UsEnglish:
The comet carrying the Lumas and
the girl continues on its journey to
this very day.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.EuEnglish:
The comet carrying the Lumas and
the girl continues on its journey to
this very day.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.EuDutch:
The comet carrying the Lumas and
the girl continues on its journey to
this very day.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.UsFrench:
Même à ce jour, la comète poursuit
son voyage avec la fillette et les
Chikos à son bord.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.EuFrench:
La comète poursuit toujours son
voyage, emportant avec elle la
fillette et les Luma.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.UsSpanish:
El cometa que lleva a los Lumas y a
la muchacha continúa su viaje por
toda la galaxia.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.EuSpanish:
El cometa y la chica continúan hoy
su viaje por el cosmos.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.EuGerman:
Der Komet, auf dem die Luma und
das Mädchen ritten, setzte seine
Reise fort.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.EuItalian:
La cometa, su cui si trovavano gli
Sfavillotti e la giovane, proseguì
il viaggio...
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.JpJapanese:
チコと[ruby base]女[ruby top]おんな[ruby end]の[ruby base]子[ruby top]こ[ruby end]を[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]せた、ほうき[ruby base]星[ruby top]ぼし[ruby end]は　[ruby base]旅[ruby top]たび[ruby end]を
[ruby base]続[ruby top]つづ[ruby end]けています。
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_000.KrKorean:
치코와 여자 아이를 태운 별똥별은
여행을 계속합니다.

PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.UsEnglish:
With more "family members" in tow
than can be counted, it's said that
the comet visits the girl's home
planet once every hundred years, its
proud white tail glittering in the sky.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.EuEnglish:
With more "family members" in tow
than can be counted, it's said that
the comet visits the girl's home
planet once every hundred years, its
proud white tail glittering in the sky.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.EuDutch:
With more "family members" in tow
than can be counted, it's said that
the comet visits the girl's home
planet once every hundred years, its
proud white tail glittering in the sky.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.UsFrench:
Avec ses innombrables "membres
de famille", on dit que la comète
visite la planète natale de la fillette
une fois tous les cent ans, son 
panache blanc étincelant fièrement
dans le ciel.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.EuFrench:
On dit qu'aujourd'hui, étirant son
étincelant panache blanc, elle abrite
une très grande famille. Et, une fois
tous les cent ans, elle passe près de
la planète natale de la jeune fille.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.UsSpanish:
Hoy en día, ya lleva sobre él
innumerables compañeros que ya son
familia, y una vez cada cien años,
vuelve al planeta natal de la
muchacha. Su estela es tan
resplandeciente como siempre.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.EuSpanish:
Sobre él, viven innumerables
destellos. Son una gran familia.

Una vez cada cien años, el cometa
lleva a mamá a su hogar.

Su estela sigue tan resplandeciente
como siempre.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.EuGerman:
Der Komet beherbergt mittlerweile 
eine so große Familie, dass man ihre 
Mitglieder gar nicht mehr zählen 
kann. Und noch heute zieht er
einen weiß leuchtenden Schweif
hinter sich her, und ein Mal in
hundert Jahren besucht er den
Heimatstern des Mädchens.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.EuItalian:
Adesso i membri della famiglia sono
tantissimi e, trascinando la sua coda
che rilascia una scia bianca, la come-
ta si avvicina al pianeta natio della
ragazza una volta ogni cent'anni.
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]今[ruby top]いま[ruby end]では、[ruby base]数[ruby top]かぞ[ruby end]え[ruby base]切[ruby top]き[ruby end]れないほどの、たくさんの「[ruby base]家族[ruby top]かぞく[ruby end]」を[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]せ
[ruby base]白[ruby top]しろ[ruby end]く[ruby base]輝[ruby top]かがや[ruby end]く[ruby base]尾[ruby top]お[ruby end]をひいて、[ruby base]百年[ruby top]ひゃくねん[ruby end]に[ruby base]一度[ruby top]いちど[ruby end]、ふるさとの[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]に
[ruby base]立[ruby top]た[ruby end]ち[ruby base]寄[ruby top]よ[ruby end]るといいます。
PictureBookChapter9_Page4_001.KrKorean:
지금은 셀 수 없이 많은 「가족」을 태우고
하얗고 눈부신 꼬리를 그리며 백 년에 한 번
고향에 머무른다고 합니다.

PictureBookChapter9_Title.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]終章[ruby top]しゅうしょう[ruby end]
-かぞく-

PuffballBZone_Rabbit000.UsEnglish:
Those [setfontcol blue]moles [setfontcol default]are digging up our
garden! It's just terrible![newpage]
But you'll get hurt if you touch the
[setfontcol blue]moles[setfontcol default].[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol default]Try [setfontcol red]pounding the ground
near [setfontcol default]them, boiyoing!

Those [setfontcol blue]moles [setfontcol default]are digging up our

near [setfontcol default]them, boiyoing!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit000.UsFrench:
Nous sommes très embêtés par
ces [setfontcol blue]taupes[setfontcol default] qui ravagent notre jardin![newpage]
Les [setfontcol blue]taupes [setfontcol default]te[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol default]feront mal si tu les
touches. Essaie une [setfontcol red]charge au sol[setfontcol default]
[setfontcol red]près [setfontcol default]d'elles! Boïng-oïng!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit000.EuFrench:
Nous sommes très embêtés par ces
[setfontcol blue]taupes [setfontcol default]qui ravagent nos terres...[newpage]
Pour ne pas te faire mal en [setfontcol blue]les[setfontcol default]
touchant, fais d'abord une [setfontcol red]charge au
sol[setfontcol default] [setfontcol red]près d'elles[setfontcol default]!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit000.UsSpanish:
¡Esos [setfontcol blue]topos[setfontcol default] están destrozando
nuestro jardín![newpage]
¡Haz un[setfontcol red] salto bomba cerca [setfontcol default]de
[setfontcol blue]ellos[setfontcol default], y evita que te hagan daño!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit000.EuSpanish:
Unos [setfontcol blue]topos [setfontcol default]enormes están
destrozando nuestro hogar.[newpage]
Acaba con ellos haciéndoles salir
con[setfontcol red] un Salto Bomba cerca [setfontcol default]de
[setfontcol blue]ellos [setfontcol default]y evita que te hagan pupita.
PuffballBZone_Rabbit000.EuGerman:
Wir haben ein Problem mit den 
[setfontcol blue]Maulwürfen[setfontcol default], die unser Land 
verwüsten...[newpage]
Berührungen mit [setfontcol blue]Maulwürfen [setfontcol default]sind 
schmerzhaft, also mach eine 
[setfontcol red]Stampfattacke [setfontcol default]in ihrer [setfontcol red]Nähe[setfontcol default]!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit000.EuItalian:
I [setfontcol blue]Talponi[setfontcol default] stanno distruggendo tutto...[newpage]
Se li tocchi, però, ti farai male,
quindi bisogna usare lo [setfontcol red]schianto a
terra[setfontcol default] da [setfontcol red]vicino[setfontcol default]! PION-PION!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit000.JpJapanese:
ボクらの[ruby base]土地[ruby top]とち[ruby end]を[ruby base]荒[ruby top]あ[ruby end]らす　[setfontcol blue]モグラ[setfontcol default]に
[ruby base]困[ruby top]こま[ruby end]ってるんだピョン…[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]モグラ[setfontcol default]は　さわると[ruby base]痛[ruby top]いた[ruby end]いから
[setfontcol red][ruby base]近[ruby top]ちか[ruby end]く[setfontcol default]で[setfontcol red]ヒップドロップ[setfontcol default]して　やっつけてほしいピョン！
PuffballBZone_Rabbit000.KrKorean:
우리 대지를 황폐하게 만드는 [setfontcol blue]두더지[setfontcol default] 때문에
못 살겠어요 깡총…[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]두더지[setfontcol default]와 부딪히면 아프니까
[setfontcol red]가까이[setfontcol default]에서 [setfontcol red]엉덩이 찍기[setfontcol default]로 물리쳐 주세요 깡총

PuffballBZone_Rabbit001.UsEnglish:
With [setfontcol purple]Floaty Fluff[setfontcol default], you can ride the
wind, boiyoing! Just [setfontcol red]shake [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] when
you feel it [setfontcol red]rumble [setfontcol default]to really fly!

With [setfontcol purple]Floaty Fluff[setfontcol default], you can ride the
wind, boiyoing! Just [setfontcol red]shake [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] when

PuffballBZone_Rabbit001.UsFrench:
Grâce aux [setfontcol purple]Herbes Duveteuses[setfontcol default], tu 
peux te laisser porter par le vent, 
boïng-oïng![newpage]
[setfontcol red]Secoue[setfontcol default] la [icon WiiRemote] quand elle vibre pour 
[setfontcol red]voler très haut[setfontcol default]!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit001.EuFrench:
Lorsque les [setfontcol purple]herbes duveteuses [setfontcol default]sont
portées par le vent, [setfontcol red]agite [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] quand
elle [setfontcol red]vibre [setfontcol default]pour [setfontcol red]voler très haut[setfontcol default]!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit001.UsSpanish:
¡Cuando te agarres a una [setfontcol purple]Flotaflor[setfontcol default],
podrás flotar por el aire![newpage]
¡[setfontcol red]Agita [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] cuando sientas que [setfontcol red]vibra
para volar de verdad[setfontcol default], boiyoing!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit001.EuSpanish:
Mientras estés subido a la [setfontcol purple]flotaflor[setfontcol default],
[setfontcol red]sacude [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] cuando
esté [setfontcol red]vibrando [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] para [setfontcol red]revoloteaaar[setfontcol default].
PuffballBZone_Rabbit001.EuGerman:
Mit [setfontcol purple]Flaumkraut [setfontcol default]kannst du den Wind 
reiten. Wenn die [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]zittert[setfontcol default], [setfontcol red]schüttele[setfontcol default]
die [icon WiiRemote], um zu [setfontcol red]fliegen[setfontcol default]!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit001.EuItalian:
Con il [setfontcol purple]Fiore Fiù[setfontcol default] puoi cavalcare i venti.
[setfontcol red]Scuotendo [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] puoi [setfontcol red]volare
tantissimo[setfontcol default]! PION-PION!
PuffballBZone_Rabbit001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol purple]フワフワ[ruby base]草[ruby top]そう[ruby end][setfontcol default]は　[ruby base]風[ruby top]かぜ[ruby end]に[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]って[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]がブルブル[setfontcol default]した[ruby base]時[ruby top]とき[ruby end]に
[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]をふると　いっぱい[ruby base]飛[ruby top]と[ruby end]べる[setfontcol default]んだピョン！
PuffballBZone_Rabbit001.KrKorean:
[setfontcol purple]팔랑팔랑풀[setfontcol default]을 탈 땐 [icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]이 부르르[setfontcol default] 떨었을 때
[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol red]을 흔들면 멀리 날 수 있어요[setfontcol default] 깡총!

ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.UsEnglish:
Thanks! Now I can go home![pause] In return,
let me tell you a secret.[newpage]
In that planet over there, my [icon Bunny]
brother has a [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol default]![newpage]
But he's the fastest of us all![pause]
You think you can catch him?
Boiyoing?
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.EuEnglish:
Thanks! Now I can go home![pause] In return,
let me tell you a secret.[newpage]
In that planet over there, my [icon Bunny]
brother has a [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol default]![newpage]
But he's the fastest of us all![pause]
You think you can catch him?
Boiyoing?
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.EuDutch:
Thanks! Now I can go home![pause] In return,
let me tell you a secret.[newpage]
In that planet over there, my [icon Bunny]
brother has a [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol default]![newpage]
But he's the fastest of us all![pause]
You think you can catch him?
Boiyoing?
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.UsFrench:
Merci! Grâce à toi, je peux rentrer
chez moi![pause] Je vais te révéler quelque
chose pour te remercier.[newpage]
Mon [icon Bunny] frère qui est à la maison
possède une [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Super Étoile[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Mais il est le plus rapide de nous
tous![pause] Tu crois que tu pourras
l'attraper? Boïng-oïng?
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.EuFrench:
Merci! Grâce à toi, nous pouvons
rentrer chez nous![pause] Pour te remercier,
je vais te révéler un secret.[newpage]
Mon grand frère [icon Bunny] qui est à la
maison possède une [setfontcol red]super étoile[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar]![newpage]
Mais il est le plus rapide de la
famille![pause] 
Crois-tu que tu pourras l'attraper?
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.UsSpanish:
¡Gracias! ¡Ya puedo volver a casa!
Déjame contarte un secreto.[newpage]
¡Mi [icon Bunny] hermano está en ese planeta y
tiene una [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] Superestrella[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Pero es el más rápido, así que quizás
no puedas atraparlo. ¡Boiyoing!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.EuSpanish:
¡Gracias! ¡Ya puedo volver![pause]
Deja que te cuente un secreto.[newpage]
Mi hermano [icon Bunny]conejo está en casa,
y tiene una [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar]Superestrella[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Él es mucho más rápido que yo,
¿te crees capaz de atraparle?
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.EuGerman:
Danke! Jetzt kann ich in nach Hause
zurückkehren! [pause]Zum Dank verrate ich
dir etwas Nützliches.[newpage]
Mein [icon Bunny] Bruder, der zu Hause ist, hat
einen [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power-Stern[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Aber mein Bruder ist der schnellste 
von uns allen! [pause]Ob du ihn fangen 
kannst?
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.EuItalian:
Grazie! Adesso posso tornare a casa!
Per ringraziarti ti dirò una bella cosa![newpage]
Mio fratello [icon Bunny] che è a casa ha una 
[setfontcol red]Superstella[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar]![newpage]
Ma lui è il più veloce di tutti noi![pause]
Credi di riuscire a prenderlo?
PION-PION!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.JpJapanese:
ありがとう！　これで　お[ruby base]家[ruby top]うち[ruby end]に[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]れるピョン！[pause]
お[ruby base]礼[ruby top]れい[ruby end]に　いいことを　[ruby base]教[ruby top]おし[ruby end]えてあげるピョン[newpage]
[ruby base]家[ruby top]うち[ruby end]にいる　[icon Bunny][ruby base]兄[ruby top]にい[ruby end]ちゃんが
[setfontcol red][icon PowerStar]パワースター[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]持[ruby top]も[ruby end]ってるピョン！[newpage]
でも[ruby base]兄[ruby top]にい[ruby end]ちゃんは　[ruby base]兄弟[ruby top]きょうだい[ruby end]で[ruby base]一番[ruby top]いちばん[ruby end][ruby base]速[ruby top]はや[ruby end]いピョン！[pause]
つかまえられるピョン？
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit001.KrKorean:
고마워! 이제 집에 돌아갈 수 있어 깡총![pause]
답례로 좋은 걸 알려 줄게 깡총[newpage]
집에 있는 [icon Bunny]형이
[setfontcol red][icon PowerStar]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 갖고 있어 깡총![newpage]
하지만 형은 우리 형제 중에 제일 빨라 깡총![pause]
잡을 수 있을까 깡총?

Blu[setfontcol default] [icon BlueStarChip]! PION-PION!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit012.JpJapanese: [icon BlueStarChip][setfontcol blue]スターチップ[setfontcol default][ruby base]出[ruby top]で[ruby end]てこいピョン！

ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit013.UsEnglish: And now I can go home!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit013.EuEnglish: And now I can go home!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit013.EuDutch: And now I can go home!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit013.UsFrench:
À cette heure, je peux 
rentrer à la maison!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit013.EuFrench:
Maintenant, on peut rentrer
à la maison!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit013.EuGerman:
Jetzt kann ich nach Hause
zurückkehren!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit013.EuItalian:
Adesso posso tornare
a casa! PION-PION!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit013.JpJapanese: これで　[ruby base]家[ruby top]うち[ruby end]に[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]れるピョン！
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit013.KrKorean: 이제 집에 돌아갈 수 있어 깡총!

ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit015.UsEnglish: I can smell the [icon BlueStarChip], boiyoing.
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit015.EuEnglish: I can smell the [icon BlueStarChip], boiyoing.
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit015.EuDutch: I can smell the [icon BlueStarChip], boiyoing.
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit015.UsFrench:
Je peux sentir l'odeur d'un 
[icon BlueStarChip], boïng-oïng.
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit015.EuItalian:
Sento un profumino di [icon BlueStarChip]...
PION-PION!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit015.JpJapanese: [icon BlueStarChip]の　ニオイがするピョン…

ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit016.UsEnglish:
Thanks! You saved me!
You're the boiyoing best!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit016.EuEnglish:
Thanks! You saved me!
You're the boiyoing best!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit016.EuDutch:
Thanks! You saved me!
You're the boiyoing best!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit016.EuFrench:
Merci!
Tu nous as bien aidés!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit016.JpJapanese: ありがとう！　[ruby base]助[ruby top]たす[ruby end]かったピョン！

ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.UsEnglish:
I bet you anything you'll find [icon BlueStarChip] [setfontcol blue]Blue
Star Chips [setfontcol default]around here, boiyoing!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.EuEnglish:
I bet you anything you'll find [icon BlueStarChip] [setfontcol blue]Blue
Star Chips [setfontcol default]around here, boiyoing!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.EuDutch:
I bet you anything you'll find [icon BlueStarChip] [setfontcol blue]Blue
Star Chips [setfontcol default]around here, boiyoing!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.UsFrench:
Je te gagerai n'importe quoi que tu 
trouveras des [icon BlueStarChip] [setfontcol blue]Morceaux d'Étoiles 
Bleus par ici[setfontcol default], boïng-oïng!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.EuFrench:
Je crois avoir vu un [setfontcol blue]morceau
d'étoile bleue [setfontcol default][icon BlueStarChip] par ici!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.UsSpanish:
¡Seguro que encontrarás algún [icon BlueStarChip]
[setfontcol blue]Fragmento Azul [setfontcol default]por aquí, boiyoing!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.EuSpanish:
Me parece haber visto un
[icon BlueStarChip][setfontcol blue]fragmento azul[setfontcol default] por aquí.
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.EuGerman:
Ich könnte schwören, ich habe die
[icon BlueStarChip] [setfontcol blue]blauen Sternenchips [setfontcol default]hier irgendwo
gesehen!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.EuItalian:
Scommetto che qui nei dintorni trove-
rai degli [setfontcol blue]Spicchi Stellari Blu[setfontcol default] [icon BlueStarChip]!
PION-PION!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue][icon BlueStarChip][ruby base]青[ruby top]あお[ruby end]いスターチップ[setfontcol default]、
この[ruby base]辺[ruby top]へん[ruby end]で　[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]かけたような[ruby base]気[ruby top]き[ruby end]がするピョン！
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit018.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue][icon BlueStarChip]파랑스타조각[setfontcol default]을
이 주변에서 본 것 같아 깡총!

ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit019.EuGerman:
Lass uns schnell nach Hause
zurückkehren!
ReverseForestHomeZone_Rabbit019.JpJapanese: [ruby base]早[ruby top]はや[ruby end]く　[ruby base]家[ruby top]うち[ruby end]に[ruby base]帰[ruby top]かえ[ruby end]ろうピョン！

RosettaMonologue000.UsEnglish: You see, we travel the starry skies.
RosettaMonologue000.EuEnglish: You see, we travel the starry skies.
RosettaMonologue000.EuDutch: You see, we travel the starry skies.
RosettaMonologue000.UsFrench:
Vous voyez, nous parcourons les 
cieux étoilés.
RosettaMonologue000.EuFrench:
Nous voyageons sur l'océan
d'étoiles à bord de notre [setfontcol blue]astronef[setfontcol default],
l'[setfontcol blue]observatoire de la comète[setfontcol default]...
RosettaMonologue000.UsSpanish:
Estamos viajando por los cielos
estrellados.
RosettaMonologue000.EuSpanish:
Surcamos los océanos de galaxias
y nebulosas a bordo de esta [setfontcol blue]nave[setfontcol default]
llamada [setfontcol blue]Planetarium del Cometa[setfontcol default].
RosettaMonologue000.EuGerman:
Wir bereisen das Sternenmeer mit
[setfontcol blue]diesem Sternenschiff, der 
Sternwarte auf dem Kometen[setfontcol default]...
RosettaMonologue000.EuItalian:
Viaggiavamo nell'oceano stellato con
la nostra [setfontcol blue]navicella[setfontcol default], l'[setfontcol blue]Osservatorio
Cometa[setfontcol default]...
RosettaMonologue000.JpJapanese:
わたし[ruby base]達[ruby top]たち[ruby end]は　この[setfontcol blue][ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end][ruby base]船[ruby top]ぶね[ruby end][setfontcol default]、[setfontcol blue]「ほうき[ruby base]星[ruby top]ぼし[ruby end]の[ruby base]天文台[ruby top]てんもんだい[ruby end]」[setfontcol default]に
[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]り、[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]の[ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end]を[ruby base]旅[ruby top]たび[ruby end]しています…
RosettaMonologue000.KrKorean:
우리들은 [setfontcol blue]별의 배[setfontcol default] [setfontcol blue]「별똥별 천문대」[setfontcol default]를 타고
별의 바다를 여행하고 있습니다…

RosettaMonologue001.UsEnglish:
We pass by this area once every
one hundred years, but we suddenly
stopped in front of this planet.[newpage]
A strange force had latched on to
our [setfontcol blue]ship[setfontcol default], pulling away Star Bits and
our [setfontcol blue]power source[setfontcol default], [pause][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Stars[setfontcol default].
RosettaMonologue001.EuEnglish:
We pass by this area once every
one hundred years, but we suddenly
stopped in front of this planet.[newpage]
A strange force had latched on to
our [setfontcol blue]ship[setfontcol default], pulling away Star Bits and
our [setfontcol blue]power source[setfontcol default], [pause][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Stars[setfontcol default].
RosettaMonologue001.EuDutch:
We pass by this area once every
one hundred years, but we suddenly
stopped in front of this planet.[newpage]
A strange force had latched on to
our [setfontcol blue]ship[setfontcol default], pulling away Star Bits and
our [setfontcol blue]power source[setfontcol default], [pause][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Stars[setfontcol default].
RosettaMonologue001.UsFrench:
Tous les cent ans, nous sillonnons
cette partie de l'espace.[newpage]
Cette fois, nous avons soudain été
stoppés devant cette planète.[newpage]
Une force étrange s'est accrochée à
notre [setfontcol blue]vaisseau[setfontcol default] et aspire nos Éclats
d'Étoile...[newpage]
ainsi que notre [setfontcol blue]source d'énergie[setfontcol default], les
[pause][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Super Étoiles[setfontcol default].
RosettaMonologue001.EuFrench:
Alors que nous sillonnions cette
partie de l'espace,[newpage]
l'[setfontcol blue]énergie de notre astronef[setfontcol default] a soudain
été aspirée par une étrange force...[newpage]
... et elle s'est échappée en même
temps que les éclats d'étoiles.[newpage]
Notre [setfontcol blue]source d'énergie[setfontcol default]...[pause]
Oui, ce sont les [setfontcol red]super étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar].
RosettaMonologue001.UsSpanish:
Una vez cada cien años pasamos por
este lugar sin problema alguno, pero
esta vez nos hemos detenido.[newpage]
La [setfontcol blue]nave[setfontcol default] se vio atraída por una
gravedad misteriosa...[newpage]
que se llevó los Trozos de Estrellas
y nuestra [setfontcol blue]fuente de energía[setfontcol default],[pause]
las [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Superestrellas[setfontcol default].
RosettaMonologue001.EuSpanish:
Cuando estábamos pasando por este
lugar sin problema alguno, nuestro
paso se ha detenido en seco.[newpage]
Y de repente la [setfontcol blue]energía propulsora[setfontcol default]
de la nave se vio atraída por una
gravedad misteriosa y...[newpage]
se desvaneció junto
al polvo de estrellas que caía.[newpage]
Esa [setfontcol blue]energía[setfontcol default] propulsora proviene de
las [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]Superestrellas[setfontcol default].
RosettaMonologue001.EuGerman:
Unser Schiff ist vor diesem Planeten
plötzlich zum Stillstand gekommen.[newpage]
Die [setfontcol red]Kraft [setfontcol default]des Sternenschiffes ist,
im Bann einer [setfontcol blue]rätselhaften
Anziehungskraft[setfontcol default], [newpage]
zusammen mit dem Sternenstaub 
heruntergeflossen.[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Kraft[setfontcol default]...
Ja, es handelt sich dabei
um [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power-Sterne[setfontcol default].
RosettaMonologue001.EuItalian:
Mentre attraversavamo questi
cieli, la [setfontcol blue]navicella [setfontcol default]si è arrestata
improvvisamente...[newpage]
Una forza misteriosa ha risucchiato
la sua [setfontcol blue]energia[setfontcol default] provocando una
pioggia di Astroschegge.[newpage]
Quell'[setfontcol blue]energia [setfontcol default]proveniva dalle
[setfontcol red]Superstelle[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar].
RosettaMonologue001.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]旅[ruby top]たび[ruby end]の[ruby base]途中[ruby top]とちゅう[ruby end]、この[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]の[ruby base]前[ruby top]まえ[ruby end]を[ruby base]通[ruby top]とお[ruby end]り[ruby base]過[ruby top]す[ruby end]ぎようとした[ruby base]時[ruby top]とき[ruby end]、
とても[ruby base]強[ruby top]つよ[ruby end]い　なぞの[ruby base]引力[ruby top]いんりょく[ruby end]に[ruby base]引[ruby top]ひ[ruby end]かれ[newpage]
この[setfontcol blue][ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end][ruby base]船[ruby top]ぶね[ruby end][setfontcol default]の[setfontcol blue]「[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]」[setfontcol default]が
[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end]くずとともに、[ruby base]流[ruby top]なが[ruby end]れ[ruby base]落[ruby top]お[ruby end]ちてしまったのです[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]「[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]」[setfontcol default]…[pause]
そう　[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]です
RosettaMonologue001.KrKorean:
여행 도중 이 별을 지나려고 할 때
매우 강한 알 수 없는 인력에 이끌려[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]별의 배[setfontcol default]의 [setfontcol blue]「힘」[setfontcol default]이
별과 함께 떨어져 나갔습니다[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]「힘」[setfontcol default]…[pause]
그것이 바로 [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]입니다

RosettaMonologue002.UsEnglish:
Our [setfontcol blue]ship [setfontcol default]had [setfontcol blue]lost power[setfontcol default], so it
entered a deep hibernation state
in which it could not move.
RosettaMonologue002.EuEnglish:
Our [setfontcol blue]ship [setfontcol default]had [setfontcol blue]lost power[setfontcol default], so it
entered a deep hibernation state
in which it could not move.
RosettaMonologue002.EuDutch:
Our [setfontcol blue]ship [setfontcol default]had [setfontcol blue]lost power[setfontcol default], so it
entered a deep hibernation state
in which it could not move.
RosettaMonologue002.UsFrench:
Notre [setfontcol blue]vaisseau[setfontcol default] a [setfontcol blue]perdu son énergie[setfontcol default]
et il a été plongé dans un état de
profonde hibernation. Il est paralysé.
RosettaMonologue002.EuFrench:
Maintenant qu'il a [setfontcol blue]perdu son énergie[setfontcol default],
notre [setfontcol blue]astronef[setfontcol default] est paralysé, comme
plongé dans un profond sommeil.
RosettaMonologue002.UsSpanish:
La [setfontcol blue]nave[setfontcol default] había [setfontcol blue]perdido su energía[setfontcol default],
así que pasó a un estado de letargo
y se quedo inmóvil.
RosettaMonologue002.EuSpanish:
La [setfontcol blue]nave[setfontcol default], sin su energía,
pasó a un estado de letargo
y se quedó inmóvil.
RosettaMonologue002.EuGerman:
[setfontcol blue]Seiner Kraft beraubt[setfontcol default], ist das 
[setfontcol blue]Sternenschiff[setfontcol default] wie in einen tiefen 
Schlaf gesunken, regungslos.
RosettaMonologue002.EuItalian:
Così la [setfontcol blue]navicella [setfontcol default]ha smesso
di muoversi...[newpage]
Come se fosse piombata
in un sonno profondo...
RosettaMonologue002.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue][ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]を[ruby base]失[ruby top]うしな[ruby end]った[ruby base]星[ruby top]ほし[ruby end][ruby base]船[ruby top]ぶね[ruby end][setfontcol default]は　[ruby base]深[ruby top]ふか[ruby end]い[ruby base]眠[ruby top]ねむ[ruby end]りについたように
[ruby base]動[ruby top]うご[ruby end]かなくなってしまいました
RosettaMonologue002.KrKorean:
[setfontcol blue]힘을 잃은 별의 배[setfontcol default]는 깊은 잠에 빠진 듯
멈추고 말았습니다

RosettaMonologue003.UsEnglish:
Those who took your [setfontcol red]special one
[setfontcol default]picked up the [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] Power Stars[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
And discovered the power to cross
the universe.
RosettaMonologue003.EuEnglish:
Those who took your [setfontcol red]special one
[setfontcol default]picked up the [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] Power Stars[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
And discovered the power to cross
the universe.
RosettaMonologue003.EuDutch:
Those who took your [setfontcol red]special one
[setfontcol default]picked up the [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] Power Stars[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
And discovered the power to cross
the universe.
RosettaMonologue003.UsFrench:
Ceux qui ont enlevé [setfontcol red]celle qui vous
est chère[setfontcol default] se sont emparés des
[setfontcol red][icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] Super Étoiles[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
Et ont ainsi acquis la faculté de
traverser l'univers.
RosettaMonologue003.EuFrench:
Ceux qui ont enlevé [setfontcol red]celle qui t'est
chère[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
... se sont également emparés des
[setfontcol yellow]super étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar].[newpage]
Ils ont ainsi acquis la faculté de
voyager entre les galaxies.
RosettaMonologue003.UsSpanish:
Aquellos que se llevaron a tu [setfontcol red]ser
querido [setfontcol default]tomaron las
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
Y descubrieron el poder para cruzar
el universo.
RosettaMonologue003.EuSpanish:
Los seres que apartaron de tu lado
a tu [setfontcol red]ser querido[setfontcol default] recogieron las[newpage]
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas[setfontcol default]. [newpage]
Ahora tienen la facultad de cruzar
el cosmos a su antojo.
RosettaMonologue003.EuGerman:
Die Schurken, die eine dir [setfontcol red]kostbare
Person [setfontcol default]entführt haben, sammelten
diese [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power-Sterne [setfontcol default]auf...[newpage]
Und haben so [setfontcol red]die Fähigkeit
erworben, das Universum zu
durchqueren[setfontcol default].
RosettaMonologue003.EuItalian:
Chi ha portato via la [setfontcol red]tua amica[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
Ha rubato le [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar]...[newpage]
E ha usato la loro energia per
varcare le galassie.
RosettaMonologue003.JpJapanese:
あなたの[setfontcol red][ruby base]大切[ruby top]たいせつ[ruby end]な[ruby base]人[ruby top]ひと[ruby end][setfontcol default]を[ruby base]連[ruby top]つ[ruby end]れ[ruby base]去[ruby top]さ[ruby end]った[ruby base]者達[ruby top]ものたち[ruby end]は
[ruby base]流[ruby top]なが[ruby end]れ[ruby base]落[ruby top]お[ruby end]ちた　その[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol default]を[ruby base]拾[ruby top]ひろ[ruby end]い[newpage]
[ruby base]宇宙[ruby top]うちゅう[ruby end]を[ruby base]渡[ruby top]わた[ruby end]る[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]を　[ruby base]手[ruby top]て[ruby end]に[ruby base]入[ruby top]い[ruby end]れてしまったようです
RosettaMonologue003.KrKorean:
당신의 [setfontcol red]소중한 사람[setfontcol default]을 데려간 자들은
떨어진 그 [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 주워[newpage]
우주를 건너는 힘을 손에 넣었습니다

SoramameZone_Tico000.EuItalian:
Fai attenzione! Dopo una piroetta,
devi aspettare che lo [setfontcol blue]Sfavillotto ri-
torni[setfontcol default] prima di poterne fare un'altra.
SoramameZone_Tico000.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]注意[ruby top]ちゅうい[ruby end]して！[pause]　スピンの[ruby base]後[ruby top]あと[ruby end]は
[setfontcol blue]チコがもどる[setfontcol default]まで、[ruby base]次[ruby top]つぎ[ruby end]のスピンは　できません！
SoramameZone_Tico000.KrKorean:
기억하세요![pause] 스핀한 다음에는
[setfontcol blue]치코가 돌아올 때[setfontcol default]까지 스핀할 수 없어요!

StaffFinalLetter_000.UsEnglish:
Dear [name 1 0],
Congratulations! We would like to
send you a galaxy-sized thanks for
saving all the Power Stars and
playing to the very end.

Until next time,
The SUPER MARIO GALAXY Staff!
StaffFinalLetter_000.EuEnglish:
Dear [name 1 0],
Congratulations! We would like to
send you a galaxy-sized thanks for
saving all the Power Stars and
playing to the very end.

Until next time,
The Super Mario Galaxy Staff!
StaffFinalLetter_000.EuDutch:
Dear [name 1 0],
Congratulations! We would like to
send you a galaxy-sized thanks for
saving all the Power Stars and
playing to the very end.

Until next time,
The Super Mario Galaxy Staff!
StaffFinalLetter_000.UsFrench:
Cher [name 1 0],

Félicitations!

Vous avez retrouvé toutes les Super
Étoiles; vous êtes une vraie super 
star!

Toute l'équipe vous adresse ses
remerciements galactiques pour
avoir mené cette aventure à son
terme. Merci!

À la prochaine,
L'Équipe de 
SUPER MARIO GALAXY
StaffFinalLetter_000.EuFrench:
Félicitations,
[name 1 0]!

Vous avez retrouvé toutes les super
étoiles, vous êtes une vraie super
star!

Toute l'équipe vous adresse ses
remerciements galactiques pour
avoir mené cette aventure à son
terme. Merci!

L'équipe de Super Mario Galaxy
StaffFinalLetter_000.UsSpanish:
Querido/a [name 1 0],
¡Felicidades! Nos gustaría mandarte
un saludo del tamaño de una galaxia
para agradecerte que hayas
rescatado a todas las Superestrellas
y jugado hasta el final.

¡Hasta la próxima!
El equipo de
SUPER MARIO GALAXY
StaffFinalLetter_000.EuSpanish:
Estimado/a [name 1 0]:

¡Enhorabuena!

¡Has rescatado a todas las
Superestrellas del Universo,
eres un fenómeno!

Te agradecemos galácticamente
todo el esfuerzo que has empleado
para llegar hasta aquí.

¡Hasta la próxima!

El equipo de Super Mario Galaxy
StaffFinalLetter_000.EuGerman:
An [name 1 0]!
Danke, dass du so weit gespielt
hast! Nein, wirklich, echt toll!
Du kannst stolz auf dich sein!

Die versammelte
Super Mario Galaxy-Crew
StaffFinalLetter_000.EuItalian:
[name 1 0],
complimenti vivissimi!
Hai raccolto tutte le Superstelle!
Sei davvero eccezionale!
Tutto il nostro staff ti ringrazia
vivamente per aver giocato fin qui!

   Staff di Super Mario Galaxy
StaffFinalLetter_000.JpJapanese:
[name 1 0]さんへ

おめでとうございます！

全てのパワースターを救ってくれた
あなたに、ギャラクシー級の感謝の
気持ちを贈ります！

最後の最後までプレイしてくれて
本当にありがとう！

そして、またいつか会いましょう！

スーパーマリオギャラクシー
スタッフ一同
StaffFinalLetter_000.KrKorean:
[name 1 0]님에게

축하 드립니다!

모든 파워스타를 찾아 주신
당신에게 갤럭시급으로
감사의 말씀을 전합니다!

마지막까지 플레이해 주셔서
정말로 감사합니다!

다음에 다시 만나요!

슈퍼 마리오 Wii
스태프 일동

He went off to that planet and hasn't
been seen since! You think he's OK?

Oh, but this is your first time

SurfingLv2Galaxy_PenguinCoach007.UsEnglish:
Hmmm... Maybe that was a bit rough
for you.[pause] Why don't you practice and
come back later?

う～～ん、キミには　[ruby base]難[ruby top]むずか[ruby end]しかったかなぁ？[pause]

TamakoroExBZone_SignBoard001.UsEnglish:
Hey there! I'm [setfontcol blue]Bill Board[setfontcol default]! Wait...
Have we met before?[newpage]
Anyway, you can only get through
here with a [setfontcol blue]ball[setfontcol default].[pause] Get on, then [setfontcol red]tilt
up[setfontcol default] on[setfontcol red] [icon WiiRemote][setfontcol default]![newpage]
[setfontcol red]Tilt[setfontcol default] [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]to move[setfontcol default], and use [setfontcol red][icon Abtn] [setfontcol default]to[setfontcol red] jump[setfontcol default]!
If anything gets in your way, just
[setfontcol red]flatten[setfontcol default] it!

Attends, on ne se connaît pas déjà?[newpage]
Enfin, ici, on ne peut avancer 
qu'en montant sur une [setfontcol blue]boule[setfontcol default].[newpage]
Monte là-haut et [setfontcol red]tiens [setfontcol default]la [icon WiiRemote]
[setfontcol red]verticalement pour te déplacer[setfontcol default]. Tu
peux [setfontcol red]sauter [setfontcol default]en appuyant sur [icon Abtn]![newpage]
Ne te gêne pas pour [setfontcol blue]écrabouiller[setfontcol default]
ceux qui sont sur ton passage!

en appuyant sur [icon Abtn]![newpage]
Et ne te gêne pas pour écrabouiller
ceux qui se mettent sur ta route!
TamakoroExBZone_SignBoard001.UsSpanish:
¡Hola! ¡Soy [setfontcol blue]Cart Elón[setfontcol default]!
¿No nos hemos visto antes?[newpage]
En cualquier caso, solo puedes pasar
por aquí en una [setfontcol blue]bola[setfontcol default].[newpage]
¡Súbete en ella,[setfontcol red] sujeta [icon WiiRemote]
en posición vertical [setfontcol default]e [setfontcol red]inclínalo para
moverte[setfontcol default]! ¡[setfontcol red]Salta [setfontcol default]con [setfontcol red][icon Abtn][setfontcol default]![newpage]
¡Si algo se cruza en tu camino,
[setfontcol red]aplástalo[setfontcol default]!

ARRIBA DE [setfontcol blue]BOLA[setfontcol default][newpage]
¡SOBRE BOLA, [setfontcol red]LEVANTAR [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote]!

APLASTAR ENEMIGOS

getroffen?[newpage]
Na jedenfalls, hier kommst du nur mit
dem [setfontcol blue]Sternenball [setfontcol default]weiter.[pause] Wenn du 
aufsteigst, [setfontcol red]richte die [icon WiiRemote] nach oben[setfontcol default]![newpage]
[setfontcol red]Neige die [icon WiiRemote], um dich zu bewegen [setfontcol default]und
[setfontcol red]springe[setfontcol default], indem du [icon Abtn] drückst![pause] Ist
jemand im Weg, rolle einfach weiter!
TamakoroExBZone_SignBoard001.EuItalian:

Non ci siamo già conosciuti?[newpage]
Ad ogni modo da qui puoi pro-
seguire solo con l'[setfontcol blue]Astrosfera[setfontcol default]...[newpage]
Quando ci sarai sopra [setfontcol red]metti [setfontcol default][icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]in[setfontcol default]

muoverti[setfontcol default]![newpage]
[setfontcol red]Salta[setfontcol default] con [setfontcol red][icon Abtn] [setfontcol default]e se incontri qualche
ostacolo, schiaccialo!
TamakoroExBZone_SignBoard001.JpJapanese:
ヘイ！　オレの[ruby base]名[ruby top]な[ruby end]は[setfontcol blue]カン・バーン[setfontcol default]！[pause]
…って　どっかで[ruby base]会[ruby top]あ[ruby end]った[ruby base]事[ruby top]こと[ruby end]、あったっけか？[newpage]
とにかく、ここは　[setfontcol blue]タマコロ[setfontcol default]でしか[ruby base]進[ruby top]すす[ruby end]めねぇ[pause]
[ruby base]乗[ruby top]の[ruby end]ったら　[icon WiiRemote]を[setfontcol red][ruby base]立[ruby top]た[ruby end]てろ[setfontcol default]！[newpage]
[icon WiiRemote]を[setfontcol red]かたむけて[ruby base]移動[ruby top]いどう[ruby end][setfontcol default]、[icon Abtn]で[setfontcol red]ジャンプ[setfontcol default]！[pause]
ジャマするヤツは　ふみつぶせ！

방해하는 녀석은 밟아 버려!

Papy a perdu ses dents, alors

TearDropGalaxy_Penguin022.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Giant Gringills[setfontcol default] have been terrorizing
the waters lately![pause] Can you help us?

[setfontcol red]Giant Gringills[setfontcol default] have been terrorizing
the waters lately![pause] Can you help us?

TearDropGalaxy_Penguin022.UsFrench:

géants[setfontcol default] sèment la terreur dans ces
mers! [pause]Peux-tu nous aider?

anguilles[setfontcol default] sèment la terreur en mer.[pause]

aterrorizando estas aguas![pause]

causando muchos problemas

¿No podrías hacer algo?

Meer unsicher. [pause]Kann man da nichts
machen?

[setfontcol default]stanno minacciando queste acque!
Che possiamo fare?!
TearDropGalaxy_Penguin022.JpJapanese:
[ruby base]最近[ruby top]さいきん[ruby end][setfontcol red]デカいアナゴ[setfontcol default]が　[ruby base]海[ruby top]うみ[ruby end]を[ruby base]荒[ruby top]あ[ruby end]らしてんだ[pause]
なんとか　なんねーかなー？

망가뜨리고 있어[pause] 어떻게 안 될까?

TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.UsEnglish:
Wahahaha! You made it![newpage]
But I won't even need my [setfontcol blue]dad[setfontcol default]'s[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol default]help
to take care of you![newpage]
Go at 'em, Megaleg![pause] Stomp 'em with
the power of your [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol default]!
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.EuEnglish:
Wahahaha! You made it![newpage]
But I won't even need my [setfontcol blue]dad[setfontcol default]'s[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol default]help
to take care of you![newpage]
Go at him, Megaleg![pause] Stomp him with
the power of your [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol default]!
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.EuDutch:
Wahahaha! You made it![newpage]
But I won't even need my [setfontcol blue]dad[setfontcol default]'s[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol default]help
to take care of you![newpage]
Go at him, Megaleg![pause] Stomp him with
the power of your [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol default]!
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.UsFrench:
Waaahahaha! Alors te voilà![newpage]
Mais pour te battre, ce n'est même
pas la peine de déranger [setfontcol blue]papa[setfontcol default]![newpage]
À l'attaque, Mégapod![pause]
Montre-lui l'étendue du pouvoir 
de ta [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grande Étoile[setfontcol default]!
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.EuFrench:
Waaahahaha! Alors te voilà![newpage]
Inutile de déranger [setfontcol blue]papa [setfontcol default]pour se
débarrasser de toi![newpage]
A l'attaque, Mégapod![pause]
Montre-lui l'étendue du pouvoir des
[setfontcol red]grandes étoiles[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]!
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.UsSpanish:
¡Ajaja! ¡Lo conseguiste![newpage]
¡Pero ni siquiera necesitaré la ayuda
de mi [setfontcol blue]papá[setfontcol default] para encargarme de ti![newpage]
¡Adelante, Megatrípode! ¡Aplástalos
con el poder de tu [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Maxiestrella[setfontcol default]!
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.EuSpanish:
¡JUAAA, JUAAA, JUAAA![newpage]
¡Yo solo puedo destruirte sin la
ayuda de [setfontcol blue]papá[setfontcol default]! ¡Eres un enclenque![newpage]
¡Megatrípode, sal a luchar![pause]
¡Haz que sienta el poder de la
[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]Maxiestrella[setfontcol default]!
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.EuGerman:
Hahahaha! Du bist weit gekommen![newpage]
Aber für einen wie dich brauch ich 
nicht mal die Hilfe meines [setfontcol blue]Vaters[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Los! Megabein![pause] Zeig ihm die
Macht des [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Großen Sterns[setfontcol default]!
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.EuItalian:
Ahahahahah! Ce l'hai fatta![newpage]
Con te non avrò neanche bisogno
dell'aiuto di [setfontcol blue]papà[setfontcol default]![newpage]
Vai, Tripodobot![pause] Mostra il potere
della [setfontcol red]Megastella[setfontcol default] [icon GrandStar]!
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.JpJapanese:
わーっはっはっは！　よく[ruby base]来[ruby top]き[ruby end]たな！[newpage]
でも　オマエごとき、
[setfontcol blue]お[ruby base]父[ruby top]とう[ruby end]さん[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]手[ruby top]て[ruby end]を　[ruby base]借[ruby top]か[ruby end]りるまでもねぇぞ！[newpage]
[ruby base]行[ruby top]い[ruby end]けーっ！　メガレッグ！[pause]
[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]グランドスター[setfontcol default]の[ruby base]力[ruby top]ちから[ruby end]を　[ruby base]見[ruby top]み[ruby end]せてやれ！
TriPodBossZone_KoopaJr000.KrKorean:
와핫핫핫! 잘도 왔구나![newpage]
하지만 너 따윈
[setfontcol blue]아버지[setfontcol default]의 힘을 빌릴 필요도 없어![newpage]
가랏! 메가레그![pause]
[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]그랜드스타[setfontcol default]의 힘을 보여 줘라!

helping my friend![pause] [setfontcol blue]Spin [setfontcol default]to [setfontcol blue]hit
[setfontcol default]something and knock them out!

The [setfontcol red]power lines[setfontcol default] are keeping me from

Fai saltare la [setfontcol red]corrente [setfontcol blue]colpendoli

UfoBegomanChainedPlanetZone_Tico001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red][ruby base]電線[ruby top]でんせん[ruby end][setfontcol default]がジャマで　[ruby base]仲間[ruby top]なかま[ruby end]を[ruby base]助[ruby top]たす[ruby end]けられません！[pause]
[setfontcol blue]スピン[setfontcol default]で[ruby base]何[ruby top]なに[ruby end]か[setfontcol blue]ぶつけて[setfontcol default]　[setfontcol red][ruby base]電線[ruby top]でんせん[ruby end][setfontcol default]を[ruby base]消[ruby top]け[ruby end]してください！

UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.UsEnglish:
MAN, that was close![pause] ...[midpause]Oh! [player_ml_normal]!
I almost forgot to tell you something.[newpage]
I was trying to get a [icon PowerStar], but I fell
into this treasure chest. Let me tell
you, it's even smaller than it looks![newpage]
Anyway, here's the [icon PowerStar] I found in
there. No, really, it's yours!
UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.EuEnglish:
MAN, that was close![pause] ...[midpause]Oh! [player_ml_normal]!
I almost forgot to tell you something.[newpage]

into this treasure chest. Let me tell
you, it's even smaller than it looks![newpage]
Anyway, here's the [icon PowerStar] I found in

MAN, that was close![pause] ...[midpause]Oh! [player_ml_normal]!
I almost forgot to tell you something.[newpage]
I was trying to get a [icon PowerStar], but I fell
into this treasure chest. Let me tell
you, it's even smaller than it looks![newpage]
Anyway, here's the [icon PowerStar] I found in
there. No, really, it's yours!
UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.UsFrench:
ZUT, c'était difficile![pause] ...[midpause]...[midpause]...[midpause]...[midpause]...[midpause]...[midpause] Ah!
[player_ml_normal]! J'ai failli oublier de te dire
quelque chose.[newpage]
J'essayais d'obtenir une [icon PowerStar], mais je
suis tombé dans ce coffre. Quel
cauchemar! J'ai failli étouffer![newpage]
En tout cas, voici la [icon PowerStar] que j'ai
trouvée dedans. Non, j'insiste!
UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.EuFrench:
Pouah! Je ne pouvais plus respirer![pause]
.[midpause].[midpause].[midpause] Aaah! [player_ml_normal]![newpage]
En fait, je suis tombé dans ce coffre
en voulant attraper une [setfontcol yellow]super
étoile[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar], c'était terrible![newpage]
Quoi qu'il en soit, prends la [setfontcol yellow]super
étoile[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] que j'ai trouvée!
UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.UsSpanish:
¡Eso ha sido durísimo!
[midpause]¡O[midpause]o[midpause]o[midpause]o[midpause]o[midpause]h, [midpause][player_ml_normal]![newpage]
Estaba intentando recoger una
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Superestrella[setfontcol default], cuando me caí
dentro del cofre. ¡Lo he pasado fatal![newpage]
¡Llévate la [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Superestrella[setfontcol default]
que encontré! ¡Toma!
UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.EuSpanish:
¡Uggggh! ¡Casi me muero![pause]
[midpause]¡O[midpause]o[midpause]o[midpause]o[midpause]o[midpause]h, [midpause][player_ml_normal]![newpage]
Estaba intentando coger una
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]Superestrella[setfontcol default] cuando me caí
dentro del cofre. ¡Lo he pasado fatal![newpage]
¡Llévate la [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]Superestrella[setfontcol default]
que encontré! ¡Toma!
UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.EuGerman:
Puh! Ich wär beinahe erstickt![pause]
...[midpause]...[midpause]...[midpause]...[midpause]...[midpause]...[midpause]Oh! [player_ml_normal]![newpage]
Ach, ich wollte gerade einen 
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern [setfontcol default]aufheben, da ist er 
in diese Schatztruhe gefallen. [newpage]
Es war furchtbar![newpage]
Na jedenfalls, nimmst du bitte den 
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern[setfontcol default], den ich gefunden 
habe?
UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.EuItalian:
Uff![pause] È stata dura... [midpause]... [midpause]... [midpause]...[midpause] ...[midpause] ...[midpause] Oh!
[player_ml_normal]![newpage]
Stavo cercando di prendere una [setfontcol yellow]Su-
perstella[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar], ma è caduta in un
forziere. Che incubo![newpage]
Ad ogni modo, puoi tenere tu la
[setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar] che ho preso?
UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.JpJapanese:
ぶっは～！　[ruby base]苦[ruby top]くる[ruby end]しかった～～！[pause]
…[midpause]…[midpause]…[midpause]…[midpause]…[midpause]…[midpause]あ～～！　[player_ml_normal]さん！[newpage]
いやぁ、[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol default][ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]ろうとしたら
[ruby base]宝箱[ruby top]たからばこ[ruby end]の[ruby base]中[ruby top]なか[ruby end]に[ruby base]落[ruby top]お[ruby end]ちちゃって、　[ruby base]大変[ruby top]たいへん[ruby end]でしたよ～！[newpage]
というわけで、ワ[midpause]タ[midpause]シ[midpause]がゲットした
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol default]、[ruby base]持[ruby top]も[ruby end]ってってください！
UnderseaTunnelZone_Kinopio001.KrKorean:
푸하～! 괴로워～～![pause]
…[midpause]…[midpause]…[midpause]…[midpause]…[midpause]…[midpause]아～～! [player_ml_normal]님![newpage]
제가요, [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 얻으려다가
보물상자 안에 떨어져서 혼났지 뭐예요～![newpage]
어쨌든 저[midpause] 키[midpause]노[midpause]피[midpause]오[midpause]가 얻은
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]파워스타[setfontcol default]를 드릴게요!

UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster001.UsEnglish:
This is my hideaway.[newpage]
It's the perfect spot for fishing...and
being left alone!

This is my hideaway.[newpage]
It's the perfect spot for fishing...and
being left alone!

Ichi, ch'est mon refuge checret.[newpage]
Ch'est parfait pour aller à la pêche...

Ichi, ch'est mon refuge checret.[newpage]
Il est en forme de poichon...
Ch'est beau, n'est-ce pas♪

Esta es mi casa de recreo.[newpage]

Eshte esh mi lugar de retiro.[newpage]
El pesh foshil tiene una forma

Das ist mein Versteck.[newpage]
Ein perfekter Ort zum Angeln...♪
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster001.EuItalian:

Il posticino ideale per pescare... ♪
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster001.JpJapanese:
ここは　ワシの　かくれ[ruby base]家[ruby top]が[ruby end]じゃ[newpage]
[ruby base]シャカナ[ruby top]サカナ[ruby end]の[ruby base]造[ruby top]つく[ruby end]りが　[ruby base]シュテキ[ruby top]ステキ[ruby end]じゃろ～♪
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster001.KrKorean:
여긴 내 아지트야[newpage]

UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster002.UsEnglish:
What was that?[pause] Do my eyes deceive
me, or did one of those [setfontcol red]mushroom
kids[setfontcol default] pop out of that chest?

What was that?[pause] Do my eyes deceive
me, or did one of those [setfontcol red]mushroom
kids[setfontcol default] pop out of that chest?

me, or did one of those [setfontcol red]mushroom
kids[setfontcol default] pop out of that chest?
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster002.UsFrench:
Voyons! Ch'est quoi?[pause] Un 
[setfontcol red]champignon vivant [setfontcol default]est chorti de ce
coffre! Ch'est de la chorchellerie!!!
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster002.EuFrench:
Un [setfontcol red]champignon vivant [setfontcol default]est chorti de ce
coffre![pause]
Ch'est de la chorchellerie!!
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster002.UsSpanish:
¿Cómo?[pause] ¡Ha salido un
[setfontcol red]champiñón vivo[setfontcol default] de ese cofre!

¡Un [setfontcol red]shampiñón vivo[setfontcol default] ha shalido
del cofre! [pause]
¡Sheguro que trae mala shuerte!
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster002.EuGerman:
Da war ja ein [setfontcol red]lebendiger Pilz [setfontcol default]in der
Schatztruhe! Das ist ein Fluch der 
Götter!!!
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster002.EuItalian:
Nel forziere... [pause] c'è un [setfontcol red]Fungo Energia[setfontcol default]!
Che bello!
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster002.JpJapanese:
なんと、[ruby base]宝箱[ruby top]たからばこ[ruby end]から[setfontcol red][ruby base]生[ruby top]い[ruby end]きたキノコ[setfontcol default]が！[pause]
た、タタリじゃー！！
UnderseaTunnelZone_PenguinMaster002.KrKorean:
보물상자에서 [setfontcol red]살아있는 버섯[setfontcol default]이![pause]
