VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker001.JpJapanese: ほな、また[ruby base]来[ruby top]き[ruby end]てな！

VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.UsEnglish:
You got zero. ZERO PURPLE COINS![pause]
Tell me you're doing that on purpose!
This old iron lady isn't amused.
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.EuEnglish:
You got zero. ZERO PURPLE COINS![pause]
Tell me you're doing that on purpose!
This old iron lady isn't amused.
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.EuDutch:
You got zero. ZERO PURPLE COINS![pause]
Tell me you're doing that on purpose!
This old iron lady isn't amused.
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.UsFrench:
Zéro... Zéro?! Dis moi...[pause]
T'as fait exprès?![newpage]
En un sens, c'est impressionnant...
mais moé je trouve ça plutôt nul.
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.EuFrench:
Zéro... Zéro?! Dis-moi...[pause]
T'as fait exprès?![newpage]
En un sens, c'est impressionnant...
mais moi je trouve ça plutôt nul.
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.UsSpanish:
Tienes cero. ¡CERO MONEDAS
PÚRPURAS![pause] ¿Lo haces a propósito?
No estoy nada impresionada.
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.EuSpanish:
Cero moneda'...[pause]
¡Lo está' hasiendo a propósito![newpage]
No está nada mal pero, no se me van
a caer la' tuerca' de la emosión.
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.EuGerman:
Wie jetzt, 0 Stück?[pause]
Machst du das mit Absicht?!?[newpage]
Manche finden das wohl toll, aber
einen Oldtimer wie mich beeindruckt
das wenig.
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.EuItalian:
Non ne hai neanche una! Zero![newpage]
L'hai fatto apposta? Per te sarà di-
vertente, ma non per una persona
seria come me!
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker002.JpJapanese:
0[ruby base]枚[ruby top]まい[ruby end]って、アンタ…[pause]
ワザと　やってるやろ！[newpage]
これは　これで　すごいと[ruby base]思[ruby top]おも[ruby end]うけど、
おばちゃん、そういうのは　あんまり[ruby base]好[ruby top]す[ruby end]かんな

0개라꼬… 니[pause]
일부러 그란 거 맞제?[newpage]
0개이기도 쉽지 않다는 건 알지마는
아줌마는 그란 거 별로 안 좋아한다

VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker003.UsEnglish:
You got [var 1 0]? This is just not working.[pause]
You can't go at life all halfhearted.
You have to just go for it!

You got [var 1 0]? This is just not working.[pause]
You can't go at life all halfhearted.
You have to just go for it!

Faut pas partir battu d'avance.[pause]
Y faut donner tout ce que t'as!
OK?

[var 1 0]? C'est pas assez...[pause]

¿Tienes [var 1 0]? Esto no va nada bien.[pause]
No puedes hacer las cosas a medias.
¡Tienes que poner todo tu esfuerzo!
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker003.EuSpanish:
Monedas recogidas: [var 1 0].[pause]
¡Qué malita e'tá la cosa!
¡Te viadar un consejillo, anda![newpage]
No te ponga' a pensar en fracaso'.
¡Metéle caña! ¡Valor y al torete!
VsHugeBattleShipZone_Caretaker003.EuGerman:
[var 1 0] Münze(n), wie? Das reicht nicht...[pause]
Soll dieser Oldtimer dir mal einen
Tipp geben?[newpage]
Denk nicht darüber nach, dass du 
versagen könntest. [pause]Du musst eben
was riskieren! [setfontcol blue]Rums[setfontcol default]! Einfach so!

Ne hai [var 1 0]? Così non va.[pause]

Guarda [setfontcol blue]avanti[setfontcol default] ed agisci d'impulso!

[var 1 0][ruby base]枚[ruby top]まい[ruby end]かー　あっかんなぁ～………[pause]

…まぁいいや　[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol default]も[ruby base]手[ruby top]て[ruby end]に[ruby base]入[ruby top]い[ruby end]れたし
[setfontcol green]ボク[setfontcol default]が[ruby base]取[ruby top]と[ruby end]ったって　[setfontcol red]ロゼッタさん[setfontcol default]に[ruby base]伝[ruby top]つた[ruby end]えといて！
VsHugeBattleShipZone_LuigiEvent003.KrKorean:
형도 참! 너무하잖아![pause]
이런 우주 한복판에 버려두고 가지 마![newpage]
…됐어 [icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]파워스타[setfontcol default]는 얻었으니까
[setfontcol red]로젤리나님[setfontcol default]에게는 [setfontcol green]내[setfontcol default]가 얻은 거라고 말해 줘!

VsHugeBattleShipZone_LuigiEvent004.UsEnglish:
Me! How could you?[pause] You were going
to leave me out in space![newpage]
At least we got a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default] out
of it. Tell [setfontcol red]Rosalina[setfontcol green] I[setfontcol default] found this one!
VsHugeBattleShipZone_LuigiEvent004.EuEnglish:
Me! How could you?[pause] You were going
to leave me out in space![newpage]
At least we got a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default] out
of it. Tell [setfontcol red]Rosalina[setfontcol green] I[setfontcol default] found this one!
VsHugeBattleShipZone_LuigiEvent004.EuDutch:
Me! How could you?[pause] You were going
to leave me out in space![newpage]
At least we got a [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol default] out
of it. Tell [setfontcol red]Rosalina[setfontcol green] I[setfontcol default] found this one!
VsHugeBattleShipZone_LuigiEvent004.UsFrench:
Hé moi![pause] C'est pas sympa de
me laisser tout seul dans 
l'espace comme ça![newpage]
Bon, on a la [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Super 
Étoile[setfontcol default]. Dis à [setfontcol red]Rosalina[setfontcol default] que 
c'est [setfontcol green]moi[setfontcol default] qui l'ai trouvée!
VsHugeBattleShipZone_LuigiEvent004.EuFrench:
Luigi![pause] C'est pas sympa de me laisser
tout seul dans l'espace comme ça![newpage]
... Enfin bon, j'ai la [setfontcol red]super étoile[setfontcol default] [icon PowerStar].
Dis bien à [setfontcol red]Harmonie [setfontcol default]que c'est [setfontcol green]moi [setfontcol default]qui
l'ai trouvée!
VsHugeBattleShipZone_LuigiEvent004.UsSpanish:
¡Eh, tú! ¿Cómo pudiste hacerlo? ¡Ibas
a dejarme en el espacio![newpage]
Al menos conseguimos una
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Superestrella[setfontcol default].[newpage]
¡Dile a [setfontcol red]Rosalina[setfontcol green] [setfontcol default]que [setfontcol green]yo [setfontcol default]encontré esta!
VsHugeBattleShipZone_LuigiEvent004.EuSpanish:
¡Eh, tú![pause]
¡¿Me ibas a dejar en el
medio de la nada?![newpage]
Bah, ya da igual... Además,

Echt! Wie konnte ich nur![newpage]
Ich kann mich doch nicht 
hier im Weltall im Stich 
lassen![newpage]
Na, egal. Dafür habe ich ja 
einen [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power-Stern[setfontcol default] 
ergattert. [newpage]
Richte [setfontcol red]Rosalina [setfontcol default]aus, dass 
[setfontcol green]ich [setfontcol default]ihn gefunden habe!

WaterRoadCaveExZone_Kinopio002.JpJapanese: まぶしいのは　[ruby base]月[ruby top]つき[ruby end]のせいでしょうか？
